story:
Has your mobile phone battery ever died at the worst possible time?  Do you like to listen to music with family and friends?  Do you spend time outdoors?  Then Solarwave is right for you.

Hello, my name is Connor.  I started Solarwave with my dad, brother and family to address a problem we all have with mobile devices.  The battery life is often short lived, and the speakers do not allow you to play music loud enough for your friends and family to enjoy with you.

This is the genius of the Solarwave - a stylish solution to keeping mobile devices powered using the sun, while entertaining with Bluetooth speakers to share music.

Imagine you are having a great time at the beach, camping, fishing, hunting, tailgating or wherever you may be that is away from a power outlet. All of a sudden your mobile device battery dies! We have all been there and it always seems to happen at the worst of times. With Solarwave, no problem. Solarwave uses the power of the sun as an endless power source and has enough battery life without the sun to fully charge eight typical mobile devices. On top of keeping all of your devices charged, it has built in high performance wireless Bluetooth speakers to ensure non-stop entertainment for your family and friends. 

Your contribution to our campaign and helping by spreading the word to others will make Solarwave a success. Everything is ready to move quickly into production. The first $20,000 is needed for startup costs (product mold), but will soon shift to a per-unit cost. First units will ship by September.

We have some great perks including an early bird special for just $60 to be one of the first to own a Solarwave. We expect future retail to be over $100. So get yours fast!

Solarwave has a stylish, compact, durable design for indoor or outdoor use and stands only 6” (150mm) high, packed with battery power (20,000 mAh – average phone is 1800mAh) and Bluetooth enabled speakers. You can use Solarwave for entertainment, keep all your mobile devices charged, and always be ready if the power goes out.  It’s also perfect to just use the wireless Bluetooth speakers at home, then pack it up in its stylish case when you head outdoors.  Solarwave is a must have for any home or even as an awesome gift!

Your help will make Solarwave a success. If you have a great story of how you can see using Solarwave in your life or one about a time your mobile phone died and you could have used Solarwave, we would love to hear it!  

Thanks for learning about Solarwave!

- Connor and the Solarwave Team

story:
Limelight Power Dock
Make Your Bike a Smart Bike

 

Are you tired of having to stop and dig your smartphone out of your pocket or your bag to check your phone or use your GPS?  Tired of buying one device for GPS, one device to track your workout, another for listening to playlists, another for a headlight?  Tired of managing your phone to save its precious battery life? 

Perfect for anyone who likes to ride a bike, the Limelight power dock easily connects to your phone via Bluetooth and securely mounts your smartphone to your handlebars. It frees you from the handlebar clutter caused by multiple one-function devices.

The handlebar mount places your smartphone front and center for easy viewing. The built in battery nearly triples your current battery life.  That means you can leave on turn-by turn directions to see your route before you miss your turns. And the Bluetooth connection means you can use all your phone capabilities: your internet connection, your apps, your fitness peripherals, and your playlists,  all day, over a crisp, clear speaker. Limelight's built in buttons make it easy to answer calls and raise or lower the bluetooth speaker volume on the go. 

Limelight lets you actually use all the features of  the best on-board computer you already own - your smartphone. 

It also adds a double LED headlight, and yes, it  has a bell. 

Limelight Power Dock makes your bike a smart bike.

A phone dock,  power bank, Bluetooth Speaker and LED headlight in one elegant, high-quality, easy- to-use device.



Let's face it, wearables such as Fitbit, Gear S2, or Apple Watch don't deliver what a cyclist wants. We want to use GPS to find new routes - and the way home. 

We want to track our workout progress - pace, heart rate, and miles.  We'd like to listen to workout playlists, but earbuds are dangerous while biking. Answering the phone or checking calls easily without stopping would be ideal. 


A third party GPS device, such as Garmin, is expensive, performs only one function, and is limited by their software. It can't answer the phone; and it can't be customized. It doesn't work with your favorite biking apps and your heart rate monitor. Wearables might work with your apps, but the screens - and their batteries - are way too small.  


I waited for technology to adapt and work better for cyclists.  I searched for a product that combined all my needs in one place. I couldn't find one. Finally, working with bike, auto and motorcycle technology experts, I have the perfect cycling accessory. The Limelight Power Dock turns your bike into a smart bike and puts everything at your finger tips. 

The Limelight Power Dock - paired with your phone - is the most powerful riding computer available.


Key functions and features:
  • Dock positions your phone for easy access to all your phone's capabilities.
  • Bluetooth pairs with your phone and peripherals to monitor speed, distance, or heart rate using your favorite workout app.
  • 4400 mAh power bank nearly triples your current battery life for extended GPS, light, speaker, and phone use.
  • The dock positions your phone for clear viewing of google maps, while speakers provide crisp audio of turn-by-turn directions.
  • The Bluetooth speaker lets you hear calls or listen to music while riding. No need to use dangerous earbuds which impede your hearing.
  • Double LED headlight let you see or be seen.  Two modes-always on or flashing.
  • Perfectly positioned push button bell alerts others to your presence.
  • Built in micro TF card slot plays and stores music with and without your phone;  Skip songs and adjust volume easily using Limelight's controls.
  • On board internet access can help you find a new spot for coffee, or a great destination.
  • IP54 water resistant.   Dock retains connectivity for clear and crisp audio functions even if your phone is stored in your pocket and out of the rain.
  • USB out (for charging phone) and Mini USB in (for charging unit).
  • Android and iPhone compatible.

Get turn by turn directions front and center


Answer your phone with the push of a button


Charges Your Phone While You Ride



Any App at your Fingertips



Your Favorite Workout App



Strava and Map My Ride Biking Apps



Listen to your Playlist or Stream the Game




Find a Restaurant and Get Turn by Turn Directions





Awesome Deal!

Our first supporters can purchase the Limelight at wholesale-only $50 with free shipping!
The cost of a bike light or external battery charger alone can easily cost over $50. Wearables can cost more than $250, and a GPS unit can easily cost in excess of $400. The Limelight serves all these functions and will retail for only $100. Our first supporters can purchase the Limelight at wholesale pricing-only $50.The Limelight turns your phone into a usable on-board computer with internet access and adds an LED headlight,  Bluetooth speaker, and a power bank to recharge your phone.




Limelight Power Dock
plus phone serves all these functions



$500 value for as low $50


Use Your Existing Biking Hardware

The beauty of the Limelight Power Dock is that it does not replace your existing phone-based workout hardware or apps. Keep using your heart rate or cadence monitor paired to your favorite riding app. The Limelight allows you to keep your existing setup using your phone as the brain. With the Limelight, you have infinite customization and no wasteful spending on additional hardware or computing power.



New Feature-Removable Bell


Perks 

We need your support to launch our project, and as a reward we are giving our first buyers special incentives.

Loyalty Exclusive with Free Shipping
Our first 250 buyers receive wholesale pricing- $50

Loyalty Exclusive
Our next 250 buyers receive wholesale pricing- $50 plus shipping

Early Bird Special
Our next 500 buyers can purchase the unit at $65 plus shipping

Still an Awesome Deal Pricing
Purchase the Power Dock at $100 plus shipping

"Twofer" $130 Deal Pricing
250 pairs available for $130 plus shipping

Wholesale by the Case Pricing
Retail pack of 20 units per carton available at $50/unit. For large orders please contact us directly


Limelight Story/Timeline


The idea-July 2015

The idea of a multi-functional bicycle audio device came from Mr. Zhang, a member of The Dream of Guangzhou Cycling Team, and a friend of our manufacturer. Mr. Zhang cycled with his team more than 500km across Malaysia in July 2015 to support the Beijing Olympic Winter Games at the scene of the International Olympic Committee’s 128th session in Kuala Lumpur. The team also traveled to Europe to support the London Olympic Games and cycled to the Korea to support the Incheon Asian Games. Their ongoing goal is to advocate a low carbon footprint through their cycling activities. 

During these rides Mr. Zhang listened to MP3 music. Another team member asked to use the device to listen to radio, but Mr. Zhang's device was limited to playing MP3.  Mr. Zhang was intrigued with the idea of a more versatile device, and began researching various bike products. He found products that were just lights, others just speakers, and all were limited to few functions and not configurable.  The idea for the Limelight Power Dock was born. 

Your phone is more powerful than any wearable, is able to sync with Bluetooth (music, heart rate, cadence etc), is already configured with your favorite riding apps and is the most powerful computer available. It's the perfect brain behind the Limelight 

Your phone coupled with the power dock serves as a perfect touring computer. It has all the functions of your phone, GPS turn by turn directions, radio, music, internet, and adds a light, speakers to listen to music, radio or amplify calls and turn by turn directions. It has  a huge battery reserve to keep your phone going on those two day camping trips.

The manufacturer specializes in car, motorcycle and bike technology  used his expertise and experience to design the prototype.


The Indiegogo Launch  December 2015

My name is John Moubayed, I have been importing for 15 years, and I love to ride. On one of my recent trips to Hong Kong I found and fell in love with the Power Dock.  I often tour on my bike and have to stop for phone call, or need to pull out my phone for GPS directions. Always concerned about my battery, I used my GPS as I would a map. I'd pull it out for directions, then turn it off to conserve power.  But the need to have GPS visible and usable for extended periods of time was strong.  I never really considered a wearable because the battery life is poor as well.  The Limelight is perfect for a touring rider like me. 

If you like long rides to new places or weekend trips exploring multiple destinations, or if you are in a more urban setting with many quick turns,  the Limelight Power Dock is perfect. With GPS on, most phone batteries last less than half a day. If you are using GPS for extended periods,  or camping overnight, your battery simply will not last.  

The Power dock gives you 150% more battery life to get you through a second day. It can be removed from your bike to serve as a charging station, camp light, or speakers for entertainment no matter where you stop. 


I love to track my progress and speed with varying biking apps and for the fitness-focused your phone can pair with heart monitors as well. 

We are ready to bring this product to life.  We have tested the prototype and are making some minor modifications.   We expect to complete the modifications and production by our ship date in May 2016.


Ship Date-May 2016

Our Indiegogo campaign will end in early February. We expect about 90 days for production and shipping, and anticipate shipping to contributors around mid May.

Risks & Challenges

While we have experience in bringing products to life, manufacturing a new item can be difficult. We have tested the unit and some modifications have been made to the phone holder to allow for larger phones and cases and larger handlebars. These modifications require new molds and take time, which we have factored into our delivery date.  While we don't anticipate problems, it is possible that delivery gets pushed back a month. Should we get very large interest in the Power Dock delivery could also be pushed back due to excessive demand, but we will do a rolling delivery on a first ordered, first delivered basis. 

The Limelight Power Dock ships with mini USB cable to charge both Android phones and the Power Dock.  For i-Phone users your existing phone cords will work with USB out to charge your phones.

Please share our link

Even if you don't ride a bike, please take the time to share our link with your friends who do ride. Indiegogo has share tools.

story:
As Featured in



         


Technology has become our everyday environment.We all need it, but what is it that technology really needs? The answer’s simple: to be flexible, powerful, save energy and pollute less.

That means no more wires, no more chargers and most importantly no more problems.

Go on, admit it, you’re still dealing with a huge problem. Do you know that not much has changed in pretty much a century?

Imagine a system that lets you simultaneously power and charge everything electronic you hold dear, that lets you use and charge your devices at the same time, that offers high speed charging.

Look no further. 


                                                              


JOS offers the chance to really improve your living and working spaces and save time.

JOS is a freestanding energy surface, a lightweight steel panel containing powerful sockets enabling you to wirelessly charge all kinds of devices from smartphones to tablets, from cameras to small appliances. A new technology that simultaneously charges a number of devices on one smart powerful surface. It’s easy to use and you could save up to 15% more energy than with a traditional system. 

                     


Plug up to six JOS Domes into your Energy Surface to get high power charging.

Take your Dome with you when you’re on the go and use it as a Power Bank. Get rid of wires, declutter and organise your living and work spaces. Easy-to-use, practical and effective, JOS Dome improves your technological life. 




Fill your Energy Surface up with devices and take full advantage of JOS. 




                     


This is our PLUS for now. This is only the initial version of JOS. Helping this project you'll be supporting something much bigger. 

JOS is much more than a simple charging product. It’ s a new kind of socket and plug, a revolutionary technology which makes whole surfaces (like a table or a wall) capable of feeding with power greater than 100 W per connection point for all our devices, with an energy saving up to 15%.

This means: lighting systems, notebooks, appliances, managed at the same time, allowing removal, modification and replacement only with a touch of the hand, without cables and structural interventions.



                       

WITH FRIENDS

AT WORK

ON THE GO POWER BANK

ON THE GO – BAG

ON THE GO – SNAP



JOS PANEL 

The first ever Energy Surface. An ultra-innovative charging system containing six high power sockets.

JOS Panel is a freestanding Energy Surface powered from your home electricity system. Each spot is a powerful socket where you can plug in and power your JOS Dome to charge your smartphone, tablet and much more.



JOS DOME

Charger & Power Bank

A new kind of plug. Use and charge your devices at the same time. 

Two versions available: Micro-USB/Lightning plug.  Micro USB & USB port. 

Easy charging with a touch of the hand.

JOS Dome is an ultra-innovative plug that quickly charges low voltage devices on your JOS Panel. It has a MICRO-USB plug for charging most smartphones and tablets or a Lightning Plug for Apple devices.

Each version has a USB socket for charging other low voltage devices using a different type of plug (meaning that each Dome can charge up to two devices at the same time) and a Micro USB socket so you can charge the Dome from your home electricity system or PC.

The Dome is also a Power Bank. Take it with you when you’re on the go and charge devices from the USB socket (you’ll need a USB cable) to ensure you’re never short on charge.



JOS NET

An ultra-light practical tool for charging tablets on the Dome. If you want to use your Dome on the go just take it off.

JOS Net is a useful accessory that helps you arrange your devices on the Panel.Its ergonomic and functional design holds the JOS Dome in place when you’re charging tablets and other large devices. It’s quick and easy to put on and off – all you have to do is click it in and out around the base of the Dome.



         CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE COLOR & PLUG



                     


Titanium Skin

Black Dots


What’s great about the JOS Panel is not only can you customise how you arrange your devices, you can choose one of two textures (titanium skin / black dots) and ask us to engrave the steel surface with your favourite words, for instance your name, the name of your loved one or a phrase that means something to you.




                                  




                      




The button underneath the Dome turns on the LED light at the centre of the JOS logo. When the light is green the Power Bank is fully charged and good to go; when it’s red it needs charging, either on the Panel or from another source using a USB cable. 

    


Your Dome can be charged straight from the JOS Panel or from another energy source such as a notebook using a USB cable.



                        


A Spin Off of the University of Pisa, JOS Technology was founded in 2013. Since then we’ve taken part in lots of electronics shows and have won various awards. The feedback we’ve received has convinced us that our product needs to be simple, practical and useful.

Over the past two years we’ve invested in R&D, engineering and design. 

We’ve selected the best materials and developed the best techniques and now our product is nearly ready for market.

JOS is Made in Italy, designed and produced with care and passion, excellently manufactured and showcases quality Italian design.



                             



                       



Five years ago we had a flash of inspiration that has turned into JOS…                  

Just One System. We’ve worked really hard and created countless prototypes to provide the best usability and design inside a small practical device. We’re really excited about launching our product.

By helping launch this project you’ll be supporting something much bigger: JOS isn’t just a product but a real piece of innovative technology.

We want to provide a new standard.

Imagine a wall where dozens of notebooks, smartphones, lighting systems and much more can all be charged at the same time without sockets or cables, efficiently and quickly...

You’d be able to charge any device, move and change your energy surface with a touch of the hand… 

And you’d make an energy saving up to 15%, and you can use also photovoltaics.

By supporting JOS you will ensure that tomorrow we’ll find infinite charging points inside houses, offices and public spaces… without being tied to electrical outlets.

Be one of the first people to own a JOS!

Together let’s make JOS a reality.

Thank you. 



For further information about who we are please do visit our website.
Please feel free to contact us for any support, we’d love to hear from you! customer@jostechnology.com


                              

JOS is a patented and tested system that has shown no particular technical or functional problems. Defects in the prototypes have been resolved by carefully engineering the panels to make them increasingly lighter and thinner. The plug connection has been made smaller and more efficient. The functionality of the system has been improved by integrating a Power Bank into the Dome.
By using technologically advanced machinery we’ll be able to get even better results in terms of shapes and sizing. It’s positive news in terms of certifications too: low voltage and made of ferromagnetic material, the system is passive and intrinsically benign. JOS is currently at the Beta prototype stage.
When you support us we guarantee to produce the best results. But as you know, a start-up’s journey can sometimes be arduous and there may well be some unexpected hiccups along the way. We promise to tell you everything that’s going on and do our very best to solve any problem that may arise.

JOS is much more than a simple charging product. It’ s a revolutionary technology which makes whole surfaces capable of feeding with power greater than 100 W per connection point for all our devices. 
This means: lighting systems, notebooks, appliances, managed at the same time, allowing removal, modification and replacement with a simple gesture, without structural interventions.


                         JOIN OUR COMMUNITY!

           Help us innovate and create the first ever powerful Energy Surface

                                                  Change the charge 

                   Get rid of your cables and liberate yourself from chargers

                                                    Surprise the world!

                                  Become an innovator and get rewarded!

                                                Thanks for your support!



                             

PRODUCT

Panel
Q: Does JOS use magnetic induction?
A: NO. The system contains an electrical contact enabling JOS to be flexible and wireless like induction while providing more power than traditional charging systems.

Q: What’s the benefit of using the JOS Panel?                                                              
A: You can charge all kinds of devices, it’s flexible, has great design and saves up to 15% more energy than traditional chargers.

Q: How many devices can be charged on a JOS Panel?
A: Each JOS Panel provides 6 connection points for Domes (for a total of 12 devices).

Q: Is the JOS Panel safe?
A: Absolutely. There are no risks associated with using a low voltage electrical surface. The certified AC Power Adapter guarantees maximum safety. However, you should always follow the instructions in the user manual.

Q: Can I clean the panel?
A: Yes. For routine cleaning put a mild detergent or glass cleaner on a soft cloth (never on the panel) and wipe across the panel. Never clean in a swirling motion. For more information about which products to use and how to clean the panel please refer to the user guide and instruction manual.

Q: What can I do if a bit of water or another liquid touches the panel?
A: Don’t panic. The system is splash proof. Turn off the system, turn over the panel and mop up the liquid with an absorbent cloth as soon as possible. Dry the panel completely with a soft cloth. Check the system is working correctly when you next turn it on by ensuring the LED light on the control board is green. If the light is not green, STOP USING THE PANEL and contact customer service on customer@jostechnology.com.

DOME
Q: What’s the benefit of using the JOS Dome?
A: It’s flexible, has great design and saves up to 15% more energy than traditional chargers.JOS Dome has: 1 Micro_USB male (or Lightning), 1 USB 2.0 female, 1 Micro-USB female. For more information on how to use these different USB points please see the Product page. JOS Dome is also a Power Bank letting you charge your devices on the go using a USB cable.

Q: Can I use my phone (or other device) while it’s charging?
A: Sure. JOS Dome lets you use and charge your devices at the same time.

Q: Can I charge my phone on the JOS Dome with its case on?
A: For most phones you can keep the case on, but this depends on the size of the case.

Q: Are all JOS Apple compatible products Apple certified?
A: Yes, all of our Apple compatible products are certified.


NET
Q: What's JOS NET for?
A: It helps hold the JOS Dome in place when charging your tablet on the JOS Panel. The JOS Net has got a hole in the handle so you can attach it to a key ring or carabiner when you want to take your JOS Dome out with you.

Q: What's unique about it?
A: JOS NET is a very useful accessory for the management of your devices, due to its special form of functional and ergonomic design.


GENERAL
Q: Where do you make the products?
A: They are made and assembled in Italy.

Q: When are the perks expected to ship?
A: We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to start fulfilment mid June 2015 and it is our goal to ship to all our backers by 20th December 2015. We will keep our backers informed of our expected delivery timeframes as we get more information during production.

Q: Can I change or cancel my perk?
A: Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on indiegogo are also non-refundable.

Q: Where do I pay for shipping?
A: Shipping costs are added in the additional donation field when you back the campaign as well as in the perks (Shipping Add-On) if you missed it.


                                              

                          JOIN OUR COMMUNITY!                         

                                                  Thanks for your support!


* Icons designed by Flaticon.com
story_txt:
As Featured in         Technology has become our everyday environment.We all need it, but what is it that technology really needs? The answer’s simple: to be flexible, powerful, save energy and pollute less.That means no more wires, no more chargers and most importantly no more problems.Go on, admit it, you’re still dealing with a huge problem. Do you know that not much has changed in pretty much a century?Imagine a system that lets you simultaneously power and charge everything electronic you hold dear, that lets you use and charge your devices at the same time, that offers high speed charging.Look no further.                                                               JOS offers the chance to really improve your living and working spaces and save time.JOS is a freestanding energy surface, a lightweight steel panel containing powerful sockets enabling you to wirelessly charge all kinds of devices from smartphones to tablets, from cameras to small appliances. A new technology that simultaneously charges a number of devices on one smart powerful surface. It’s easy to use and you could save up to 15% more energy than with a traditional system.                      

Plug up to six JOS Domes into your Energy Surface to get high power charging.
Take your Dome with you when you’re on the go and use it as a Power Bank. Get rid of wires, declutter and organise your living and work spaces. Easy-to-use, practical and effective, JOS Dome improves your technological life. 






Fill your Energy Surface up with devices and take full advantage of JOS. 






                      

This is our PLUS for now. This is only the initial version of JOS. Helping this project you'll be supporting something much bigger. 
JOS is much more than a simple charging product. It’ s a new kind of socket and plug, a revolutionary technology which makes whole surfaces (like a table or a wall) capable of feeding with power greater than 100 W per connection point for all our devices, with an energy saving up to 15%.




This means: lighting systems, notebooks, appliances, managed at the same time, allowing removal, modification and replacement only with a touch of the hand, without cables and structural interventions.





                       

WITH FRIENDS



AT WORK



ON THE GO POWER BANK



ON THE GO – BAG



ON THE GO – SNAP






JOS PANEL 




The first ever Energy Surface. An ultra-innovative charging system containing six high power sockets.
JOS Panel is a freestanding Energy Surface powered from your home electricity system. Each spot is a powerful socket where you can plug in and power your JOS Dome to charge your smartphone, tablet and much more.



JOS DOME
Charger & Power Bank




A new kind of plug. Use and charge your devices at the same time. 

Two versions available: Micro-USB/Lightning plug.  Micro USB & USB port. 
Easy charging with a touch of the hand.

JOS Dome is an ultra-innovative plug that quickly charges low voltage devices on your JOS Panel. It has a MICRO-USB plug for charging most smartphones and tablets or a Lightning Plug for Apple devices.


Each version has a USB socket for charging other low voltage devices using a different type of plug (meaning that each Dome can charge up to two devices at the same time) and a Micro USB socket so you can charge the Dome from your home electricity system or PC.


The Dome is also a Power Bank. Take it with you when you’re on the go and charge devices from the USB socket (you’ll need a USB cable) to ensure you’re never short on charge.




JOS NET



An ultra-light practical tool for charging tablets on the Dome. If you want to use your Dome on the go just take it off.
JOS Net is a useful accessory that helps you arrange your devices on the Panel.Its ergonomic and functional design holds the JOS Dome in place when you’re charging tablets and other large devices. It’s quick and easy to put on and off – all you have to do is click it in and out around the base of the Dome.



         CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE COLOR & PLUG



                     


Titanium Skin

Black Dots

What’s great about the JOS Panel is not only can you customise how you arrange your devices, you can choose one of two textures (titanium skin / black dots) and ask us to engrave the steel surface with your favourite words, for instance your name, the name of your loved one or a phrase that means something to you.






                                  




                      










The button underneath the Dome turns on the LED light at the centre of the JOS logo. When the light is green the Power Bank is fully charged and good to go; when it’s red it needs charging, either on the Panel or from another source using a USB cable. 

    

Your Dome can be charged straight from the JOS Panel or from another energy source such as a notebook using a USB cable.





                        




A Spin Off of the University of Pisa, JOS Technology was founded in 2013. Since then we’ve taken part in lots of electronics shows and have won various awards. The feedback we’ve received has convinced us that our product needs to be simple, practical and useful.
Over the past two years we’ve invested in R&D, engineering and design. 
We’ve selected the best materials and developed the best techniques and now our product is nearly ready for market.
JOS is Made in Italy, designed and produced with care and passion, excellently manufactured and showcases quality Italian design.



                             



                       



Five years ago we had a flash of inspiration that has turned into JOS…                  
Just One System. We’ve worked really hard and created countless prototypes to provide the best usability and design inside a small practical device. We’re really excited about launching our product.
By helping launch this project you’ll be supporting something much bigger: JOS isn’t just a product but a real piece of innovative technology.
We want to provide a new standard.
Imagine a wall where dozens of notebooks, smartphones, lighting systems and much more can all be charged at the same time without sockets or cables, efficiently and quickly...
You’d be able to charge any device, move and change your energy surface with a touch of the hand… 
And you’d make an energy saving up to 15%, and you can use also photovoltaics.
By supporting JOS you will ensure that tomorrow we’ll find infinite charging points inside houses, offices and public spaces… without being tied to electrical outlets.
Be one of the first people to own a JOS!
Together let’s make JOS a reality.

Thank you. 




For further information about who we are please do visit our website.
Please feel free to contact us for any support, we’d love to hear from you! customer@jostechnology.com


                              
JOS is a patented and tested system that has shown no particular technical or functional problems. Defects in the prototypes have been resolved by carefully engineering the panels to make them increasingly lighter and thinner. The plug connection has been made smaller and more efficient. The functionality of the system has been improved by integrating a Power Bank into the Dome.
By using technologically advanced machinery we’ll be able to get even better results in terms of shapes and sizing. It’s positive news in terms of certifications too: low voltage and made of ferromagnetic material, the system is passive and intrinsically benign. JOS is currently at the Beta prototype stage.
When you support us we guarantee to produce the best results. But as you know, a start-up’s journey can sometimes be arduous and there may well be some unexpected hiccups along the way. We promise to tell you everything that’s going on and do our very best to solve any problem that may arise.


JOS is much more than a simple charging product. It’ s a revolutionary technology which makes whole surfaces capable of feeding with power greater than 100 W per connection point for all our devices. 


This means: lighting systems, notebooks, appliances, managed at the same time, allowing removal, modification and replacement with a simple gesture, without structural interventions.




                         JOIN OUR COMMUNITY!
           Help us innovate and create the first ever powerful Energy Surface
                                                  Change the charge 
                   Get rid of your cables and liberate yourself from chargers
                                                    Surprise the world!
                                  Become an innovator and get rewarded!

story:
Stop Spending your Money on Inferior Cables!

You have probably heard the saying "They don't make things like they used to!" and for a lot of things this is true especially recently when it come to electronics.  The world is always trying to make things smaller, lighter, quicker, and cheaper.  Sometimes this results in a very flimsy low quality  product.  So Sly Kly Design decided to take charging/sync cables and change their status from a "consumable" to a product that will last you "Forever".

 

 

 

Helix Cables protect the delicate wires and tips with Metal Armor.

 

The plastic coated copper wires are wrapped with a flat Stainless Steel Spring.

The molded connectors are housed in Aluminum to prevent crushing.

Chew Proof

Whether its your child or your pet that likes to gnaw on your cables its never a good thing for your plastic coated cable.

Helix Cables  can withstand almost all the abuse that your child or pet can throw at it.

Check out this video below where we played tug of war with Jax, a 60lb+ dog, using a Helix Cable.

The cable still works and doesn't even have a scratch on it.
I wouldn't dare try that with a plastic or fabric covered cable.
 

 

Say goodbye to tangled cables.

Helix Cables are Tangle Resistant and Hold a Nice Tight Wrap with Included Hook and Loop Strap.

See the animation below where Helix Cables Resists Knotting and Tangling. 

 

 

Helix Cables are Available in:

2 Different Lengths - 1 Meter (3 Feet) & 2 Meter (6 Feet)

3 Connector Types - Micro, Lightning, Type C

4 Metal Finishes - Silver, Gray, Black, & Rose Gold

 

Every Helix Cable is covered by a Limited Lifetime Warranty.

If your cable breaks or stops working from normal wear and tear, we’ll replace it.

Simply return the cable back to us and we will send you a replacement after inspecting the returned cable.

 

The white cables that come with popular cell phones quickly get dirty and become discolored.  The dirt they collect turns them brown and gray.  Over time they will also turn yellow from exposure to UV light or overheating.  

The finish on the metal of Helix Cables won't collect dirt and won't discolor when exposed to UV Light.  

 

 

Can I claim multiple perks?

It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in claiming! Please note, at this time, we do not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

 

About Sly Kly Design

Sly Kly Design has a history of upgrading the material of normal everyday objects.

(Plastic - Metal Dice,  Paper - Kevlar & Carbon Fiber Playing Cards)

In doing so this creates a very high quality feel and makes the product last forever.

So Sly Kly Design has now decided to upgrade something that everyone uses everyday....

Helix Charge Cables - Armor Plated Charge/Sync Cables

Final Cable Design

The Look of the Final Design may differ slightly from images shown.  It will still be a metal spring wrapped cable with metal capped connectors but the shape and color of the plastic connectors may differ from those shown in images/video.

Risks & Challenges

Sly Kly Design has had 6 successful crowdfunding projects.  Each one was fulfilled at 100 %. Depending on how popular these cables become will affect how quickly we can ship them out.  Not everyone will have their cables shipped at the same time.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please share this Project with anyone you know who has a cell phone.

    Let the World know that they no longer have to put up with weak/inferior cables.

story:
Why we design the Storage Cable?

           In our daily life, cable is used frequently for our mobile devices, it is the carrier but often in a mess status since the twine of cable is hardly to be well settled down. So we decide to design a way to storage the cable well by itself.


What is the Concept Of the Storage Cable?

        We don't want to use the extra tool to storage cable, we have the great idea that the cable can be in well storage by itself. So we think out some design of the surface texture of cable.We use the concave-convex concept to combine the cable well.

FAQ

1.How can I select the type and color of my Storage Cable?
Please send the email to us to specify your demand.

2.How much is shipping?  

Shipping ranges from USD $5-8 depending on the weight of your perk. 

3.How can I get one more Storage Cable for free?

In every perk, if you share the link as below to your face book,twitter and instagram and send the screenshot by email to us, you can get one more for free.

 https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/bd69faf4#/

4.If I have any other concern how I can I contact you?

Please feel free to contact us by email of usams@usams.com.cn

story:
Short Summary

 I had been using some key tags that current selling on market but I still lost my stuff or very hard to find them due to weak sound alarm or forget button battery replacement. All of these issue because of button coin that's very fast to be depleted.

Our product is using rechargeable battery to overcome that chronic issues. With a lot of juice our device could have stronger signal, louder buzzer and beside that it is integrated a lot of useful functions.

Device's specifications comparison

 

Note: data got from others review website only use for reference purpose.

PERK

To truly show our sincere gratitude to all of our GORGEOUS and AWESOME BACKERs, we will ship with combo gifts below in each our PERK:

Note to me with each color you like.

Features:

Keep  track of the things you Need & Love (Asset tracking)

Out-of-range alarm. Put smartkey in items which need to be protected such as laptop, luggage, balo, safety box.., right after these items are taken away suddenly in the radius of 25m, the smartphone will ring up the emergency alarm immediately..

Be hands-free talking pictures (Selfie)

Smartkey can be used for Selfie (self portrait photograph or group photograph featuring photographer) - a new hot trend of young people. It helps people create whole-body and panoramic shots.

Wireless presenters use to remote Powerpoint(window) and Keynote(Mac os)

Use smartkey to control slide powerpoint, support presentations in professional teaching.

Beside that you can also remote your Mac OS like stop/play youtube, move up and down on web browser or pdf reading in preview.

Control music, receive calls remotely

Adjust music stop/play/next/back and increase/decrease the volume on Smartphone easily while being used with headset in the sport activities or in winter while your gloves 're on.

In Android phone you can receive incoming calls and your phone automatically change to speaker. That's especially convenient when you're driving.

Use smart phone to find your keys (Key Finder)

Use smartphone to find keys hooked with smartkey by moving following distance showed on displaying screen and press sound and light button to position keys (GPS) at losing point.

Record your meeting, phone calls or interviews by only press button.

In a sudden circumstance you need to record sound to use as  a proof but have no time to open your phone or open  an  recorder app. So with this device is very simple just press the button until have red light 's blinking as a feedback that you're recording. This function can be used even though your phone's in lock mode and screen is off.

Fake call!!!

if you want to get out of some situation or just want to find a reason politely to leave. A fake phone call 's not a bad idea.

Rechargeable battery. 

Equip with a small rechargeable lithium battery-180mAh. This help you get out of annoyance due to running out of battery . By using rechargeable battery it can use with maximum RF power that help our bluetooth device 's more stable with higher link budget. Duration of 6 months battery life in theory or 1 to 2 months with frequently use. With 1000 charge cycle it takes 1000 months or over 80 years of battery life. But It takes only an hour to get the full charge. Battery level 's showed on App interface.

Specifications

• Wireless technology: Bluetooth 4.0 LE (BLE).

• Wireless range: up to 100ft in building, 200 ft in open field.

• Waterproofing: IP43 (splash-resistant).

• Dimensions: 1.18 x 1.57x 0.27 inches / 30 x 40 x 7.0 (mm).

• Battery life: up to one year per 1 full charge(depends on using time).

• Battery type: rechargeable lithium  (180 mAh).

• Supported platforms:

- iOS7 and above 

- Android 4.3 and above (requires Bluetooth 4.0 LE)

- Mac OS X 10.9 and above (for presentation remote)

User interface(IOS, Android App)

Website:http://seq.huongphuc.com/en

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/SEQPyon/

Apple Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pyon/id11416741...

Google Play: coming soon.

Mac OS app: Done(Use to remote Keynote and Youtube on Website).

Window7 app: Done(Use to remote Powerpoint).

How Funds Will Be Used:

Upgrade current demo version to higher demand's quality.

R&D Hardware, Firmware and mobile App.

Improving device appearance and bluetooth RF tuning.

Improve app's user interface.

Creating customer support service infrastructure.

Improve app's user interface.

Coming up next:

Change the plastic case to wooden case for higher duration and to carve personal wooden carving patterns.
story_txt: Short Summary I had been using some key tags that current selling on market but I still lost my stuff or very hard to find them due to weak sound alarm or forget button battery replacement. All of these issue because of button coin that's very fast to be depleted.Our product is using rechargeable battery to overcome that chronic issues. With a lot of juice our device could have stronger signal, louder buzzer and beside that it is integrated a lot of useful functions.Device's specifications comparison Note: data got from others review website only use for reference purpose.PERKTo truly show our sincere gratitude to all of our GORGEOUS and AWESOME BACKERs, we will ship with combo gifts below in each our PERK:Note to me with each color you like.Features:Keep  track of the things you Need & Love (Asset tracking)Out-of-range alarm. Put smartkey in items which need to be protected such as laptop, luggage, balo, safety box.., right after these items are taken away suddenly in the radius of 25m, the smartphone will ring up the emergency alarm immediately..Be hands-free talking pictures (Selfie)Smartkey can be used for Selfie (self portrait photograph or group photograph featuring photographer) - a new hot trend of young people. It helps people create whole-body and panoramic shots.Wireless presenters use to remote Powerpoint(window) and Keynote(Mac os)Use smartkey to control slide powerpoint, support presentations in professional teaching.Beside that you can also remote your Mac OS like stop/play youtube, move up and down on web browser or pdf reading in preview.Control music, receive calls remotelyAdjust music stop/play/next/back and increase/decrease the volume on Smartphone easily while being used with headset in the sport activities or in winter while your gloves 're on.In Android phone you can receive incoming calls and your phone automatically change to speaker. story:
Next-Gen Child Car Seat Technology in the Prevention of Accidentally Leaving a Child in a Car

Inventor and Registered Nurse, Maria Striemer, developed and patented the Backseet Buddy device and mobile phone application after working in the emergency room and witnessing the detrimental effects of leaving a child in a hot car.

Maria decided that something had to be done about the increasing number of children that are forgotten in hot cars each year. In many cases these children die from heat exhaustion. She recognized that an invention to prevent this widespread tragedy needed to rely on habits already in place; checking one’s cell phone when a notification appears.​

This is a project of passion over the last three years to finally put an end to child deaths in vehicles. Please help us bring this program to life.

-Maria Striemer, RN

 

HOW IT WORKS

         

When your child is placed in the car seat, the Backseet Buddy powers up, broadcasting your device's unique ID. Your phone will recognize that your child is in the car seat within 1 to 2 minutes.

 

In the unlikely event you leave your child in the vehicle, within 1 to 2 minutes, your phone will receive a notification. When removing your child from the car seat, the notification serves as a friendly reminder that your device is working properly.

                                                           

If you miss the first notification, your phone will continue to send notifications every minute until one is dismissed because every minute counts!

 

USER-FRIENDLY

 

 

The device securely fits in your existing car seat.

Once the mobile app is installed, Backseet Buddy passively works in the background without the need to login or launch daily.

Notifications are also pushed to your Smart Watch.

Long battery life

The communication module in Backseet Buddy runs on a coin cell battery. Backseet Buddy only uses power when the child is seated.  The battery life is estimated to last through the critical car seat years without needing new batteries.

 

NON-INSTRUSIVE

 

  

 

Backseet Buddy does not interfere with the wireless functionality of your mobile phone. You can stream music and go hands-free as you normally would.

 

SAFE AND SECURE

"Perfect application of technology to prevent catastrophic human error"
- Marcus Romanello, MD, MBA 

 

The device and mobile app are both based on Apple iBeacon licensed technology standards and Google Beacon Platform built on Eddystone. 

       

 

Each Backseet Buddy comes with its own Unique ID that is broadcasted when powered. This ID can be shared across multiple phones using the same Backseet Buddy to enable parents, grandparents, nannies, or other caretakers to use the same device.

PATENTED TECHNOLOGY

The invention System and Method to Detect the Presence of a Child in a Car Seat 
was granted a US Patent 9,564,036 in February 2017. 

 

OUR JOURNEY TO YOUR FAMILY

The current prototypes are made with 3D printed parts. To enable a beta test of Backseet Buddy, we will be moving to molded parts. This Indiegogo campaign will raise money to pay for the molds to mass produce parts. Our break-even cost to pay for the molds, electronics components, packaging for the first beta test in mass. is $30,000. Any additional funding generated, will be re-invested into Backseet Buddy for design improvements to the device and mobile app.

 

THE TEAM

Maria Striemer, RN, BA - Grant Striemer, BSME, MS

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

STAGE OF DEVELOPMENT

Initial prototype work is complete with the device housing design & button functionality, printed circuit board, and iOS mobile application. Optimizations to the design have been made for moving the design from 3D printing to injection molding. Pictured below is a preliminary design for the eCOM shipper and pulp tray to safely ship your Backseet Buddy.

 

ABOUT

Specifications

* Dimensions: 3.15" in diameter by 0.6" deep

* BC010 Bluetooth Low energy communication module 

* Broadcasts a Unique ID via Apple iBeacon licensed technology standards and Google Beacon Platform built on Eddystone

* Powered by a CR2032 coin-cell battery

* ABS plastic housing and button

* Custom printed circuit board with power switch

* Broadcasting region is 50 to 100 meters

* Mobile app notification response time is 1 to 2 minutes

Mobile Application

The prototype mobile application was built in Apple XCode using Swift. Android programs will be written for Google Beacon Platform built on Eddystone after the Indiegogo campaign is completed. The intent will be to use the same device across both iOS and Android platforms.

Shipping

For international orders, your pre-order does not include VAT/GST. This will be collected prior to shipping.

For Backers

* Those who back the program will receive regular updates on the progress

* There will be no refunds as funding will be used for development and production

CONTACT

For all inquiries or B2B, please email maria@backseetbuddy.com.

story:
Meet Kissenger

 

 

Struggle with long distance relationship? Plug in to your phone and give your loved ones a kiss over the Internet. Kissenger can sense your kiss and transmit realistic kissing sensations to your partner in real time. You can also feel the force on your lips when your partner kisses you back. Share an intimate moment with your friends and families while chatting with them on your phone.

 

 

Background Story

 

Imagineering Institute (IDM Labs Sdn Bhd) is a quantum step research lab with a mission to “Invent the Future of the Internet”, which includes the way we communicate on the web and mobile apps. The lab’s research includes multisensory experience, which led to the development of a “Kissenger device” which employs sound, vision and haptic technology to simulate a human kiss. A positive pressure print performed on one device is digitally transmitted to another device as the exact negative pressure print. A smartphone is inserted into the device so you can see your loved one while you are kissing them, making the experience “multisensory”.

 

 

User Validation

This product is part of Imagineering Institute’s ongoing research thesis that digital media will change the way we experience living.

The individuals were usually young men and women just out of college and trying to continue long distance relationships as one partner moves back home or to a new job.

 

 

The Impact: Solving a Pain Point

 

 

Main Stream Media

Major mainstream media contacts around the globe contact us on a weekly basis asking use for articles and TV shows. The list of outlets who have profiled the Kissenger to date includes:

 

 

Marketing also includes podcasts with various radio stations such as the BBC: http://emmayannzhang.com/kissenger-interview-on-bbc-world-service-radio/

 

Meet The Team

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life. We aim to raise $500,000 through our crowd funding campaign. We have a fully functioning physical model of the device which we have tested , leading to value engineering upgrades for the model we plan to put on the market. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the full software stack. As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks.

 

Our goal is to create 5,000 units, but if we do not meet that goal we will make the amount of units requested if we can meet our price points for a smaller batch. Otherwise we will return the money.

 

Risks & Challenges

At present, we have a fully functioning physical model of the device. We have identified a number of manufactures in Malaysia and China who could value engineer, up-design, produce and deliver the product once we have the funding in place. By working with these providers, we have significantly de-risked the process of bringing Kissenger to market. The manufacturers have experience building hand held devices which uses the same software and hardware in our product. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable. As such we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Kissenger's progress.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love you to join the Kissenger movement. We have set out a couple of ways for you, as backer, to help us. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it. Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! We would love to hear from you.

story:
Hi, my name is Marty.

 

When I was young, I lost my brother to a family car accident. We never knew what hit us until it was too late. It was a multi-car pile up. 

 

It is important to me that we use technology to prevent future accidents. 

That is why we are developing Raven's Call.

 

Raven's Call is a technology that warns the driver of hazards in their path so they can slow and be cautious. 

 

We are part of Global Startup Weekend and we need your help. 

Over the next 24 hours, 46 people will die in car accidents on country roads in America. 

 

With Raven's Call we can drive this number down. 

 

With $1 you get a #shoutout on Instagram. 

 

With $20 we add your name to the code. I will explore more on how this works later :)

story:
Short Summary

 

  • Hello, my name is Dev Grant and I am the founder of Re-Syked. After years of working in various electronic stores selling a variety of tech, it occurred to me that almost all electronic products are made from plastic and have a relatively short lifespan. That is when I decided that somebody needed to change the way plastic is used in technology; and that somebody was going to be me.
  • Plastic water bottles are the most commonly used plastic item worldwide and because only 1 in 5 get properly recycled, the rest all end up in the landfills, streets or oceans making a mess of the earth, there had to be a better way to give more single-use plastic a new life, and now there is, with Re-Syked plastic water bottle phone cases made with at least 90% recycled bottles.
  • This campaign, if successful, will allow Re-Syked to start mass production of our phone cases and can further help improve the recycled plastic industry, which is relatively untapped in the electronics industry.

  • With your funding, you can help Re-Syked make massive contributions towards taking waste plastic water bottles, that would otherwise be sitting in streets,  oceans or landfills and turning it into incredibly useful, modern phone cases. Both large and small donations will be contributing to something incredibly ecological and revolutionary.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

With $25,000 Canadian we can set up a manufacturing warehouse in Canada, as well, so we can process the recycled bottle plastic and turn it into the final phone cases, this will include mixing machines, injection molding and or 3d printing machines and packaging products so we will be ready to have the product on the market by April 2018.

 

 You the contributor, is the reason the world will have recycled phone cases, so we want to thank you with perks.

 

  • 10$ we will send you "i am the reason there is recycled phone cases" and i am the reason    Re-Syked exists" stickers. 
  •  $20 you get a t-shirt (made from recycled bottles) with the Re-Syked logo, with a personal letter signed by the founder expressing our gratitude
  • $30 you get a Re-Syked phone case made from recycled plastic water bottles in packaging as well as a personal letter signed by the founder expressing our gratitude 
  •  $50 you get 2 Re-Syked phone cases made from recycled plastic water bottles in packaging as well as a personal letter signed by the founder expressing our gratitude 
  •  $100 you get 4 Re-Syked phone cases made from recycled plastic water bottles in packaging as well as a Re-Syked t-shirt (made from recycled bottles) as well as a personal letter signed by the founder expressing our gratitude 

 

  • If we don't reach our goal, what we will do with the funds is focus strictly on getting our backers their products and take preorders from there on to pay for any phone case sales after the backer's products are fulfilled to make up for the discrepancy. 

The Impact

  • You aren't just putting your money into another unoriginal copy-cat product, you are using your money to help change an entire industry and to better the world; we want you to feel proud of that.
  • Once our campaign is successful, Re-Syked will be running 24 hours a day to deliver our phones cases to you. Every purchase improves our environment and provides a 20% donation to a non-profit organization that is cleaning up the world's waste.

supported phone models

iphone: 

iphone 5/se

iphone 6/6s

iphone 7/8

iphone 7/8 plus

iphone x

samsung:

samsung s7

samsung s8

samsung s8 plus

google pixel

pixel and pixel xl

pixel 2 and pixel xl 2

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

If you love this idea hit the share buttons and follow us on instagram!

If you love this idea hit the share buttons and follow us on instagram!

story:
INTRODUCING THE OOLi RANGE

 

The OOLi FLEX is a beautifully designed cable available in Micro USB / MFi Certified Apple Lightning options.

 

The OOLi NORTHSOUTH plug has been designed from the ground up to reduce strain on USB cables - the main cause of cable failure. It has ergonomic and contemporary styling and works in a conﬁned space without forcing the cable in to an unnatural position.

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

THE PROBLEM

There are many common problems that occur when using charging cables and plugs.

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

THE SOLUTION: OOLi FLEX CABLE

 

___________

FLEXiNECK

The area most susceptible to damage on any cable is where the USB overmould and cable meet. The FlexiNeck distributes the area of stress from a single point to a larger area.

 

________________

STRONG CABLE

The OOLi FLEX cable features numerous strong yet flexible materials including DuPont Kevlar fibre. We believe in the quality and durability of this and therefore the OOLi FLEX cables come with a lifetime guarantee.

 

____________________________

ERGONOMIC CABLE HEADS

The head of the cable needs to be small, but on most cables they are not easy to grip. We added contours and a soft-touch rubberised finish to make it easier when connecting or disconnecting the cable to, or from a device

 

________________

EXTRA LENGTH

The OOLi FLEX cable is 2M in length which we feel is the optimal length for most uses around the house or at work.

 

__________

THE GRIP

The Grip is a multifunctional, rubberised weighted sphere. Thanks to a non slip finish, the Grip holds your USB cable in place when you’ve removed the OOLi FLEX cable from your device, ready for the next time it’s needed.

 

_____________________

STORING WITH GRIP

The Grip doubles as a cable tidy for transportation and storage. Its flexible mouth can be used to hold the coiled cable neatly in place.

 

 

______________

MOVING GRIP

The Grip’s position can be adjusted, up and down the cable to suit your charging needs. It can also be removed entirely if required.  

 

  

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

THE SOLUTION: OOLi NORTHSOUTH PLUGS

 

______________________

NORTHSOUTH PORTS

The plug features two USB ports, one on the top and one on the bottom, allowing choice of charging position and simultaneous charging. Vertical orientation of the ports saves space behind furniture and reduces the likelihood of stress on the cable.

 

_____________________

ERGONOMIC CASING

The ergonomic grooves on the sides of the NORTHSOUTH plug were added to ease grip when pushing in to, or pulling out of wall sockets.

 

_______________________________

SMART CHARGE TECHNOLOGY

Our plugs also feature SmartCharge technology which guarentees safe electrical curents that won’t damage your devices’ batteries in the long term. It also ensures the devices connected are being charged at their maximum speed.

 

________

SAFETY

Safety is very important to us. That’s why all of our plugs are compliant with relevant safety standards in each country and tested by SGS - the worlds leading product safety tester. So you can be assured our products are tested to the highest standards.

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

PRODUCT VARIATIONS

1. Micro USB cable (Navy Blue or White colour), 2. MFi Certified Apple Lightning cable (Navy Blue or White colour).

 

1. USA/Canada NORTHSOUTH plug (Navy Blue or White colour), 2. Australian NORTHSOUTH plug (Navy Blue or White colour), 3. Europe NORTHSOUTH (Navy Blue or White colour), 4. UK NORTHSOUTH plug (Navy Blue or White colour).

 

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

CAMPAIGN REWARDS

 

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

THE MAKING OF

 

The FLEX Cable
At OOLi we began with research into ways to improve the ubiquitous charging cable. We then chose strong, yet flexible materials including Kevlar to enhance durability to cope with the riggers of our busy lifestyles. We discovered that the area most susceptible to breaking on a cable was where the rigid overmould and the cable meet, so we created the FlexiNeck which is made from a flexible rubberised plastic. The FlexiNeck spreads cable strain from a single point to a larger area, preventing the cable breaking. 

 

The Grip
The Grip began as a simple cable tidy, but we quickly realised we could add an extra feature by making the Grip cable tidy heavier and giving it a rubberised finish to grip onto surfaces.

 

The NORTHSOUTH Plug
Next we analysed where people were charging their phones. A recent survey* of over 9000 participants revealed that 76% of us charge our phone next to our beds at night. Wall sockets are often behind bedside cabinets in bedrooms so we took all of this into consideration and designed a plug that can be used behind furniture without putting strain on the charging cable, we called it the NORTHSOUTH Plug. Having a USB port on the top and the bottom of our plug means that furniture can sit flush with the plug, without putting strain on the cable.

 

Safety
Many of us had heard stories or seen news articles about sub-standard electronics causing fires and explosions, so safety was paramount to us and we took it very seriously, all of our plugs are tested by SGS - the worlds leading product safety tester. 

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

ABOUT US

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

HELP & SHARE

Have friends or family who need this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.

Let's do this.

 

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

 

FAQ's

Campaign Questions:

How do I choose my colour and connector/plug type?

      You will be emailed a survey on completion of the campaign.

How will my order be shipped?

      FILL IN.

Which countries do you ship to?

      FILL IN.

When does shipping begin?

      Shipping will begin in November/December this year so that your order arrives in time for Christmas.

What payment options do I have?

      You can either pay via credit card or PayPal. When you select a perk and you'll be able to see the available payment methods at checkout.

Why are we crowdfunding?

      FILL IN.

 

Product questions

Is the OOLi FLEX Lightning cable MFi certified?

      Yes the Lightning cable is MFi certified.

What safety standards do the plugs meet?

      The plugs will be tested by the leading safety tester SGS. All plugs are compliant with the relevant safety standards for the relevant country ie. USA/Canada, Australia, Europe and the UK.

What cable options do I have?

      The cables can be bought in either blue or white with different cable ends of either Apple Lightning to USB or Micro USB to USB.

What plug options do I have?

      The plugs can be purchased in either navy blue or white for different regions of the world, these options are USA/Canada, Australia, Europe and the UK.

What makes the OOLi FLEX cable better than others in the market?

      The OOLi FLEX cable is designed to last with durable materials and design features. Usage scenarios were at the forefront of our design process as we developed features such as the FlexiNeck and the Grip.

What makes the OOLi NORTHSOUTH plug better than others in the market?

      The plug and cable have been designed to work harmoniously together. The NORTHSOUTH plug allows vertical charging, works well in confined spaces and allows simultaneous charging of devices.

What is the length of the cable?

      The cables are 2 meters in length.

What materials are included in the OOLi FLEX cable?

      The cable is made from nylon-braided material and DuPont Kevlar strands.

Can I plug the OOLi FLEX cable into my laptop, computer, car charger or power bank?

      Yes, you can use the OOLi FLEX cable in any USB port. 

Will the OOLi FLEX cable affect the charging speed?

      The OOLi FLEX cable in Apple Lightning or Micro USB will allow up to 2.1 Amps charging speed. If a USB-C cable is used with the NORTHSOUTH plug, devices can be charged at up to 3 Amps.

Can you use both ports on the OOLi NORTHSOUTH plug simultaneously?

      Yes, the two ports enable you to charge two devices at the same time as well improving flexibility.

Does the product come with warranty or guarantee?

      The OOLi FLEX cable comes with a Lifetime Guarantee. The OOLi NORTHSOUTH Plug comes with a 1-year guarantee. The reason we haven't also offered a lifetime guarantee for the plug is that electrical systems may cause faults with the plug and this is outside of our control.

 

Return and exchange policy:

Here at OOLi, we stand behind all of our products.  If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked.  But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!

 

Shipping policy:

Within 24 hours of your order being shipped you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

 

Risks and challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed. However, our team has plenty of experience bringing technology products to market. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us!

 

 

 

*Where do you charge your phone at night? survey - http://bit.ly/2rP0hrl

story:
Short Summary

Quick License was founded by Josh and co-founder Ben when they saw the problem of always carrying around, your physical drivers license. Quick License is an app in the process of developing, for you to have your ID digitally in your phone.

There should be solutions to these everyday problems, which is exactly what we are trying  solve, to make life easier for you and me.

We understand that everyone has busy lives and we want to make it more efficient by being able to have easy access to your license.

We all know that feeling in the morning worrying that you will forget something, well with Quick License it is one these think to forget.

Quick License is import not only for you to have your license digitally but also because of our advanced security technology that keeps your license safe. 

If Quick License seems great already its gets even better. In addition to our easy to access license scan, your license will be directly connected with the dmv to insure your security.

The best part about Quick License is that we are one of the first in this revolutionary digital ID industry!

The contributions will help us launch Quick License and get it on the app store and provide crucial funds to market and expand Quick License to the American people. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding for building our innovative app and marketing it to the public. Our goal is to raise 25,000 dollars in total funding with your support! 

Our unique perks that we will be offering to contributors only, is our first version of the app, to sign up, and get it before the entire public. 

If we do not reach our funding goal the money will go specifically to app design.

The Impact

The contribution that you make will go directly into early stage development of Quick License which is specifically targeting an untapped industry of the digital drivers license.

Both Josh Gershon and Ben Helman were born entrepreneurs and started their first business at the age of 9 and 10. Josh would sell snacks at school for a small profit, while Ben would sell shoes online at a young age.  

Both Ben and Josh are willing to give up anything to make Quick License a successful company that makes an impact on technology forever.

Risks & Challenges

One small risk that we have is the amount of states that have digital license's are small at the movement but in recent years there has been a lot of traction for digital licenses with trials already in Colorado, Maryland, Idaho, Louisiana, and the district of Colombia.

Josh is extremely determined and never gives up. Ben is always looking for a new way to solve problems.

These challenges will be solved with perseverance and hard work.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can support the Quick License movement by sharing with friends and family about our great new app and technology.

You can also email us at Quick.License.App@gmail.com for any further questions.

story:
ClixPro - 2 in 1 Wide Angle & Macro Lens

From our rough drawing to the finished product our goal of providing a professional quality quick attaching lens at an affordable price was met with ClixPro.

The ClixPro design team took a complex idea and made it simple. Quick on and quick off. You can be ready for that special picture instantly. 

      The Lens Matters

      To take the best picture you need the best lens - after months of testing ClixPro offers the best lens possible! The proof is in the picture.

      Photographers today are routinely switching between their trusty DSLR cameras and mobile phones for photography. With fast-changing, ever-improving technology your photographs are only as good as your lens. The ClixPro was developed to be a professional-grade quickly detachable lens system for your mobile phone or tablet.  

       Our unique optical design gives a super sharp image every time. Whether it’s a close-up or long shot, indoors or outdoors this innovative lens system is perfect for precision photography.

       

       

      Risks & Challenges

      This is our 2nd crowd funding campaign, so we are familiar with the process and have learned much from our first experience. From what we learned, we've done everything possible to streamline the process on our end. We are working with the same trusted manufacturer on this project that we've worked with before. We have taken every precaution possible to make sure our perks get delivered on time but sometimes issues arise that are out of our control which may cause a delivery delay. We will provide regular updates to keep you informed and support will be available long after the ClixPro has been delivered.

story:
Who We Are

We at Party-Hunt are developers who've built an open platform for hosting live-music concerts and parties around Goa, India. 

When we ourselves were on the lookout for great parties, we found it very hard to look for specific genres and events anywhere on the popular platforms. Hence we thought of creating an open platform where events would be arranged based on location and genre and people could look for just the thing they wanted. 

There was a big lack of awareness about various great events that we wanted travellers coming to Goa to visit. An online platform that would host all verified events, down to the intricate details like genre and entry fee was the best way to move forward.

Also a lot of big parties were already hosted on popular platforms and were attracting a lot of tourists at whose cost smaller bars and restaurants were suffering. So we thought that every venue must be given some online exposure to tell the world what they're playing tonight. This was how it all began.

Music is Goa's spirit. Everyone has a different definition of what calms and relaxes them and people come to Goa for that reason. Empowering the much less known venues and bringing the spirit of Goa online is our mission.

What We Need

All the efforts till now have been self funded. We're proud to announce that we've reached a point where a good number of people use our application and we need a workforce to market and manage everything during the party season. 

  • Of the 25k USD asked, roughly 10k will be used to pay videographers, content writers and a developer intern from the period of August 2019 till March 2020. We at Party Hunt, being developers ourselves, ensure the donors that every hiring will be done keeping equal opportunity and no discrimination guidelines in mind. We seek to build a diverse team with a similar vision.
  • 10k is to be put into use for aggressive marketing just before the peak Party season. Printing of banners, 
  • 5k and some of our own funds are being labelled as infrastructure funds. We're renting an office space in Arambol. We seek to buy equipments and begin an independent ArtistConnect venture which shall provide talented local artists and DJs a platform to showcase their music to our partner venues. 

The Impact

We come to this platform because we intend to make our application a sustainable venture away from the world of investments and advertisements.

Our potential donor is an upcoming Goa traveller that understands the need of knowing the best places and not wasting resources in a places that may not catch their vibe. Someone that wants to explore the best of Goa based on what travellers with identical stories recommend. There is a big requirement of a strong community driven music guidance and we are bent on making the perfect platform for it.

Our ideal donor is someone that has a close connection to music. Someone that knows what the right music with the right environment can do to us emotional beings and why places like Goa where people from around the world come to de-stress themselves thrive.

Our potential donor is also someone who realises how important technology is for smaller businesses and believes open platforms and assistance for them are essential for healthy competition and local sustainability to thrive in today's world where tourists have pre booked almost everything before they even visit the place.

What You Get

The next version of our application has a "Shoutout to our Donors" page. Please do check out our Perks section for knowing more about our T-shirt and mugs giveaways. We intend to keep a personal connection with those who want to power us. You get exclusive passes to any partner venue if you are an Indian national, or are in India at the time. One top International donor will be extended our hospitality in Goa just before the last big party of the season and get to meet the team they've supported.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are someone who cannot contribute to our venture at the moment but would love to be a part of it,

  • Write to us about your experiences with music or about your experiences in Goa. We will share them on our blog.
  • Fill us with your ideas about live-music or business in general. We are always open to suggestion from anyone across the world.
  • Share our campaign page with people you identify can help us reach our goal!
