We at Party-Hunt are developers who've built an open platform for hosting live-music concerts and parties around Goa, India. 
When we ourselves were on the lookout for great parties, we found it very hard to look for specific genres and events anywhere on the popular platforms. Hence we thought of creating an open platform where events would be arranged based on location and genre and people could look for just the thing they wanted. 
There was a big lack of awareness about various great events that we wanted travellers coming to Goa to visit. An online platform that would host all verified events, down to the intricate details like genre and entry fee was the best way to move forward.
Also a lot of big parties were already hosted on popular platforms and were attracting a lot of tourists at whose cost smaller bars and restaurants were suffering. So we thought that every venue must be given some online exposure to tell the world what they're playing tonight. This was how it all began.
Music is Goa's spirit. Everyone has a different definition of what calms and relaxes them and people come to Goa for that reason. Empowering the much less known venues and bringing the spirit of Goa online is our mission.

What We Need
All the efforts till now have been self funded. We're proud to announce that we've reached a point where a good number of people use our application and we need a workforce to market and manage everything during the party season. 

Of the 25k USD asked, roughly 10k will be used to pay videographers, content writers and a developer intern from the period of August 2019 till March 2020. We at Party Hunt, being developers ourselves, ensure the donors that every hiring will be done keeping equal opportunity and no discrimination guidelines in mind. We seek to build a diverse team with a similar vision.
10k is to be put into use for aggressive marketing just before the peak Party season. Printing of banners, 
5k and some of our own funds are being labelled as infrastructure funds. We're renting an office space in Arambol. We seek to buy equipments and begin an independent ArtistConnect venture which shall provide talented local artists and DJs a platform to showcase their music to our partner venues. 


The Impact
We come to this platform because we intend to make our application a sustainable venture away from the world of investments and advertisements.
Our potential donor is an upcoming Goa traveller that understands the need of knowing the best places and not wasting resources in a places that may not catch their vibe. Someone that wants to explore the best of Goa based on what travellers with identical stories recommend. There is a big requirement of a strong community driven music guidance and we are bent on making the perfect platform for it.
Our ideal donor is someone that has a close connection to music. Someone that knows what the right music with the right environment can do to us emotional beings and why places like Goa where people from around the world come to de-stress themselves thrive.
Our potential donor is also someone who realises how important technology is for smaller businesses and believes open platforms and assistance for them are essential for healthy competition and local sustainability to thrive in today's world where tourists have pre booked almost everything before they even visit the place.
What You Get
The next version of our application has a "Shoutout to our Donors" page. Please do check out our Perks section for knowing more about our T-shirt and mugs giveaways. We intend to keep a personal connection with those who want to power us. You get exclusive passes to any partner venue if you are an Indian national, or are in India at the time. One top International donor will be extended our hospitality in Goa just before the last big party of the season and get to meet the team they've supported.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are someone who cannot contribute to our venture at the moment but would love to be a part of it,

Write to us about your experiences with music or about your experiences in Goa. We will share them on our blog.
Fill us with your ideas about live-music or business in general. We are always open to suggestion from anyone across the world.
Share our campaign page with people you identify can help us reach our goal!

story:
If you have any questions please email EzySnapService@gmail.com and our team will respond within 24 hours.

 

THIS IS THE EZY-SNAP

This is the EZY-Snap, the revolutionary product to solve all your cable problems. It should be easy to plug your cable in. And you shouldn’t need all different cables for your different products. The Ezy- snap solves this problem.

  • It's magnetic, so it's easy to plug in
  • It's universial, so you only need one cable for all of your devices
  • It's reversible, so you don't ha ve to think about wich direction you plug it in
  • It's snag free
  • It has a indicator light, to show that your device is charging

This is just a few of the advantages the EZY-SNAP has over standard cables.

 

 

 

It's Universial:

 

 

 

It Features Neodynium Magnets, To Make A Really Strong Connection:

 

 

 

How to use it:

 

The EZY SNAP works by plugging the tip into your device, and then the cable magnetically snaps to your phone! BAM – and its connected.

 

1. Insert the tip into the port of your phone, where it stays in place

2. And you are done! The cable will now magnetically connect to your device!

It's that easy!

 

Our idea:

 It should be easy to plug your cable in. And you shouldn’t need all different cables for your different products. The Ezy- snap solves this problem. It’s magnetic, so it just snaps in place.

And it fits all your products, so you only need one for all your devices. Headphones, power banks, phones, speakers… As long as it has a lightning, micro- or type C port, you can EZY-SNAP it.

It’s also reversible, so you don’t need to think about which way you Snap it in place. And, it has a small led to indicate when you are plugged in. The EZY-Snap features the most powerful magnets on earth, so it stays in place.  

 

We have a product, but we need your help

We already have a product ready. We are not far from meeting our goal of sharing this product with the world, but we need some help. We need a little bit of money to start shipping the products, but we are ready.

  • We need about 15 000$ to start shipping
  • The first Early Birds get's lot of discounts, so it's best to be quick!
  • We have a product ready, we just need some money to start the shipping
 
 
 
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the money to support us, please help us in other ways to make this the future!

  • Make some noise! Share it with your friends!
  • Please also use the indiegogo sharing tools to share this with people.

story:
We love summer, we love sunshine. But how can we get rid of a smelly sweaty face, stay comfortable and enjoy a windy summer anywhere at anytime?  

We are glad to introduce you the Windmill which is a little device, it can easily turn your cellphone into a portable fan in just a second. It also helps a lot on cooling down food for kids, drying your art work, making a camping fire, etc.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Features Summary

_____________________________________________________________________________


  • Feather design. Light weight, small size
  • Smooth and silent and powerful. Only ~20db
  • Easy to use. Just plug in it!
  • Compatible with Apple or Android and external battery
  • Low power consumption. 
  • Safe. Propeller is made of soft rubber.

Extreme Low Power Consumption

We know you are concerning about the power consumption of the Windmill, we put it into a test. Let's check this out!

_____________________________________________________________________________

Design & Engineering 

_____________________________________________________________________________

The Windmill is compact, safe and efficient designed.  The propeller is made of soft rubber which could makes it light and safe.  With an efficient mini motor which can generate enough power to maximise the spinning of the propeller. Moreover there is a penetrated cover which could protect the motor and prevent the motor from over heated. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

Easy to use

_____________________________________________________________________________


The operation of the Windmill is pretty easy, you don't even need to switch it on. By just plugging it to the power port of your device, and it turns on automatically. You can also separate the propeller and the motor easily for storage or cleaning. 

________________________________________________________________________

The Ultra Stand

_____________________________________________________________________________


The Ultra stand makes the Windmill works even better, just put your phone on the stand and it works like a house fan! Ultra stand is a hard plastic stand which allow you to adjust at 4 different angle. Its strong and reliable, it can support most of the cellphone and tablet models on the market.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Compatibility

_____________________________________________________________________________



The Windmill is designed in 2 different power connection. One is lightning connection and the other is USB / micro USB connection. Which make it compatible with most of the cellphone and tablet models. It also work with your tablet or external battery.

_____________________________________________________________________________

FREE Worldwide Shipping

_____________________________________________________________________________

Since the Windmill is so light and slim. We could offer our you a FREE worldwide shipping. We ship the product with a internal bubbled envelope and our team would ensure all the products are welly packed. If you have any question about the Windmill,  feel free to contact us!

_____________________________________________________________________________

We need you support

_____________________________________________________________________________

Our team work very hard on the product and we hope this tiny thing could make our life better, easier and more comfortable. Just select a perk now and start experience a powerful portable fan right on your finger tip anywhere! 

Thank you

story:
What is Netedex?

Netedex is a smart business card

Netedex is a premium quality, PVC, credit card sized business card with in-built smart inlays.

600DPI Netedex card printers are used to ensure high resolution finish on all cards.

Netedex has security features in place to ensure you and your privacy are protected at all times.

Netedex makes networking and passing on contact details a breeze.

Netedex is updating the way we use business cards by employing secure, personalised, business card technology so we can finally carry just one card in order to pass our details on time and time again.

Netedex cards can be for personal use too, passing on your contact details and your Social Media links all with a tap of your card.


Why Netedex?

Netedex was created to provide a seamless contact management system that updates contact information via a mobile application - Just simply edit the contact details within our app and your contacts will automatically be provided with the updated information.

Netedex has innovated the way we pass on our contact information, keeping the formal presence of a business card while having all contacts easily accessible at your ﬁngertips.

Finally, Netedex has developed a business card that meets the needs of a digital world. Netedex provides a paperless system, utilising the latest technologies that make the sharing of contact details simple, quick and easy.


Doing Business with Netedex


How does Netedex work? 

Because sharing our contacts allows us to connect with people everywhere, we make sure that you never miss an opportunity or miss a chance to connect.

Netedex gives every businessperson the opportunity to exchange details quickly and easily, making sure you never miss the key moment to connect.

Users simply tap their business card on a smart device, and the Netedex app exchanges their contact details. During the sync between Netedex and your smartphone, the contact details of the other person are sent back to you.

Exchange contact details with ease, the Netedex way.


Features

The truth is that we often give out or take business cards, leave them in our pockets, or an old wallet or even a business card holder, and forget about them. The task of transferring new contact details to your smartphone is laborious and time consuming. It’s time we had a ‘smarter’ way to manage contact information and keep it updated. Enter Netedex.


The Card

Design your card, as customised or generic as you please, to your desired look and style from our websites online store. Your Netedex data is encoded in order for details to be easily passed along to your next client, contact or anyone else who would normally take your business card.


Tap your Card

Tap your card against any NFC activated device and it will pass on your details.

Meet someone that currently isn’t using Netedex? When you tap your Netedex card on their smart device, non-users will be taken to the App Store where they can register for a free account.


Card scanner

What happens when a device isn’t NFC compatible?

Your Netedex Code is printed on all of your cards so clients can simply open the "exchange page" within the app, use the camera feature on their smart device, scan the code and the app will log the contact details.

Share your Netedex code and it can be saved in any smart devices photo gallery and opened within our “camera feature” to connect.

Netedex prides itself on having the ability to ensure we are compatible with all phones and devices.


The App

The Netedex app is available for free in the App store for all iOS devices and Google Play for Android.

The app provides essential functionality for business contacts that allows the user to add notes, quotes, bookings and appointments to any contact allowing both parties to access the information and interact, all within the “notes page”.

Security

Worried that your personal details will get into the wrong hands?

When you ﬁrst establish your Netedex proﬁle the “pre-approval feature” is activated in the app. This feature ensures your “digital page contact details” cannot be seen without your prior approval, allowing you full control over access to your details, including removing those you no longer want to connect with.

Multiple Cards – One User

Netedex allows one user to have multiple cards with the same data so you can simply leave one card at your desk and keep in your purse or wallet.

Forget your card?

You and your new contact can simply activate the “add nearby feature” within “exchange page” at the same time, conﬁrm and connect. Easily add/ invite friends from your devices contacts in the “exchange page”.

What if you lose your card?

Lost your card and worried that someone might be using it? Go to our “lost card” feature within your "profile page" to cancel the card and receive a replacement Netedex code for your new card.


Contacts Page

Never lose those all important contact details again

All contacts are saved in the Contacts page of the app.

The contacts page has 3 folders: Favourites, Recent and All.

 “Darkened contacts” have recently updated their details.

By clicking on a contact the user will be able to open their “digital page”.


The Digital Page

Viewing your contacts digital page

Once the user has opened the contacts digital page, simply tap on the details to open the appropriate function.

Example: Number to call/message, email to send email, website to view website, or social media link to send a message

Your digital page

Design your own business/ personal page for that unique look and feel.

Not only can you add your professional details as a normal business card but Netedex also allows you to add Social Media links that can be opened at the tap of a ﬁnger.

Add as much or as little information as needed and create your own unique design using fonts, colours and background images to present a professional profile for your contacts.

Alter and change your details at any time and the app will automatically provide your existing contacts with your updated details and you can keep using the same Netedex card.


Our Vision

At Netedex we understand the importance of contact management and the relevance of business cards in business today. If you’ve ever lost a valuable card, or had a contact change their position or contact details, then Netedex is a simple and smart solution for you.

Our vision is to improve the way we all network, connect and essentially do business, using available technologies to provide a much needed system for our digitally enhanced lives.

To provide a sustainable method for business development and interaction, contact management and smart communication is our primary goal.

We believe that a paperless system is sustainable, unlike other smart business cards, that print millions of paper based cards incorporating USB’s and QR codes or even chips, is not sustainable for the long term.

We also believe in giving back and paying it forward – 5% of our profit will always be donated to charity, which may be a current crisis or a suggested charity of our customer’s choice.

By meeting a real need that has been identified by business people around the world, we believe that we can make a difference in a small but significant way – so why not support us in our vision and help us to improve lives everywhere.


Your Support is Everything

Our journey began some time ago. We called the project 'Netedex'. A combination of the 2 things most valuable to any businessperson today, the modern InterNET and the retro RolaDEX. This concept guided us in the design of our smart business card. Many months of work later, we have made our concept into a reality and now we need your help to complete the final stages of the app development.

This is an opportunity to become a part of something far greater than yourself and exhibit your qualities as a business leader. If you recognise the time saving and sustainability of the Netedex smart business card, then we really need your help. Join us and lets work together to make a genuine difference. 

Where we are

We have explored and tested a lot of possibilities.

Why we need you

Our next step is to turn Netedex into a business essential. That's why we've turned to Indiegogo. We expect to deliver a quality system to business people who appreciate the need to connect rapidly and securely, with ease.

Indiegogo allows us to reach out to thousands if not millions of fellow business people and entrepreneurs who have the same needs as us and hopefully that includes you.

With your support, we will get this product to market. 

All together, we can turn Netedex into a reality! 


The Goal

Our goal is to raise $60,000

90% of funds will be going to app development

5% to printer and cards

5% to charity

If we exceed our campaign goal any additional funds will go towards getting the app developed quicker and to adding additional printers and cards to keep up with demand.

The Team

Matthew Gazzo and Alana Di Pasquale created Netedex.

Matthew is an entrepreneur who for the past 2 years has operated as an owner of his own food company distributing in Melbourne and Adelaide.

Matthew moved into application research, technology and development learning for a year. Alana and Matthew found themselves talking about business cards one day; about how many business cards they would go through and wanting to make business relations an easier and hassle free experience. Netedex was born

Alana Di Pasquale

Has worked in the corporate business world for a number of years, with experience in accounting, banking, finance, superannuation and financial planning. Alana and Matthew have worked on a previous project and got talking about revolutionising parts of the corporate world and came up with the Netedex idea.

The development team

Mnet Mobile

Mnet is the world’s most awarded, full service mobile solutions and communications agency.

A national team of 65 mobile and technology specialists thrive in a high performance culture that encourages innovation, collaboration and curiosity. Above all else, we value our relationships with clients and the exceptional results we consistently deliver across 7 core business pillars: Strategy and Consulting, Marketing Solutions, Enterprise Solutions, Content and Commerce, Competitions and Promotions, Media & Analytics and Technology Platforms/Products.

No other Australian mobile solutions provider has the scale of onshore resource capability, the breadth and depth of experience in mobile, nor the scope of global industry recognition for their work, including 49 local and global awards across 2014/15.

Mnet is a division of IPG Mediabrands, Australia’s fastest growing media communications group”


Never Miss A Thing

Because we want you to be a part of our journey and benefit from our transparency we have provided a timeline here for you to keep up with what we are doing and what you can expect each step of the way.

Timeline

January 2015                       • Research and testing.

July 2015                               • Card ready. 

                                                  • Card printers ready.

September 2015                 • App development ready for build.   

                                                  • Website currently under construction.

October 2015                       • Indiegogo campaign.

November 2015                  • Construction and development of app.

 February 2016                    • Design your card/s online and shipping

 March 2016                         • Netedex launch

We will keep you up-to date along the way on Indiegogo, our Facebook page and email you any Netedex information.

Feel free to leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page. We will reply as soon as possible!

Help spread the word of Netedex through the Indiegogo share tools and follow us on Facebook for the latest information while our website is under construction.

Have a question? Contact us at: info@netedex.awsapps.com

You can also leave a message on our Facebook page.

Netedex thanks you in advanced for your support.

management and smart communication is our primary goal. 
We
believe that a paperless system is sustainable, unlike other smart business cards,
that print millions of paper based cards incorporating USB’s and QR codes or
even chips, is not sustainable for the long term. 
We also
believe in giving back and paying it forward – 5% of our profit will always be
donated to charity, which may be a current crisis or a suggested charity of our
customer’s choice. 
By
meeting a real need that has been identified by business people around the
world, we believe that we can make a difference in a small but significant way
– so why not support us in our vision and help us to improve lives everywhere. 
Your Support is
Everything
Our journey began some
time ago. We called the project 'Netedex'. A combination of the 2 things most
valuable to any businessperson today, the modern InterNET and the retro
RolaDEX. This concept guided us in the design of our smart business card. Many
months of work later, we have made our concept into a reality and now we need
your help to complete the final stages of the app development. 
This is an opportunity
to become a part of something far greater than yourself and exhibit your
qualities as a business leader. If you recognise the time saving and sustainability
of the Netedex smart business card, then we really need your help. Join us and
lets work together to make a genuine difference.  
Where
we are
We have explored and
tested a lot of possibilities.
Why
we need you
Our next step is to
turn Netedex into a business essential. That's why we've turned to Indiegogo.
We expect to deliver a quality system to business people who appreciate the
need to connect rapidly and securely, with ease. 
Indiegogo allows us to
reach out to thousands if not millions of fellow business people and
entrepreneurs who have the same needs as us and hopefully that includes you. 
With your support, we
will get this product to market. 
All together, we can
turn Netedex into a reality! 
The Goal
Our goal is to
raise $60,000
90% of funds will be
going to app development
5% to printer and
cards
5% to charity 
If we exceed our
campaign goal any additional funds will go towards getting the app developed
quicker and to adding additional printers and cards to keep up with demand. 

The Team
Matthew Gazzo and Alana Di Pasquale
created Netedex.
Matthew is an entrepreneur who for the past 2 years has operated as an owner of his own food company distributing in Melbourne and Adelaide.Matthew moved into
application research, technology and development learning for a year. Alana and
Matthew found themselves talking about business cards one day; about how many
business cards they would go through and wanting to make business relations an easier
and hassle free experience. Netedex was born
Alana Di Pasquale
Has worked in the
corporate business world for a number of years, with experience in accounting,
banking, finance, superannuation and financial planning. Alana and Matthew have
worked on a previous project and got talking about revolutionising parts of the
corporate world and came up with the Netedex idea.
The development team


Mnet Mobile
Mnet is the world’s
most awarded, full service mobile solutions and communications agency.
A national team of 65
mobile and technology specialists thrive in a high performance culture that
encourages innovation, collaboration and curiosity. Above all else, we value
our relationships with clients and the exceptional results we consistently
deliver across 7 core business pillars: Strategy and Consulting, Marketing
Solutions, Enterprise Solutions, Content and Commerce, Competitions and
Promotions, Media & Analytics and Technology Platforms/Products.
No other Australian
mobile solutions provider has the scale of onshore resource capability, the
breadth and depth of experience in mobile, nor the scope of global industry
recognition for their work, including 49 local and global awards across
2014/15.
Mnet is a division of
IPG Mediabrands, Australia’s fastest growing media communications group”
Never Miss A Thing
Because we want you to
be a part of our journey and benefit from our transparency we have provided a
timeline here for you to keep up with what we are doing and what you can expect
each step of the way.
Timeline 
January
2015                       • Research and testing. 
July
2015                               • Card ready.  
                                                  • Card
printers ready. 
September
2015                 • App development ready for
build.   
                                                  • Website
currently under construction. 
October
2015                       • Indiegogo campaign. 
November
2015                  • Construction and development
of app.
 February 2016                    • Design your card/s online and
shipping
 March 2016                         • Netedex launch
We will
keep you up-to date along the way on Indiegogo, our Facebook page and email you
any Netedex information.
Feel free to leave a comment on the
COMMENT tab at the top of the page. We will reply as soon as possible! 
Help
spread the word of Netedex through the Indiegogo share tools and follow us on
Facebook for the latest information while our website is under construction. 
Have a
question? Contact us at: info@netedex.awsapps.com 
You can also leave a message on
our Facebook page.
Netedex
thanks you in advanced for your support.

story:
Andama is an open source remote desktop software that enables you to connect to a remote computer and use the mouse and keyboard as if you were sitting in front of it.

There is no need for complicated router setup, or any knowledge of the remote computer IP. Only the ID and password of the remote computer is required.

In addition to user simplicity, with Andama you are sure that what you do on the remote computer is visible only by you and no-one else can spy on your activity. This is achieved by encrypting all data before leaving the PC using client-side encryption. The remote desktop images, mouse movements and whatever you type on the keyboard are all encrypted. Andama on both client and server side is not tracking user activity. The unique computer ID changes each time you launch the application and the proxy server does not permanently store any information that could uniquely identify your computer. In the current implementation there is no permanent storage in the filesystem. Everything is stored in temporary memory. 

Of course, I could claim anything I want about the application cryptography, security and privacy but the only way for you to know is by inspecting the source code. Andama source code is available on a GitHub public repository and anyone with some C++ knowledge can inspect it and contribute to it. You can find it here: https://github.com/YiannisBourkelis/Andama-Remote-Desktop

And the best part! I have already created a preview version of Andama for Windows, OS X and Linux that you can try. You can find it here: http://www.andama.org/downloads

Please keep in mind that this version offers no cryptography, it is insecure and might put your computer and data in danger, so use it only for preview purposes.

Until now, I have spent hundreds of hours programming Andama, making sure that before I ask for funds, what I want to do is possible. 

Many things have to be done from now on to move Andama to the next level and release the first stable version including:

  • Implement client side encryption between connected computers. This will ensure the privacy we all want.
  • Create the user interface for all mobile platforms (iOS, Android, Windows Phone). The networking code is already tested on iOS and works fine. Should also work on Android and Windows because it is portable C++.
  • Create a Windows, OS X and Linux service (daemon) to accept remote connections as a privileged user. This is required to respond on UAC prompts, especially on Windows 8 and 10, and connect to remote computers without a user logged into the system.
  • Make mouse and keyboard work as it should on all platforms. Currently keyboard is not working on Linux and mouse needs some fixes on OS X.
  • Andama should grab the desktop screen only when changes are happening. This would result in better performance and reduced latency. Currently Andama is continuously taking screenshots of the desktop and compares them with the previous one until a change is detected.
  • Direct connection between remote computers (Peer-to-Peer). This will drastically reduce overall latency. Currently all data goes through the Andama proxy server.

All these features require a huge amount of man-hours to implement and experts to do it correctly. That's why it is important to back us now to develop the first stable version of Andama.


Perks

With perk level 1 you are actively helping the development of Andama. We will do our best to finish the first stable version on schedule.

In our GitHub source code repository there is a file named “Contributors.txt”. Inside this file you will find your name. Of course we respect the desire of some not to be thanked publicly or effusively.

Perks level 2-9 will give you early access to compiled binaries for each platform described in each perk.

Additionally, perks level 3-9 will list your name in a dedicated contributors section of our website. We hope you will be proud to help Andama through its development, as we are.

Perks level 6-9 give you the opportunity to place your advertising banner on the main screen of Andama. This is a non-obtrusive banner that gives your company great visibility to thousands of users who will use the software  worldwide. Please note the following for your ads:

-Advertising must tell the truth and not mislead consumers.
-In addition, claims must be substantiated.
-We will not accept advertising that we believe is unsafe, discriminatory, or spam-like
-We will not accept advertising from companies we believe show egregious disregard for sustainable practices
-Bottom line, we will listen to our community feedback, we will listen to our hearts, and we will modify our approach as appropriate to maintain our standards.


Technical specifications

  1. Andama is written in pure C++ using Qt Framework mainly for cross platform UI code. This gives it the best native performance on every platform and optimal memory usage.
  2. In order to connect to remote computers, a server application is in use: Andama Proxy. This is required for the Andama client applications to get an ID and make them discoverable.
  3. Every client makes an outbound connection to the Andama Proxy. That way there is no port forwarding rules required to setup on your router. Andama Proxy stands in the middle and merges the outbound connections of two clients
  4. All traffic between two clients in encrypted using industry standard encryption (To be implemented)
  5. The communication protocol is designed for speed and simplicity at the bytes level. There is no third party framework in use for objects serialization / de-serialization. Only the minimal required data is transferred over the wire.
  6. The server application, Andama Proxy, is a lightweight single file proxy server written in C++. When running on a Linux machine it consumes less than 2 MB for the main process and around 30 KB for each client computer connected. The proxy server code is 100% portable and compiles fine on Linux, OS X and Windows.


Timeline

26 November 2015 - 24 January 2016: Gather the required funds from the Indiegogo campaign.

23 January 2015 - 13 February 2016: Publish the required job positions and hire the talented developers who will develop Andama. The first cash injection from the Indiegogo campaign will go to developer salaries and technical equipment.

14 February 2016 - 15 April 2016: Once the development team is ready, we'll start by implementing encryption, fixing mouse and keyboard issues and implementing many other features required for releasing the first Alpha version of Andama. Make sure that everything works on Windows, OS X and Linux.

16 April 2016 - 6 June 2016: Fix any issues risen from the Alpha 1 version and implement the Windows service for Andama. This is required to respond to elevated UAC prompts from the remote computer. Implement the mobile version of Andama for iOS, Android and Windows Phone. Publish the Alpha 2 version of Andama for all platforms.

7 June 2016: Release the first stable version of Andama and publish the roadmap of the new features to be implemented in the next six months.

story:
Welcome to X of Stock. We're a couple of young men from the San Luis Valley, a small rural community lacking much opportunity. That’s why we decided to create our own. Together we came up with the idea to create an all in one cable that not only charges but connects all your devices.  We see the removal of the headphone jack beginning in newer smartphones and we know the inconvenience of having additional adapters and cables to carry. Our creation would eliminate the need of purchasing anything additional because our cable would have the ability to adapt to you!  We were tired of the mess and inconvenience that came with the separate cables for all of your other devices too! This nuisance birthed the concept of the Multi-Verse Cable! The most innovative cable that’s works for all of your mobile devices!  

Early contributors to our campaign are essential for us to get our idea of the ground. We need funds to create our prototype, once done then we can put our cable into production. We also need input from these contributors. We plan on sending early models of the cable to a select few of our founding donors so they can provide feedback! Together we can create the ultimate cable!

We’re going to need to raise $25,000 in order to get our prototype created and marketed online, and introduced at trade shows. 

We don’t have a set collection of perks quite yet but here is what we are thinking right now. Contributors of at least ($200.00) or more will qualify for a special partnership with X of Stock! The foundation contributors will have a huge voice on how we carry out our campaign for the Multi-Verse Cable! In addition they will get all of the following lesser perks for their contributions. Contributors of at least ($100.00) will be entered in a drawing to be considered to receive early prototypes of the Multi-Verse Cable, in order to send us some feedback!  Contributors of at least ($60.00) will receive the deluxe package of the Multi-Verse Cable once it has hit production!

We will have to reach our goal in order use any of the money donated to us. We have it set up like this to avoid any issues we could face when it comes to returning our funds if we for some reason, cannot follow through with our promises.

Our cable will be an asset to anyone with a mobile device, which means nearly everyone. These days’ people have so many devices for so many things. This means everybody has a lot of cables as well. All that means is more clutter. The Multi-Verse cable is an advancement in technology and convenience. No matter who you are or what you do, it would make things just that much easier only having to keep track of one cord for all of your devices!

We have never done anything like this before, but we are eager and hungry to get work! With our determination and the support from you guys, we can bring our creation to fruition. We’re just two guys who are passionate helping people and making a difference in the world. It’s going to be tough for us to start our company and get the Multi-Verse Cable going but with everyone’s help I’m confident we will succeed.

One of the biggest obstacles we face with creating the Multi-Verse cable is separating it from other products that may seem similar. We truly believe that the Multi-Verse Cable would be the most superior product of its kind, It would have many more features that our competition may have overlooked or ignored.  We also must admit this is our first time launching a campaign.

Don’t think that just because you’re unable to make a monetary contribution now, that you can’t contribute in other ways! The important thing here is, we need help with getting this idea out there and seen by everyone tired of all their cables! If you have any interest in the Multi-Verse Cable, and you would like it to become a reality, or if you just feel bad for us, SHARE our campaign!  Also, we need EVERYONE to follow all of our social media pages, and check out our website!

story:
Dear Everybody.

We've developed an application for ios platform called "Peer Touch"

Our's "Peer Touch" application for kids, men, women.... use to draw together for Chat, Education with funny.

And now We want to scale this system.

Estimate:

- the first 3 months: build large server.

- 3 months after: smoth performance ios application.

- 3 -> 6 months after: build android application.

And We need your help to do them. each dollar you helped our, we will refund them to your account in our's system to use in "Peer Touch" application with big value. You can see them on Perks.


Thanks you very much for your help to make big system with our.


Here is Live link iOS Application on Appstore:

http://apple.co/1oLAnEh


Application Promotion:

Collaborate with your friends, your family or your kids with Peer Touch, the easy-to-use collaborative drawing app!

One user can create pictures with Self Drawing mode.

Two users can create pictures together via Internet.

• Designed for the iPhone, iPod touch, and iPhone 6, iPhone 6S, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S Plus.

Try many potential uses.

• The peer-to-peer networking feature also enables a certain class of multiplayer games, like Connect 4, Tic-Tac-Toe, Dots, and more.

• It's also useful for quickly visualizing ideas: I used it myself this way, putting into visible form an icon layout I had in mind. It's almost like using a graphic tablet!

• The possibilities are endless wherever you go.

TIPS:

• To Draw with friends:

Go to Search, Followers, Followings Screen and tapping to user want to draw. Then tap to button Draw and wait friend connect.

On Mode Draw with Friend, friends must online.

• Show/Hide the menu on draw screen by tapping the screen.

If you enjoy this app, please give it a top rating to encourage us to develop more. Send us your feedback for updates, as I have plans for many future improvements! Thanks :)

• If you have some feedback, please email us at wakingit.com@gmail.com

story:
We believe Swift One is the best-in-class power bank for its size and portability. 
It’s lightweight and 25% smaller than others of the same capacity.
It features 3 ports of innovative fast-charging technologies.
It lets you charge all your favorite devices at the same time. 
And it packs a whopping 20100mAh. That’s a lotta juice! 

Why have we made it? Because we believe your devices should enable you, not limit you.
But when you’re relying on your phone, tablet, or laptop, the battery can let you down when you need it most. We want to avoid this frustration and live truly mobile lives. 

Swift One lets you join the limitless. All the power you need, on the go, in one handy device. 


Any Devices. Many Devices

Swift One can power a huge range of phones, tablets, MacBooks, wearables, and more, with the versatility that lets you mix and match to fit your needs. 

Fast Charge Three (3) Devices Simultaneously

We’ve designed Swift One to be the last power bank you’ll ever need. Use it to fast-charge all your smart devices, phones, and more, at once. 

3 Fast-charging Ports

Each port designed for specific device types but with the flexibility to be used as needed. 

Faster Charging than Ever

USB-C Power Delivery is the most cutting-edge fast-charging standard. Built for speed, this port charges your MacBook, tablet, smartphone, and more in times that were previously impossible. The 30W port can charge an iPhone 8  up to 3 times faster than its own charger, and a Nintendo Switch at full speed.

 

Quick Charge 3.0. 

The quickest way to charge countless smartphones. Up to 4X faster than their own chargers. Wait less and do more.

 
 

Swift+ Offers Speed and Versatility

Our proprietary 12W port is perfect for low-power smart devices and gadgets, but still works perfectly with fast-charging phones and tablets.


High Capacity 

20100mAh is enough to charge most of your devices several times over. Check out what Swift One can do:


Compact Design

We didn’t want a bulky device, despite its high capacity. So we didn’t build one.


 

As Portable As Your Own Phone

So wherever you can take your phone, you can take your pocket-sized Swift One as well. 


Lightweight

The Swift One weighs only slightly more than a Nintendo Switch (which it can charge, by the way). So if you can carry one, you can carry the other. 


Fast Recharging

Because life’s too short to wait around. Its 3-hour recharge with a USB-C PD input gives you more than 5 full smartphones worth of energy. 



 

Airplane-friendly

Take your Swift One to the skies with you, since it meets airline regulations to be carried onboard. 


Two Cool Colors

We like to keep things simple, But stylish. The fine-finish aluminum alloy shell is scratch and impact-resistant. Swift One is available in Infinite Gray and Deep Blue. 




For lives on the go 

The ultimate travel companion for device-enabled lives. 


Switch on the Turbo

One for the gamers, Swift One charges the Nintendo Switch at full speed. 


 

The Smart Choice for Wearables

Low-power devices mean rapid charging and tons of cycles. Need to charge your Fitbit nearly 100 times? No problem. 


Smart by Design

Our partnerships with some of the world’s leading tech companies have helped us bring the Swift One to life and deliver the best ever power management system seen in a portable power bank. 

Development 


 

Putting Safety First

Key to the safe operation of the Swift One is its comprehensive user protection system and world-class hardware that prevent any malfunctions.


 

How We Stack Up Against the Competition

We didn’t want to make just another power bank. We wanted to make the best power bank for its size at a truly affordable price. 


Technical Specs

 
 
Meet Swift™; Your Personal Smart Charging Assistant

We’re giving every backer a lifetime Premium account of our Swift Alexa Skill. Not only does this enable Alexa to help you extend your phone’s battery life, but you’ll also receive charging tips and life hacks. We won’t give all the details away now, but if you’ve ever been frustrated by your phone’s battery life, you’ll be able to do something like this:

“Alexa, ask Swift how to improve the battery life of my iPhone 8”

or

“Alexa, ask Swift why my Galaxy S9 battery dies so fast” 

*Supported phones: iPhone X, iPhone 7/8Plus, iPhone 7/8, iPhone SE, Galaxy S8/S9+, Galaxy S8/S9, Galaxy Note 9, Galaxy Note 8, LG G6/G7, LG V30, Google Pixel/Pixel2, and Google Pixel XL/XL 2.*

*Available December 2018*

 


Created for Convenience

The Swift One was born from the desire of NexX founder Arvin to have one portable power bank that could rapidly charge his phone, tablet, and MacBook at the same time. After failing to find the right device out there, Arvin took matters into his own hands and the NexX team brought the world his vision of a more versatile portable power bank. 


 

Quality Assurance

At NexX we take quality very seriously and we believe high quality is not an added value; it is an essential basic requirement. We use the highest quality American made microchips and ICs manufactured by ON Semiconductor and Texas Instruments. We manufacture and assemble the circuit boards in United States to ensure that the final product meets our standards.

Designed with Passion

NexX is a small and dedicated team whose skillset spans electronic engineering, computer science, and industrial design. Together we strive to create innovative solutions that make our modern lives simpler and convenient. The Swift One is our flagship product that we believe represents a step change for the portable charging market. 
 


 


 


 

 


 

Now We Need Your Help

The Swift One is a bright vision of what power banks should be… now we’re asking for your help to make that vision a reality. In return, you can be the first in the world to get your hands on the most complete portable charger ever made at a price that reflects our gratitude for your support. 

 

Perks


 




 

FAQ

What's the warranty policy for Swift One?
Swift One comes with 12 months hardware warranty.

Can I take the Swift One on an airplane?
Yes, You can carry Swift One in your carry-on luggage. The capacity of Swift One (74.4Wh) falls within Federal Aviation Administration’s safety limit.
For additional information you can visit : 
https://www.faa.gov/about/initiatives/hazmat_safety/more_info/?hazmat=7

What is the life expectancy of Swift One?
Swift One's life expectancy is 500 full cycles. After 500 cycles, Swift One will hold around 80% of the original capacity.

What countries do you ship to?
We ship to more than 50 countries worldwide. Shipping is free to United States.
Please note that backers are responsible for any applicable customs duty and charges.
story_txt:
We believe Swift One is the best-in-class power bank for its size and portability. It’s lightweight and 25% smaller than others of the same capacity.It features 3 ports of innovative fast-charging technologies.It lets you charge all your favorite devices at the same time. And it packs a whopping 20100mAh. That’s a lotta juice! 
Why have we made it? Because we believe your devices should enable you, not limit you.But when you’re relying on your phone, tablet, or laptop, the battery can let you down when you need it most. We want to avoid this frustration and live truly mobile lives. 
Swift One lets you join the limitless. All the power you need, on the go, in one handy device. 



Any Devices. Many Devices

Swift One can power a huge range of phones, tablets, MacBooks, wearables, and more, with the versatility that lets you mix and match to fit your needs. 


Fast Charge Three (3) Devices Simultaneously
We’ve designed Swift One to be the last power bank you’ll ever need. Use it to fast-charge all your smart devices, phones, and more, at once. 


3 Fast-charging Ports
Each port designed for specific device types but with the flexibility to be used as needed. 
Faster Charging than Ever
USB-C Power Delivery is the most cutting-edge fast-charging standard. Built for speed, this port charges your MacBook, tablet, smartphone, and more in times that were previously impossible. The 30W port can charge an iPhone 8  up to 3 times faster than its own charger, and a Nintendo Switch at full speed.

 
Quick Charge 3.0. 
The quickest way to charge countless smartphones. Up to 4X faster than their own chargers. Wait less and do more.
  
Swift+ Offers Speed and Versatility
Our proprietary 12W port is perfect for low-power smart devices and gadgets, but still works perfectly with fast-charging phones and tablets.


High Capacity 
20100mAh is enough to charge most of your devices several times over. Check out what Swift One can do:

Compact Design
We didn’t want a bulky device, despite its high capacity. So we didn’t build one. 
As Portable As Your Own Phone
So wherever you can take your phone, you can take your pocket-sized Swift One as well. 

Lightweight
The Swift One weighs only slightly more than a Nintendo Switch (which it can charge, by the way). So if you can carry one, you can carry the other. 


Fast Recharging
Because life’s too short to wait around. Its 3-hour recharge with a USB-C PD input gives you more than 5 full smartphones worth of energy.  
Airplane-friendly
Take your Swift One to the skies with you, since it meets airline regulations to be carried onboard.

story:
What is Standify?

It's simple. Standify is a smartphone stand that was designed to be light, stable and  just the right height to enhance every common magnifier tool.

 

How do I use it?

Just open your Standify and place your smartphone on top. Launch the magnifier tool and enjoy a clear, stable image.

Once you're done, just fold it up. It will even fit in your pocket.

Who can use Standify?

Standify is suitable for everyone who enjoys exploring the small details of life!

In particular:

 

 

For those who like macro-photography, using special lenses for their smartphone- Standify would be a great solution for getting the best stable, clear images!

 

 

The Design Process.

I began by investigating what would be the right stand for getting the best results from smartphone magnifiers. Then I sketched out some design ideas and gathered information about smartphone dimensions.

I modeled the stand using CAD software, and printed the first prototype in a 3D printer.

I finally came up with a stand that works! An easy to use, light-weight stand. The smartphone is held firmly, in a horizontal position, ready for use.

Without Standify, it's difficult to get clear magnified images, even with the steadiest hand.

 

Below are some pics from the design process- sketches, CAD, 3D printing:

 

Perks.

I want to thank you for supporting this project! Check out the perks below:

Campaign Goals, and the Future of Standify.

So why do I need the money?  With your kind support I hope to complete the funding for the launch of this project. I'll use the money to produce molds for the parts, hire an Industrial Designer to mass-produce Standify and to launch the product! 

During the design process, I used my iPhone 6S as a test model. The goal is that Standify will be available in one size, compatible with all common smartphones today. 

*Maximum size will be up to iPhone 7 Plus size,  about 160 mm X 78 mm.

The next step is to make Standify a multi-purpose stand; a magnifier stand, a smartphone stand and also a tablet stand.

 

Comments.

Below are several comments I received from people who got a chance to try out Standify:

 

 

A little bit about myself.

I'm Leeav, an Industrial Engineer with passion for designing solutions for problems we come across in daily life.

I am a technology enthusiast - and a pilot.

This is my second Crowd-Funding project, and another venture in my entrepreneurial resume.

From every project I learn a lot and implement new ideas.

 

Timeline.

 

 

Social Media.

Help by sharing Standify's Facebook page with your friends.

With more people knowing about Standify- the better the chance that I'll be able to make it!

 

Questions?

Got a question? Message me or post on Facebook and I'll do my best to get back to you with an answer.

 

FAQ's.

Q1- Shipping:

Shipping is availabe for the countries on the list below:

United-States, Austria, Australia, Italy, Israel, Ireland, Belgium, Brazil, United-Kingdom, Germany, Holland, China (Hong-Kong only) Norway, Spain, Finland, Poland, Portugal, France, Canada, Sweden and Switzerland.

 

Q2- Maginification Quality:

Standify was designed and tested to work with several smartphone brands and their cameras. However, other smartphone brands and models may have cameras with different focal lengths and the maginfied image quality may vary.

 

Q3- Smartphone Sizes:

Eventually, Standify will be produced in a "one-size"  and will fit all common smartphones available, up to 160 mm X 78 mm.

 

Q4- Standify Colors:

Currently, Standify will be in one color only- Black. 

If additional colors will become available- I will update via updates section.

story:
Piiirs

100 + people pass us by every day. More than 100 missed opportunities each day. 

Our app Piiirs will enable you to contact everyone who has crossed your path today. Find and meet your peer groups, where ever you go. 

 

Piiirs will be an app that creates more meaningful connections in real life. Expand your personal and business circle where ever you go. 

*There are no ties between “The Northface” company and Piiirs, this display is just for presentational use and visual support.

Main Features

1. See everyone you have passed today and...

  • See where your paths have crossed
  • Find, contact and meet your peer groups in real life
  • See a profile picture and other peoples passion 
  • View how others would like to meet e.g. sports, culture, drinks, studying, business, etc.
  • Expand your personal and business circle where ever you go

2. Shake your phone once while in a public place and...

  • See a profile of people who are sitting in the same room, bar, restaurant, train etc..
  • Find and contact interesting people in a neutral way
  • Easily connect with your peer groups

Oh..Interesting

How did Piiirs get started? 

A year ago i was cycling along the Rhein river in Cologne. A sporty couple on their bikes were riding next to me and we started an interesting conversation while riding. Once i got home i was frustrated that we didn't exchange any contacts. I would have really enjoyed to meet them again go cycling together or simply grab a beer in the city.

In that moment the idea of Piiirs was created. There should be services out there that use technology and enable us to create meaningful connections in real life. To contact everyone we have passed by today in order to expand our personal and business circle, where ever we go. That is the core idea of Piiirs. More Meaningful Connections in real life through technology. An app that adds endless opportunities to our daily routine and enables us to find and meet our peer groups, any where and any time. 

Back to the sporty couple. Through pure coincidence we three meet again, went on many cycling trips together and have become great friends. 

Why do we need Piiirs

A study found that high social media use is linked to the feelings of social isolation, the more time people spend on social media sites, the more socially isolated they perceived themselves to be. A perceived social isolation is one of the worst things for us, mentally and physically. 

Using technology to enable us to cultivate meaningful connections in real life is a
powerful approach to reduce human loneliness and negative emotions. Piiirs uses
technology to bring us all closer together, share exciting adventures with interesting people in REAL LIFE. 

I believe a future where we can connect to the interesting people who pass us every day in a respectful way is infinitely more exciting and inspiring than one where we can't. 

  • We believe in People, Life as an Adventure and services that do Good
  • The goal is to create tech that enables us to build bridges and not walls, in real life
  • Real people, meaningful connections, real adventures in real life

Business Model

Piiirs is based on a Freemium approach. 

  • The main features and usage of Piiirs is (and will stay) FREE
  • In order to offer a total free service we will integrate exciting ads
  • The premium account unlocks extra goodies

Premium Account 

This premium version will cost 4.99 Euros per month and includes:

  • We know data storage on the phone is very very valuabe. Premium users have the option to delete or save specific chat histories on Piiirs automatically. 
  • The free version includes your job title or field of study. The premium version enables you to attach your professional CV to your profile and share it with others.
  • Add  2 social / business accounts that are important to you. Own Website link, Blog, Vlog, etc.
  •  It also highlights 2 “Power-Peers” for you each day that have + 90 % of interests in common with you. They might be a perfect fit for the next adventure in the city or outdoors.
  • In the future, as our community grows you will be able to find and contact your peers in other cities, before actually traveling there.

Distribution of the Indigogo Funding

  • 37,5 % : Design of the app Piiirs
  • 37,5 % : Technical development of the app Piiirs 
  • 15,0 % : Marketing of Piiirs
  • 10,0 % : Legal, incorporation costs and salary

 

 

Piiirs Roadmap

  • Q1 - 2017 
    • Core idea was born, beginning of market research
    • Features of the app were developed
    • Freelance designer realized first mockup pictures
  • Q2 - 2017
    • Legal advice was obtained
    • First draft of a business plan 
    • Live survey with 180 potential customers was conducted
    • The results: 
      • 92 % are very excited about this neutral approach
      • 87 % answered "Yes" they would reccomend the app to friends
      • 90 % were not excited about purchasing coins in order to use the app
      • 27 % would be willing to pay over 10 Euros / month for premium features.
  • Q3 - 2017
    • Business model was changed to a more user friendly "Freemium model"
    • Pre screening and first interviews with potential future team members
    • Screening recommendations for a valuable mentor
    • Finalizing the business, finance plan, executive summary and a pitchdeck
  • Q4 - 2017
    • Conducting recruitment interviews in the areas of web & app design, marketing, full stack development
    • Found an incredible team who will design and develope the app 
    • A mockup prototype was designed and developed by previous freelance designer
  • Q1 - 2018
    • Diane Tea, a member of the European and Luxemburg business angel association joined Piiirs as the senior advisor
    • Pre-seed investors and tech incubators were found
  • Q2 - Q3 - 2018
    • Raise funding through Indigogo
    • Develope, design and launch Product
    • Celebrate this milestone with our backers and send out our Perks
    • Execute first small budget marketing campaigns
    • Begin conversations with seed investors 
    • Secure seed funding either through Seed investor or launching an (pre) ICO
    • Hire the a team of 8 and start to execute our international geo - marketing plan

Milestone

With your support we can design and develope a fully functional version of the app Piiirs. We will launch it and open our doors for you guys and support you with any questions you might have during and after the campaign.

Together we will overcome one of the biggest challenges of any startup, building and launching a first incredible product. We will begin to walk the journey as a young and ambitious startup together and change the world, step by step with you.

We will keep you up to date on our Piiirs instagram account and celebrate the begining of an exciting journey with all of you together. If you have any direct questions feel free to contact us via e-mail at tristan@piiirs.de and we will get back to you. You can also reach out to us on the Instagram account of Piiirs.

 

Team

  • Tristan Coe, founder of Piiirs, serial founder, educational background in business administration, applied psychology undergraduate dropout inorder to change the world with Piiirs
    • https://www.linkedin.com/in/tristan-coe-4926334a/ 
  • Diane Tea is the Senior advisor to Piiirs. Business advisor & mentor 
    • https://www.linkedin.com/in/dianetea/
  • Sebastian  Germesin,  CEO of appwith.us (Innovative app development company)
    • Technical development of the app Piiirs
    • https://www.linkedin.com/in/germesin/
    • https://appwith.us/home

92 % are very excited about this neutral approach
87 % answered "Yes" they would reccomend the app to friends
90 % were not excited about purchasing coins in order to use the app
27 % would be willing to pay over 10 Euros / month for premium features.




Q3 - 2017
Business model was changed to a more user friendly "Freemium model"
Pre screening and first interviews with potential future team members
Screening recommendations for a valuable mentor
Finalizing the business, finance plan, executive summary and a pitchdeck


Q4 - 2017
Conducting recruitment interviews in the areas of web & app design, marketing, full stack development
Found an incredible team who will design and develope the app 
A mockup prototype was designed and developed by previous freelance designer


Q1 - 2018
Diane Tea, a member of the European and Luxemburg business angel association joined Piiirs as the senior advisor
Pre-seed investors and tech incubators were found


Q2 - Q3 - 2018
Raise funding through Indigogo
Develope, design and launch Product
Celebrate this milestone with our backers and send out our Perks
Execute first small budget marketing campaigns
Begin conversations with seed investors 
Secure seed funding either through Seed investor or launching an (pre) ICO
Hire the a team of 8 and start to execute our international geo - marketing plan



MilestoneWith your support we can design and develope a fully functional version of the app Piiirs. We will launch it and open our doors for you guys and support you with any questions you might have during and after the campaign.Together we will overcome one of the biggest challenges of any startup, building and launching a first incredible product. We will begin to walk the journey as a young and ambitious startup together and change the world, step by step with you.We will keep you up to date on our Piiirs instagram account and celebrate the begining of an exciting journey with all of you together. If you have any direct questions feel free to contact us via e-mail at tristan@piiirs.de and we will get back to you. You can also reach out to us on the Instagram account of Piiirs. Team
Tristan Coe, founder of Piiirs, serial founder, educational background in business administration, applied psychology undergraduate dropout inorder to change the world with Piiirs
https://www.linkedin.com/in/tristan-coe-4926334a/ 

Diane Tea is the Senior advisor to Piiirs. Business advisor & mentor https://www.linkedin.com/in/dianetea/

Sebastian  Germesin,  CEO of appwith.us (Innovative app development company)
Technical development of the app Piiirs
https://www.linkedin.com/in/germesin/
https://appwith.us/home

story:
It's Dangerous!

Are you still holding the phone while driving? Did you lose your way when your phone died because of long-time navigating? Do you always find your drink become hot in your car? It's time to change!

Wireless Charging

Standard charging mode is recommended for iPhone and all other QI-enabled devices. It provides you with 5w wireless charging. No more extra wires to twine your gear stick. You will be free to use your phone to navigate and play music while driving and always get a charged phone when you leave your car. The indicator on the mount will also give you a reminder of the working status.

Cool Your Drink

You won't refuse a cup of cool drink in the hot summer, will you? But how to keep the drink cool in the car? It becomes simple when you find this phone mount! Stretch it out and put your drink on the cup holder. Then, start your air conditioner. You will always have a cool drink by your hand. It will provide strong support for your cup. Meanwhile, because of its simple structure, it will not block your vent. So the cool wind can also spread in the car, making your car the best shelter in the summer.

Air Freshener

Yes, it only takes up one of the vents and does all jobs. There is a groove for air freshener on the back of the phone mount which is behind your drink and is closest to the vent. Air Freshener helps clean away odours and slowly releases an ocean scent, which will bring you to the beach and recall your precious memories. You can also drop your own fragrance on to the block after the scent fades.

Retractable

The retractable structure will help you to find the most comfortable viewing angle which gives you safe driving whether you are talking, navigating, listening to music or charging. Also, this feature will help you to save your space when not holding the cup.

Gravity Linkage

With the 3 angle arms, the mobile phone car holder is able to lock your phone firmly and securely. Car phone holder arm clips form a triangle fixed to adapt the deceleration zone, rugged mountain road, emergency braking and other situations. It allows you to clamp your phone with one hand. This air vent phone holder can be flexibly adjusted to hold phones of size from 58~92mm. Compatible with most smartphones.

Protect The Car From Scratching

Two springs on the kickstand legs will keep the phone mount fixed firmly on the air vent. This mount will not cause any damage to the air vent. With reliable aluminum alloy material, it is more sturdy than other plastic car phone mount. The silicon pad will also prevent your car from being scratched and give your phone a more stable hold.

Shock Absorption

There are too many accidents caused by reaching the fallen phone. We think the most basic and important rule of designing a phone mount is making it stable. With three built-in springs, the mount will effectively absorb the shock and hold your phone steadily without any risk of sliding or falling off even on a rugged road. It will also leave the room for the phone's side button.

Easy To Install

Simply follow the steps and set your phone mount in a minute. Pull out the buckle and insert it to the groove. Rotate it to the right angle paralleling with your vent. Then, clip it to the vent. The last step will take a little extra force, but it will give you firmer support once installed.

It fits most vehicles' vents except the round ones.

Great Quality

Made of high-quality aluminum alloy and plastic material. It's durable and can reject noise caused by shake.

This Package Contains:

Risks and Challenges

We can guarantee that the first shipment will go out no later than August 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delays as being very low.

story:
The more you trust us, the more we'll reward you...

...just to be clear, it's going to be 128 GB!

 

 

 

If you double the funding goal, we will colour it!

Choose between three different possibilities:

 

 

Have you been one of the first supporters of our campaign and you already bought the "Original Black" version? Don't worry, you have the possibility to change the colour.

 

 

 

 

We know we set an high goal but there is a reason why. We can't accept to hit the target and despite that, fail our duty towards you.

Our first project is going to be an hard but stimulant challenge because of the costs and sacrifices that the building of a new production chain requires.

story:
Short Summary

The Cyrcle Phone 4G LTE is your familiar smartphone with Android but in a new shape. There have been decades of the same smartphone, year after year. It’s time for a new perspective. The Cyrcle Phone reframes your relationship with technology in a more meaningful and beautiful way.

Our company has been making "Non-Rectangular Phones for Non-Rectangular People" since 2015. We have been funded for not just one, but TWO innovative smartphones via crowdfunding, and have built a reputation of delivering rewards early to backers. 

By funding The Cyrcle Phone via crowdfunding, you enable bulk manufacturing, thereby bringing the individual cost down for everyone (from over $2,000 per phone, to less than $1,000 per phone). In this way, more people are able to explore beyond mainstream smartphones, and dive into the realm of advanced technology.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have a few units of The Cyrcle Phone available, and we would like to use those to help us explore the Indiegogo In-Demand community and platform. Please tell us what you like and don't like about the product, our campaign page, and how you would like to be treated.  Learning about you is important to us!

 

The Impact

All funds go to producing the rewards and shipping them to you. It is important for us to get this part right so that we can grow further as a company.  By backing us, you enable a diverse team of people to deliver amazing products across the globe.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have the supplies on hand to manufacture The Cyrcle Phones in the amount listed. As we obtain more supplies, we plan to return to Indiegogo to add additional offerings. Our company has delivered many phones before this campaign. When you back us via crowdfunding, it is our tradition to exceed your expectations. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks to Hannah Busing @hannahbusing for making this photo available freely on Unsplash

We understand that you may not be able to contribute at this level, but this does not mean that you can't help. You can get the word out and make some noise about The Cyrcle Phone, especially by using the built-in Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign link to your social media. We appreciate every mention!
 

Press & Electronic Media Coverage

"In a sea of rectangular black smartphones, the Cyrcle concept phone at CES immediately stands out for its novel design.” - Lynn La, CNET Senior Editor, Phone Reviews

 

“The Cyrcle Phone doesn’t have one, but rather two headphone jacks.” - Cody Godwin, BBC Producer, BBC Tech​

 

“The makers of the Cyrcle Phone offer a different vision, a rounder vision.” - Will Nicol, Digital Trends: Emerging Tech

 

"Besides hitting off a new design, the shape makes it very handy. Providing users with a better grip and changing their entire experience of handling a smartphone." - Haya Ali, Wonderful Engineering


"Smartphones, as a concept, have been reduced down to glowing rectangles that have grown boring. Why not have it take on a different shape? Well, the people behind the Cyrcle Phone have decided to take up the challenge, showcasing a circular phone at CES." Jules Wang, Android Police

story:
Do you use your laptop all the time? So do we. And that’s why we designed a stand that meets your needs at home and in the office. This is not just your tipical stand, it was designed to be comfortable everywhere, while protecting your laptop.  So here are our main goals for the design:

Ergonomics: we aimed to develop a product that helps you use your laptop in a more comfortable and natural position, be it on a desk, on your lap, a couch or even in bed. The back contour was designed to fit and grip in your legs and to be sturdy on a table or irregular surface. The wedge shape makes it perfect for a desk, aiming for a natural working position.



Functionality: not only did we care about your comfort but also your laptop’s health - our design lets your computer breathe wherever you place it, and it grips, so it is safer to use it wherever you want it. The back contour maximizes airflow and the front rib keeps your laptop secure.

Sustainability: we use sustainable materials (Cork) and ecofriendly processes. We value the environment, so we took the time to think about our footprint.


Style: if you like to stand out with classy props, this one is for you! Have you ever seen a molded cork piece? It's unique: the looks, the warmth, the smell - you'll never find anything like it, and it goes beautifully with the CRK's sleek lines. Don't wait too long to have it.


"But why Cork?" you might ask. Well, there are a number of answers to that, let me tell you about cork:

Sustainability

Cork is an ecofriendly and sustainable material, it is basically the bark of a tree branch (cork oak) that is removed without any damage to the tree itself - and it grows back in a couple of years. 


These raw pieces of cork are normally used for the production of wine corks. Now, what we use to produce our “CRK stand” is the residue of this process, which is molded with natural resin, so not only are we using sustainable materials, we are also reducing waste. The final product has no finishing layer, it doesn’t need one.


The Touch

Another great thing about cork is its touch, it’s something that you can’t easily describe but it is extremely comfortable. It has a kind of raw feel to it that perfectly matches the way it looks.


Properties

Did you know cork can easily hold at a 35º angle in a smooth surface? This means you can be lying down with your laptop comfortably hanging in your legs. It is also one of the best natural thermal insulators you can find (it is used to isolate the deck of the space shuttle), so that means you can forget that nasty feeling you get when your laptop starts heating up your legs.


The Looks

Well, we love it, but this is up to you really. We offer three choices of grain, the fine grain can be molded directly into final pieces (Standard edition), the other two types of large grain (for the Deluxe and Black editions) are molded into blocks and then CNC machined, choose the one you love.

                    Standard                                Black Edition                           Deluxe Edition

Why we need your help?

Straight like an arrow – mold costs and minimal production quantities.

Everything is prepared, the product and mold are designed and the prototypes are ready and tested.

Now we need you to give us the last pull and go forward with production – and because we really, really appreciate your help, we provide you with the best deal you’ll get on our product, plus some unique opportunities!
