story:
Do you remember DouBBleTime from our Kickstarter campaign launched in May of 2014?

It was the world's first charging cable with a built-in switch that allowed double the charging speed of a regular cable when plugged into a USB device or car port.
With $98,376 in funds raised worldwide, we received a lot of recognition for our hard work. Following us, there were a few copycats here and there that also did funding campaigns and were quite successful. With slight modification to our original design, others were able to piggyback on our idea and did a great job of it. So we decided to come out with an upgraded version and dub it DouBBleTime Plus and launch it on Indiegogo.

Why should you use DouBBleTime?

When you’re always on the go and usually charge your phone or tablet with a laptop or PC in the office or an USB port in the car, have you noticed that charging this way takes a really long time? And it’s almost impossible to actually increase your phone’s battery power if you’re using it as a GPS even while your phone is plugged in into your car's USB port; that's because your phone is using more power than the power your USB port can supply to your phone.  


Regular USB cables are made to communicate (transfer data) and to act as a power supply between your USB port and your device simultaneously.

When you connect your device (i.e. phone, table, etc.) to your USB port (on your laptop or in your car), the port automatically changes to sync/charge mode providing limited power because it's attempting to sync AND charge at the same time. Simply put, attempting to transfer data and charge at the same time is the main reason why charging is so slow.


No more switches!

The original DouBBleTime cable had a switch near the device plug that would turn on DouBBleTime charging while cutting off data communication between your device and your computer. (DCP Mode) An LED light would let you know that Dedicated Charging was turned on and data sync with your PC was turned off. Turning data sync off allowed for double the charging speed because all input/output was being dedicated strictly for charging no matter what port you were using (PC, car, etc.)

DouBBleTime Plus enhances our original design by getting rid of the clunky switch design while still charging your device at twice the speed AND allowing data synchronization at the same time with your PC. If you take a close look at the new cable design above, you'll notice that the switch is no longer there. 

Charge your device at twice the speed, all the time, and sync your data too!



DouBBleTime EL adds a new feature to our original cable design by adding an LED strip down the entire cable letting you know when DCP mode has been turned on. The switch for DouBBleTime EL has been moved from the cable and added to the USB charging plug for a more simplistic and cleaner design.

The moving LED strip has been added along the cable to allow easy visibility of your cable in the dark and letting you know that your device is being charged and the switch has been turned on. The switch was left on so that the new LED strip would not always be running when charging your device and you can decide when and when not to charge your device in DouBBleTime.

DouBBleTime Plus and DouBBleTime EL are equipped with new features that enhance the comfort and convenience of DouBBleTime. 


With DouBBleTime Plus, you no longer have to check whether to see if DouBBletime charging is turned on. DouBBleTime charging is on all the time and the LED simply shows you that it's working. Even though your device will be charging at double the speed, data sync will STILL work and will not harm your devices battery.

DouBBleTime & DouBBleTime EL

A simple, yet ingenious, special chip inside the switch talks to your computer telling it, ‘I’m not a phone; I’m not going to sync, so give me maximum charging energy’. This feature allows the cable to bypass the capped out maximum power a USB can output and connect straight to the mainboard. The special chip also provides over current protection (OCP) and short circuit protection, which guarantees the safety of both your computer and device while charging. 




An added bonus, DouBBleTime & DouBBleTime EL protects your personal and private data stored on your devices by blocking data connection. When DouBBleTime mode is turned ON, the cable prevents accidental data exchange when your device is plugged into a foreign charge source. DouBBLeTime mode achieves this by blocking off the data communication between your phone and USB ports, allowing only power charging to take place (at DouBBle the charging pace compared to a regular USB cable).



*Retailer Perk Packs are free shipping to the continental U.S. only. All other countries, an additional $20 must be provided.

Founded in 2012, BenchSoft is dedicated to studying and developing smartphone related accessories that provide a touch of humanity, creativity, and fun. Our team consists of specialized engineers in the fields of Audio DSP, 2.4 GHz wireless technology, mobile applications, and battery operation along side young marketing experts.

Core Business Areas:
  • Nearfield Wireless Communication ( Bluetooth Speaker, Headset, ETC.)
  • Audio DSP related Business ( Audio and Sound Signal Processing )
  • Recharging Smart Phone Battery and Management Technology
  • Mobile App Production( Photo Editing/ Control 3rd Party Accessories)


DouBBLeTime Charging Cable 7 months in the making and it has been a rewarding experience to take it from concept to working samples. These working samples have been tested extensively to prove charging times and safety. We have already set up agreements with key suppliers (certified MFi connector factory) and contracted manufacturer. And we have expertly-designed printed circuit boards in hand. These are just a few steps we’ve taken to make sure the product is delivered correctly and on time!

Our biggest concern and challenge will come from manufacturing of our product. From the quality of the mold we will be making to final assembly, we have a very high standard and expectation. Meticulously overseeing the manufacturing to ensure we produce tight fitting and well functioning product will be our biggest challenge that lies ahead of us.


Does the DouBBleTime cord charge a device faster than normal cords when plugged into the wall?

  • DouBBleTime was designed with "faster charging on the go" in mind, with the added bonus of data security when connected to an unknown power source. If you connect a regular USB charger cable to a wall outlet, charging time will be similar to that of our DouBBleTime charging cable, but you will be handcuffed to a wall outlet and this usage case is not our primary objective nor the spirit of this invention. DouBBleTime is about fast, very fast, charging on the go: from car USB port, laptop, etc

Will the cable only work for Apple products?

  • Good news! DouBBleTime Charging Cable works for both Apple AND Android devices!

Will the cable be certified by apple to work on all devices?

  • We are using MFi approved components to manufacture our product. This way, our cable is as genuine as the one that comes with the iphone. You will not receive messages like, 'This accessory is not certified.

How long is the cable?

  • The DouBBleTime Charging Cable is 40" long.
Does the cable come in many colors?
  • At the time, only white is provided. We are looking into adding more colors for a possible stretch goal.

And it’s almost impossible to actually increase your phone’s battery power if you’re using it as a GPS even while your phone is plugged in into your car's USB port; that's because your phone is using more power than the power your USB port can supply to your phone.  



Regular USB cables are made to communicate (transfer data) and to act as a power supply between your USB port and your device simultaneously.

When you connect your device (i.e. phone, table, etc.) to your USB port (on your laptop or in your car), the port automatically changes to sync/charge mode providing limited power because it's attempting to sync AND charge at the same time. Simply put, attempting to transfer data and charge at the same time is the main reason why charging is so slow.




No more switches!The original DouBBleTime cable had a switch near the device plug that would turn on DouBBleTime charging while cutting off data communication between your device and your computer. (DCP Mode) An LED light would let you know that Dedicated Charging was turned on and data sync with your PC was turned off. Turning data sync off allowed for double the charging speed because all input/output was being dedicated strictly for charging no matter what port you were using (PC, car, etc.)
DouBBleTime Plus enhances our original design by getting rid of the clunky switch design while still charging your device at twice the speed AND allowing data synchronization at the same time with your PC. If you take a close look at the new cable design above, you'll notice that the switch is no longer there. 

Charge your device at twice the speed, all the time, and sync your data too!












DouBBleTime EL adds a new feature to our original cable design by adding an LED strip down the entire cable letting you know when DCP mode has been turned on. The switch for DouBBleTime EL has been moved from the cable and added to the USB charging plug for a more simplistic and cleaner design.
The moving LED strip has been added along the cable to allow easy visibility of your cable in the dark and letting you know that your device is being charged and the switch has been turned on. The switch was left on so that the new LED strip would not always be running when charging your device and you can decide when and when not to charge your device in DouBBleTime.

DouBBleTime Plus and DouBBleTime EL are equipped with new features that enhance the comfort and convenience of DouBBleTime. 



With DouBBleTime Plus, you no longer have to check whether to see if DouBBletime charging is turned on. DouBBleTime charging is on all the time and the LED simply shows you that it's working. Even though your device will be charging at double the speed, data sync will STILL work and will not harm your devices battery.





DouBBleTime & DouBBleTime EL




A
simple, yet ingenious, special chip inside the switch talks to your computer telling it, ‘I’m not a phone; I’m not going to sync, so give me maximum
charging energy’. This feature allows the cable to bypass the capped
out maximum power a USB can output and connect straight to the mainboard. The
special chip also provides over current protection (OCP) and short circuit
protection, which guarantees the safety of both your computer and device while
charging. 











An added bonus, DouBBleTime & DouBBleTime EL protects your personal and private data stored on your devices by blocking data connection. When DouBBleTime mode is turned ON, the cable prevents accidental data exchange when your device is plugged into a foreign charge source. DouBBLeTime mode achieves this by blocking off the data communication between your phone and USB ports, allowing only power charging to take place (at DouBBle the charging pace compared to a regular USB cable).












*Retailer Perk Packs are free shipping to the continental U.S. only. All other countries, an additional $20 must be provided.
Founded in 2012, BenchSoft is dedicated to studying and
developing smartphone related accessories that provide a touch of humanity,
creativity, and fun. Our team consists of specialized engineers in the fields
of Audio DSP, 2.4 GHz wireless technology, mobile applications, and battery
operation along side young marketing experts.Core Business Areas:

Nearfield Wireless Communication (
Bluetooth Speaker, Headset, ETC.) 
Audio
DSP related Business (
Audio and Sound Signal Processing )
Recharging
Smart Phone Battery and
Management Technology
Mobile
App Production( Photo Editing/
Control 3rd
Party Accessories) 











DouBBLeTime Charging Cable 7 months in the making and it has been a rewarding experience to take it from concept to working samples. These working samples have been tested extensively to prove charging times and safety. We have already set up agreements with key suppliers (certified MFi connector factory) and contracted manufacturer. And we have expertly-designed printed circuit boards in hand. These are just a few steps we’ve taken to make sure the product is delivered correctly and on time!
Our biggest concern and challenge will come from manufacturing of our product. From the quality of the mold we will be making to final assembly, we have a very high standard and expectation. Meticulously overseeing the manufacturing to ensure we produce tight fitting and well functioning product will be our biggest challenge that lies ahead of us.






Does the DouBBleTime cord charge a device faster than normal cords when plugged into the wall?


DouBBleTime was designed with "faster charging on the go" in mind, with the added bonus of data security when connected to an unknown power source. If you connect a regular USB charger cable to a wall outlet, charging time will be similar to that of our DouBBleTime charging cable, but you will be handcuffed to a wall outlet and this usage case is not our primary objective nor the spirit of this invention. DouBBleTime is about fast, very fast, charging on the go: from car USB port, laptop, etc


Will the cable only work for Apple products?


Good news! DouBBleTime Charging Cable works for both Apple AND Android devices!


Will the cable be certified by apple to work on all devices?


We are using MFi approved components to manufacture our product. This way, our cable is as genuine as the one that comes with the iphone. You will not receive messages like, 'This accessory is not certified.


How long is the cable?
The DouBBleTime Charging Cable is 40" long.
Does the cable come in many colors?

At the time, only white is provided. We are looking into adding more colors for a possible stretch goal.

story:
Unicone is the World 1st 3 in 1 storage stick. It allows you to easily, quickly and safely move data between computers, ISO devices and Androids devices without the need for Internet, wireless networks or the Cloud where hackers may gain access. It just needs you to snap in your devices!

As seen on:

People love flash drive. They are fantastic to us for transferring large files between devices, and it has much faster transfer speed than any of Cloud storage. However, have you ever been frustrated when transferring data between devices having different ports USB, Micro USB and Lightning?! Until Now Unicone. World's 1st 3 in 1 mini flash drive. Freely transfer your data between computer, ISO devices and Android devices.

 Mini 3in1 flash drive design helps you get your storage method more organized.

Unicone turns from an ordinary USB flash drive to a flash drive that works with IOS devices, Android devices and computer. You are no more headache on the annoying incompatibility between devices.  

Music: It's all about your Music

You can transfer music between your devices by Unicone, and also you can play music directly from Unicone. No more synchronization or pay for streaming services plus internet service.

Movie: Wrap up your favourite movies and ready for road trip  

The Unicone app has a wide variety of video formats MP4, M4V, MPV, MOV, MPG, MKV, AVI, WMV, RMVB, FLV, 3GP, GIF. No matter IOS devices or Android devices, you can stream all these formats movies anywhere you want without WIFI.

Photos: never worry about your IOS or Android devices out of space  

Have you ever encountered that your devices are out of space because of too many photos taken? You can directly backup your photos using Unicone and free up your devices space anywhere and anytime. DO NOT let Cloud back up kill your precious time! 

Files: safe & secure that all you care about

Unicone is always by your side, make your files storage more safe and secure. It does not on internet, you do not have worry about the hackers.Also, you can store your important files with password protected. It makes your business data transfer easier, smoother.

Interface: Lightning connector; Micro USB connector; USB (USB3.0 compatible)

Capacity:16GB/32GB/64GB/128GB/256GB/512GB

Transfer Speed: Lightning/Micro USB read/write speed: up to 30/20MB USB read/write speed: up to 90/35MB

OS Compatibility: IOS, Android, Windows, MAC OS, Linux

Format: ex-FAT or FAT32

App Requirement: Unicone apps

From ID (industrial design) to 3D model building.

story:
IDEA

Everyone dreams of a miracle. Each day, every moment, whatever the situation, wherever they are. Be it at the gym, in the car, in the kitchen, or at a party. We had a dream as well and our dream has taken on its form - Vottler Mixer in an innovative bottle shaped design with USB charge. No more batterries, leaking and shaking.  


We wanted to change your daily routine into something extraordinary. So you enjoy a fascinating process of blending your whey proteins in Vottler Mixer right at the gym. No more continuous bottle shaking and leaking!


We were dreaming of amazing your kids with a small tornado by mixing breakfast in Vottler Mixer. Just one touch and your kid can perform magic in the glass of the mixer himself!



We were dreaming of the convenience of feeding your child right from the bottle of the mixer.


We wanted your parties to become unforgettable and fun. And your cocktails to surprise your guests with simplicity and speed of mixing.


We were dreaming of carefree, reliable and continuous work of your mixer. No more batteries! You can simply charge it by plugging it in USB-slot wherever you are – at work, at home, in the car, or at the gym.


We were dreaming and working hard on our dream for you! We are proud to introduce our Vottler Mixer in the shape of a bottle with two lids. First is a feeding nipple lid which allows you to feed your baby straight after the smoothest infant food blending, preserving supplement structure. Second lid is for your convenient drinking. Due to its rubber-coated parts Vottler Mixer is leakage proof, durable and safe. With its lithium-ion battery, which is easily chargeable from the USB-slot, you can count on its performance all day - every day!


But wait, there is more. Now you can share these moments and this amazing experience with your nearest and dearest! We designed a unique Vottler Mixer gift box, which seamlessly contributes to reliability and performance. It will be a great present for any occasion, while the joy of utilizing it will become a small miracle every day!


Our dream already has its shape, quality, sustainability and uniqueness! Let’s make our dream come true together! 


We welcome you to contribute to our dream – invest in mass production of a unique Vottler Mixer so that everyone can enjoy all the benefits of the dream come true! 

WHAT YOU GET

You will get a USB-charged mixer with two lids at the best price before it appears on the market.


TIMELINE



TEAM
We are originally from Chelyabinsk (Russia), which became famous in 2013 after the meteorite fall :) We work in the Hong Kong company selling plastic devices worldwide. In 2014 we decided to produce a portable family-friendly mixer. We created the prototype of the mixer and the design, which is connected with space of course! Then we made the trial batch. At this stage we need financial funding to start mass production, that's why we need the support of our fascinating backers.



FAQs

1) What does Vottler Mixer consist of?

Vottler Mixer consists of:

01 Feeding nipple

02 Screw-on lid

03 Mixer cup

04 Measuring scale (ml and oz)

05 Rotating paddle

06 Motor box with lithium-ion battery

07 Push-button

+08  Extra lid for your convenient drinking with pour spot


2) What is the rotating paddle made of? 

It is made of BPA-free plastic. 


3) Can the rotating paddle cut ice, meet, fruit or vegetables?

No, it can’t. The rotating paddle can be used only for mixing of liquids, supplement powders, infant formulas or eggs.

4) Can Vottler Mixer be used by children?

Yes, it can. But we always encourage you to keep an eye on your children in case of them dealing with electric devices.

5) How is the battery charged?

You can charge the battery by any of the following means: socket, computer usb-slot or usb-adapter in your car.

6) What is the duration of the battery charge?

Mixing lasts for about 15 sec, so the duration of the battery charge varies between 3 and 4 weeks depending on the frequency of mixing.

7) Can Vottler Mixer be washed?

Sure, but don’t forget to unscrew the motor box before washing the rest of the parts. Due to the removable motor box Vottler Mixer can be washed in the dishwasher.


8) Does the price include shipping?

No, it doesn’t. For your convenience we have worked out the following shipping conditions:

If you want to order 1 Vottler Mixer the shipping worldwide will cost 11$

Ordering 3 Vottler Mixers (Family Pack) it will cost you 22$

Ordering 24 Vottler Mixers it will cost you 120$ (expedited delivery)

In case of ordering 48 pieces it will cost only 160$ (expedited delivery)

If you want to get 500 Mixers it will be exw price plus sea shipping (custom-tailored estimation, around 55$ per m³ + port and customs charges. The total volume is 1.2 m3)

Ordering 1000 pieces it will be exw price plus sea shipping (custom-tailored estimation, around 55$ per m³+ port, customs charges. The total volume is 2.4 m3)

9) What is the basic model: with a pour spout or with a feeding nipple?

We made a set of Vottler Mixer with two lids, so you can enjoy the maximum of the Vottler mixer opportunities. 

10 ) What are the dimensions, bottle capacity and weight of the mixer?

The dimensions of the mixer are 6x6x23 cm. The weight is 270 g and the volume of the bottle is 300 ml, which makes the mixer really portable and convenient for any situation.

11) Is the gift box included in the set? 

Yes, all the mixers come with our specially designed gift box.

story:
We believe everyone deserves privacy. As the global debate over security vs. privacy continues, we wanted to make a contribution to personal privacy that regular people — not just experts — can reasonably afford and use. 

  • Zero works with cellphone providers, calling apps, and landlines
  • Connects to cellphone/laptop/landline via standard 3.5mm audio jack or Bluetooth
  • Charges via USB port 
  • Comes with specially made app for managing your contacts and settings - works on Mac and Windows, as well as iOS and Android
  • Security of secret key exchange ensured by SSL and Diffie-Hellman Cryptographic Protocol
  • Online and offline device configuration available
  • Compact size (7x3 cm) 
  • 8-hour battery life

Zero connects to your phone, computer or landline via standard audio jack or Bluetooth and converts your voice into indecipherable sounds. At the other end of the call, the second Zero device restores the sound back and your partner hears your voice as usual. If someone does listen in on your conversation, they won’t be able to understand a thing.

 

Without Zero your phone conversation can be intercepted. Use Zero to protect it.

 

When getting into Zero via headset or Bluetooth, the voice is getting digitized. Then the voice components are shuffled by secret algorithm (key), and getting converted back to analog signal. This encrypted analog signal is transmitted over a telephone line. At the other end, second Zero device decrypts the signal back to speech in the same way using the key you create yourself.

 

One of the reasons Zero is the most secure way to communicate is because no one ever gets the encryption key you create with your partner. When you create a key, only you and your calling partner know it. We do not store any keys and cannot know them. That is why your encryption is 100% secure.

Zero Concierge provides deep encryption of conversation, and in case of interception your speech will sound for attackers as something indiscriminate. We call this...

 

You might have heard that many messenger apps encrypt your data today. But truth is, they will give it out in decrypted form to any third party once requested. Same happens with all applications that claim to encrypt your calls.

The essential part of Zero is that voice gets into your phone already encrypted, so it doesn’t matter whether your smartphone records something or not, or someone attempts to intercept . No one will be able to decrypt it.

So you can talk over GSM networks, Viber, Skype or any VOIP and landline phone without fear of interception. 

Primarily Zero Concierge will come in handy for commercial and business affairs, but also can be useful by ordinary people for keeping confidentiality of their personal conversations. We did not develop Zero Concierge for assistance in shady deeds, indeed we are absolutely against such activities, but we believe that in times of total surveillance people should be able to protect their privacy. That’s why we decided to build Zero.

Here are some things you protect when you secure your voice calls:

  • your personal data such as bank account info, card numbers, contact info
  • your personal safety, such as information about where you’ll be at a certain time
  • confidential organizational or business information
  • sensitive medical information and records
  • confidential relationships, like conversations with doctors or counselors
     

We made the use of Zero Concierge easy and convenient. That's how it looks:

  • Using Zero mobile or desktop application, create connections with your interlocutors.
  • Connect Zero as a headset via Bluetooth or Jack-Jack, and make a call by phone or VOIP
  • Select your interlocutor’s name on the Zero’s screen
  • Indication on the screen will prove that the connection is securely protected

If desired, you can update secret keys in your app, add new contacts, change the names and edit already existing contacts.

Zero should be charged via USB.

Zero can be connected to your calling device by two means:

  • Jack to Jack: securely connects to a calling device via standard Jack to Jack 3.5 mm cable
  • Bluetooth: securely connects to a calling device via Bluetooth

Below you will find more information about the difference between them.

For quick and easy creation and  transfer of secret keys we have developed proprietary Zero applications for computers and smartphones. We already have software for Windows and Mac, Android and iOS. Before the first use, this smart software will help you synchronize your contacts and establish encrypted connection with your mates who also use Zero Concierge.

While transporting the keys from device to device, Zero uses Diffie-Hellman Cryptographic Protocol, which provides high level of protection and allows you to generate a secret key using unprotected line even before the installation of a secure connection. For greater security, the keys can be updated unlimitedly, as well as be deleted and created again.

Zero application has the protection against attacks such as "man-in-the-middle" that gives additional guarantee of security.

We have made it possible to configure key exchange and connections between devices both online (via the Internet) and offline when you connect two devices to a single computer. The first method is useful if the other person has his own Zero and is in a different location. The second way is if you have two Zero devices together.

When you buy Zero, you also get a code to download all versions of our applications.

We started working on Zero four years ago, and most of the time was devoted to create reliable algorithms.

In the meantime, we have produced a large number of different versions of the devices, and conducted lots of testings to improve the quality of speech intelligibility.

We offer the Zero device for an affordable price for any person to use at home or for work.

It is unlikely that you will find similar devices in terms of format and price on the market. Those competitors who attempted to make something similar before to us, did not fulfil promises and timeframes. We already have completed prototypes, ready for industrial production.

Our team consists of high level experts in IT and electronics. We are engineers, schematics and PCB designers, software programmers, designers, mobile engineers and algorithm developers. Our company is based in Montenegro, although we a truly global company with employees in the USA and Europe.

You can buy Zero in the following packaging:

  • One Zero (remember, that your calling partner will also need to have a Zero in order to establish a secure call with you);
  • Double pack with two devices;
  • 4x pack of Zeros for 4 persons.

We offer special Indiegogo 50% off prices. After this campaign ends, you won't be able to find Zero for such a low price, so hurry up! :)

We also offer limited super Early Bird deals for our first backers in order to appreciate your support. We need it in order to make this project successful!

Shipping and return policy

We are shipping worldwide. When ordering devices to your country, please find out whether the use of such devices is permitted by national law. Moreover, remember that due to the varying import regulations, there may be import duty to pay.

Considering return policy, in the unfortunate case that we don’t meet our campaign goal, all contributions will be fully refunded. 

We need to collect $100K for the commencement of commercial production. After receiving the funds, we will cover the production of the first series of Zero devices, and set our mates in China to start the manufacturing. Our experience shows that manufacturing and assembly can take about 2-3 months, after which the ordered device can be sent to backers

 

Why Indiegogo

We need investment for the industrial manufacture of Zero.

We already have a fully working prototype of the devices, software and contact management tool for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android. We conducted the necessary testing, and developed plans for further development.

At all the development stages of Zero Concierge to current date, we have invested our own funds in the production. We have conducted a lot of research and tests, tried different versions and configurations, tuned the parameters for high-quality work of Zero Concierge. During the process of development, we have created dozens of prototypes. Finally, we have made and configured fully working prototypes ready for manufacturing. To start it, we need additional investment.

Risks and challenges

Since we already have the finished prototypes that are fully working, we do not have any risks associated with the production of devices. 
Our goal is the manufacturing, set in China. We've already produced the gadgets in China, and we have the proven manufacturers there. 
As for the risks - we can mention the following: 

  •  The delivery itself may be slightly delayed because of the production terms of chinese factories or breaks of postal services.

Zero Concierge provides deep encryption of conversation, and in case of interception your speech will sound for attackers as something indiscriminate. We call this...



 
You might have heard that many messenger apps encrypt your data today. But truth is, they will give it out in decrypted form to any third party once requested. Same happens with all applications that claim to encrypt your calls.
The essential part of Zero is that voice gets into your phone already encrypted, so it doesn’t matter whether your smartphone records something or not, or someone attempts to intercept . No one will be able to decrypt it.


So you can talk over GSM networks, Viber, Skype or any VOIP and landline phone without fear of interception. 

Primarily Zero Concierge will come in handy for commercial and business affairs, but also can be useful by ordinary people for keeping confidentiality of their personal conversations. We did not develop Zero Concierge for assistance in shady deeds, indeed we are absolutely against such activities, but we believe that in times of total surveillance people should be able to protect their privacy. That’s why we decided to build Zero.
Here are some things you protect when you secure your voice calls:

your personal data such as bank account info, card numbers, contact info
your personal safety, such as information about where you’ll be at a certain time
confidential organizational or business information
sensitive medical information and records
confidential relationships, like conversations with doctors or counselors 



We made the use of Zero Concierge easy and convenient. That's how it looks:

Using Zero mobile or desktop application, create connections with your interlocutors.
Connect Zero as a headset via Bluetooth or Jack-Jack, and make a call by phone or VOIP
Select your interlocutor’s name on the Zero’s screen
Indication on the screen will prove that the connection is securely protected

If desired, you can update secret keys in your app, add new contacts, change the names and edit already existing contacts.

Zero should be charged via USB.
Zero can be connected to your calling device by two means:

Jack to Jack: securely connects to a calling device via standard Jack to Jack 3.5 mm cable
Bluetooth: securely connects to a calling device via Bluetooth

Below you will find more information about the difference between them.


For quick and easy creation and  transfer of secret keys we have developed proprietary Zero applications for computers and smartphones. We already have software for Windows and Mac, Android and iOS. Before the first use, this smart software will help you synchronize your contacts and establish encrypted connection with your mates who also use Zero Concierge.

While transporting the keys from device to device, Zero uses Diffie-Hellman Cryptographic Protocol, which provides high level of protection and allows you to generate a secret key using unprotected line even before the installation of a secure connection. For greater security, the keys can be updated unlimitedly, as well as be deleted and created again.
Zero application has the protection against attacks such as "man-in-the-middle" that gives additional guarantee of security.

We have made it possible to configure key exchange and connections between devices both online (via the Internet) and offline when you connect two devices to a single computer. The first method is useful if the other person has his own Zero and is in a different location. The second way is if you have two Zero devices together.
When you buy Zero, you also get a code to download all versions of our applications.

We started working on Zero four years ago, and most of the time was devoted to create reliable algorithms.

In the meantime, we have produced a large number of different versions of the devices, and conducted lots of testings to improve the quality of speech intelligibility.

We offer the Zero device for an affordable price for any person to use at home or for work.

It is unlikely that you will find similar devices in terms of format and price on the market. Those competitors who attempted to make something similar before to us, did not fulfil promises and timeframes. We already have completed prototypes, ready for industrial production.

Our team consists of high level experts in IT and electronics. We are engineers, schematics and PCB designers, software programmers, designers, mobile engineers and algorithm developers. Our company is based in Montenegro, although we a truly global company with employees in the USA and Europe.

You can buy Zero in the following packaging:

One Zero (remember, that your calling partner will also need to have a Zero in order to establish a secure call with you);
Double pack with two devices;
4x pack of Zeros for 4 persons.

We offer special Indiegogo 50% off prices. After this campaign ends, you won't be able to find Zero for such a low price, so hurry up! :)
We also offer limited super Early Bird deals for our first backers in order to appreciate your support. We need it in order to make this project successful!

Shipping and return policy
We are shipping worldwide. When ordering devices to your country, please find out whether the use of such devices is permitted by national law. Moreover, remember that due to the varying import regulations, there may be import duty to pay.
Considering return policy, in the unfortunate case that we don’t meet our campaign goal, all contributions will be fully refunded. 


We need to collect $100K for the commencement of commercial production. After receiving the funds, we will cover the production of the first series of Zero devices, and set our mates in China to start the manufacturing. Our experience shows that manufacturing and assembly can take about 2-3 months, after which the ordered device can be sent to backers
 
Why Indiegogo
We need investment for the industrial manufacture of Zero.

We already have a fully working prototype of the devices, software and contact management tool for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android. We conducted the necessary testing, and developed plans for further development.
At all the development stages of Zero Concierge to current date, we have invested our own funds in the production. We have conducted a lot of research and tests, tried different versions and configurations, tuned the parameters for high-quality work of Zero Concierge. During the process of development, we have created dozens of prototypes. Finally, we have made and configured fully working prototypes ready for manufacturing. To start it, we need additional investment.
Risks and challenges
Since we already have the finished prototypes that are fully working, we do not have any risks associated with the production of devices. Our goal is the manufacturing, set in China. We've already produced the gadgets in China, and we have the proven manufacturers there. As for the risks - we can mention the following: 
 The delivery itself may be slightly delayed because of the production terms of chinese factories or breaks of postal services.

story:
Ever wondered how many times a day charge your Smartphone? We do and according to official statistics people charge their smartphone 2 or more times a day.

 The M-charger advanced is the world’s first rechargeable wall charger, it’s made to replace your smartphone regular wall charger. It comes with a 2 feet built-in retractable power cord so you will have no more worries about carrying annoying power cords that become entangled and at the same time get broken, also has foldable power plugs that adjust to your need to have a wall charger always with you and a 5000 mAh battery that works as a power bank.

People usually carry two devices to charge their smartphones, as a wall charger and also a portable battery to never run out of energy when their smartphones show that red icon that make them panicked and annoyed. Sometimes users forget charge their portable batteries and that’s another problem we are solving with the M-charger Advanced. You just need to charge your smartphone every night as usually and you will be charging both batteries: your smartphone’s battery and the M-Charger advanced 5000 mAh built in battery. So as you see, when you wake up in the morning you will have your smartphone and your M-charger Advanced already charged and ready to have energy on the go. The M-charger Advanced allows you to charge your smartphone at least 2 times in the day without plugging into the wall socket. Most of the time, people go crazy looking for a wall socket and when they finally find it, charging their smartphones become awkward since many times they have to do it almost lay on the floor, stuck to a table or even leave their smartphones with someone strange in a restaurant. If you charge your smartphone more than 3 times in a day then you always have the choice to make it connecting the M-charger Advanced into the wall socket. At that time you’ll be charging your smartphone but also will be charging the built-in battery of the M-Charger advanced.

M-Charger Advanced | World's first rechargeable wall Charger

 

Patent Pending

 

As we always carry our charging cables with us, we usually roll up them or just put inside of our pockets and bags, they are continuously poorly handled. That’s one of the reasons they get broken or bent. The integrated power cable always keep straight and inside in the body of the M-Charger Advanced while not in use avoiding get damage or broken. Just need to be pulled out when you need to use it and after that you just pull it again to retract the cable inside.

 

Compatibility

The M-Charger advanced works for all the popular devices. Also works with all your electronic devices that have a micro usb or lightning interface and require 3.7V to 5V of voltage power.  

We have 3 different versions for your convenience:

- The Micro USB version M-Charger Advanced has a retractable power cable with a micro USB interface for most Android phones and other electronic devices.  

- The USB Type-C Version M-Charger Advanced has a retractable power cable with USB type-C for the most new Android smartphones

  - and the iPhone version M-Charger Advanced has a retractable power cable with a MFI certified lightning cable for apple products.

Charge your must-have devices anywhere

 

 

The integrated Li-Polymer battery of the M-Charger advanced can be charged and recharged many times. You can charge at least 2 times in a day without plugging the M-Charger advance into a wall socket. In standby mode the built-in battery is able to keep its energy around 30 days.

Relax and travel with at least two charges of battery backup

That red icon alert not only leave you feeling panicked to you but also your friend. That’s why the M-charger advanced has a USB port to share your charge with others or also charge other devices besides your smartphone.

Share your charge

  • Input power: foldable power plugs:100-240V, 50/60 Hz
  • Micro USB port 3.7V 
  • Output power: - Retractable cable 3.7V / 2.1A
  • USB port 4.5V / 2.1A
  • Retractable cable: 2 feet  
  • Built-in battery: Li- Polymer 5000 mAh

Patent Pending

 

 

We have more than 5 years developing and manufacturing tablets, smartphones and power banks as we distribute them to all Latin America and part in the United States. All of our distributors and clients give faith that our products are good quality. We have passed all lab tests in different retail chain like Walmart. Because we are a new brand in the market we are committed to bring high quality products to the consumers and we will always keep this promise since we love it that way. The M-Charger advanced will also have that same high quality end to meet the expectations of all backers and consumers that believed in this project.  

 

Rewards

We added this first stretch goal to thank to all our backers for their support and pledges. After we reach this goal and the campaign ends all backers would be able to choose among 3 different colors of a velvet case for their M-Charger Advanced.​

 

Elegant Black​

 

Electric Purple

 

Lightning Blue

 

Team M-Charger

Team Artex

 We take our projects as serious as they can be and we love to work hard because we are committed to our customers to deliver the goods in the time and date we promised. That’s why since now we will brew a lot of coffee and work harder every night and every day to bring this product to the hands of the backers and our customers according to our time line as always do.

Working Hard

It seems worth mentioning - our price is realistic, the margins are small, and we need your support to order a large enough quantity of parts to make this possible - but we will deliver and we'll deliver something that works and works well! We can't! Making a high quality, charger solution at this price point takes large minimum orders and custom tooling - we' invested a great deal into this, and will invest much more, but we need your help to meet these minimum quantities and get started on full production!

 

Time Line

 

Risks and Challenges

Developing a product from scratch entails many challenges as many details have to be taken into account as the materials that make up the product, as well as the quality tests necessary to ensure that the product we deliver to users is faithful and works properly. It is important to say that in the development process it is necessary to be able to comply with all the regulations and licenses required so that the product can meet the requirements that all countries require in terms of quality and good operation. Because it's a product that works with AC we must issue the necessary licenses like FCC, CE, RoHs, UL, MFI, among others. This means that we must depend on the times of third parties to be able to obtain all these necessary licenses so that the users can be sure that the product that is going to replace their wall charger works correctly. In addition our reliable manufacturers also have their manufacturing times and quality tests which leads us to have to be aware that the times can be fulfilled in order to be able to deliver the product on time. However on the way some delays could arise which may lead us to send the M-Charger Advanced with some delay in the dates we had already promised. However as an experienced company, we are going to do our best to ship in the set dates.

story:
Hello backers and fellow iPhone lovers!  

We are iPhone lovers - maybe just like you - who are missing the headphone jack on the new iPhone 7.

Apple suggests using their pretty but pricey bluetooth AirPods, but everyone knows that bluetooth headsets like to be not charged when needed the most and might lack sound quality. Current adapters on the market just tend to make things more complicated, frustration and cable jam forecasted!

That's when we realized the opportunity for a better product

 

 

Adapple is the first and only adapter to support both headphone jack and lightning port.

Adapple a slim and handy adapter, that can be easily plugged into the lightning port of the iPhone7. Adapple is simple, convenient and easy to use. It is designed to fit the iPhone7 design and might become your day-to-day gadget and accessoire to your iPhone7.


Adapple is available in black and white.

We reworked our prototype to make sure Adapple looks cool and is slim. We love the iPhone 7, we just miss the headphone jack, consequently we want to make sure, that adapple just serves the purpose of replacing the missing functionality. Adapple does not obstruct the design of the iPhone 7, it features no frills, its simple and convenient. What you get is what you see!

How far we came and whats next

We talked to over 500 manufacturers worldwide and got amazing respond. We were able to select a trusted manufacturer who emphatizes good quality. We  already got a functional (working) prototype. At the moment we are working on the case design and on decreasing the case size to approach the look and feel of our concept prototype. 

After finalizing the design we plan to start production in November, shipping of Super Early Bird starts in December.

Our key objectives on adapple

- small
- lightweight
- handy
- no frills
- what you get is what you see
- easy to use
- functional
- does not obstruct the iPhone design

About us

We are a small, international team bound in Hong Kong and Germany. We know each other from studying in Hong Kong. Next to working in Aero Engineering and IT Consulting we found projects together. We both love apple products and came up with our idea while watching the apple keynote.

Media response

We got the prototype and a manufacturer, the only thing we still need is YOUR SUPPORT! We need your help to make this happen!  

For any questions and inquiries feel free to shot as a message.

story:
First of all it should be mentioned that despite its safety and technological effectiveness this phone will suit anyone who wants to have a powerful instrument, that is suited to any task.

Do you like mobile games? You will be able to enjoy the games since the smartphone has a powerful video adapter Adreno 630 combined with incredibly colorful and crisp display.

For those who are fond of photographs, we also have something to offer - there are two 16mp cameras on its back panel. They allow you to get high-quality pictures.

Do you use crypto currency? We have a solution for you - an embedded hardware crypto wallet. You’ll be sure that your money is in safety. However let’s talk about this later.

 

Let's start with the most interesting thing - the brain of Titan. In Titan, we decided not to save on hardware and equip it with the best stuffing, based on the price-quality ratio. Titan is equipped with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 processor, which will satisfy all your needs.

A beautiful image will be provided by Adreno 630 graphics adapter. There is no such game that would give out less than 60 FPS with high image quality settings. You can forget about lags and hangs.Titan is rich in various interfaces. The Wi-Fi adapter supports 2.4 / 5GHz network, which provides you with incredibly fast internet access. Also, we have equipped our NFC smartphone with a module - paying for purchases has never been so convenient. More details can be found in the technical specification section.

Our smartphone is equipped with two slots for Nano-SIM and both slots support LTE. We also made support for SD cards up to 128 GB - in total, the maximum memory capacity is 384 GB. The lack of memory problem will not bother you anymore.

 

Titan will be running Android 8.0 Oreo, but with significant changes.

Titanium - the so-called operating system, which will manage all systems of the phone. An incredibly fast and secure system leaves no chance for cybercriminals and opens up new possibilities for using the phone.

The system constantly monitors all behavioral factors of the owner, and in case of suspicious actions, immediately blocks access to all smartphone systems

But the owner does not need to worry, just enter the special code that every phone owner will have.

All that we wrote above, in our opinion, is very cool, but it will be even more impressive if you use Titanium in conjunction with our unique TitanGate protection system

TitanGate is an intelligent, continuously self-improving system based on neural network technology that protects your smartphone from unauthorized access to it from the outside. This system is by default embedded into the Titanium operating system and provides the most advanced protection against cyber attacks.

We derived a simple security formula: Titanium + TitanGate = an unprecedented level of cyber defense.

Another feature of our smartphone is the built-in software TitaniumDirect. This application is built into Titanium, which allows you to turn your smartphone into a real PC.

Simply connect the phone to any computer, install TitaniumDirect for PC and use your phone the same way you would work with your computer.

This solution will be useful for organizations where mobility is very important. Employees can continue their work at home, without special efforts to synchronize data between the worker and home PC

We also have a solution for safe storing data outside the telephone: TitanCloud!

To date, the security of data is very important. In order to protect your data, we will develop a special TitanCloud network to back up all your data to a decentralized server network. Protection of personal data has never been so perfect.

We at Titan Technologies really like high-quality sound, and since we make the phone the way we would like to have, we couldn’t help but equip the phone with high-quality headphones. We called them SeriousSound X.

SeriousSound X - headphones, which will combine a powerful deep bass and pure sound. 

It is the combination of innovative software and hardware solutions, in our opinion, that makes the Titan really cool.

 

 

None have ever had such a strong glass on both sides. Corning Gorilla Glass 4 provides almost complete protection against scratches and chips.

The frame matching the body is made of aluminum. And also protection from water and dust - IP67

Titan will be released in only one version:

Display

Resolution: 2160x1080px

Type of Matrix: IPS

Diagonal: 5.9 "

 

Memory and processor

CPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 845

GPU: Adreno 630

Amount of RAM: 8 GB

Built-in memory: 256 GB + SD

 

Connectivity

Standard: GSM 900/1800/1900, 3G, 4G LTE, LTE-A Cat. 12, VoLTE

Interfaces: Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 5.0, USB, NFC

Satellite Navigation: GPS / GLONASS / BeiDou

A-GPS system: yes

Number of SIM cards: Dual-LTE Nano-sim

 

Power Supply

Battery capacity: 4500 mAh

Battery: non-removable

Connector type for charging: USB Type-C

Quick charge function: yes

 

Dimensions:

Length: 148 mm

Width: 70 mm

Thickness: 7.9 mm

Weight: 177g

 

Comparing Titan with other smartphones

 

Technical features:

  • Qualcomm QuickCharge 4+ charging technology, which allows you to charge up to 50% of the battery in just 15 minutes
  • Support for GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, Galileo
  • Synchronization of the phone with the TITAN network ensures the absolute security of the transmission of any data and means.
  • Video recording up to 4K at 30FPS, playback up to 4K 60FPS, support for H.264, H.265 and VP9 codecs
  • Display: 1300: 1 contrast (standard), Advanced color coverage (P3), Brightness up to 625 cd / m2
  • Degree of protection IP67
  • Dual camera 16 MP with a wide-angle lens and telephoto lens. Optical image stabilization. Optical zoom; 6x digital zoom.
  • Light indication of events
  • OS: Titanium (Android 8.0 Oreo)
  • Thanks to the optimization of Titanuim, the smartphone can work up to 15 hours in stand-alone mode.
  • Dual LTE Nano-SIM
  • Glass: Gorilla Glass 4. Nothing can damage the screen of your phone.
  • Fully aluminum case, protected from the front and back by the strongest glass.

 

  • Smartphone Titan with Android 8.0 (Titanium)
  • SeriousSound X Headphones
  • Charger (USB Type-C cable + unit)
  • Documentation

 

We are an experienced team that really wants to make a breakthrough product in the industry. We poured our souls into this product, it contains the best solutions that exist at the moment.

We are all friends and we have   worked in the phone industry, so we decided to make product that will meet all quality standards. Titan Technologies standards .

We have been working on our product more than 2 years and it is created for everyone! It's not just a smartphone. This is a universal toolkit for users who want to get the best experience from their smartphone

 

 

H1'2016 - Founding of Titan Technologies

H1'2017 - The creation of the first prototype of Titanium, in parallel begins the development of a TitanGate

H2'2017 - Appearance of the first working version of the TitanGate, the beginning of the development of the concept of Titan

2018 - Crowdfunding event

August of 2018 - Sales start

 

  • Which countries and mobile networks will support TITAN?

Titan is an open device that is not blocked for any particular network. It works in all countries providing network services based on the GSM / 3G / LTE standard. It will also support two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity worldwide (taking into account network availability and data collection). Before launching, we will test compatibility with networks in Europe, the US, South America, China, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the development of a mobile device.


 

  • Do I need to add the shipping cost to my security deposit?

For US and UK residents, shipping is included in the price of the device. For all other destinations, please add the amount stated in the perk description. Local taxes on imports can be applied.


 

  • I contributed to perk, but I forgot to add an additional $ 30 for shipping. How to increase the amount?

No problems! If you want to add funds for delivery, you can make one more contribution and choose perk delivery.


 

  • What if you did not achieve the goal of financing?

We appreciate any support we receive within 30 days, and every supporter will be welcomed in the community. If we do not achieve our goal, all contributions will be fully reimbursed.


 

  • What guarantees apply to TITAN?

A standard manufacturer's warranty will apply. If you are unhappy with the product, you can return it within 28 days of receipt for a full refund. Please note that we can not cover the cost of return postage and packaging.


 

  • What should I do if my question is not answered?

We are happy to answer any other questions that may arise regarding TITAN, the campaign of Indiegogo and our company as a whole. Contact us at info@titantechnologies.company
story_txt:
First of all it should be mentioned that despite its safety and technological effectiveness this phone will suit anyone who wants to have a powerful instrument, that is suited to any task.Do you like mobile games? You will be able to enjoy the games since the smartphone has a powerful video adapter Adreno 630 combined with incredibly colorful and crisp display.For those who are fond of photographs, we also have something to offer - there are two 16mp cameras on its back panel. They allow you to get high-quality pictures.Do you use crypto currency? We have a solution for you - an embedded hardware crypto wallet. You’ll be sure that your money is in safety. However let’s talk about this later. Let's start with the most interesting thing - the brain of Titan. In Titan, we decided not to save on hardware and equip it with the best stuffing, based on the price-quality ratio. Titan is equipped with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 processor, which will satisfy all your needs.A beautiful image will be provided by Adreno 630 graphics adapter. There is no such game that would give out less than 60 FPS with high image quality settings. You can forget about lags and hangs.Titan is rich in various interfaces. The Wi-Fi adapter supports 2.4 / 5GHz network, which provides you with incredibly fast internet access. Also, we have equipped our NFC smartphone with a module - paying for purchases has never been so convenient. More details can be found in the technical specification section.Our smartphone is equipped with two slots for Nano-SIM and both slots support LTE. We also made support for SD cards up to 128 GB - in total, the maximum memory capacity is 384 GB. The lack of memory problem will not bother you anymore. Titan will be running Android 8.0 Oreo, but with significant changes.Titanium - the so-called operating system, which will manage all systems of the phone. An incredibly fast and secure system leaves no chance for cybercriminals and opens up new possibilities for using the phone.The system constantly monitors all behavioral factors of the owner, and in case of suspicious actions, immediately blocks access to all smartphone systemsBut the owner does not need to worry, just enter the special code that every phone owner will have.All that we wrote above, in our opinion, is very cool, but it will be even more impressive if you use Titanium in conjunction with our unique TitanGate protection systemTitanGate is an intelligent, continuously self-improving system based on neural network technology that protects your smartphone from unauthorized access to it from the outside. This system is by default embedded into the Titanium operating system and provides the most advanced protection against cyber attacks.We derived a simple security formula: Titanium + TitanGate = an unprecedented level of cyber defense.Another feature of our smartphone is the built-in software TitaniumDirect. This application is built into Titanium, which allows you to turn your smartphone into a real PC.Simply connect the phone to any computer, install TitaniumDirect for PC and use your phone the same way you would work with your computer.This solution will be useful for organizations where mobility is very important. Employees can continue their work at home, without special efforts to synchronize data between the worker and home PCWe also have a solution for safe storing data outside the telephone: TitanCloud!To date, the security of data is very important. In order to protect your data, we will develop a special TitanCloud network to back up all your data to a decentralized server network. Protection of personal data has never been so perfect.We at Titan Technologies really like high-quality sound, and since we make the phone the way we would like to have, we couldn’t help but equip the phone with high-quality headphones. We called them SeriousSound X.SeriousSound X - headphones, which will combine a powerful deep bass and pure sound. It is the combination of innovative software and hardware solutions, in our opinion, that makes the Titan really cool.  None have ever had such a strong glass on both sides. Corning Gorilla Glass 4 provides almost complete protection against scratches and chips.The frame matching the body is made of aluminum. And also protection from water and dust - IP67Titan will be released in only one version:DisplayResolution: 2160x1080pxType of Matrix: IPSDiagonal: 5.9 " Memory and processorCPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 845GPU: Adreno 630Amount of RAM: 8 GBBuilt-in memory: 256 GB + SD ConnectivityStandard: GSM 900/1800/1900, 3G, 4G LTE, LTE-A Cat. 12, VoLTEInterfaces: Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 5.0, USB, NFCSatellite Navigation: GPS / GLONASS / BeiDouA-GPS system: yesNumber of SIM cards: Dual-LTE Nano-sim Power SupplyBattery capacity: 4500 mAhBattery: non-removableConnector type for charging: USB Type-CQuick charge function: yes Dimensions:Length: 148 mmWidth: 70 mmThickness: 7.9 mmWeight: 177g Comparing Titan with other smartphones Technical features:
Qualcomm QuickCharge 4+ charging technology, which allows you to charge up to 50% of the battery in just 15 minutes
Support for GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, Galileo
Synchronization of the phone with the TITAN network ensures the absolute security of the transmission of any data and means.
Video recording up to 4K at 30FPS, playback up to 4K 60FPS, support for H.264, H.265 and VP9 codecs
Display: 1300: 1 contrast (standard), Advanced color coverage (P3), Brightness up to 625 cd / m2
Degree of protection IP67
Dual camera 16 MP with a wide-angle lens and telephoto lens. Optical image stabilization. Optical zoom; 6x digital zoom.
Light indication of events
OS: Titanium (Android 8.0 Oreo)
Thanks to the optimization of Titanuim, the smartphone can work up to 15 hours in stand-alone mode.
Dual LTE Nano-SIM
Glass: Gorilla Glass 4. Nothing can damage the screen of your phone.
Fully aluminum case, protected from the front and back by the strongest glass.
 
Smartphone Titan with Android 8.0 (Titanium)
SeriousSound X Headphones
Charger (USB Type-C cable + unit)
Documentation
 We are an experienced team that really wants to make a breakthrough product in the industry. We poured our souls into this product, it contains the best solutions that exist at the moment.We are all friends and we have   worked in the phone industry, so we decided to make product that will meet all quality standards. Titan Technologies standards .We have been working on our product more than 2 years and it is created for everyone! It's not just a smartphone. This is a universal toolkit for users who want to get the best experience from their smartphone  H1'2016 - Founding of Titan TechnologiesH1'2017 - The creation of the first prototype of Titanium, in parallel begins the development of a TitanGateH2'2017 - Appearance of the first working version of the TitanGate, the beginning of the development of the concept of Titan2018 - Crowdfunding eventAugust of 2018 - Sales start Which countries and mobile networks will support TITAN?Titan is an open device that is not blocked for any particular network. It works in all countries providing network services based on the GSM / 3G / LTE standard. It will also support two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity worldwide (taking into account network availability and data collection). Before launching, we will test compatibility with networks in Europe, the US, South America, China, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the development of a mobile device. Do I need to add the shipping cost to my security deposit?For US and UK residents, shipping is included in the price of the device. For all other destinations, please add the amount stated in the perk description. Local taxes on imports can be applied. I contributed to perk, but I forgot to add an additional $ 30 for shipping. How to increase the amount?No problems! If you want to add funds for delivery, you can make one more contribution and choose perk delivery. What if you did not achieve the goal of financing?We appreciate any support we receive within 30 days, and every supporter will be welcomed in the community. If we do not achieve our goal, all contributions will be fully reimbursed. What guarantees apply to TITAN?A standard manufacturer's warranty will apply. If you are unhappy with the product, you can return it within 28 days of receipt for a full refund. Please note that we can not cover the cost of return postage and packaging. What should I do if my question is not answered?We are happy to answer any other questions that may arise regarding TITAN, the campaign of Indiegogo and our company as a whole. Contact us at info@titantechnologies.company

story:
1. Introduction

When I bought a smartphone with TV output three years ago, I thought it would have been great to be able to use my phone as a second computer. Hence, I started creating software which would enable me to make my phone a workstation similar to a computer. After three years, I succeeded in developing software that met my demanding requirements.


2. The goal of the campaign

The goal of this campaign is to create software that will make a smartphone a substitute for a laptop or a desktop computer. Today’s smartphones are very efficient and, in the near future, will become even more efficient, having greater storage capacity; thus, it is certain that, sooner or later, smartphones will become portable mini-computers while still maintaining their function as mobile phones. Even today, it is possible to download applications for smartphones allowing sound, video, or picture editing and viewing and editing documents of any kind.


3. How it works

It is very simple! As shown in the video, for a wired connection (via a cable), all you need to do is insert your phone into a docking device; within seconds you can use your phone as a desktop computer – on the screen, you will see all programs adapted (size and interface) for use with external monitor, keyboard, and mouse. In this way, you can create texts, tables, surf the internet, and do many other things that you do on your PC or laptop. After disconnecting, simply take your phone out of the docking device and you can instantly use it as you are used to.

For a wireless connection (without a cable), all you need to do is click on a specific icon on your phone and it will connect to a television where you can use the internet, play games, watch movies, view photos, listen to MP3 files – your phone can easily become a multimedia centre. With a wireless connection, it is also possible to use all functions of your phone as with a wired connection. To disconnect, simply click on the icon.

If you would like to know more, please see the “How it works (a version for advanced users)” section.

4. What is needed for it to work

a) a smartphone :-)

b) a docking device with a HDMI cable for a wired connection or a Google Chromecast device for a wireless connection

c) a wired keyboard and mouse for connection to a docking device or a wireless keyboard and mouse for any connection

d) for wired connection you need phone with TV Out (HDMI output)

e) my software :-)


5. What can the application be used for

a) For managers – people who often travel and stay in hotels on business trips have to carry their laptop with them so that they can create graphs, presentations and other documents, but soon a smartphone could be the only device needed. In the future, every better hotel would be equipped with a universal docking station, a keyboard and mouse included. Managers would then simply insert their phone into the docking device and could instantly work on their documents. This is advantageous mainly because people would not have to carry their laptops and chargers with them as they always carry their phone with them.

b) For businessmen – you could use a single device for work and home alike. Nowadays, smartphones have many applications that are comparable to programs on an ordinary PC (for example video cutting apps, photo editing apps etc.). The main advantage is that you would not have to buy a special computer for work or carry your laptop with you every day.

c) For normal people – firstly, a smartphone can be used as a multimedia centre, enabling you to watch movies, listen to music, or surf the internet on a big TV. Secondly, it can be used as a substitute for a normal PC; if you do not need really high performance, a smartphone connected as a desktop PC should be a sufficient device for general working activities. There already exist many programs that have the same functions as the programs that you are used to on your PC or laptop. The main advantage is that you can save money by not buying a multimedia centre or a new computer, and, instead, change your old smartphone for a new one when needed. In this way, you can save a lot of money.

d) Tablets with a keyboard and touchpad (with phone operation system sometimes looking like a laptop) will be able to be used as a normal laptop – currently, it is unfortunately not the case; when using these tablets, the only thing you get is the feeling of a bigger screen comparing to the phone.

e) Nowadays, it is cheaper to produce phones than computers. If somebody began producing devices on a mobile platform, it would be possible to produce cheap computers, which could be used by poor children throughout the world.

f) Other options are unlimited; for example, there could be docking cafes which would provide for their visitors monitors, keyboards, mice, and Wi-Fi connection so that they would need only their own phone. This could be applied anywhere else – for example in libraries, in companies for employees and business partners’ presentations, etc.

Do not forget that your phone is always with you, unlike your laptop or computer!


6. What will it bring to you?

a) You will take part in something revolutionary, something that will change the world as we know it!

b) If you often travel, in the future you will need only your mobile phone.

c) You will save a lot of money by not buying a new computer or laptop.

d) You will help enable others to have access to a desktop computer; not everyone can afford a smartphone, laptop, or computer. In case you need a desktop computer also for your children, this can be a solution.

e) If it works out, children in poor countries will have access to a normal PC.


7. What do I need money for?

To create software that will work on all phones is quite a difficult and expensive thing. There are four ways of implementing this project.

1) The software will be accessible only to phones with ROOT access (phones that are modified with a special program enabling users to make changes on their phone; this modification must be done by users themselves). The advantage of this is that I will need only a good programming team for creating the software. The disadvantage is that the software will be restricted only to users with phones with root access.

2) The software will be accessible to everyone, but all software producers (producers of any program or application that people would like to use after connecting to an external monitor) will have to add a new user interface to their programs, thanks to which the programs will have a different appearance on a phone and after connecting to an external monitor or TV. It will not work without great public interest in this solution; only after that the developers will modify their programs.

3) Mobile phone producers will add the software to their phones. This will, again, require great public interest in this solution.

4) Operating system producers (Google, Apple, or Microsoft) will add the software to their operating systems. Again, great public interest will be needed for this solution to work.

In any case, I will need a lot of money to pay for the development of the software itself, sponsoring developers to modify their programs, and travels to mobile phone and operating system producers. It won’t be easy, but I believe that if you can imagine something, you can also make it a reality!


8. How it works (a version for advanced users)

When using a smartphone as you are used to, everything runs in a mobile UI (user interface). After connecting to an external monitor, the smartphone will switch to a new launcher which will be part of my software. Currently, it works like this: I change the DPI of chosen applications, thanks to which their UI is switched to a tablet UI and everything is adapted to a bigger screen size. The planned solution is that after connecting a smartphone to an external monitor, the smartphone will switch to a new launcher and other software producers (e.g. e-mail programs, office, etc.) will detect whether this launcher is activated or not. If activated, a modified version of their program will run; otherwise, the standard version will open. I have thought up a solution to make everything easy and without root access, but I will not present the complete manual here due to the danger of someone copying my ideas.

FAQ
Q: When phone is connected as desktop PC (or is connected to TV), could I still write SMS and make calls?
A: Yea, you could write SMS and make calls. The phone has still all its functions.
Q: Where it is possible to buy docking station?
A: Everywhere, just type name of your phone and add docking station.
Q: Does program works on iPhone?
A: Sorry not yet, but if it will works on Android soon it will be available on iPhone.
Q: When the program will be released?
A: It should take about 3 - 6 months to finish program.
Q: Do you think that in the future mobile will replace computers?
A: It could be possible, if we look at mobile processor  X1  (newest processor form Nvidia company) it has more than a teraflop of computing power. The fastest supercomputer in the world in the year 2000 could achieve a teraflop, but it required 10,000 Intel Pentium Pro processors.
Q: Could I edit file with extension docx and xlsx (new Microsoft Office files)?
A: That's no problem at all.

story:
What is WiC?

It’s a plug and charge Iphone 6 case that can connect to any USB port. The connection cable is an original Apple (valued at $19,95), so you won't have to worry about any compatibility issues. 

How does it work?

It's quite simple: the case is manufactured in polycarbonate and (Thermoplastic Polyurethane), concealing an original Apple connection cable with a lightning connector and USB connector on each side. If you have to charge your phone, all you need to do is open the lid, expose the connectors and charge your iPhone by plugging it into any USB port. 

Product images.

What made us decide to do this?

The whole thing arose from a personal need. Being active users of iPhone as we were, we always ended up carrying our charger with us out of fear of running out of battery and being disconnected. That's why we got down to work and designed a battery charger case that would allow us to connect through USB  and without any additional cables. Simple, don't you think? 

Production plan. 

Our product is now fully designed, patented and ready for the production phase. The objective is to send out the first deliveries in September 2015. 

  • May: Production prototyping, moulds and first samples. 
  • June: production modifications and packaging design. 
  • July: production 
  • September: reception and distribution of goods.

In order to speed up procedures and reduce negotiation times, the preliminary agreements with manufacturers have already been reached. 

About us.

José Antonio Cruz. CEO & FOUNDER.

A Computer Science Engineer with more than 15 years of experience in developing and leading IT projects for companies. About 2 years ago he decided to set up his own business of Apps for mobile; leading him to recognise the need we showed today. 

Daniel Castillo Buj. Marketing Manager. 

With a degree in Advertising and Public Relations, he has developed his professional career in advertising agencies and marketing departments of companies from different sectors. He has been specialising in digital marketing and mobile apps for the past years. 

Thank you!

It doesn't really matter if you finally decide to invest or not in this project, because if you've reached this far, it means that you took your time to consider it. And for this matter, thank you very much for your interest!!!

story:
Cause and how you can help:

- With iSolar we are making people's lives more comfortable and at the same time alleviating the high level of power consumption which the world is going through due to the technological advances in the past few decades, even if only by a small percentage. All monetary and non-monetary help is highly appreciated and will greatly assist us in finalizing the prototypes of our product and conducting further testing and optimization in high tech labs across Germany and Switzerland.

Impact:

Now a days the world needs a constant supply of extremely large amounts of power on a daily basis and this power is mostly derived from the limited fossil fuels of our planet, in the past few decades the number of mobile telephones has gone up from only a few thousands to billions and they all require a daily power supply. this enormous consumption of power means that more fuel must be burned in power stations, therefore more carbon monoxide is released into the atmosphere and so worsening of the global climate. On the other hand, solar energy is very abundant and inexpensive, it is also very suitable for some applications such as mobile phones and tablets. That's why we want to take this opportunity to create an efficient, reliable, and sustainable product to ease people's lives and help the environment.

Other Ways You Can Help:

We understand that not everybody is financially capable of supporting our product monetarily, but we welcome any type of help, be it telling your friends about us, or just sending us an email of your thoughts and ideas, all greatly appreciated!
