story:
The V-DOCK(Versatile Docking) Mobile Body Grips are Phone Holders in the form of an Arm Band. These grips are meticulously designed comfortable, much easier Cell Phone Holder surprisingly simple compared to the best Worldwide Mobile Device Accessories—but with a modern MAGNETIC twist. 

This is your new everyday Cell Phone friend and it will get continuously better the more you use it. From iphones, to samsungs, to almost any type of phone on earth, the V-DOCK Body Grips develop an almost super-natural vibe when using the Neo-Magnets. A mobile device is in everyones hand, pocket, purse or pouch, and at home in most any context. All things are difficult before they become easy, no moreNO MORE stuffing in pockets and doing that dreaded search for your personal items! . . .

YOU CAN FIND OUT MORE AT OUR NEW WEBSITE HERE>>>

 

 

 

 

 

 

     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     

     

    YOU CAN FIND OUT MORE AT OUR NEW WEBSITE HERE>>>

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    What Makes the V-DOCK Phone Grips Special? The Phone & hand Freedom and can be used with any phone.  We also use Rare Earth Neo-Dymium Magnets along with micro Hook and loop Material to secure mobile items. 

    No more cell phone inserts, pouches, belt clips and all of the extremely annoying things you see on the marketplace today. We chose a skin safe and extremely effective mobile device companion you'd be comfortable wearing every day, without compromising performance. The V-DOCK products are remarkably light, extraordinarily strong, highly effective and looks great.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     
     
     
     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Risks and challenges

    First of all, we are not about to let a product like this be executed poorly and the evolution of getting it perfect has been a challenge in this long 3 years. We have worked extremely hard to get this product very ready for Funding and to have the very best manufacturing and shipping options but here are are the minor risks we see:

    FULFILLMENT: We will be alittle overwhelmed by the positive feedback on the shipping speed as your VDocks will arrive within 30 days of the ending of this campaign. We do think the demand will be extremely high and we will need to do the math every single day to keep up with orders but we have prepared 100% for this. 


    We will be working with manufacturers who have over 100 years of experience delivering excellent products in massive quantities. There will some small surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our V-DOCK customer.

    Other than those small things, we expect every single thing to go very smoothly as every single business detail has been thought out thoroughly.

    PLEASE KNOW that any backing amount brings us one step closer to providing a great product to the world. Help make the greatest mobile idea (next to the cell phone itself) get out to the world by clicking the ‘Back It’ button at the top of the page, or spreading the word by sharing our page. Please do SHARE!

    My friends, family and colleagues all STAY CONNECTED with this helpful, very cool product and say THANK YOU for your help! Let's make this available to all that need it most.

story:
The What

A gesture recognition and motion tracking palm-bracelet is in the works. But what is that  actually? A palm-bracelet that will not only recognize gestures but will also allow you to use your hands in a Virtual- or Augmented-Reality. Our creation can become whatever you desire in any virtual environment via a series of attachable modules.

 

 

The Who

The team of BrainHUB consists of software developers & engineers, an industrial designer and an economist. Our mission - to develop simple but working solutions to technically challenging problems. We hope that you will share our enthusiasm when you experience your hands at work in a virtual world. We are neither the first nor the only ones trying to come up with such a device like "GR". But we aim to be the ones that ultimately create an elegant solution one.

 

The Why

So why are we doing this exactly? Well, not only, is the problem and its technicalities fascinating, but its solution would also has the potential to revolutionize man's interaction with computer systems.

 

The How

 

Currently, our creation is still only a laboratory prototype. Nonetheless, it is the culmination of seven other preceding versions - each one being a crucial step in the developmental process. We are asking for your support, so that we can take the decisive step of turning our prototype into a product.Whether this happens or not depends on those of you who are devoted to making the future a thing of the present.

Another reason to turn to you is because your input on Indiegogo is invaluable to us. Each of our devices is as unique and personal as a your hand: tell us your suggestions and we will gladly comply to any special requests and cool ideas you may have.

Let us know what you think on our e-mail: ideas@brainhub.co and you might become part of BrainHUBs history. Let’s walk the creative path together and experience the pure joy of turning an idea into reality.

 

Chalenges & Risks

As with any project in development, ours isn't short on risks and challenges. Our first hurdle was to develop attachable modules for the device which could apply its functionalities to a specific task.. For example: it may be used to control a PC and then, by plugging a VR module, to also act as a gaming controller.

The technical challenge at hand is fraught with risks. Namely:

  • The development process may be lengthy;
  • Making the device compatible with other systems and devices will also take quite some time;
  • Turning real-life gestures into mathematical abstractions is a buggy process;

Due to all of the above, the development process will take place on a step-by-step basis.

Thankfully, we can overcome these obstacles with your support. Our work will focus on:

  • Developing a unified design for the bracelet and modules;
  • Designing an industrial blueprint;
  • Developing three generations of specialized GR devices;
  • finalizing first version of our SDK

Those of you that get a perk will gain an exclusive preview of our work. 
The rest will get an update a week later.

 

FAQ

Who are the people behind BrainHUB?

- Check us out at: https://brainhub.co

 

How long have we been working on the project?

- A little over a two years .

 

Is the money going to be enough?

- The amount we are asking for will allow us to make a crucial step in the developmental process.

What if you fail to reach the funding target?

- We would have still benefitted greatly by getting some feedback from you. The work itself would still go on as usual, just slower.

 

Some Indiegogo campaigns promise merch, glam and glory to their supporters. Why are your perks so humble?

- Your ideas will be included in the final version of the product. In the end, you will own a device which you partly created. You gotta admit that´s kinda awesome.

Leaded by Apple, more and more companies start to use USB-c port in their products, which is a nightmare to Designers, College students, Network Engineers, photographers, and almost everyone who needs to work or play with computer.

And about the latest MacBook Pro, both the 13 inch and inch of it eventually only use USB-C port, which means the new MacBook Pro nearly doesn’t have any output ability in this real world. Even the EarPods sells with iphone 7 is using lightening connector, Which means you even can’t use ” Apple EarPods” with its own laptop without an adopter.

To use the MacBook Pro as we expected, well, obviously we need a lot of adaptors, or a ports hub.I’m introducing you – Hub 3.0 .

First Generation of Hub

Have you experienced this? All cables twines eachother together, Ruins your whole days good mood within a second. These ” Simple Adaptors” could be considered as the first generation of Hub. One adaptor for one port. In everyday life we need different outputs, then you need many adaptors, USB, HDMI, Net Cable, SD card reader…..It hard to pick a needed one in that kind of cable mess, which always drive you crazy and mess everything up together.

First generation of Hub

Second Generation of Hub

The second generation of Hub is "dock". It Has almost all the functions you need, looks nice, but when you actually start to use it with your macbook, it will ruin your laptop's most expansive feature: portability. It’s sooo huge! And the point is, you barely use all the different poats at a same time, which means most of the space and the weight is actually wasted at the time. You only need a Hub which is easy to carry and meet your needs when you need it, not a brick even bigger than your phone.When you choose MacBook, you choose to have a really efficient life, Efficient working or creating experience. The Hub should provide you what you need, and nothing should be surplus or wasted. Then here comes The FruitHub, Hub 3.0. 

FruitHub is the world’s first modular USB-C Hub that helps you expanding your MacBook or MacBook Pro. By changing the blocks you can easily connect your MakBook or MacBook Pro to Lightening, Net Cable, HDMI, USB cables and SD Card. The soft light on the fruit shows which part is standby at the time, helping you recognize the ports with no effort in an emotional and friendly way.

You can change the blocked according to different occasions, and by chaning the order og the blocks, you will get all ports that are frequently used . The FruitHub is highly flexiable and totoally efficient based on it’s  design idea. Nothing is wasted, and nothing is lost.

By changing the blocks, you can get ports from one lightening and a USB to 5 different frequently used ports, and you always get an extra USB port in additional.

You will the service you need based on different occasions. For example, you are listening beautiful music using your Lightnening earpods, and going to have a presentation, just stick the Mango block(“Mango” for “Media”)into the Zero part, then show your presentation to others concentratively and efficiently. If you plan to go picnic with family and take some memorable pictures, stick the strawberry block (“Strawberry” for SD card) into Zero part, then you can view and polish your photos at the very same time. The FruitHub provides you what you need accurately, without burden.

Why Fruits?

Mango, Strawberry and cherry are what everybody familiar with. Using the fruits can help people recognize the  different ports in a more user- friendly way. Fruits also have a magic to make people delightful, Which provide you creativeness and efficiency when you are working.

"I'm not a big fan of tech and I love the fruits. Instead of cold computer things, it definitely will cheer me up when I am using it, it's cute and lively."A financial  bachelor student studing in London said.

 

How to choose the colors and the blocks?

We will send you a survey to know your preference within 7 days after the campaign ends.

Our Team

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions!

Our email address: wearefruithub@gmail.com

story:
Why is piServer the ultimate enclosure?

 

Designed for the Raspberry Pi 3

piServer was designed around the brand new Raspberry Pi 3. Many considerations were made to ensure the best possible experience with the Raspberry Pi foundation’s new frontrunner. It was designed to take advantage of the processing power of the new Raspberry Pi 3. For those who already own Rasberry Pi's, it is also backwards compatible with the Raspberry Pi 2B. 

 

Stunning Design

piServer was designed to look sharp and to have big functionality within a small form. The criteria were to fit a 2.5" hard drive and a Raspberry Pi 3 inside the case, along with the supporting circuitry. After many hours of mechanical design, we have done just that. 

Internal Hard Drive

piServer has an integrated SATA controller and mounting points for a 2.5" Hard Disk. It is offered with two different hard drive capacities: 1TB and 2TB.

External Connector and SD Access

On the back, the piServer has 3 external USB 2.0 ports, an HDMI port, a high current power input, an optical audio connector, and a USB 3.0 port for direct access to copy files to the hard drive. All piServers include an AC power adapter.

Our newest design has made the ethernet port available in the back of the piServer.

 

On the right side, it has a 4th USB 2.0 port along with exterior access to the Raspberry Pi's Micro SD card.

On the bottom of the unit, there is a full 40-Pin Raspberry Pi GPIO header designed to be used with a ribbon cable to connect to all of your Pi Hats and projects.

 

Advanced Thermal Management

To dissipate the heat generated by the Raspberry Pi 3, the piServer has an internal fan that is throttled by a PWM circuit paired with an included aluminum heatsink. This allows the fan to be slowed down to save power and be quiet, or the fan can be sped up to maximum cooling for those who want to push their Raspberry Pi's harder.

 

 

Smart Power System 

A microswitch on the back of the case paired with some smart internal circuitry allows the piServer to the started and shutdown in sync with the operating system. This allows the Raspberry Pi to prepare for a power off. The piServer's power circuitry senses when the Raspberry Pi has shut down and then shuts the power bus off. To boot the Pi, simply press the button on the back of the box. The piServer will re-enable the power busses, and the Pi will boot.

 

 

 

The Core of piServer  

The core of the piServer is a custom PCB assembly with all the required circuitry to power the Raspberry Pi and provide all the other features of the piServer.

One Enclosure; Infinite Uses

piServer was designed with versatility at its core. One user may want to prototype using a Pi Hat, while another may want a way to play media. With this in mind, we have made an effort to test our system with several diverse operating systems.

Designed for Media

The piServer was designed with media playback in mind. In order to make the piServer Media experience even better, we will be including a media controller similar to the one below with all Media perk packages. The remote works via RF, and therefore does not require line of sight to operate.

Perks

 

Functional Prototype

Why should you trust NightShade Electronics?

NightShade electronics is a proven company that has been operating since 2013. This is our second crowdfunding campaign, with our first being the energyShield (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nightshade...). The energyShield has gone on to be a very successful product that has been available on Amazon ever since it went into production. Between then and now we have completed many contracted projects for several different companies. The piServer has been in development for years now, and we have decided that 2016 is the year for us to come back to the crowdfunding scene to make this product a reality. If you choose to back the piServer, you can rest assured that you will receive a great product!

 

Production Plan

Using the experience from our 2014 Kickstarter campaign ( energyShield), we plan to avoid many of the common issues that cause delays and dissatisfied backers. We want to provide the best possible experience for everyone involved in this campaign.

There is always potential for problems and delays in manufacturing.  We are only choosing suppliers that we believe will do the best work and deliver the parts on time to help mitigate these risks. Doing so helps us ensure that all backers will receive their piServers before the scheduled delivery date. The funds from this campaign will provide the working capital that we need to fund the first production run.

Soon after our project is funded, we will order the injection mold to make the piServer case.  It is the item with the longest lead time, and therefore should be ordered first.  To streamline this process, we already have a company lined up to produce the molded parts.

Suppliers have been selected to produce the many other parts of the piServer, and they are ready to start production. Once all of the components arrive at Nightshade, we will get them assembled and mailed as quickly as possible.

 

Timeline

  • November 2014 - 1st piServer Prototype
    • Designed to use Raspberry Pi compute module, but we decided the compute module was underpowered for a good media experience.
  • November 2015 - 2nd piServer Prototype Designed and Tested
    • The design was migrated for use with the Raspberry Pi 2.
  • May 2016 - 3rd Prototype Designed
    • The design was refined to ease assembly and cost less to produce. piServer was fine-tuned to work great with the Raspberry Pi 3
  • June - August 2016 - Preparing for production.
    • The design has been continually refined since the 3rd prototype in preparation for the 4th (and hopefully final) prototype. We have also been working hard to find suppliers for all the parts. 
  • September 2016 - 4th Prototype
    • During this campaign, we will finish the 4th prototype. After validating that prototype, we will be ready for production.
  • November-December, 2016 - Production
    • Because we already have suppliers lined up and the design almost complete, we plan to start production right after the campaign has completed.
  • December 2016 - Shipping

 

 

Credits:
Icons made by Freepik and Butterflytronics from www.flaticon.com

story:
Product Design

Cables Labelz are made from the same high-quality molded plastic you find in your favorite accessories, creating a stylish and personalized name block complimenting your tech accessories. Cable Labelz come in various sizes to fit any cord, such as standard headphones, charging cables, laptop chargers, or the innumerable dongles required for your favorite devices.  The Blocks are designed to be securely fastened and cannot be removed, yeah Charles tried it while “testing.”  

Cable Labelz are personalized with your name printed directly onto the block.  You can choose your color and font when you place your order prior to fulfilment.

Cable Labelz are engineered to ensure that each component is designed to fit the accessory perfectly and will not damage the cord attached.  Cable Labelz come in various sizes to fit the diameter of the accessories they protect.

Cable Labelz come in two pieces, the body and secured back plate.  Once the back plate is secured, it cannot be removed from the accessory.  This ensures total security. 

The Basic Pack

A basic set of Cable Labelz to fit your phone charging cable and headphones personalized just for you.

Dongle

Personalize your phone or laptop dongles, perfect for the office to keep Steve from Accounting from taking the projector dongle, again.

 

Laptop Protection

Cable Labelz laptop block fits most modern laptop computers or notebooks.

 

A Family Affair

Dad, a gadget guy, loves technology and his kids have all inherited his passion to have the latest and greatest Apple and Android gear. With more than a couple dozen devices in our house, keeping track of charging cables and headphones has been near impossible.  One frustrating day, after searching for a charging cable, Dad finally lost it and began designing Cable Labelz.  He wanted something functional that didn’t look hideous.  That is how Cable Labelz was dreamed into existence.  As they say, necessity is the mother of invention.

The Team

Dad is the chief product designer and head of manufacturing, with more than twenty years of manufacturing experience in Asia.  Maddy is queen of social media and marketing, and yes, she did graduate from high school (early) and is currently pursuing a degree in business from Brigham Young University.  Charles is head of testing, as the primary culprit “borrowing” other people’s headphones, to catch a thief, you must employ one.

Budget: $7,500

While manufacturing with extruded plastics is a tried and true process, the printing and personalized fulfillment is where our team's skill with process engineering will be critical.  Each order will be individually printed and packaged to you.

Risks and challenges

All hardware products carry associated risks and challenges. Our team has been working hard to address every one of them.

Prototyping is the hardest part for a new product, however with prototyping and testing completed we are confident in our ability to meet both our timeline and product design objectives. With more than 20 years of manufacturing experience, we aim to have 100% of On Time Delivery.

Your Impact

While we have infused a satirical theme in the development of Cable Labelz, “save your accessories, save the world!”, we do believe that on a personal level the personalization of your tech accessories has an emotional effect.  We have all experienced getting in our car, looking in our bag or just going to plug our phone in at night and our charging accessory is not there.  There is a sense of angst that can create disharmony and anxiety.  While we don’t believe that Cable Labelz will solve the literal problems of the world, if we can make it a little easier to avoid losing your accessories we have fulfilled our mission to you. 

This project also has a personal effect for us, we came up with this idea several years ago and have not pursued it.  As our kids got older, they have taken this project forward in hopes that we can not only fulfill the mission of keeping your accessories stylishly personalized and secure, but also help them create a company to pay for fun, school and even a Wedding (yes – Maddy is getting married). 

Our mission is to create a system to stylishly personalize your tech accessories, have some fun doing it and hopefully make a little money in the process.

Join Our Team

We are excited to have you join our team of product users; keeping your accessories stylish and safe is our mission.  No mater how you back Cable Labelz, a single pair or the ultimate fan boy pack, we hope that you will promote this product with your friends, family and neighbors both on social media and in real life.
story_txt:
Product DesignCables Labelz are made from the same high-quality molded plastic you find in your favorite accessories, creating a stylish and personalized name block complimenting your tech accessories. Cable Labelz come in various sizes to fit any cord, such as standard headphones, charging cables, laptop chargers, or the innumerable dongles required for your favorite devices.  The Blocks are designed to be securely fastened and cannot be removed, yeah Charles tried it while “testing.”  Cable Labelz are personalized with your name printed directly onto the block.  You can choose your color and font when you place your order prior to fulfilment.Cable Labelz are engineered to ensure that each component is designed to fit the accessory perfectly and will not damage the cord attached.  Cable Labelz come in various sizes to fit the diameter of the accessories they protect.Cable Labelz come in two pieces, the body and secured back plate.  Once the back plate is secured, it cannot be removed from the accessory.  This ensures total security. The Basic PackA basic set of Cable Labelz to fit your phone charging cable and headphones personalized just for you.
Dongle
Personalize your phone or laptop dongles, perfect for the office to keep Steve from Accounting from taking the projector dongle, again.

story:
AirPods Accessories Kit consists of Mini Charging Cable with Lightning connector and natural leather AirPods Case.

Mini Charging Cable is very short – just 4.33 inch (11 cm) long. With it you can easily charge your mobile phone or other devices everywhere!

We are also offering a Mini Charging Cable with MiniUSB connector for Android devices.

You can purchase the Mini Charging Cable separately by your choice for your mobile phone or tablet – both iPhone or Android.

AirPods Case is hand made from high quality natural leather.

The leather used for external case decoration is the same used in luxury BMW vehicles interior trimming.

 

Your AirPods you can place into AirPods Case, as well there is a special section for Mini Charging Cable.

You will always have your AirPods and Mini Charging Cable close to reach!

 

One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. We understand that INDIEGOGO backers want their product as soon as possible, but we could be limited by manufacturing capabilities. 

 

If you will support our project in INDIEGOGO you will receive  our AirPods Accessories Kit for a SPECIAL PRICE!

You can get AirPods Accessories Kit right at your home!* 
* Free shipping Worldwide with parcel tracking is included. 

 

All  AirPods Accessories Kit  prototype samples are ready yet (see photos).

Funding is needed for mass production:

  •    prototype verification in the manufacturer`s company
  •    purchase of raw materials
  •    manufacturing
  •    product quality testing and inspection
  •    packaging
  •    shipping

 

timeline:

 

 

We are ready to do it with your help!

 

If you like our AirPods Accessories Kit or Mini Charging Cables but does not want to buy them, please, contribute development of project by sharing information about it in family and with your friends in social networks!

 

 

We`ll be glad to answer any of your questions!

 

 

 

We hope you`ll like it!

 

Apple, iPhone and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and in other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Windows Phone is either a registered trademark or trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.

story:
We like to use the phone without a cover - but how can we enjoy it if the phone is scratching and constantly swing if put it on the table and try to type text, scroll through photos or play in favorite game ??? This is extremely annoying!

We present you Reinventing the phone case! Standy is an incredible Coasters for your phone made of transparent composite material. Thanks to them, your phone lies flat on the surface, its back cover does not touch the table and is not scratched. You just enjoy your phone and you no longer need a case!

 

 

 


Original tactile sensations

We interviewed a large number of iphone owners to find out what prevents them from enjoying their phone 100%. The absolute majority tell two reasons. The first is that the iphone does not lie flat normal on the surface, it is unsteady and this is annoying! The second is that they are forced to wear a case so as not to damage the back cover and this spoils the original feeling of use. We solved this problem! You will get 70% more pleasure from using your phone with Standy - because it is real magic. We did it for you.
 

Reliable fastening


Looks great

When the phone is on the table - the Standy are completely unremarkable. We have developed a unique composite material, both elastic and solid. And completely transparent! In everyday life, you get the whole experience from your iphone.
 

The best crowdfunding project according to my mother


 



I want to say a big and sincere thanks to all who supported our project. Dear community, you are our the most important support, you give us the confidence to move forward - in your own words of support you give us a positive mood and smiles in our office! Thank you for working together, for the heated discussions, for publishing in the media and sharing with your friends. In response, we dedicate to you our hard work and our product that we make with warmth and love for you! I wish you all be the same cool and fun guys! Is always! With your support, we are changing the world of mobile accessories. Geronimo! Minimal!

story:
MobileIrisID

With your purchase, you will be receiving the MobileIrisID Key and the MobileIrisID app to keep your files and passwords secure.

We live our lives through our phones. From those videos of your kids playing in the snow for the first time. To reviewing those contracts your boss just sent you. Even sending your crush those … very… intimate photos.

Somethings are for our eyes only. That next-level security to make sure what’s private stays private. Some things need more than a fingerprint or pin code to see. Other biometric technologies prioritize quickly unlocking the phone instead of protecting a data vault. MobileIrisID is the first tool specifically designed to keep your private data hidden.

With a simple scan, the Iris Key quickly reads your iris and automatically unlocks a secure data vault on your phone where you can store your passwords, photos and private documents.

MobileIrisID Iris Key

The USB-C adapter is small device that attaches to your Android phones and turns it into an iris recognition system. It will be powered by the phone and is compact enough to carry in your pocket. 

The user will a ttach the adapter to the phone and bring it up to their eye level to scan. Information will be sent over SSL to the cloud for verification, and will unlock the Data Vault App if it’s successful. The user can then see the information in their vault.

Advanced algorithms will detect common spoofing methods, such as when someone tries to place a picture of an eye in front of the camera or scanning an unconscious person’s eye.

MobileIrisID Data Vault App

The data vault is an Android app that can store passwords, notes and pictures that can only be accessed if the user successfully authenticates using the MobileIrisID Iris Key. Even if you unlock your phone, you will need to re-authenticate with your eyes to access the app.

The data will be encrypted on phone and shown only if the user has authenticated.

Why the eye

Iris Key provides you a level of security beyond the typical fingerprint or face recognition. Because the iris is a far more unique part of you. 20 times more unique than your fingerprints and 1000s of times more than face, to be exact.

From the little specs all around, to the unique coloration that your friends keep saying really goes well with your favorite shirt. It's what led us to create Iris Key. Your eye is one of the best passwords in the world. It's always with you and no two are exactly alike, so it made perfect sense to create a simple seamless way to use it as a password.

Iris Key uses a built-in infrared camera to capture a high-resolution video of your iris. It intelligently analyzes this information with a remarkable degree of detail and precision. From the outer layer that you see to those layers that only the infrared camera can pick up.

Advanced machine learning algorithms learn from every scan, constantly improving accuracy and speed. Iris ID uses all this to provide the most accurate match and a high level of security.

Technology

Iris Key goes beyond normal iris recognition by analyzing much more than your iris.

Your pupil is always changing size, subtle, but enough to be picked up by the camera to assure someone isn’t trying to scan a printed picture. Or worse, an unconscious person.

Reflections from the camera’s small lights are analyzed to make sure they are distorted in a way that only a 3-dimensional round object can. This prevents someone trying to scan a high-quality video.

Our patented algorithms and methods are all in the cloud, meaning you always get the latest and greatest experience. It’s fast, it’s secure.

Our roadmap

We’ve spent many years building the technology behind all of this and we still plenty of ideas.

Cryptographic barcode

MobileIrisID has submitted for a patent to quickly show a cryptic barcode on the screen while the person is scanning their eye so that the barcode is reflected off the pupil. When our cloud receives the iris image, it extracts the barcode from the pupil and compares it to the cloud sent during scanning. If they don’t match, something is wrong.

This technique is truly unique in iris scanning and has so far proven successful in our experiments. We plan on releasing this in version 2 of our device.

iPhone support

Our team specializes in Android development, so we decided to try it on Android first. Once this campaign finishes, our very next step is to make it available for the iPhone. If you would like to join our iPhone beta program, feel free to contact us and we’ll be happy to work with you.

Developer APIs and Integration

We think that it should be easy to any app to add an extra layer of security. Our founders are experts in the SaaS world and we know how important it is to make it super simple to integrate with. We already have the APIs ready but we just have a little more to go to productize them. If you would like to join our API beta program, feel free to contact us and we’ll be happy to work with you.

A little about biometrics

The iris is the colored portion of the eye visible around the pupil. It is covered by the cornea. The iris is the only internal part of the body visible from the outside. It is formed before birth via a process known as chaotic morphogenesis and is very stable after that time. Features of the iris including those created by the collagenous fibers referred to as contraction furrows, coronas, crypts, freckles, rifts and pits. Iris recognition is basically the matching of these features across images.

Iris recognition is one of the most accurate security systems to identify a unique user, promptly and conveniently. Even if the person wears glasses and contact lenses. The system functions normally since it does not change the characteristics of a person's iris. In fact, even when a person undergoes eye surgery, it has no effect on the iris.

Who we are

We’ve assembled an amazing team. From engineers to mathematicians to business developers. We validated the concepts. We designed many prototypes. We have working units.

The team has filed 2 patents that are essential to making this technology work:

  • Application No. 62/190,090, received a filing date of 07/08/2015 – method of detecting boundaries of the human eye.
  • Application No. 62/135,426, received a filing date of 03/19/2015 – remote authentication of identity.

Using our patents, we are prepared to make MobileIrisID into the leading biometric technology, shifting consumers away from fingerprinting and less-reliable methods. We have put in a lot of work to get where we are today, but we could use some outside help to keep going forward.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This is where you come in. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $200,000, which will cover the costs of continuing development on MobileIrisID. Considering the potential for this technology to change the world, this funding level is modest, and we are confident that it can help to push us over the finish line with all our designs and plans. To say thank-you to everyone who makes a contribution, we are offering some exciting rewards exclusively through this campaign, including early access to MobileIrisID itself.

Risks & Challenges

The truth is that we have already mitigated a great deal of risk over the last four years. Given the patents that we hold and our expertise in the field of biometric processing, we believe that we are ready to go to market quickly, just as soon as we can raise the funds that we need and get over the developmental challenges that remain.

This is an urgent problem, as in 2018, there were 179 million records exposed. We will do everything in our power to step up and help.

Whatever logistical challenges arise during the manufacturing and distribution processes, we will figure out a way forward, coming up with creative solutions just as we always have. We also pledge to remain transparent with our contributors, providing regular updates on all the progress that we are making.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can help out by sharing a link to this campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Just as we all use smartphones, this is a piece of technology that everyone can benefit from, something that everyone should know about. The more we spread the word about MobileIrisID prior to the launch date, the more we will be able to edge toward the tipping point – and make this a global technology.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary. Thank you for taking the time to read about our plans and what we have accomplished with MobileIrisID thus far.

story:
Media coverage.


+ 3dprint.com

How you can help.


For us to bring the “StandPro” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “StandPro”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

The “StandPro” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!


How we'll use the funds.


We need about $10000 USD Insert Goal amount in order to break “StandPro” onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up. 


Final thank you and links.


We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “StandPro” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!


Contributions.


Your generosity and support could make all the difference in the fruition of “StandPro”. 

It would be great to have XX people to contribute $1,000. But in reality, XX people contributing $5 would work too.  Of course you may contribute more.  I will be eternally grateful!  Please share this with anyone you think would be willing to help. 

Old school?  No Problem!

For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact me via email: sang@galatek.co and I will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to.  I will post your contribution on the campaign with your name and I will deliver whatever perk you would like.

Also...

You do not have to have a PayPal account.  They accept credit cards and debit cards.

Please help spread the word!

This has proven to be one of the hardest things I have ever done.  I don't have a million friends to share this with.  But, I have the Internet and wonderful people who want to see me succeed. Whether or not you contribute financially, please use the share tools on this page. Tweeting, sharing on Facebook or any other venues you have at your disposal will greatly enhance our exposure and increase our chances to succeed.  I'm asking for 5 minutes of your time, a $5 contribution, and 5 personal emails.

Here's the link to the Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/galatek.co/

Please like and share it.  Feel free to leave a message also.

If you wish to contact us:

Website: www.galatek.co

Our Social Media Connections:

   +  Instagram

   +  Twitter     

   +  Facebook 

   +  Pinterest  

   +  YouTube  

Contact Information

Name: Sang Le

E Mail: sang@galatek.co

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@galatek.co

story:
Tired of carrying a huge smartphone all day?


Ever wished for a device that performs great AND fits in your pocket?

 

Happy with the size of your iPhone 4, but wish it had a larger screen, 4G LTE, and superior performance?

 
 

Meet Mu

 

 
The most comfortable high performance smartphone you'll ever own.
 
A practical phone, for practical people.
 
 
 
 
 

The powers of Mu

 
High Screen-to-Body Ratio
4" HD Display
Ultra Thin Bezel
4G LTE Support
Easy One Hand Operation
Truly Compact Size
MAXIMUM POWER
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

What we have

 

 
 
 

What we need

 

YOU

 

 
 

Dare to be different

 

Help us create the world's most powerful compact smartphone -

by owning one!

 

 

This is a Fixed Funding campaign

If we fail to raise our goal, you will be fully refunded automatically!
 
 
 

Models, Specifications & Perks

 
Each model is available in 3 colors - White, Grey & Red/Blue
we will confirm your color of choice after the campaign is completed
 
 

Mu Red

First 40 backers get 50$ OFF! LIMITED QUANTITY REMAINING!
 

 

 
 
 

Mu Blue

First 20 backers get 50$ OFF! LIMITED QUANTITY REMAINING!
 

 


 

Our Current Competitors

(Latest smartphones under 120mm)

Why we believe we're the hope and future of crowdfunding campaigns

 

TRANSPARENCY & HONESTY

We've noticed the high number of crowdfunding campaigns taking the wrong turn lately.

That's why we're focusing on giving out all information possible about this project, from beginning to end, to anyone who seeks it.

 

WE'RE NOT CORPORATE

We're not going to hide behind a bogus company name or a dead-end over-seas telephone number.

We're real, and you're welcome to contact us anytime on our website,  Twitter, or our IRC channel on QuakeNet (#MuHQ).

 

COMMUNICATION & UPDATES

We're submitting a weekly update regularly, involving the status of development, and production, including Tweets and regular IRC FAQ sessions. GUARANTEED.

 

YOUR PLEDGE IS SAFE

None of the backers money is going to be spent on seeding this project.

We already have investors waiting to fund our tooling and mould creation, in order to bring Mu into mass production.

 We just need the numbers to show them we mean business.

If anything goes wrong before we enter mass production, and we'll be unable to send you a finished product as described, all of our backers will get automatic refund.

 

 

Long term goals

After the creation of Mu Red and Mu Blue, we plan to keep producing Mu models which will be:

  • Compact, yet packed with high performance components
  • Physically strong, highly durable, and possibly even waterproof
  • Supporting the latest operating systems and communication technologies
  • Having the highest battery capacity possible
  • Equipped with the best camera possible

 

Accessories, accessories, and more accessories!

We want to do to Mu what GoPro did to cameras, but with a little twist.

We will team up with creative fans that designed awesome accessories and help them with manufacturing and production.

Eventually we will put these accessories for sale at the Mu HQ website and share the income with the creators.

Armored cases, arm holders, customized satchels, special purses, you design it, we create it.

 

 

Timeline

 

Why does the Mu will only be ready in June ?

Well, there are a couple of reasons for this timeline.

First, if a campaigner has promised to ship you a product that will be ready in 2 months, it probably means they already have the final prototype, tooling, and mould ready, and is only using crowdfunding as a marketing platform to boost sales.

We don't use crowdfunding as a marketing platform, we use it to bring Mu to life.

If this campaign will be unsuccessful, Mu will simply not exist.

Second, we don't want to make the same mistakes other campaigners have made before, by promising super-early deliveries which are most likely impossible to achieve, and eventually fail the backers.

We have doubled our estimated development and manufacturing times, just to make sure that we will not need to sacrifice product quality and support in order to deliver on time.

 

But won't my phone be outdated by the time I get it?

Don't worry, we've got you covered.

We have planned a specific time frame in our timeline to further upgrade Mu Red and Mu Blue as we get closer to mass production.

We will update the backers and create an option to keep the original configuration if needed.

 

And what about specific frequencies?

We are currently working on adding as many LTE frequencies possible, with USA and European frequencies on top priority.

The MediaTek 6735 and 6753 support LTE WorldMode so we are going to have a very wide range of frequencies supported which is also perfect for traveling.

The moment we will have an exact list, we will publish it on the campaign and on our website.

 

Warranty & Returns

Full 12 month international manufacturer warranty included for parts and labor from the moment you receive your device. In any case your device needs service, we'll ask you to ship the device back to us for examination.
If after lab examination the device will contain a defect, the buyer will have a choice to either get a full refund, or ask for a new replacement, free of charge.
In the future we do plan to create service shops in US and in Europe for quicker and easier service.
We provide a 14-day return policy in any case you decide you no longer want the device. The product must be still in the original package, unused and unopened. Buyer must pay for return shipping.
 
Our #1 intention is to keep you happy and satisfied. You are always welcome to contact us and we'll personally provide an adequate solution towards your problem.

 

Have any more questions?

Feel free to visit our website @ www.TheMuHQ.com and submit your question in the contact section.
We will answer asap and upload it to our website, and present it on our weekly IRC FAQ sessions.
IRC Server: QuakeNet
Channel: #MuHQ
IRC Client for Android: AndroIRC (on Google Play)
IRC Client for iOS: IRChon (on App Store)
IRC Client for windows: http://www.mirc.com/get.html

story:
IMPORTANT UPDATE:

Dear contributors, thank you for your contribution but unfortunately the campaign did not meet the target, so please expect a refund. Thank you again and apology for the inconvenience.

What is PrintBoxie?

With the advancement of technology, everything is going wireless - including the new breed of printers. They are WiFi enabled so no more need to connect cables to print.

How nice would it be if we could convert any printer into a wireless printing device? Well, the time is here! In fact, you can now turn almost any USB printer into a wireless printing device - thanks to PrintBoxie!

Attach your printer to PrintBoxie and connect PrintBoxie to WiFi. PrintBoxie has its own email address so to print, all you need to do is send an email to your PrintBoxie's email address and your print is ready.

How to Print Using PrintBoxie?

Very simple! Connect PrintBoxie to your WiFi network on first use and note the email address of your PrintBoxie that comes along with your device.

Later, whenever you want to print, send an email to your PrintBoxie and your print is there.

Why Email and Not WiFi?

The reason is simple. WiFi has a range and email does not.

What can be Printed Using PrintBoxie?

Anything that you can print from the print command can be printed using PrintBoxie.

If email is plain text, PrintBoxie will print the plain text. If email has attachments, PrintBoxie will print attachments as well.


How Secure is PrintBoxie?

To be honest, PrintBoxie is quite secure. You can configure PrintBoxie using two options. Either 'Public' or 'Private'.

If set to 'Public', anyone who knows the email address of your PrintBoxie device can send an email and print - no restrictions.

If set to 'Private', PrintBoxie asks you for email addresses to add to PrintBoxie's whitelist. This way, only prints sent from the senders in the whitelist will be printed - others just rejected.

What About Printing from Mobile Devices?

Absolutely yes! Anything that can be shared as email on your mobile device, can be printed using PrintBoxie.

What About People in Office?

Yes again! Everyone in the office, tens or hundred or even more, they all can print using PrintBoxie.

What if on a Different WiFi Network?

No issue! Just like you can send emails to people on other WiFi networks, you can send email to PrintBoxie from anywhere in the world, on any network and on any WiFi.

Does PrintBoxie Print in Color?

It has nothing to do with PrintBoxie, it depends on the printer you connect PrintBoxie to. Color, black and white, laser, deskjet, plotter - PrintBoxie will work.

Daughter's Birthday, Son's Graduation or Your Anniversary

You can send directly printed greetings on any occasion just by emailing the greetings to your PrintBoxie.

IMPORTANT UPDATE:

Dear contributors, thank you for your contribution but unfortunately the campaign did not meet the target, so please expect a refund. Thank you again and apology for the inconvenience.
