story:
Our system makes your home smart and secure

Smart home concept, environmental control, AI smart security system with fully analyzed video, outstanding WiFi coverage for your entire home. All of these is our Camuniti Center!

Easy and smart as never before!

What can be connected?

Compatibility

There are several companies in the market who produce ZigBee sensors and switchers of great quality and with advanced characteristics.

Support of these devices we will steer and provide in the first place:

Goals

The Future is here

Center is a very smart device. It is designed not just to record and notify of any event but to detect really important issues. A built-in neural network and artificial intelligence perform deep analysis of what is happening on video and detect a wide range of objects and their actions in the frame. Did your mother or a friend just come over? Center will notify you. Any stranger around? Center will also inform you and record everything.

Meet the App

Turn your iOS or Android device into a home remote control with our mobile App. Using any other device with browser access? Utilise our Web App.

New philosophy, new outlook.

Stay connected, be notified

Get all types of notifications about your home and video cameras records! From now on you won’t miss anything important neither in the house nor around it. We mean it! Nothing else but really important!

WiFi without dead zones

Supported by cameras and WiFi repeaters, Center helps delivering and repeating WiFi signal. Fast and reliable WiFi, a single network name with a single password and high speed internet in every corner of your home. It takes only a few clicks to make it work.

Center is the brain of our entire system. It analyzes data flows from cameras and sensors, and intelligently and accurately decides on event importance, it is also in control of switchers and WiFi network.

This is just a unique device.

Center not only detects motion in video but also can see and analyze like a human

Artificial intelligence and artificial brain, deep neural network, smart self-learning system - Center has it all!

Center performs a detailed analysis of what is happening on video, detecting up to 20 object types and tracking their actions in the frame. Center can recognize roads, buildings and the surroundings so you won’t be disturbed with incidents happening on the road. With Center you will not get notifications about trees moving with the wind, sunlight piercing through clouds, snow fall etc.

Center can be taught to detect faces of your family members or your friends and you will be properly notified if any of them appears in the frame. Or the opposite – you will not be, depending on the settings you choose.

Center is fully compatible with any IP cameras. No need to worry that your smartphone will not playback a recorded video – Center will transcode any flow from the camera and record it in a format suitable for iOS, Android or any web browser.

WiFi control and coverage

With Center you can control WiFi network. Just connect our cameras and they will be both monitoring and serving as WiFi replicators.

Need a better WiFi range or would like to use your own cameras? You can still connect our WiFi replicators.

It is so easy now to define a network name, to set a single password and to get a high speed internet even where it never existed before.

Smart home with ZigBee

Center is a powerful thing allowing you full and easy control of your home. To implement this, we used ZigBee protocol.

With Center you can control air quality, temperature, the opening of doors or windows, water or gas leaks and fire risks.

You can also operate air-conditioning, light, heating, curtains and roller blinds, locks, electrical appliances and much more.

Control via the cloud, store in the cloud

By default Center is always connected with the cloud. Whenever you are away from home, you will receive notifications, have full control of your home, review images from cameras and playback recorded videos via the cloud.

The cloud allows you stay in touch with your home! It is easy and does not require any setup. Center continuously tests channel traffic and performance therefore automatically adapts video quality before transferring to the cloud. It does not matter whether you have a broadband channel or just a mobile internet. As long as you have any type of internet connection, you will see every message coming from our system.

Choose yourself what exactly to be transferred to the Cloud. Any moment you can change country your data is stored in - choose from USA, Germany, United Kingdom or Singapore.

Design

Compact Center made of opaque scratch resistant plastic in minimalist design will integrate perfectly with your interior whether this is a shelving unit, equipment stand or a desk.

Our Center is so pretty you don’t want to hide it in the storage room or in the attic!

Under the hood

Creating our products, we pay attention to every detail. Despite the fact Center is as tiny as only possible, it contains inside a powerful 5-core processor, several WiFi and ZigBee antennas. And all this in attractive palm-size case made of anti-scratch plastic.

Minimalist design, best matrix and wonderful picture quality, powerful battery and built-in WiFi and ZigBee signal repeaters for better network coverage. Our camera is not just a camera.

Summing up in three words - impressive, comprehensive, easy.

Best colour picture even in darkness

Only best components and attention to every detail make any product best.

That’s why in our camera we use Panasonic νMaicovicon® matrix, which gives bright colourful picture even in darkness. In complete pitch-black camera will automatically switch to night mode and infrared backlight will be on.

When the camera is not just a camera

Our camera is able not only to record high quality video but also to replicate WiFi and ZigBee signals. Now it’s all easy - once you have a camera you have a guaranteed WiFi signal.

For convenience we equipped our camera with just one port - Ethernet, which is used both for charging and data transfer, in case you don’t want to use WiFi for data transfer.

If you have unexpected blackout at home, both cameras and Center will keep working thanks to the built-in battery.

Design

Nice to touch anti-scratch opaque plastic, neat square form, front glass panel - all is designed not just for good performance but also for interior embellishment. You can easily install camera wherever you want - on a bookshelf or onto a house wall - this flexibility will only add to the great impressions of our products.

Under the hood

Powerful processor and incredible matrix, night mode, both PoE and battery power supply - we didn’t miss any single detail!

You can connect extra WiFi repeaters and have a high-speed internet all over the house without additional setup. Neat implementation will integrate seamlessly with your interior.

Nothing else. Just WiFi.

I - Infrastructure

Finally no more extra effort to stop a distant camera from losing WiFi signal. Because in our system it won’t be trying to connect to the Center directly. Simply no need because there is always available WiFi signal supplied from a much closer camera or a WiFi repeater mounted on the house wall for high speed internet even in your backyard.

​

Super fresh concept

It is easy to add sensors and switchers, easy to join them into a group, easy to manage the group. No more complex systems which require rigid settings performed only by professionals.

Super groups

Home control and monitoring devices can be grouped the way you want. Any groups can be created - a room, a floor, garden, garage or overall perimeter of the house. Every sensor or switcher can be included into unlimited number of groups.

Super sharing

Share the entire home control, access to some specific group or just one particular sensor or switcher with your family in two clicks.

Video / WiFi

Video monitoring and WiFi control are now isolated groups so they are always within easy reach. Sophisticated is very simple now.

Our product is a perfect combination of video surveillance with home remote control and modern technologies, such as artificial intelligence and self-learning neural networks. Guaranteed WiFi coverage and easy network control makes our product even more versatile.

We produce a brand new and unique product!

When sophisticated is simple

With our product, your house can see, feel and analyze just like any human.

The Center artificial intelligence will be constantly learning and accumulating knowledge about your habits, your lifestyle, any events inside and outside your house, it will learn to recognize your family members and friends.

Camuniti is not just a video surveillance system or a smart home concept. It is rather a smart entity giving you comfort and caring for you. And the longer you stay with it the better it understands you.

All included, even the future

Nvidia TK1 platform was chosen as a base for Center development. Creation of optimized algorithms and neural network compression let us achieve overcapacity exceeding needs for our current tasks. In future, we plan to use it for some new tasks and functions which we will create together with you and for you.

And you will get access to all of them once install Center updates.

100% free

What we use

Next steps

We’ve got plenty of ideas about what to do next, including extended open API, integration with IFTTT service, development and introduction of new connecting modules to ensure automated and simplified daily processes. You only need to connect them to the Center and take advantage of them!

We are head over heels about what we do and want to dedicate to this all our energy, skills and time. That’s not hard for us indeed. Because our business is our hobby!

Our products are unique for their technology, philosophy, ecosystem and the ease of use.

The entire R&D process has been financed by ourselves but it isn’t be enough to start production. That’s why we start a fundraising campaign on Indiegogo to cover production expenses.

There is no solution similar to Camuniti in the home security market, so let’s launch it together!

Risks

The development process is in full swing now. We have deployed a deep neural network on an embedded system. DNN recognizes objects in motion just like a human, so Center can understand what is happening in the frame.

Currently we are optimizing and compressing the network for better performance. Both hardware and design are almost ready, UI/UX is created and mobile apps programming is well underway.

Roadmap

Center

Camera

WiFi repeater

www.camuniti.com
story_txt:
Our system makes your home smart and secure

Smart home concept, environmental control, AI smart security system with fully analyzed video, outstanding WiFi coverage for your entire home. All of these is our Camuniti Center!
Easy and smart as never before!
What can be connected?

Compatibility
There are several companies in the market who produce ZigBee sensors and switchers of great quality and with advanced characteristics.
Support of these devices we will steer and provide in the first place:

Goals


The Future is here

Center is a very smart device. It is designed not just to record and notify of any event but to detect really important issues. A built-in neural network and artificial intelligence perform deep analysis of what is happening on video and detect a wide range of objects and their actions in the frame. Did your mother or a friend just come over? Center will notify you. Any stranger around? Center will also inform you and record everything.

Meet the App

Turn your iOS or Android device into a home remote control with our mobile App. Using any other device with browser access? Utilise our Web App.
New philosophy, new outlook.

Stay connected, be notified

Get all types of notifications about your home and video cameras records! From now on you won’t miss anything important neither in the house nor around it. We mean it! Nothing else but really important!

WiFi without dead zones

Supported by cameras and WiFi repeaters, Center helps delivering and repeating WiFi signal. Fast and reliable WiFi, a single network name with a single password and high speed internet in every corner of your home. It takes only a few clicks to make it work.

Center is the brain of our entire system. It analyzes data flows from cameras and sensors, and intelligently and accurately decides on event importance, it is also in control of switchers and WiFi network.
This is just a unique device.

Center not only detects motion in video but also can see and analyze like a human

Artificial intelligence and artificial brain, deep neural network, smart self-learning system - Center has it all!
Center performs a detailed analysis of what is happening on video, detecting up to 20 object types and tracking their actions in the frame. Center can recognize roads, buildings and the surroundings so you won’t be disturbed with incidents happening on the road. With Center you will not get notifications about trees moving with the wind, sunlight piercing through clouds, snow fall etc.
Center can be taught to detect faces of your family members or your friends and you will be properly notified if any of them appears in the frame. Or the opposite – you will not be, depending on the settings you choose.
Center is fully compatible with any IP cameras. No need to worry that your smartphone will not playback a recorded video – Center will transcode any flow from the camera and record it in a format suitable for iOS, Android or any web browser.

WiFi control and coverage

With Center you can control WiFi network. Just connect our cameras and they will be both monitoring and serving as WiFi replicators.
Need a better WiFi range or would like to use your own cameras? You can still connect our WiFi replicators.
It is so easy now to define a network name, to set a single password and to get a high speed internet even where it never existed before.

Smart home with ZigBee

Center is a powerful thing allowing you full and easy control of your home. To implement this, we used ZigBee protocol.
With Center you can control air quality, temperature, the opening of doors or windows, water or gas leaks and fire risks.
You can also operate air-conditioning, light, heating, curtains and roller blinds, locks, electrical appliances and much more.

Control via the cloud, store in the cloud

By default Center is always connected with the cloud. Whenever you are away from home, you will receive notifications, have full control of your home, review images from cameras and playback recorded videos via the cloud.
The cloud allows you stay in touch with your home! It is easy and does not require any setup. Center continuously tests channel traffic and performance therefore automatically adapts video quality before transferring to the cloud. It does not matter whether you have a broadband channel or just a mobile internet. As long as you have any type of internet connection, you will see every message coming from our system.
Choose yourself what exactly to be transferred to the Cloud. Any moment you can change country your data is stored in - choose from USA, Germany, United Kingdom or Singapore.

Design

Compact Center made of opaque scratch resistant plastic in minimalist design will integrate perfectly with your interior whether this is a shelving unit, equipment stand or a desk.
Our Center is so pretty you don’t want to hide it in the storage room or in the attic!

Under the hood
Creating our products, we pay attention to every detail. Despite the fact Center is as tiny as only possible, it contains inside a powerful 5-core processor, several WiFi and ZigBee antennas. And all this in attractive palm-size case made of anti-scratch plastic.





Minimalist design, best matrix and wonderful picture quality, powerful battery and built-in WiFi and ZigBee signal repeaters for better network coverage. Our camera is not just a camera.
Summing up in three words - impressive, comprehensive, easy.

Best colour picture even in darkness

Only best components and attention to every detail make any product best.
That’s why in our camera we use Panasonic νMaicovicon® matrix, which gives bright colourful picture even in darkness. In complete pitch-black camera will automatically switch to night mode and infrared backlight will be on.

When the camera is not just a camera

Our camera is able not only to record high quality video but also to replicate WiFi and ZigBee signals. Now it’s all easy - once you have a camera you have a guaranteed WiFi signal.
For convenience we equipped our camera with just one port - Ethernet, which is used both for charging and data transfer, in case you don’t want to use WiFi for data transfer.
If you have unexpected blackout at home, both cameras and Center will keep working thanks to the built-in battery.

Design

Nice to touch anti-scratch opaque plastic, neat square form, front glass panel - all is designed not just for good performance but also for interior embellishment. You can easily install camera wherever you want - on a bookshelf or onto a house wall - this flexibility will only add to the great impressions of our products.

Under the hood
Powerful processor and incredible matrix, night mode, both PoE and battery power supply - we didn’t miss any single detail!




You can connect extra WiFi repeaters and have a high-speed internet all over the house without additional setup. Neat implementation will integrate seamlessly with your interior.
Nothing else. Just WiFi.

I - Infrastructure

Finally no more extra effort to stop a distant camera from losing WiFi signal. Because in our system it won’t be trying to connect to the Center directly. Simply no need because there is always available WiFi signal supplied from a much closer camera or a WiFi repeater mounted on the house wall for high speed internet even in your backyard.
​
Super fresh concept

It is easy to add sensors and switchers, easy to join them into a group, easy to manage the group. No more complex systems which require rigid settings performed only by professionals.

Super groups

Home control and monitoring devices can be grouped the way you want. Any groups can be created - a room, a floor, garden, garage or overall perimeter of the house. Every sensor or switcher can be included into unlimited number of groups.

Super sharing

Share the entire home control, access to some specific group or just one particular sensor or switcher with your family in two clicks.

Video / WiFi

Video monitoring and WiFi control are now isolated groups so they are always within easy reach. Sophisticated is very simple now.




Our product is a perfect combination of video surveillance with home remote control and modern technologies, such as artificial intelligence and self-learning neural networks. Guaranteed WiFi coverage and easy network control makes our product even more versatile.
We produce a brand new and unique product!

When sophisticated is simple

With our product, your house can see, feel and analyze just like any human.
The Center artificial intelligence will be constantly learning and accumulating knowledge about your habits, your lifestyle, any events inside and outside your house, it will learn to recognize your family members and friends.
Camuniti is not just a video surveillance system or a smart home concept. It is rather a smart entity giving you comfort and caring for you. And the longer you stay with it the better it understands you.

All included, even the future

Nvidia TK1 platform was chosen as a base for Center development. Creation of optimized algorithms and neural network compression let us achieve overcapacity exceeding needs for our current tasks. In future, we plan to use it for some new tasks and functions which we will create together with you and for you.
And you will get access to all of them once install Center updates.

100% free


What we use


Next steps

We’ve got plenty of ideas about what to do next, including extended open API, integration with IFTTT service, development and introduction of new connecting modules to ensure automated and simplified daily processes. You only need to connect them to the Center and take advantage of them!
We are head over heels about what we do and want to dedicate to this all our energy, skills and time. That’s not hard for us indeed. Because our business is our hobby!

Our products are unique for their technology, philosophy, ecosystem and the ease of use.
The entire R&D process has been financed by ourselves but it isn’t be enough to start production. That’s why we start a fundraising campaign on Indiegogo to cover production expenses.
There is no solution similar to Camuniti in the home security market, so let’s launch it together!

Risks
The development process is in full swing now. We have deployed a deep neural network on an embedded system. DNN recognizes objects in motion just like a human, so Center can understand what is happening in the frame.
Currently we are optimizing and compressing the network for better performance. Both hardware and design are almost ready, UI/UX is created and mobile apps programming is well underway.

Roadmap


Center


Camera


WiFi repeater




www.camuniti.com

story:
Summary

As a blind person, mobile technology has vastly simplified my life. I can call a car, have groceries delivered or read documents at the tap of an icon. Yet there are so many small visual tasks that no single app can perform. Even with all of today's digital conveniences, I am amazed that finding a poorly-marked bus stop, mapping the buttons on a new stereo or catching my hiding cat are things which we can't say "you know, there's an app for that." Until now.

Perceptron is a subscription-based service that connects blind clients with paid sighted assistants by video for help in real-time. It works almost everywhere, whether through the browser or on one's smartphone platform of choice. All current competitors are eitherbuilt for a single platform and exclude many clients and assistants, or use technologies that are not currently available to consumers. Perceptron is a marketplace, and the best markets are open to as many participants as possible. By working almost everywhere, almost any blind person can turn to Perceptron for help, and any assistant wanting to offer it can do so from anywhere and from any device.

Perceptron is time-saving technology for blind people, by blind people. I often need a small amount of help to identify an object, find a building or perform some other visual task in a way that is more efficient and less stressful. As a software developer, I have the skills and insight to solve this. Nothing frustrates me more than putting off something simple that is impossible to do without sight. Not only have I not completed my task, but I have to think about it while remaining productive. Any Getting Things Done fan knows the peace of mind that comes from having all loops closed. Perceptron doesn't just solve one problem. Instead, it overcomes a whole range of challenges, letting me and others spend more time on those things that matter. It is something I've wanted to exist for years, and thanks to modern technology, the beginnings of a solution are now within my reach.

Perceptron is bootstrapped with a minimal budget, but in order to take it to the next level, I am seeking $10,000 in funding. The base platform is very complete, but donations will support development of native Android and iOS apps. They will also facilitate the transition from an innovative concept to a sustainable business.

[Note that Perceptron is a working title. It may change before launch, but if it does then I will announce the change and redirect the website. To paraphrase a famous quote, naming is one of the hardest problems in computer science. I think it is more important to build something worth naming before investing time naming it.]

My Story

It was another hot Austin day, with humidity high and temps in the triple digits. I'd stepped away from work to run a quick errand at the bank. If I couldn't finish in 15 minutes, I'd miss my return bus and have to wait another 45. I had a small problem, however. I couldn't find the bank.

I certainly had solutions, but they all took precious time. I could have asked someone on the street, but no one was around. I could have checked each likely building, but then I'd miss my bus. In a world where anyone could trade a little money for convenience, I found myself thinking, why couldn't I just pay someone for a few minutes of help so I could run my errand and get back to work?

The idea was ridiculous ten years ago. Staffing a call center would have been prohibitively expensive. The internet was a thing you used at home or in a coffee shop, and then only on your desktop or laptop. Smartphones were gadgets busy executives used to quickly respond to emails between moments in the office.

Many of us now take all of those things for granted. Mobile internet speeds in most major cities are more than adequate for streaming video. Web applications simplify outsourcing work, and marketplace platforms manage payouts seamlessly. While smart glasses aren't yet readily available, it is only a matter of time before they are. The smartphone on my belt is more powerful than the computer I had at home on that long-ago summer day, with a highly-accurate GPS receiver and an HD video camera.

Perceptron is a big idea that exists thanks to many technologies from the intervening decade. I am excited to be building something worthy of my once-dismissed notion, and look forward to the impact it will have on my life and those of others.

Who am I?

I've been a software developer for over two decades, ever since the day I wrote a quiz app about cats for the Apple IIe. More recently, I've developed various websites and apps, and have seven years of experience working with Android. Some of my previous projects include:

  • One of the first Android screen readers
  • A media content delivery app for a major access technology company
  • Open-source outdoor navigation software
  •  A word processor for a major notetaker

What's Done

Perceptron is currently a web-based application that transmits video between two parties. It accepts tasks from clients, publishes those tasks to assistants, marks them as complete, and sends status notifications, all in real-time. The web app also serves as the back-end for future native mobile apps, which only need to relay video and call into the back-end. As such, most of the heavy lifting is already done. What remains is polishing and packaging technology that already exists, making it more intuitive and a joy to work with.

I've partially developed an Android app to prove out my design. It currently submits tasks and sends video. It also offers integrations not possible on the web, such as using the device's flashlight to improve visibility. Future versions will support voice commands for hands-free operation, or for use on devices without convenient controls.

The Android app is developed in React Native, using native modules for video chat and device integration. All third-party libraries are available for both Android and iOS, and I anticipate an iOS port to primarily involve changing the interface to comply with Apple's guidelines.

How Your Donation Will Help

While technically solid, the core experience still needs work. Because I myself am blind, Perceptron's visual design requires improvement to simplify the work of sighted assistants. Hiring a designer would be incredibly beneficial. I also need to integrate with a back-end payment processor. Perceptron needs time to grow into a sustainable business, and donations will give me the breathing room to transition from an interesting prototype to a successful product.

Many blind users prefer iOS over Android. While Android app development is possible on any mainstream operating system, iOS requires OS X, and its device emulator is inaccessible. As such, I'll need to acquire the necessary hardware and Apple memberships to publish an iOS app. This includes a Mac Mini, as well as an iPad Mini for device-based testing.

Finally, I am committed to running the business in a responsible manner. It is unacceptable to open my doors without a solid legal entity. Further, I need to improve my terms of service as they relate to Perceptron's marketplace aspects. Some funds will be designated for establishing a Limited Liability Company, as well as for purchasing or drafting better legal documents.

Risks & Challenges

Perceptron is not the first app to connect blind clients with sighted assistants. We hear about them every few months or so, and after a handful of articles in the popular press and a few convention appearances, some of those companies disappear. My biggest challenge is being taken seriously when many competitors struggle to deliver. Further, those who are successful don't push this concept to its fullest. It can be difficult believing in an idea when others' implementations of that idea don't go as far as we think they can and should. But I and Perceptron are uniquely positioned to address this.

By Blind People, for Blind People

Many efforts fail because they're great ideas that are executed poorly. Often imagined by a sighted person, that individual must then seek out blind users to serve as test subjects, or in an advisory capacity with no real input to the product's direction or validity.

The importance of blind leadership in access technology cannot be understated. As a blind person, I think this is a great and useful idea, and have spoken with other blind people who agree. By heading the development myself, instead of requiring validation and remediation to reach a basic level of functionality, I can guarantee that my apps will be a joy to use right from the start. Issues will certainly exist, but they won't be related to accessibility. We don't need more clunky products, bad ideas or companies of mostly sighted people building our future products. Instead, let's empower blind users and developers, giving them the lead.

Medical Thinking Hurts Everyone

Further, many developers of products like these believe that assistants must be trained and vetted, and that the apps themselves require extensive testing to be declared "safe." I don't need a certified professional to tell me the can I'm holding is oven cleaner, and I'm fully capable of choosing whether I can accept the risk of inaccurate assistance. I certainly wouldn't use Perceptron to cross a street or drive a car, but the line between acceptable and unacceptable risk is different for each person. It isn't someone else's to decide for me.

On top of that, the infrastructure needed to interview and vet professional assistants costs money and requires time, driving up development costs and decreasing revenue. Time wasted making inaccurate decisions  for the blind community is time not spent empowering us with good products. By trusting blind people to make sensible decisions, I can direct my efforts toward building a good platform that survives where others flounder. The last thing we need is another company built on a medical model of disability.

Sustainability = Survival

Other efforts are volunteer or donation-driven. A volunteer-based project may be free, but it is not without cost. Ventures must perpetually seek out funding to keep the lights on, development to enhance their platforms, and volunteers to assist blind clients. This is a triple-edged sword and is hardly sustainable. Without developer effort, the platform will stagnate. Without assistants, clients won't get the help they need. Without funds, everyone is putting in effort between other obligations and struggles to be fully committed to making the platform as good as it can be.

I'm building Perceptron to be a sustainable, subscription-oriented business from the start, one that does not perpetually seeking volunteers for its advancement. I pay for grocery shopping, transportation and food delivery because the companies providing those services offer improved experiences, continuing in part through my purchases. Similarly, I want to pay for a good, regularly-developed platform where I can get the help I need when I need it. I also want to know that the platform won't stagnate, and will continue growing in ways that challenge this industry to think along new lines and to create new products.

Other Challenges

I have never written an iOS app. Most companies in this position immediately hire outside developers, as the differences between these platforms are challenging for app developers familiar with only one to address.

However, in Facebook and other high-profile companies have recently built a platform called React Native for creating native mobile apps on Android and iOS. In describing an early experience with React Native, Facebook claims to have reused around 85% of its code when porting an iOS React Native app to Android. Contrast that with the old way of doing things, where almost no code works on multiple platforms and each app is entirely separate. Many other companies report similar experiences. One common theme is that teams historically separated by platform can work together, collaborating on the same codebase and becoming more efficient. React Native was also recently backed by Microsoft with its addition of Universal Windows to the list of supported platforms.

While developing my Android prototype, I quickly brought my video chat code from the web to Android in a half hour, with only a few lines of code changed. Similarly, implementing the capability to log in and submit tasks was straight-forward, and the only code specific to Android is the layout for the user interface. At this time I have no reason to think that an iOS port will be any more involved than complying with Apple's interface guidelines, and while there will almost certainly be unanticipated challenges, fixing an app that mostly works is a much easier prospect than building something from scratch on an unfamiliar platform in an unfamiliar language with a minimal budget. I don't expect it to be easy, but the cost of developing an iOS app from scratch would be several times that of this entire campaign, and would change Perceptron's iOS success from a realistic possibility to an impossible pipe dream.

Other Ways To Help

Can't donate? That's OK. Perceptron won't succeed with money alone, and every bit of help is appreciated.

Spread the word on social media. Tweet about my campaign or share it with your Facebook friends. If you have a blog or podcast, consider mentioning Perceptron in a post or episode.

Also, Perceptron won't succeed without sighted assistants. If you're looking to earn a bit of cash, consider signing up. I'll be opening early access soon, and we'll need assistants to kick the tires and ensure that everything works.

React Native was also recently backed by Microsoft with its addition of Universal Windows to the list of supported platforms.While developing my Android prototype, I quickly brought my video chat code from the web to Android in a half hour, with only a few lines of code changed. At this time I have no reason to think that an iOS port will be any more involved than complying with Apple's interface guidelines, and while there will almost certainly be unanticipated challenges, fixing an app that mostly works is a much easier prospect than building something from scratch on an unfamiliar platform in an unfamiliar language with a minimal budget. I don't expect it to be easy, but the cost of developing an iOS app from scratch would be several times that of this entire campaign, and would change Perceptron's iOS success from a realistic possibility to an impossible pipe dream.Other Ways To HelpCan't donate? That's OK. Perceptron won't succeed with money alone, and every bit of help is appreciated.Spread the word on social media. Tweet about my campaign or share it with your Facebook friends. If you have a blog or podcast, consider mentioning Perceptron in a post or episode.Also, Perceptron won't succeed without sighted assistants. If you're looking to earn a bit of cash, consider signing up. I'll be opening early access soon, and we'll need assistants to kick the tires and ensure that everything works.

story:
Hi,

We are RedZ Technologies and today we are proud to present our newest creation -  a 3D Laser Scanner that is able to scan physical objects with a resolution of up to 0.1 mm.

The body of the scanner is made of anodized aircraft aluminum and has built in two 5MP camera modules ( OV5640 ) it also has four LED lights, to illuminate the object while scanning it.

On the top you will find two riffles  with color LED embedded underneath, they will be used to display scanner statuses by changing their color.

On the back you will find a micro USB port, as well as a micro SD card slot.

The rotating turret on top of the scanner will contain a laser with a line generating objective lens. The main PCB has two spring-loaded pins, which are used to pass power to the turret.


3D model of the scanner itself.


Turntable that connects to 3D scanner via Bluetooth




How it works:

Scanner swipes a laser line along a physical object. Line adjusts, according to the shape of the object and is detected by scanner's two cameras. By setting position of the cameras and laser turret, built in Free-scale iMX6 processor will able to build an accurate point cloud and will transfer it via USB or WiFi to a PC, MAC, or mobile device.

Next steps include the user to either rotate the object by hand or use the Bluetooth turntable to scan the object from a different angles.

Once the object is scanned, point clouds are combined and our software reconstructs a full 3D mesh.


Sample scans:

Angel sculpture, 50 mm in height, scanned from 5 sides.

Dental impression castings, scanned from 4 sides, at a 45 degree angle.

Larger sculpture, 350mm in length, scanned from 5 sides.

"Little Mermaid" sculpture, 40mm in height, scanned from 4 sides.
You can see the artifacts caused by the reflective surface.



Photos of the physical prototype:

In the photo below you can see the stepper motor gear, that turns the Scanner. You can also see spring-loaded pins that power the laser.


Dimensional drawing of the scanner. (Dimensions 140x70x36 mm)


What have we done so far:

1. Aluminum housing is fully designed
and a physical prototype proves its work-ability.

2. First working PCB is made and will be updated before sending it to customer.

3. Firmware that analyzes images from the cameras, detects the laser line and calculates a point cloud accordingly is made and working.

4. Command-line version of the software fusing the point clouds that turns into a mesh using the Poisson algorithm , cut off the unneeded parts and generates a seamless mosaic texture.

What need to be done in the future:

1. In order for the aluminum housing to be reasonably priced, it needs to be manufactured by injection molding process in Asia, which requires steel molds and other tooling.

2. We plan to mane one more iteration of the PCB, before considering it finished and ready for mass production.

3. We also need to create a GUI ( graphical user interface ) for our software and to make it available for multiple platforms.


Our team:

Dmitrijs Drobenkovs ( Mechanical Engineer, co-founder )
and Raivis Lapkasis (Project Manager, co-founder )


Thank you for your support!

story:
We all know operating phone while driving can be a hassle. The more you do it, the more dangerous and frustrating it becomes. Our vision has always been to create a phone cradle that is so convenient in use to minimize distraction from phone handling. One so effortless the device itself disappears into the experience. And so secured that you would never be distracted by picking up a fallen phone.

With Boltron, that vision is now a reality. Boltron combines driver, car, and phone into one entity, bonding each part to create the ultimate driving experience.

     Even on the BUMPIEST ROAD

Boltron was designed to hold your phone safely in all kinds of road condition. The semi-enclosed frame together with the spring back base allows the best stability to shore up your Phone as you push through your daily commute. 

Experiencing the blazing fast charging speed with the newest Qi fast charge technology. Mount your phone on for hassle-free, wireless charging on the go. Boltron powers up your mobile device immediately. 

 

⚡Fine-tuned for iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone 8 to safely provide up to 7.5W 
⚡Designed to provide Samsung wireless-charging phones up to 9W
⚡Qi-certified for full functionality with all Qi-enabled devices up to 10W

Please Note: 10W / 7.5W fast-charging can ONLY be supported with a QC 2.0 / QC 3.0 adapter and a 2A USB Cable.

 

Boltron's improved transmitter coil in the charging base generates a wider electromagnetic field that able to deliver electrons through a thicker barrier then powering the battery. 

You may be able to recall plenty of times that you've been inconvenienced by not having your phone. It's a frustrating fact that leaving it behind can be costly.

Avoid Dangerous Consequences (real cases):
⚡ Phone explosion caused by exposure to direct sunlight in the summer!
⚡ Miss out important emergency calls (boss/clients/hospital).
⚡ Catching a flight, but left the phone in the car. Yup, flight without it. 

Let's see what others experience:
⚡ Battery explosion (Reddit)
⚡ Frostbite 
⚡ Explosion

 

Boltron alerts you when your phone is left behind. The built-in sound reminder triggers on immediately after the vehicle is turned off. This is the perfect tool to remind you not to forget an important device for everyday life, and maybe save your car from burning.

 

 

 

Street Review

 

How to Choose your Pledge & Cradle Type

 

  • There are two types of Boltron in the pledges, one comes with wireless charging module, one doesn't ($29). You will need to decide whether you need the charging function or not. 
  • Your preference of cradle arm will be asked in the final survey. We provide 4 different cradles (iPhone 8, 8 Plus, X, and Adjustable) to fit your phone perfectly.
  • For any phone case user, please select the adjustable cradle in the final survey.  
  • Please note the acceptable phone size for adjustable cradle has listed above. For example, iPhone 5 is not supported. 

 

 

Get Your Old Phone(s) Charge Wirelessly

  • Click through to add this assistive receiver to your pledge.

4 mounting options are available. 
⚡ Air vent clip
⚡ Adhesive pad with 3M tape
⚡ CD-slot arches base
⚡ Suction cup

You could select 2 out of 4 from above mounting options, your preference will be asked in the survey.

Adjust the angle of Boltron to your most comfortable position and unlock the iPhone X just at a glance.

Please Note: Adhesive pad with 3M tape is not included in the video, but we do offer 4 options in total. 

Please Note:  

  • Advance laser etching printing words will be asked in the final survey.

Boltron is very gentle in taking care of your phone. 

  • Anti-Scratch *
  • The form of the stainless steel frame/bracket fits snugly over the curves of your device without adding bulk. A silky, soft-touch finish of the silicone on the inside helps protect your phone from scratch.
  • Low Temperature *  
  • Traditional Qi wireless chargers are not very efficient and generate a lot of heat which causes the iPhone to reduce or stop charging completely to lower operating temperature. But Boltron will never get your phone overheated, not even close to being.
  • Interference-Free 
  • Traditional Qi wireless chargers have fluctuating electromagnetic frequencies that may interfere with iPhone functions like Touch & FaceID. Boltron uses a fixed frequency designated by Apple that does not interfere with Touch or Face ID.
  • Intelligent Reliable Protection System  
  • Overcurrent, Overvoltage, Short Circuit, and Overheated Protection.
  • Foreign Object Detection -- (FOD) is a safety mechanism which automatically interrupts power delivery if there is interference caused by a foreign object.
 
 
 

If you're a member of the press looking for info or media assets, please download our Media & Press kit here, or contact us at hi@boltron.cc.

  • Standard -- International Qi Standard 
  • Input -- 9.0V 2A / 5.0V 2A 
  • Output -- 10W / 7.5W / 5W 
  • Efficiency -- Up to 85% 
  • Weight -- 90g / 3.1oz / 0.2lb 
  • Enclosure -- Aluminum & ABS 
  • Operating temperature 0℃ ~ 40℃ 
  • Operating humidity：10% ~80% (No steam condensation)
  • Dimension (iPhone 8) --- 111 x 90 x 30 mm 
  • Dimension (iPhone 8 Plus) --- 116 x 100 x 30 mm
  • Dimension (iPhone X) --- 113 x 93 x 30 mm
  • Dimension (Adjustable Cradle) --- 119±5 x 102±10x 39 mm    
  • CEO / Roberto Iten / Industrial Designer
  • Roberto is the man behind Boltron's creation. He believes that most of the products can be enhanced and totally reach a higher level, just like he did for the Boltron. He has a rich experience with the product designing work. Especially for tech products, he always has the angle on making the product stylish without sacrificing any usability.
  • Co-Founder / Anthony Maguire / Electronic Engineer
  • Anthony is Roberto's best friend. They attended the same high school and university. Anthony is the man behind Boltron's blazing fast charging experience.

In short, attach and bonding different things together is what makes us progressive and collaborative, to build a strongly bonded connection in things, and to integrate powers/resources in achieving a higher efficiency. We found the way to build up a perfect balance in bonding man, phone, and car all into one like a force of "trinity". Instead of letting all these factors interfere with each other, Boltron is more creating a complementarity among the factors and to make the driving experience improved.

So, we set out to design the world's first in-car phone cradle that redefines the category and better than anything else available: it's a driving companion—a cradle specifically designed to accompany on-the-go people, whether they are commuting around the block or around the state.

 

Risks and challenges

This project has already come a long way after several iterations of the product development. We've finalized our designs and there shouldn't be much to worry about toward the final fulfillment.

In any possible, certification might have a chance to slow us down a bit as the electronic hardware must be tested and approved by various independent agencies. We've gotten a head start on the process of FCC and CE certification. We’ll optimize our products in compliance with the certification and will complete it ASAP.

story:
Tired of battery wearing down while driving, even while charging because you are using Bluetooth, maps, and/or music?

 

Tired of having to wait for your phone to charge, when your only option is thru the usb socket of your notebook?

 

We would like to introduce F.A.S.T charging Adapter and Cable with a simple design and ease of use.

F.A.S.T. is the abbreviation of 'Faster, Amplified, Speedy, and Time-saving'. With the patented technology, it maximizes the output up to 1.6Amp from a standard USB port resulting in 3 times faster charging speed than conventional USB charging cables.

 

 

Tired of slow charging while using your phone for navigation and music? Just plug in the simple and small FAST adapter while using ANY cable, to ensure fast charging and not to lose battery while driving.

 

Traveling requires lots of battery usage for your phone or any devices, while charging is limited. Especially while you are on the plane, simply attach the FAST adapter on the usb charging station, use ANY cable, and charge your phone or any devices fully before landing.

 

Don’t worry about the bulky wall adapters, or waste time going through your cables to find a fast charging cable. Just carry the FAST adapter around. So small and simple, it will not take up much space. Just carry it around in your pocket, and always have fast charging.

 

Distinct Color

Designed to be easily distinguished amongst many cables, don’t spend time testing and going through your cables to check which is a fast charging cable.

 

Durability Design

Made of thick PVC material for a longer lifetime.

 

Universal Compatibility

Works great with any Micro USB charged phones, tablets, and other devices.

 

AMPTEC USB FAST Charging Adapter

 

AMPTEC USB FAST Charging Cable

 

Reward Fulfillment

To ensure timely reward delivery and launch online sales after a successful Indiegogo campaign, we are partnering with OneStopGadget which is a professional IT reseller and experienced fulfillment service provider located in California USA.

 

We're a start-up with a talented and trusted R&D, manufacturing, and marketing team. We have had many experiences with the version 1.0 of FAST charging USB cable in the past, so we know how to handle timelines and how to prevent delays from happening, especially from production. Although there are some challenges that we may not fully control that are common to any manufacturers, we've been thriving to reduce risks by partnering with core component suppliers and e-commerce fulfillment service providers for years, and we promise to be transparent and always keep our supporters updated with information on any issues that may arrive, and of course, how we will or have handled it.

You can count on our team to overcome any challenges that we may face, as we are dedicated and are professional in our areas.

story:
A message in a bottle to the future.

 

Ezl is a great little product, which unfortunately has been unable to gain traction amongst the Indiegogo community this time. I invite you to follow its story, and maybe try one for yourself, by visiting myplinth.co.uk.

Sadly, I fear the reason that it hasn’t been funded is not so much a judgement on its design, as a reflection that successful crowdfunding seems now to be the domain of those who can afford paid social media campaigns, expensive referral agencies, influencers and others who make their living by promoting crowdfunding campaigns.

I cannot afford these - which is why I came to the community to help gather the investment which my business needs in order to grow.

I invite you to seek out great design wherever you can find it - and often you may need to dig deep to cut through the sheer volume of noise created by those who already have the funds to afford great marketing of their ideas.

Thank you for your interest in Ezl.

John Bull

 

HOLD IT.  BETTER.


With the press of a single button Ezl gives you the security of a comfortable phone grip or the practicality of a phone stand, wherever and whenever you need it.

When you don't... forget it - you won't notice Ezl on the back of your phone.

_________

EZL is designed so you can easily reach all of your screen when using your phone and is perfect for taking selfies. You will never drop your phone again!

 

 

 

SEE IT.   BETTER.

Perfect if you are working and need to keep an eye on your messages or watching videos.

Non-slip rubber feet keep your phone secure so you can sit back and relax knowing its secure.

_____________

Easy to deploy slide out stand with 3 adjustable angles and portrait mode. Just press the button and slide to your desired angle.

 

 

CHARGE IT. BETTER.

No metals, no magnets, no disassembly.

Just put it down.

 

 

 

LESS.   IS MORE.

Its taken over a year of development to design out every unnecessary molecule, leaving you with a precision reliable device which weighs only 6g!

 

Once you are done using your Ezl just push it flat. It's that simple. Ezl will never get in your way when not in use, and will never catch on your pockets.

 

 

 

Protection for your phone.

For some applications, plastic performs better than metal. Tiny metal features can weaken over time and just aren't made to stand up to rigorous daily use - that's why we have seen so many "thinnest" phone grips and stands go wrong before.

Ezl's rubber feet protrude 0.3mm - but it's enough to give non-slip protection to the back of your phone. 

Now it won't slip off the car bonnet!

 

 

 

 

John has been making and selling his designs since 2014 (have a look for Plinth - the world's best tablet stand). Everything he makes is guaranteed for life.

 

 

He has happy customers. Ask them.


 

 

 

 

 

COLOURS FOR YOUR PHONE

From metallic denim blue to a stunning pearlescent purple, Ezl comes in a range of carefully selected colours to complement most phone case designs.

Compatibility.

Ezl is small enough to fit on any smartphone from iPhone4 onwards, and will stick to most surfaces except silicone rubber (test your surface with ordinary sticky tape).

It can be safely removed when you want to move it to another phone or case - replacement adhesive membranes are available on our web shop.

 

Whats in the box?

Ezl comes in a sleek and stylish box complete with everything you need to get your stand set up. Step by step instructions are included along with an alcohol wipe to clean your phone or case before attaching your stand.

 

Why we need your help.

Ezl is already in production which is great news for you. Enter your pledge and rest easy knowing your awesome new stand will be making its way to you soon.

However, Ezl is far from where we would like it to be. With your help we aim to take Ezl to the next level...

Ezl’s hidden secret

Ezl isn’t just two devices.. it’s three. Ezl has been meticulously designed with the future in mind, so includes hidden features which will allow it to dock to a range of accessories - wireless charging desk stands, car mounts, bike mounts, wall mounts and more.

Development is well underway, with working prototypes promising exciting features. But getting things right takes time, and we need help bringing these and other designs to life.

Invest in our journey, and enjoy your Ezl as it gets better and better.

 

TIMELINE

It has taken a long time to get this right!

 

 

A note from the creator. 

 

 

After working as a navigator with the British Navy for many years I left the sea to follow my passion for design. I studied for my Industrial Design degree at university in London back in 1986 and haven’t looked back since. Since then I successfully managed my own consulting company designing and creating amazing products, from children’s nursery equipment, sports gear, laboratory test apparatus to Industrial safety equipment. My team won a prestigious Millennium product design award. In 2003 I moved to my current home in Somerset where I use my skills in design to create innovative products for my favourite market – mobile technology. In 2016 I appeared on Dragons Den for my first stand design – Plinth. Following the show I was offered investment by a well-known entrepreneur and investor in tech products, and Plinth has gone from strength to strength ever since.  I have put my years of experience in to designing the best possible products for you to help you get the most out of your mobile. Now I have been able to bring you an even better stand and grip – Ezl.
story_txt:
A message in a bottle to the future.
 
Ezl is a great little product, which unfortunately has been unable to gain traction amongst the Indiegogo community this time. I invite you to follow its story, and maybe try one for yourself, by visiting myplinth.co.uk.
Sadly, I fear the reason that it hasn’t been funded is not so much a judgement on its design, as a reflection that successful crowdfunding seems now to be the domain of those who can afford paid social media campaigns, expensive referral agencies, influencers and others who make their living by promoting crowdfunding campaigns.
I cannot afford these - which is why I came to the community to help gather the investment which my business needs in order to grow.
I invite you to seek out great design wherever you can find it - and often you may need to dig deep to cut through the sheer volume of noise created by those who already have the funds to afford great marketing of their ideas.
Thank you for your interest in Ezl.
John Bull
 
HOLD IT.  BETTER.
With the press of a single button Ezl gives you the security of a comfortable phone grip or the practicality of a phone stand, wherever and whenever you need it.
When you don't... forget it - you won't notice Ezl on the back of your phone.
_________
EZL is designed so you can easily reach all of your screen when using your phone and is perfect for taking selfies. You will never drop your phone again!

 


 
 
SEE IT.   BETTER.
Perfect if you are working and need to keep an eye on your messages or watching videos.
Non-slip rubber feet keep your phone secure so you can sit back and relax knowing its secure.
_____________
Easy to deploy slide out stand with 3 adjustable angles and portrait mode. Just press the button and slide to your desired angle.


 
 
CHARGE IT. BETTER.
No metals, no magnets, no disassembly.
Just put it down.
 

 
 
LESS.   IS MORE.

Its taken over a year of development to design out every unnecessary molecule, leaving you with a precision reliable device which weighs only 6g!
 
Once you are done using your Ezl just push it flat. It's that simple. Ezl will never get in your way when not in use, and will never catch on your pockets.
 

 
 
Protection for your phone.
For some applications, plastic performs better than metal. Tiny metal features can weaken over time and just aren't made to stand up to rigorous daily use - that's why we have seen so many "thinnest" phone grips and stands go wrong before.
Ezl's rubber feet protrude 0.3mm - but it's enough to give non-slip protection to the back of your phone. 
Now it won't slip off the car bonnet!

 
 
 
 
John has been making and selling his designs since 2014 (have a look for Plinth - the world's best tablet stand). Everything he makes is guaranteed for life.
 

 
He has happy customers. Ask them.


 


 

 
 
 
COLOURS FOR YOUR PHONE
From metallic denim blue to a stunning pearlescent purple, Ezl comes in a range of carefully selected colours to complement most phone case designs.

Compatibility.
Ezl is small enough to fit on any smartphone from iPhone4 onwards, and will stick to most surfaces except silicone rubber (test your surface with ordinary sticky tape).
It can be safely removed when you want to move it to another phone or case - replacement adhesive membranes are available on our web shop.
 
Whats in the box?
Ezl comes in a sleek and stylish box complete with everything you need to get your stand set up. Step by step instructions are included along with an alcohol wipe to clean your phone or case before attaching your stand.


 
Why we need your help.
Ezl is already in production which is great news for you. Enter your pledge and rest easy knowing your awesome new stand will be making its way to you soon.
However, Ezl is far from where we would like it to be. With your help we aim to take Ezl to the next level...
Ezl’s hidden secret
Ezl isn’t just two devices.. it’s three. Ezl has been meticulously designed with the future in mind, so includes hidden features which will allow it to dock to a range of accessories - wireless charging desk stands, car mounts, bike mounts, wall mounts and more.
Development is well underway, with working prototypes promising exciting features. But getting things right takes time, and we need help bringing these and other designs to life.
Invest in our journey, and enjoy your Ezl as it gets better and better.

 
TIMELINE
It has taken a long time to get this right!

 
 
A note from the creator. 
   
After working as a navigator with the British Navy for many years I left the sea to follow my passion for design. I studied for my Industrial Design degree at university in London back in 1986 and haven’t looked back since. Since then I successfully managed my own consulting company designing and creating amazing products, from children’s nursery equipment, sports gear, laboratory test apparatus to Industrial safety equipment. My team won a prestigious Millennium product design award. In 2003 I moved to my current home in Somerset where I use my skills in design to create innovative products for my favourite market – mobile technology. In 2016 I appeared on Dragons Den for my first stand design – Plinth. Following the show I was offered investment by a well-known entrepreneur and investor in tech products, and Plinth has gone from strength to strength ever since.  I have put my years of experience in to designing the best possible products for you to help you get the most out of your mobile. Now I have been able to bring you an even better stand and grip – Ezl.

story:
SmartCharge uses power-sensing technology to align the charge-receiving coils of your phone with the induction coils of the wireless charger. This maximizes the speed and power of the charge, and when combined with Qi technology, makes it the fastest in the world for your car. Plus, the entire process is hands-free, making your journey safer.

 

Fastest, Smartest Charging for Any Phone 

Based on our exclusive power-detection algorithm, SmartCharge aligns the absolute center of both charging locations with 100% accuracy, no matter the phone type. You can put a Samsung in the charger and immediately replace it with an iPhone, and the SmartCharge finds the perfect center every time. Because of its power-delivery input, the charger refuels your phone with a powerful 15W, but gives you the ultimate convenience of wireless with maximum compatibility. 

 

 

Power Delivery Input and 15 Watt Wireless Output

It refuels your phone at similar speed as the fastest wired charging, but with the ultimate convenience of wireless and maximum compatibility.

 

Safe Journey with One-Hand Operation and a Stable Hold 

Make hands-free calls and navigate knowing that SmartCharge is securely holding your phone with its auto-clasp technology. Safety is paramount with SmartCharge with the anti-shake stabilizer, overheat protection, and 3-way installation that lets you place your phone in the optimal viewing position. The Qi wireless technology means you don’t have to plug in your phone everytime you get in the car; you just drop your phone on the charger and it starts charging at lightning speed.  When you arrive, the one-touch release makes it fast and simple to grab your phone and go.  

 

Flexible Telescopic Arm

The telescopic arm extends from 2.75” to 4.5” and pivots on 225 degree arc for a variety of optimal viewing positions. The auto-clamping borders on the charging pd hold most every phone from 3" to 6.5".

 

Three Choices for Easy Installation 

 

Dashboard Installation

Use the included mount to install on your dashboard so that you can pivot the phone in the optimal viewing position. Strong suction cup combined with adhesive means your phone charger stays put. When you want to move it, there’s a release tab to make it easier.   

 

Windshield Installation 

Installing on your windshield is just as easy as your dashboard with the telescoping arm that allows you to pull your phone closer to you for easier viewing of maps and GPS.  The sturdy adhesive and suction cup ensure it stays exactly where you put it.  

 

 

Air Vent Installation 

The easiest installation is right on your air vent, and the stabilizing tab keeps it from bouncing and falling. Because it pivots, you can install it on vertical or horizontal air vents and viewing will be perfect every time.  

 

    Technical Specs

     

    Compatibility

    All phones that support 5W, 7.5W, 10W or 15W wireless charging

     

    Timeline

     

    Perks

     

    What’s in the Box

     

    Our Story

    HTC was founded a quarter-century ago, and since then has consistently brought brilliance to life through leading innovations in smart mobile device and experience design. Beginning with a vision to put a personal computer in the palm of our customers' hands, HTC has led the way in the evolution from palm PC to smartphone. 

    The Pursuit of Brilliance is at the heart of everything we do, inspiring best-in-class design and game-changing mobile experiences for consumers around the world. At HTC, the Pursuit of Brilliance is the impulse to create, to venture into the unknown with an unwavering dedication to bring innovative design to life. It pushes us everyday to re-imagine new ways to connect the world, our consumers, and their pursuits in ways never before thought possible. 

     

    Warranty

    HTC warranties this product to be free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of one (1) year from the original date of purchase. For full details on our warranty, visit https://www.htc.com/us/

It pushes us everyday to re-imagine new ways to connect the world, our consumers, and their pursuits in ways never before thought possible.

story:
Short Summary

Hi My name is Raj Chanda and I’ve been a banker for 17 years. After I have been made redundant which was recently I have decided to setup my own business. The idea for a new telephone network came across when I had a poor experience with a telephone provider transferring my number across. It took them 3 months and they had no clue what was going on. The new telephone system I plan on designing and setting up will allow people from all over the world to communicate with each other without the need for telephone numbers. This will solve most of the problems in the communication industry. Your help will allow a new era to come about and disturb the major players in the communication industry. Your assistance will give us a head start to design new technology and phones to allow this communication to happen. I thank you all for coming onboard and with me on this journey.

 

What We Need & What You Get

It’s not a lot to ask but we are looking at 500k GBP to get started. This will help 2 year office rental. Some staff, research and development and to bring about a prototype of the new network will be trying to build. We will need to then patent the technology and build prototype servers to handle the communication data around the world. I will then require fees for communication license in the respected countries. To help with the funding I have some perks, please feel free to purchase any perks to get us started.

 

 

The Impact

To establish a new way of communicating from one side of the world to another without phone numbers. We will use a different system to ID a person, in turn our system will be like having speed dial on your phone to whomever and wherever with no restriction to countries, therefore reducing lag on current video calls and delivering the best HD calls wherever you are. No more excessive bills or searching for internet signal. No more worries if you’re in a remote area or not. We will be implementing new technology that will allow us to connect from a village in the middle of nowhere without the conventional method of wiring your house to your road.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Licensing in certain countries may be a issue however were willing to go into dialogue with certain countries over this. Product development is another we have a few manufacturers and highly qualified engineers ready and on standby. Once this funding is complete. The development of new phones with new tech will be looked into.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I cannot stress how much we will appreciate your help by spreading the word out there for us. If you cannot contribute financially you can help by spreading the news using word of mouth, social media posts, nudges or making it viral for us on social media platforms. We will be grateful for any assistance from any angle. Don’t forget you can use Indiegogo’s share tools or if you have any other methods feel free to use them.

 

Before and After

 

CURRENT TELECOMMUNICATION SYSTEM

In Laymen's terms, telecommunication is made through radio frequency transmissions or via underground/overhead wiring, including fibre optics.

 

PROBLEMS WITH THIS TELECOMMUNICATION SYSTEM

Lots of issues with lag, poor quality communication, no network coverage, poor internet connections, network to network jumping costs are too high for end users, lots of radiations. No improvements are made to current technology.

 

 

THE NEXT GENERATION IN TELECOMMUNICATION NETWORK

Although each little step in telecommunications is forward, but this step is too little and at the expense of the end user.

Our vision is to bring tomorrows technology today.

We want to create the planets first telephone network with global reach, with the aid of semi - artificial intelligence (AI)

We want you, the Bio - Form to link up to this one system offering you endless possibilities in your professional, social and personal life with ease, security and complete safety.

Imagine a world where not only making calls, information access and GPS is offered, but also understanding dangerous and critical situations, auto emergency calls, discreet telecommunication aids with minimum radiation. Also, able to generate its own mini - sub network in absolute remote areas of the world on auto in order to connect to the main mother network.

 

BENEFITS 

A truly global telecommunication system run by one company with the latest AI technology, enhancing and superseding all other forms of telecommunications.

Able to generate its own mini Wi-Fi hub (umbilical connection) to the main mother network, there by sustaining the status quo. 

Able to assist in any difficult or critical situations with auto - dialling to any emergency service.

Access to unlimited and secure data 24/7 with unique bio - metric codes. 

No need for mobile phones - expense, but instead a small and discreet communicator giving you access via speech recognition and bio - metric code

 

Please note all logos and material are trademark of Rasthaa Tele-Net Ltd, company house registration number: 11462525, UK,

I would like to thank everyone for their support.

Regards

Raj Chanda and Harminder Bansal

CEO and Co Founder of Rasthaa Tele-Net Ltd

story:
Grand Prize Winners!!

Although, we did not reach our goal, Motorola has chosen us as one of the Grand Prize Winners of their "Transform your Smartphone Challenge." 

We now meet with Motorola at their HQ in Chicago to discuss more about bringing Linc to everyone!! Stay Tuned!

 

Proud to be certified by Arrow Electronics!

Arrow Electronics, a global provider of products, services and solutions to industrial and commercial users of electronic components and enterprise computing solutions, has reviewed this campaign and verified that the design is ready for manufacturing. In partnership with Indiegogo, the Arrow Certification program provides campaigners with design and engineering tools to create their vision, discounted materials to keep costs down and mentorship from Arrow’s engineers to address problems or setbacks before they happen. 
Arrow Certification is a seal of approval from experts in engineering.

Linc wins MotoMod™ challenge

We are excited to announce that our Linc Smart Walkie Talkie is one of the grand prize winning MotoMod™ headed to Chicago to become a reality.

Stay connected during your adventures!

Want to stay connected with your skiing or hiking buddies at different spots on the mountain or trails? Zip-lining across the forest and want to share the moment? Gliding in the clouds but still need to reach out to your buddies on the ground?

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie

 

Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie is a revolutionary device that seamlessly mounts and connects to your Moto Z as well other bluetooth enabled smart devices. In combination with the smartphone, it is an essential communication tool for each and every outdoor enthusiast.

Linc is not a bulky or complicated radio system. Unlike other walkie-talkies, its slim design is stylish, lightweight, rugged, and barely changes the look of the typical smartphone. It's slim design also allows it to easily fit in your pocket or backpack.

Linc operates on FRS/GMRS for voice communication perfect for outdoor recreation. It has 22 channels available on FRS /GMRS with 121 Privacy codes for minimizing the amount of unwanted chatter on your main channel, ideal if your in a busy area such as a ski resort.

With a range of up to 5-6 miles, this radio is perfect for family and friends to stay in touch whether you are climbing a mountain, tackling a backcountry trail, making your way through an amusement park, or wherever cellular coverage is not available.

Some other features include:

  • 1-to-1 or 1-to-many - Voice and SMS within a 5-6 mile radius
  • Selectable 0.5w/1w/2w RF power output
  • VHF/UHF frequency bands
  • Water and dust resistant
  • Broadcast current smartphone GPS location coordinates to your group without cellular service
  • Scan Mode
  • NOAA weather radio
  • Emergency alert Button transmits beacon SOS signal
  • Rechargeable 1500 mAh battery for up to 20 hours stand by

 

            

How does it work?

 

Linc smart walkie talkie seamlessly connects to your Moto Z phone or other smart devices. Once connected, The ARC controller app launches, which will automatically start operating right out of the box allowing users to begin using Linc to communicate with others within a 5-6 mile radius.

Linc allows for group and private 1-to-1 SMS messaging by using the ARC controller. Users simply open our app and begin messaging with the same look and feel of your smartphone’s text messaging app. Users can even broadcast their locations to other users within range all without WiFi or cellular connections. 

Our dual band radio allows us to provide both voice and data over separate bands ensuring you will always stay connected. Linc can even communicate with other two-way radios from different vendors or smartphone users around the global with our built-in radio-over-IP gateway.  The Linc is the ultimate communication device connecting you to all your family, friends, and coworkers.

How do I connect to Linc?

 

Bluetooth Connection

Linc can connect to any Bluetooth enabled smart device and be controlled with the ARC app. This also includes the Moto Z, in order to provide the Moto Z user more options to use multiple MotoMods on their smartphone.

 

 

*The App presets the radio according to the licensed or unlicensed user. *

 

Amateur radio Fun!

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie is also great for Amateur radio operators! Unlock the dual band (2m & 70cm) feature with your verified callsign and gain access to APRS tracking and Packet Radio capabilities. Linc can join your existing gear and help make some fun projects!

  • Packet Radio
  • Repeaters
  • RoIP Repeaters
  • Beacons
  • Tracking devices (APRS)
  • High altitude ballooning
  • Long range mesh networks
  • Scanning public safety frequencies
  • Weather stations
  • And much more!

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie operates on 2m & 70 cm band!

For those interested in getting in on these fun projects, feel free to get your Ham license and get to it!

Getting your Ham license is easy! All that is required is a Technician license: http://www.arrl.org/getting-your-technician-license

 

Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie

Motorola Transform your Smartphone Challenge

We accept taking this challenge! And are fortunate to have been selected by Motorola to participate in the "Transform your Smartphone Challenge". It is an honor to be able to introduce our vision to many Moto Z Smartphone users. We plan to bring in a new era of two-way radio communication.

“Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t.” To learn more visit www.motomods.com.”

Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie features include:

 

        

 

**Certain features of Linc are not available in GMRS/FRS mode due to FCC regulation restrictions. App will ask for callsign in order to activate  licensed features**

Arc App (Linc controller app)

 

Linc Mod total thickness  = 16.30mm (0.642 inches)

Developing the Technology

We, at Fantom Dynamics, have been developing modular walkie talkie technology for the past 8 years. Starting with the original prototype based on a universal case to mount a walkie talkie to any phone. With the design complete and the funds raised, we will be able to continue further development. And, most importantly, integrate our modular walkie talkie into the MotoMods™ system as well as obtain FCC certification. This will allow us to bring to you, the consumer, this new state of the art walkie talkie.

FCC Part 95 certification will be filed before the tooling fabrication phase, but subject to change

Please be sure to check out our specially priced perks just for Indiegogo's early contributors! Please refer to your right side of this page for details.

We appreciate your help in Sharing This Campaign

Almost anyone, anywhere will benefit from our walkie talkie.  With the help of your support and spreading this campaign, we will have the opportunity to showcase this new revolutionary mobile technology to the world!

  • What can I do to Help Spread the word? (Quick and simple tools to help make a buzz about our campaign are below!)

 

  • Spreading the word to co-workers, friends, and family
  • Tweet us on Twitter
  • Like us and Share us on Facebook
  • Visit and Share our website at fantom.io/linc  
  • Share on LinkedIn
  • Pin on Pinterest
