Want to stay connected with your skiing or hiking buddies at different spots on the mountain or trails? Zip-lining across the forest and want to share the moment? Gliding in the clouds but still need to reach out to your buddies on the ground?

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie
 
Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie is a revolutionary device that seamlessly mounts and connects to your Moto Z as well other bluetooth enabled smart devices. In combination with the smartphone, it is an essential communication tool for each and every outdoor enthusiast.
Linc is not a bulky or complicated radio system. Unlike other walkie-talkies, its slim design is stylish, lightweight, rugged, and barely changes the look of the typical smartphone. It's slim design also allows it to easily fit in your pocket or backpack.
Linc operates on FRS/GMRS for voice communication perfect for outdoor recreation. It has 22 channels available on FRS /GMRS with 121 Privacy codes for minimizing the amount of unwanted chatter on your main channel, ideal if your in a busy area such as a ski resort.
With a range of up to 5-6 miles, this radio is perfect for family and friends to stay in touch whether you are climbing a mountain, tackling a backcountry trail, making your way through an amusement park, or wherever cellular coverage is not available.

Some other features include:

1-to-1 or 1-to-many - Voice and SMS within a 5-6 mile radius
Selectable 0.5w/1w/2w RF power output
VHF/UHF frequency bands
Water and dust resistant
Broadcast current smartphone GPS location coordinates to your group without cellular service
Scan Mode
NOAA weather radio
Emergency alert Button transmits beacon SOS signal
Rechargeable 1500 mAh battery for up to 20 hours stand by

 
             
How does it work?
 
Linc smart walkie talkie seamlessly connects to your Moto Z phone or other smart devices. Once connected, The ARC controller app launches, which will automatically start operating right out of the box allowing users to begin using Linc to communicate with others within a 5-6 mile radius.

Linc allows for group and private 1-to-1 SMS messaging by using the ARC controller. Users simply open our app and begin messaging with the same look and feel of your smartphone’s text messaging app. Users can even broadcast their locations to other users within range all without WiFi or cellular connections. 

Our dual band radio allows us to provide both voice and data over separate bands ensuring you will always stay connected. Linc can even communicate with other two-way radios from different vendors or smartphone users around the global with our built-in radio-over-IP gateway.  The Linc is the ultimate communication device connecting you to all your family, friends, and coworkers.
How do I connect to Linc?
 
Bluetooth Connection

Linc can connect to any Bluetooth enabled smart device and be controlled with the ARC app. This also includes the Moto Z, in order to provide the Moto Z user more options to use multiple MotoMods on their smartphone.
 
 
*The App presets the radio according to the licensed or unlicensed user. *
 
Amateur radio Fun!

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie is also great for Amateur radio operators! Unlock the dual band (2m & 70cm) feature with your verified callsign and gain access to APRS tracking and Packet Radio capabilities. Linc can join your existing gear and help make some fun projects!

Packet Radio
Repeaters
RoIP Repeaters
Beacons
Tracking devices (APRS)
High altitude ballooning
Long range mesh networks
Scanning public safety frequencies
Weather stations
And much more!

Linc Smart Walkie Talkie operates on 2m & 70 cm band!
For those interested in getting in on these fun projects, feel free to get your Ham license and get to it!
Getting your Ham license is easy! All that is required is a Technician license: http://www.arrl.org/getting-your-technician-license
 


Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie





Motorola Transform your Smartphone Challenge
We accept taking this challenge! And are fortunate to have been selected by Motorola to participate in the "Transform your Smartphone Challenge". It is an honor to be able to introduce our vision to many Moto Z Smartphone users. We plan to bring in a new era of two-way radio communication.
“Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t.” To learn more visit www.motomods.com.”
Linc: The Smart Walkie Talkie features include:
 


        
 
**Certain features of Linc are not available in GMRS/FRS mode due to FCC regulation restrictions. App will ask for callsign in order to activate  licensed features**
Arc App (Linc controller app)

 


Linc Mod total thickness  = 16.30mm (0.642 inches)

Developing the Technology
We, at Fantom Dynamics, have been developing modular walkie talkie technology for the past 8 years. Starting with the original prototype based on a universal case to mount a walkie talkie to any phone. With the design complete and the funds raised, we will be able to continue further development. And, most importantly, integrate our modular walkie talkie into the MotoMods™ system as well as obtain FCC certification. This will allow us to bring to you, the consumer, this new state of the art walkie talkie.

FCC Part 95 certification will be filed before the tooling fabrication phase, but subject to change


Please be sure to check out our specially priced perks just for Indiegogo's early contributors! Please refer to your right side of this page for details.




We appreciate your help in Sharing This Campaign
Almost anyone, anywhere will benefit from our walkie talkie.  With the help of your support and spreading this campaign, we will have the opportunity to showcase this new revolutionary mobile technology to the world!

What can I do to Help Spread the word? (Quick and simple tools to help make a buzz about our campaign are below!)
 

Spreading the word to co-workers, friends, and family
Tweet us on Twitter

Like us and Share us on Facebook

Visit and Share our website at fantom.io/linc  

Share on LinkedIn
Pin on Pinterest

story:
Risks and challenges

The risks which come with the Portal Puck are similar to those of any small business attempting to bring a product to market. At Portal Design Solutions we like to think of these risks as surmountable obstacles, which when accounted for, can be avoided or overcome. The Portal Puck team is fortunate to have two members who have each successfully designed, manufactured and sold previous products. It is the experience, talent, and motivations of our team which we believe will allow us to move though the Puck's design, testing, manufacturing, and finally delivery, without falling short due to inexperience or common risks.

story:
Germs Are Everywhere, We Are Here to Help

Study shows smartphone, wallet, and other personal items have more germs than a toilet. Covid-19 has reminded us the importance of sanitiazation, pandemic or not, our dual-band UV sanitization and wireless charger is your every day solution to a healthy, efficient life style.

 

Dual Band UV to Safe Guard Your Health

Our sanitization box deploys both UVA and UVC bands through no-ozone emitting LEDs to kill germs.  Using both UV wavelengths to maximize germ-killing effect without worrying about hazardous o3 .

 

Protect You and Your Loved Ones

Important to keep your personal stuff far away from bacteria without harmful chemicals, It's a great addition to your home for you and your family.

In between your laundry days, sanitize your small towels daily to keep them clean.

Ideal for home or for office, easy to carry to fight germs on the go!

 

15W High Output Wireless Charging

Underneath the beautiful soft-touch cloth lies wireless charging capability, simply place your smartphone or wireless charging capable headsets to replenish battery.  Healthy and energetic.

 

 

Last But Not Least, It's Professionally Certified

Our UV sanitization solution can kill germs such as: 

  • Pseudomonas aeruginosa  
  • Escherichia coli
  • Staphylococcus aureus
  • Candida albicans

To verify its effectiveness, it is certified by a professional institution

 

Some Technical Specification for You:

  • Input: 5V / 2A or 9V / 1.67A or 12V / 2A, to achieve fast wireless charging, your AC adapter must support above output rating
  • Output (Wireless): 15W / 10W / 7.5W / 5W, wireless output rating is dependent on your smart phone's wireless charging and power management
  • Product Dimension: 206 x 107 x 38 mm
  • Weight: 580g
  • UV LED: 3 UVA+UVC LEDs, 10 UVA LEDs
  • Sanitization Timer: 1 / 3 / 6 / 9 Minutes

 

About Wiz Smart Device

A group of ex-Nokians founded Wiz in 2012, and has been designing and making 3G/4G capable Android-based smartphone and tablet for sale in Asia Pacific markets.  In 2019 we further expand into accessories and smart home appliance segments, bringing combination of form and function to audience globally.

Please follow us on Facebook and Instagram @bewizus.

 

Risks & Challenges

Due to the current constrained environment with limited flight/freight availability, along with the complicated production and quality assurance process, fulfillment may be delayed. Different time zones between countries may result in delayed replies to your inquiries. We appreciate your interests and patience in our offering.

 

Contact Us

If you have any further questions about the Wiz Sanitizer

feel free to reach out to us:

For General Inquiries: indiegogo@wizdevice.com

Join our Facebook group for the most updated news!

story:
Q: Why should I fill in and edit my profile?

A: This information will be updated in your friends contact books. The more details in the profile the easier it will be to contact with you. Furthermore you will be able to use your profile to exchange information when meeting. It will be enough to give the phone number or profile link and information will be downloaded automatically and you wouldn’t have to dictate your first and second name with e-mail and etc.

Q: What will happen with my contacts info?

A: All the information in your phone will be updated according to your friend’s profiles information. All made changes will be available to see in “history”. If the information in your contact book is different from the information from profile, it will copy to comment field. It will help to find your friend’s contact even if you don't recognize him in person.

Q: If I don’t want to share my personal information with everybody may I limit access to them?

A: Yes, of course. Specially for that access levels were created. You may specify access to information for each level individually.

Q: If, for example, I don't limit my date of birth for all contacts, will it be deleted from the phone books?

A: No, what you are showing in your levels does not replace, but complements your friend's phone books, this will fix contacts outdated information or add the missing.

story:
Introducing GPIOduino

My name is Adrian and I was born in Madrid (Spain), where I lived and studied until I moved to London. I'm a Telecommunications Engineer with a great passion for software and hardware, and I've spent several years tinkering and making stuff with Arduino and Raspberry Pi.

One of the problems I had always faced while working in Arduino projects, was the big pain and hard work I needed to do every time I wanted to swap between one project and another, and every time I needed to transport or share them.

A few months ago, I thought that it was not worth it to mount and dismount all my projects every time and loose all my work. Not anymore! So, I started to design my first draft of the shield.     

Now, I have created GPIOduino and I can easily work in several projects at the same time. I can quickly swap between them and I can safely store my projects for the future.

Today, I would like to share this idea with everyone.

Why Indiegogo?

To make the GPIOduino shield affordable and available to anyone, we need to manufacture at least 100 boards. Indiegogo is the best solution in this case. We can offer this shield to anyone who wants it, regardless of their location and with the same conditions.

     


Where are we now?

GPIOduino has already been sent to a professional PCB manufacturer and the prototype is now with us. Currently, we are testing the shield and doing awesome projects.

All the I/O pins from Arduino have been extended to the GPIO port as follows: 

  


What will you get?

PERK 1: GPIOduino Shield Only = £12



PERK 2: GPIOduino Basic Kit = £18


PERK 3: GPIOduino Retail Kit - 15% Off = £153


Compatibility?

GPIOduino is an IO extension shield compatible with the majority of Arduino boards, shields and compatible systems. However, due to our limited budget the shield has not been tested against all the products available in the market at this stage.

             


If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com.

For any other questions, please contact gpioduino@gmail.com. We will respond as fast as possible!


It's time for action now! Scroll back to the top of the page and you will find the perks on the right column. Give us your support today and use the sharing functions of Indiegogo to let everybody know it!

story:
We have managed to create a digital recorder prototype. This mod will turn your phone into a superb voice recorder. Our campaign thrives because transforming the mobile phone is important us. Contributions will help us achieve our goal and manufacture this awesome product.

 

What We Need

If we do not reach our entire goal, we would like to thank you for supporting us. Whether or not we reach our goal, we are staying true to our commitment and your funds will go towards the final production of the Digital Recorder for Moto Z smartphones.

How funds will be used

  • Equipment to develop our own modules
  • Materials
  • Hours
  • Programmers for UI improvements and fixing bugs

 

The Impact

Our project is extremely important because it will enable recording for playback at a later point in time. This is a high quality mod that will last a long time - we are grateful for this opportunity.

    Mod features

    • High quality recording
    • LCD screen display
    • Functions buttons
    • High quality custom plastic body
    • 96 kHz / 24 bit, PCM recording quality
    • 1 x Stereo microphone 3.5mm Input
    • 1 x Stereo Headphone 3.5mm Output
    • Speaker
    • 19 Hours Recording
    • 15 Hours Playback
    • Dimensions: 74mmW x 153mmH x 20mmD
    • Internal Storage memory 4GB or 8GB - recorded files will be stored on the inbox. Users can then retrieve, organize,  and listen.

    App features

    • Mixing and collaboration
    • Notifications
    • Automatic recording
    • Reminders
    • Ringtones
    • Creating folders
    • Sharing
    • Record settings
     

    What's Next

    Perks #1
    Includes two beautiful designed cooling pads. colors: black and silver, size 70mm x 50mm, materials: nickle, graphite, thermal sheet, carbon fiber.

    Perks #2
    Gift card from us thanking you for being a pleasant backer.

    Perks info @ cellphoneheatsync.com

    Send us comments on Twitter @ mobileheatsync

    Find us on facebook @ cellphonheatsync

    Videos on youtube @ cellphoneheatsync

    Blog @ cellphoneheatsync.blogspot.com

     

    Milton Fraser

     

    Risks & Challenges

    Our team is working hard to overcome any hurdles, We are always engaged.

    Thank you so much for watching the videos. Please like, share, subscribe and don't forget to donate to help our campaign continue.

     

    CYE DIGITAL RECORDER, a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones.
    Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC.
    To learn more visit www.motomods.com

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Jose Delgado, born in Rio Grande, Puerto Rico.
  • I will be creating an application for Iphone and Android of an interactive map for the island of Culebras, Puerto Rico. Helping to strengthen the local economy of the island and you are contributing a bit of sand to the economy of Puerto Rico.
  • As we all know the launch of an application with carries a number of expenses. (Development, Advertising, Marketing). The money raised will be used for these expenses.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need an amount of $ 8,000.00. This money will be as follows;

    Development $ 5,000.00
    Marketing and Advertising $ 2,000.00
    Contingency $ 1,000.00

  • It would be the only application created for this market. By this we mean that we would be the first to create an app with this reach in this market.

The Impact

  • In the past 4 years its beaches have been nominated among the 10 most beautiful beaches in the world. With this application we will be promoting the tourism of the island and making your stay more pleasant. They will be able to use the GPS of the application to locate fgastronomic places, beaches, hospitals, police stations and much more. Users will also be able to evaluate places upload photos, videos and comments.

    The local economy of the island had increased significantly

Risks & Challenges

  • After completing the development phase we will have to travel to the island to prove that everything is working as scheduled. We estimate about a week of testing before its launch. It may happen that we have to correct some function and return on another trip. This would be part of the budget designated the area of development.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Another way of helping us is by sharing our idea.
  • Thanks everyone for your help

story:
First time to Indiegogo? This is how it works:

1. Decide which of our incredible products you would like, then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
3. Receive and fill out the survey via e-mail for your device model or to attach your custom design, if you ordered custom phone case.
5. We receive your demands and prepare your order according them. 
6. You receive your awesome perks :)

Risks & Challenges

There is absolutly no risk for you. Our goal is fixed to $9900. That means that, if we don’t rich this goal by its deadline, all contributions will be refunded back to the contributors by Indiegogo, typically within 5-7 business days. But if you help us to reach this goal you will receive your awesome perks!

Our project needs only the final amount of $9900 to go to mass production. Everything else is already achieved. The suppliers, the engineers, the materials, the taxes, everything is fixed and calculated. All the amount of money goes for the implementation of the project. All previous steps are already passed by us.

The Person Behind This Project

My name is Valentin Bachov and I am CEO of Protecto Ltd. This is my first campaign. And I am excited to present you my new project. But first let me tell you little history of me and my small company with big dreams.

How I get involved in customizing phone cases?

A few years ago I was searching for a special gift for friend of mine. I wanted to be something special, personal and visible to others. I decided to be phone cover. Somewhere in that search I found my passion about customization. With little money and huge enthusiasm I found my small company.

How I started customizing screen protectors?

When I was involved to mobile device protection, I just loved how the screen protectors works. And I wanted to be able to produce screen guards, not only for smartphones, but for every device, which has glass on it. This project allows us to create curved protectors for curwed screen (e.g. Samsung Galaxy Edge series).

How we decide to make this project and what are the advantages?

We are always striving for improvement. One year ago we decided to create whole new system for customization, which will increase the quality and reduce the cost of our custom products. After 1 year of researching, negotiations with suppliers, meeting with partners, prototyping and testing we are ready to go to the final step - Implementation.

What our project will improve?

  1. The price of custom cases and protectors is too high. Our project reduce the prices of the end product up to 30 %.
  2. Quality. Our project increases the quality of the products, using high quality materials and innovative technologies. We will make them to last much longer.
  3. The amount of supported models and devices is limited to the most widespread. When our campaign finish we will be able to produce custom cases for over 500 models smartphones and 4 different kinds of screen protectors for 2000 model devices.

What We Need & What You Get

Our project needs last amount of $9900 to be finished and to go to mass production.

  1. $5200 – for equipment, hardware and software.
  2. S2800 – for high quality materials, which will be used to produce our first production for bakers.
  3. $1900 – for finishing new web platform, where everyone can easily create custom phone cases and order screen protectors.

You will be the first who will receive our new products from this campaign.

  1. Custom Phone Case. We will produce high quality jelly phone cases with designs of your choice. The colors are bright and vivid. There is no fading, nor peeling! Image last forever! We will make custom phone cases for over 500 phone models. You can get this perk from this page on amazing price. You will get a gift from our screen protectors only with this perk!

  1. Atishock, Antishatter, Waterproof, Oleophobic screen protector. Forget about broken or scratched phone screen. Don't worry if accidentally touch your screen with fat fingers. Made from unique material, which is 5 times stronger than ordinary tempered glass. It is flexible and never cracks. The thickness is only 0.26 mm. This shield protect you electronic devices without sacrificing the touch sensitivity of its screen. We will produce it for more than 2000 devices, including devices with curved screen. You can get this perk from this page on amazing price.

  1. Scratch-resistant Matte screen protector. Our Matte (anti-glare) screen protector can reduces the glare from fluorescent and sun light to allow easy viewing and reducing the burden on your eyes. We will produce it for more than 2000 devices. You can get this perk from this page on amazing price.

  1. Scratch-resistant Diamond screen protector. Ladies, do you want sparkles on your screen? But don't worry, when the display is active the protector goes totally transparent.Offers tough, durable, transparent surface while keeping the screen clean and unscratched. We will produce it for more than 2000. You can get this perk from this page on amazing price.

  1. Scratch-resistant Glossy screen protector. The screen protector adds an ultra-thin durable layer of transparent protection to your display. We will produce it for more than 2000 devices. You can get this perk from this page on amazing price.

The Impact

We are implementing a new process of production, not only for our company, but new at all. Our colleagues customizing phone cases and protectors only for widespread phone models. And actually their production is kind of pricy. We collected Our new project allows us to support most of the phones of the market. Beside of the production process, we created strict financial plan, which allows us to offer you affordable and competitive prices.

Part of the supported brands by this project: ACER, ALCATEL, ALLVIEW, AMAZON, APPLE iPhone, ARCHOS, ASUS, AT&T, BENQ, BLACKBERRY, BLU, CASIO, CAT, CELKON, COOLPAD, DELL, GIGABYTE, GOOGLE, HAIER, HP, HTC, HUAWEI, LENOVO, LG, MAXWEST, MEIZU, MICROMAX, MICROSOFT, MOTOROLA, NOKIA, ONEPLUS, OPPO, ORANGE, PANASONIC, PHILIPS, PRESTIGIO, SAMSUNG, SHARP, SONY, SONY ERICSSON, SPICE, T-MOBILE,TOSHIBA,VIVO, VODAFONE, WIKO, XIAOMI, XOLO, YEZZ, YOTA, ZTE
 

Other Ways You Can Help? Share!

Have a friend who needs custom protection for his mobile device? Or you want to make awesome gift to him? Want to share? Just a few seconds of your time could make the difference for our project. Hit one of the Indiegogo sharing buttons at the top of this page. As you see our perks are really cheap, so about a thousand bakers are needed to achieve our goal. Let your friends or coworkers know about our passion to make the people happy! The more people who know about this campaign, the bigger is the chance to cross the finish. Let’s do it together! Thank you!

F.A.Q.

1. Where to send my photo/photos and my phone model/models?
A: You will receive a survey via e-mail after the end of the campaign.
2. What will happen with the money of the bakers, if the campaign fails?
A: All contributions will be refunded back to the contributors by Indiegogo, typically within 5-7 business days.
3. I want to order Packed Perk. Can I order protector or case for different models?
A: Yes, you can!
4. What is the shipping cost?
A: $5.00 worldwide.
5. How do I request a refund?
A: You should check Indiegogo refund policy.
6. What is the innovation in your project?
A: The project is in category “Small Business” for reason. The innovation is mainly in decreasing the price of whole process of production, increasing the quality of the products and supporting huge amount of mobile devices.

Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.3. Receive and fill out the survey via e-mail for your device model or to attach your custom design, if you ordered custom phone case.5. We receive your demands and prepare your order according them. 6. You receive your awesome perks :)Risks & ChallengesThere is absolutly no risk for you. Our goal is fixed to $9900. That means that, if we don’t rich this goal by its deadline, all contributions will be refunded back to the contributors by Indiegogo, typically within 5-7 business days. But if you help us to reach this goal you will receive your awesome perks!Our project needs only the final amount of $9900 to go to mass production. Everything else is already achieved. The suppliers, the engineers, the materials, the taxes, everything is fixed and calculated. All the amount of money goes for the implementation of the project. All previous steps are already passed by us.The Person Behind This ProjectMy name is Valentin Bachov and I am CEO of Protecto Ltd. This is my first campaign. And I am excited to present you my new project. But first let me tell you little history of me and my small company with big dreams.How I get involved in customizing phone cases?A few years ago I was searching for a special gift for friend of mine. I wanted to be something special, personal and visible to others. I decided to be phone cover. Somewhere in that search I found my passion about customization. With little money and huge enthusiasm I found my small company.How I started customizing screen protectors?When I was involved to mobile device protection, I just loved how the screen protectors works. And I wanted to be able to produce screen guards, not only for smartphones, but for every device, which has glass on it. This project allows us to create curved protectors for curwed screen (e.g. Samsung Galaxy Edge series).How we decide to make this project and what are the advantages?We are always striving for improvement. One year ago we decided to create whole new system for customization, which will increase the quality and reduce the cost of our custom products. After 1 year of researching, negotiations with suppliers, meeting with partners, prototyping and testing we are ready to go to the final step - Implementation.What our project will improve?
The price of custom cases and protectors is too high. Our project reduce the prices of the end product up to 30 %.
Quality. Our project increases the quality of the products, using high quality materials and innovative technologies. We will make them to last much longer.
The amount of supported models and devices is limited to the most widespread. When our campaign finish we will be able to produce custom cases for over 500 models smartphones and 4 different kinds of screen protectors for 2000 model devices.

$5200 – for equipment, hardware and software.
S2800 – for high quality materials, which will be used to produce our first production for bakers.
$1900 – for finishing new web platform, where everyone can easily create custom phone cases and order screen protectors.

story:
Short Summary

 The Vasko V1 case was designed with Two Goals in mind... 1. Convenience 2. Air pod Security

     The Vasko V1 case is a Patent Pending Iphone/Airpod Case integrated together in one ergonomic unit to offer the great security and protection for your Iphone and Airpods.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • The $30,000 will be broken down into six buckets. (Manufacuring Costs, Packaging Costs, Distribution Costs, Inventory Management, and New Product Development) We will invest 100% of the proceeds into our business and not take a cent as a retained earning from this crowdfund.
  • We have multiple perks, they range from a lifetime update to our newest cases in our pipeline to heavy discounts for vendors that want to buy in bulk and resell.
  • If we do not reach our entire goal we will use all funds to produce all cases paid for, if not able to meet 100% fulfillment we will refund all money.

Risks & Challenges

     We have spent a lot of time and energy covering any possible risks and challenges. Our product is Patent Pending on not just the physical product but the IDEA of attaching headphones to your phone case.

     Currently the only risk we have to the project is not meeting our crowdfunding goal to move forward with the next step in our business which is manufacturing the physical product and bringing it to your home.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not get involved with this round of funding we ask that you please send us a message telling us what you think of the product and also hit the share button to help us get the word out!

The $30,000 will be broken down into six buckets. (Manufacuring Costs, Packaging Costs, Distribution Costs, Inventory Management, and New Product Development) We will invest 100% of the proceeds into our business and not take a cent as a retained earning from this crowdfund.
We have multiple perks, they range from a lifetime update to our newest cases in our pipeline to heavy discounts for vendors that want to buy in bulk and resell.
If we do not reach our entire goal we will use all funds to produce all cases paid for, if not able to meet 100% fulfillment we will refund all money.

     We have spent a lot of time and energy covering any possible risks and challenges. Our product is Patent Pending on not just the physical product but the IDEA of attaching headphones to your phone case.
     Currently the only risk we have to the project is not meeting our crowdfunding goal to move forward with the next step in our business which is manufacturing the physical product and bringing it to your home.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can not get involved with this round of funding we ask that you please send us a message telling us what you think of the product and also hit the share button to help us get the word out!

story:
If you're one of the lucky ones with the new MacBook, you might have noticed that its power adapter lacks the usual built-in cable manager 'wings' of the MagSafe adapters. The new USB-C charging cable is also longer, thicker, and more unruly than other Apple power cords, adding cord clutter to bags, desks, and floors. 

So we took on the challenge of designing a cable manager for Apple's 29W Power Adapter for the 12-in MacBook.

Cable managers in the market are common, but the disposable mass-produced nature of the products makes them degrade and get dirty quickly. We wanted to design a cable manager that is user-friendly and would last a long time, yet is affordable.

PowerPlay: Cable Manager for 29W Power Adapter

PowerPlay makes it easy to use, carry, and store your USB-C cable.

> PORTABILITY

Keep your cable snug and secured within the leather reel, which stays connected to the adapter even when plugged in. No more fumbling with any loose accessories.

> CONTROL

Wind up loose cables so any excess length remains in storage to keep desks and floors clutter-free.

> LONG LASTING

Made with full-grain vegetable-tanned leather, durable elastic, and a stitch-free construction, PowerPlay is resistant to breakage and will be a lifelong companion to your adapter and cable.

If you're a frequent traveler or just want to manage the length of the USB-C cable, you'll appreciate the PowerPlay for its ease of use and portability.

Oh... and did we mention that PowerPlay uses vegetable-tanned leather, which maintains a natural softness and buttery touch? You'll love how it looks as much as how it feels in your hands. Like fine wine getting better with age, vegetable-tanned leather looks better with long term use.


Design Approach

We chose to work with vegetable-tanned leather because it is a natural material that is amazingly versatile and durable. Besides being the leather of choice for high-end luxury goods, vegetable-tanned leather has the unique property of maintaining structured forms while remaining supple and malleable.

Through many iterations, we determined the best design that would optimize this material's features, yet eliminate the need for clasps, closures, and sewing. Engineering the PowerPlay comes down to the tiniest millimeters, taking into consideration detailed physical characteristics of the leather, adapter, and cable, including most importantly usage behavior.

The result? The coiled cables fit snugly between the two pieces of leather, minimizing bulk. Initially, the leather starts off slightly stiff then gently molds to the shape of the coiled cables - the way a pair of jeans will mold to your body.

The sturdiness of the leather created a built-in "lock" for the cable that uses its own body as the closure, allowing for easy lock and release of the cable. 


Finally, to reflect people's intuitive behavior in storing cables, we made sure the design allowed the accessory to be attached to the adapter.


How Is It Made?

We might be based in Asia, but we don’t like sweatshops. Our suppliers are proud owners of second-generation family businesses. We ensure our craftswomen receive compensation above the minimum wage and have flexible working hours. 

We use high-quality vegetable tanned leather from the UK with a smooth grain and lightly waxed finish.  We work with an established 40-year-old leather workshop to cut the hide into required shapes and thickness. Our craftswomen then bevel and burnish the edges with beeswax to create a polished look, before assembling the pieces by hand. 


How To Use It

Using PowerPlay is simple. Just slip the elastic band around the adapter, making sure the leveled side aligns with the side of adapter that plugs into the socket. 

Wind the cables around the center to store.

To lock the stored cables in place, slip the cable along the hook and lift the side of the leather where the cable slides out to create a slight overlap.

To plug your adapter into the socket, unravel cables to your desired length. Adjust the the front piece so the leveled side aligns with the adapter side that plugs into the socket.

Plug away!


Designed for Everyone: Our Perks

Got the MacBook? Save up to $7 and pre-order a PowerPlay of your own:

Save $4 and get the PowerPlay at 14% off the retail price of $29:

 


Show your MacBook as much love as its adapter. Get the "MacBook Set"  with a MacBook sleeve in matching leather.

FAQ

Who are the people behind this nifty cable manager?

We're the founders of abovethefray.co and creators of the PowerPlay cable manager for the 85w & 60 Apple power adapters. Flashback a year ago, in NYC, we were featured as an Emerging Designer-Maker at the NYNOW International trade exhibition. It was there that the original PowerPlay for MagSafe adapters  was debuted to the world. The PowerPlay for 85W/60W adapters continues to receive great customer reviews and was picked up by: 


Sample reviews from our stores and retailer sites:

Today, we would like your help to bring PowerPlay's concept to the new MacBook's 29W adapter.

How big is PowerPlay 29W? 

With the entire length of the cable stored, PowerPlay's cable reel measures about 2cm or 3/4 inch thick, with a diameter of 8cm or 3.2 inches. That's just slighty more than the actual volume of the cable.

Why should I use PowerPlay instead of some other way to manage my cable?

PowerPlay stays attached to your adapter at all times, so you'll never need to think about where to store your unused cable manager or fiddle with a cable tie. Sure, you could go for the regular rubber band or Velcro tie, but PowerPlay makes it so much easier to manage and care for both the cable and the adapter. Silicone cable managers might be cheaper, but the rubbery surface collects dirt easily and is likely to drag the contents in your bag. 

With a reportedly long battery life, does the MacBook really need a cable manager? 

Reviews show that the MacBook battery life could go as low as 4.5 hours with heavy usage, so you may need to carry around the power adapter more than you think. And as we all know, as a laptop ages, the battery doesn't last as long as it originally did. PowerPlay, however, can help manage your MacBook cables from now till years to come, at home and on the go.

Will PowerPlay make my adapter prone to overheating?

No. As you can see, the leather on PowerPlay doesn't fit around the entire adapter. The leather pieces simply hook to the elastic strap, leaving plenty of room for the adapter to 'breathe'. Besides, vegetable-tanned leather is a natural, porous material that allows heat to disperse easily.

How long will my PowerPlay last? 

We expect it to last as long as your MacBook, if not longer. As it is assembled with no stitches, the chances of breakage are slim. The woven elastic strap is extremely durable, the same as those being used as shoes straps. 

Will the elastic strap slip off my adapter? 

Not with normal usage. We carried out heavy-duty tests by placing the adapter with PowerPlay in a duffle bag and putting it through a lot of shaking and throwing around. Everything stayed perfectly put.

Will the PowerPlay block adjacent sockets when plugged in? 

No, the PowerPlay will not block any adjacent socket when plugged in. The standard space between the sockets is 2.5 cm or 1".

Will the PowerPlay add too much weight to the adapter when plugged into a wall?

No. If the same plugs can hold the heavy weight of Apple's 85w power adapter, then the attached PowerPlay won't affect its performance.

Why do we need your support?

Your support helps us launch our new product and scale our business. We’d like to make this a going concern so we can support our craftswomen in sustainable manner.

What are the potential risks?

Possible risk that may occur may be in the time it takes to complete the project. If the project becomes highly successful, we may have to extend the deliver time depending on the quantity ordered. I may also divide production runs and deliver partial orders as they are completed in order to get the items sent out faster on a first come first serve basis. Early backers will have priority in the delivery schedule. 

Also raw materials acquisition time are fairly predictable, but there is a small risk of delay from time to time, so this will have to be taken into account. While the risk may exist, we don’t foresee any delays beyond the stated timelines. If delays do arise we’ll be sure to communicate and provide critical updates on a frequent basis.

What's my inspiration?

I created the PowerPlay out of a love of making elegant, useful objects by hand and a unique set of philosophies influenced by my personal experiences, which can be summed up as follows:

- thoughtful simplicity -

Growing up as a third-culture kid, I had no ties to a particular nation's cultural background. To connect with people of different cultures, I applied the values of simplicity, authenticity, empathy, and common sense in interacting with people. These are the principles that I have projected into the design of the PowerPlay and my other creations.

- think universal -

I am obsessed with the notion of universality - principles that resonates across cultures and transcends borders, like mathematics or music. To this end, my designs are influenced by Albert Einstein's elegant formulas and thought experiments, Steven Jobs' zeal for Zen aesthetics, and John Maeda's Laws of Simplicity. 

- act local -

In pursuing my passion for making, I had the opportunity to explore places and interact with people that I would never have had the chance to as a 'yuppie' living in Bangkok. In doing so, I was able to leverage the strengths of the locality that I was living within:

Craftsmanship:  From my leather craft teacher to the makers who make the PowerPlay, I have noticed that Thais care about the quality of the output of their craft and boast an overall good sense of aesthetics.

Community:  In starting my own production line, I relied on people who were connected together by a sense of community to help out in setting up our workshop and providing an extra hand when needed.

Small businesses:  We were able to set-up our operations effectively and at a small-scale by working with the plethora of small businesses that formed a good chunk of the economy in Thailand.


Thank you so much for checking out our project!!!

Remember if we don't reach our goal then we won't get funded, and no one will get the PowerPlay at these prices. So please share with your friends and family!

If delays do arise we’ll be sure to communicate and provide critical updates on a frequent basis.

I created the PowerPlay out of a love of making elegant, useful objects by hand and a unique set of philosophies influenced by my personal experiences, which can be summed up as follows:
- thoughtful simplicity -
Growing up as a third-culture kid, I had no ties to a particular nation's cultural background. To connect with people of different cultures, I applied the values of simplicity, authenticity, empathy, and common sense in interacting with people. These are the principles that I have projected into the design of the PowerPlay and my other creations.
- think universal -
I am obsessed with the notion of universality - principles that resonates across cultures and transcends borders, like mathematics or music. To this end, my designs are influenced by Albert Einstein's elegant formulas and thought experiments, Steven Jobs' zeal for Zen aesthetics, and John Maeda's Laws of Simplicity. 
- act local -
In pursuing my passion for making, I had the opportunity to explore places and interact with people that I would never have had the chance to as a 'yuppie' living in Bangkok. In doing so, I was able to leverage the strengths of the locality that I was living within:
Craftsmanship:  From my leather craft teacher to the makers who make the PowerPlay, I have noticed that Thais care about the quality of the output of their craft and boast an overall good sense of aesthetics.
Community:  In starting my own production line, I relied on people who were connected together by a sense of community to help out in setting up our workshop and providing an extra hand when needed.
Small businesses:  We were able to set-up our operations effectively and at a small-scale by working with the plethora of small businesses that formed a good chunk of the economy in Thailand.


Thank you so much for checking out our project!!!
Remember if we don't reach our goal then we won't get funded, and no one will get the PowerPlay at these prices. So please share with your friends and family!

story:
"The multi-functional connectivity on this thing is impressive, from iPhone to Android to Mac, it has everything covered..."

"On The Go stuffs nearly every must-have iPhone/Android add-on into one" tiny cube"

"OTG is Exactly What its Name Suggests"

"This is One Disruptive Innovation that Changes Everything"

"No device offers everything, but OnTheGo comes pretty close!"

"This is the Ultimate Companion"

"The Swiss Knife of All Things Flash Disk"

"This Multi-Headed Flash Drive Charges And Syncs All Your Mobile Devices"

It is aptly called OTG (On The Go) that works not just with Apple devices but also with those running on Android. 

OTG comes in a slim square design that’s 11mm thick. It features three different plugs on its three sides (a standard USB plug, a Micro-USB plug and a Lightning connector) that allow the device to work with Macs and PCs, iOS products and devices that run on Android. The device is capable of both syncing and charging any device as it also packs its own battery, which can later on be used to augment a device’s energy supply.

Users will be able to play different kinds of media straight from OTG including music, movies and images. OTG can also function as a Bluetooth locator which either allow users to locate their smartphone using the device or locate keys (OTG has a special latch where keys can be connected) using its companion app.

OTG comes in three different storage capacities: 32GB, 64GB and 128GB. It supports various file formats for photos, videos, audio and even documents. The device is now available for pre-order on the company’s website with the 32GB going for $199  and goes up to $349 for the 128GB version. OTG can be purchased at a fraction of that with perks right here on Indiegogo.

Grab the chance to be part of this campaign!

HOW DOES IT WORK:

The OTG system is a combination of the OTG Device and a mobile app. These two components work together to allow users to transfer, sync and convert files quickly and easily between iOS and Android devices as well as Macs and PCs. Access movies in air or in a remote area and never needing a network or Internet. 

  • View photos, documents, playback music, TV series, videos and movies, backup and manage files directly from OTG
  • Upgrade your device storage up to 128 GB with world’s fastest read/write speed 
  • Use it to Take Pictures
  • Use it to Charge Your Mobile Device
  • Use it to play, pause or skip music on your Smartphone
  • Use it as Flash Memory
  • Upgrade your device storage up to 128 GB
  • Safe & Secure as your data is never sent through 3rd party servers
  • No Battery Required for Flash Drive
  • 1080p HD movie streaming, direct playback from OTG
  • Read/write speed: Lightning: 16/10 MB/s | Micro USB: 20/16 MB/s
    USB 3.0: 140/20 MB/s.
  • The lowest power consumption
  • Fast Data Transfer USB 3 interface
  • Apple Certified MFi Lightning interface
  • Micro USB interface
  • Smart Detection of connected devices
  • Fast Charging 2.1 Amps
  • Highly compact & Light weight design
  • Compatible with Windows, Mac, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch & Android devices
  • Super portable size with an ultra-slim design
  • Rugged Aluminium Construction to protect your data. Built to Last!
  • Measuring a mere 57mm x 57mm x 11mm, this device is ultra-portable.

  • On The Go is small in size, big in features, easy to use, durable and compact. The original design combines both form and function.

    We wanted to create a simple and beautiful device that solves our mobile devices' charging needs. What we ended up with is a smart connected device that serves as a perfect companion On The Go!

OTG App

Features

  • Cross platform, fully integrated external flash drive memory expansion for PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch as well as Android devices.
  • One convenient place to fully manage your files such as Music, Video, Photos and Documents. 
  • Portable Power Bank External Backup Battery
  • Use it instead of a cable to sync or charge your device
  • Works as a Wireless Remote Shutter Control for your Smartphone camera
  • Conveniently use it as a remote to play, pause or skip music on your Smartphone
  • Voice Recorder
  • Two-way separation alert to keep your valuables including your phone safe so you never lose anything again. OTG finds your Phone. Your Phone Finds OTG
  • Brushed Aluminium Construction Built to Last
  • Conveniently exchange files between iOS and Android devices, iPhones & iPads, and computers on the fly, without being shackled by a cord, translator or lack of network

Together with the OTG App, an auto file management, backup and security, you will have the most powerful, must have device available for your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch as well as Android powered phones and tablets ever.

  • Direct File Transfer
  • Free App for iOS and Android File Management
  • Zip and Unzip File Support
  • Secured File encryption and secure Access to App and files
  • Hardware accelerated video decoder that supports a wide variety of non-iOS native video formats like MP4, M4V, MPV, MOV, MPG, MKV, AVI, WMV, RMVB, FLV, 3GP, GIF.
  • Backup essential files such as Contacts/Calendar, Music & Videos
  • Playback Videos and Music directly or stream to your TV
  • Document viewer for all major file formats
  • View, Create, Copy, move, delete, rename, open, encrypt and Manage all your data directly on your iOS or Android Devices



[P E R K S]

Why We Need You

We have come to Indiegogo to share our project with all of you, our incredible community of supporters. You deserve a better device that can support all your needs On The Go. We also want to hear and learn from you--your suggestions and feedback will not only help us improve our project, but will also be implemented into our rewards and additional features of OTG. We know this is an ambitious project, but we are certain that with your help OTG will become a worldwide reality.

Use of Funds

This is where you come in! We’re asking you to help us make OTG a reality. We’re very close to getting there. We have working prototypes, identified suppliers, and are ready to put OTG into production. Funds will be used for:

The above list is typical for taking a product to market. We are experienced in launching products and know exactly what’s required to pull this off.

Estimated Development Time

We need your help to develop OTG and start mass production and make it a reality. You'll be the first to receive OTG at a price significantly less than future retail price. We hope that you like OTG and will be happy to answer your questions and suggestions.

Production

We use advanced technology of high quality that has already been tested and developed by many other companies. The whole production process is monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field.

Risks & Challenges

OTG is designed to be simple and useful. We’ve worked hard over the last year to get it to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones. We also used reputable electronics manufacturers who offer great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and that’s where our training and experience comes in. We have successfully launched multiple products into the marketplace, so we are confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.  

When we started this project, our goal was to bring a product that is fun, cool, and useful. We believe OTG is just that! We had a great time working on transforming the concept to reality. We cannot wait to finalize OTG and put it in your hands. All we need now is your help and support to cover the cost of what remains. We are well versed in the challenges involved in delivery, so we hope our experience in delivering products will help us to make sure that your perks arrive on time and in mint condition.

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a pledge, you can still help up by spreading the word about our campaign. Just click any of the share links at the top left of this page and share our campaign with your friends and family, or anyone you know who can benefit from OTG. Thank you SO MUCH for supporting OTG!

                                                      

Our Story

Innovation can come from anyone, anywhere. Fuelled by creativity, connectivity and collaboration, new ways of thinking are shaping the future and all it takes is a bit of imagination and it all comes down to how you look at things. We call that, iVue.

iVue was founded by a group of passionate individuals from the worlds of business, Marketing, and technology. We are passionate about using technology to create digital experiences that leave an impression.

We are inspired by extraordinary technology. We are dreaming up for anything that makes our daily lives better. Let's together make this dream a reality.

story:
The ALUM Case is a hexagonal, solid aluminum case for the Apple Pencil crafted to resemble the graphite pencils that we know and love. We chose aluminum because it’s strong and light. The hexagonal shape gives support to your hand when you pick it up and keeps it from rolling away when you put it down. It’s perfect for keeping your Apple Pencil protected and pristine while still allowing you to write and draw effortlessly.



We love the use of aluminum in Apple products and we wanted to bring the same look and feel to the Apple Pencil.

We’ll craft the ALUM Case from solid, high quality, 6000 series aluminum stock that will undergo an anodization process to ensure that the surface is resistant to scratches and other corrosive elements (sweat!). Anodization will also allow us to offer the ALUM in silver, grey and gold so you’ll be able to match your ALUM Case with your iPad Pro.


CNC machining allows us to fabricate the ALUM Case to tightly specified tolerances, allowing the Pencil a snug fit, while also keeping easy it to slip on and off.

Each piece is individually turned in a CNC lathe before sand blasting. During the sandblasting process, special care will be taken to smooth out the interior barrel surfaces to make sure it’s free from burrs and other imperfections.

The taper of the ALUM Case will be hand polished to a mirror finish before anodizing for protection and color. We think the polished metal luster contrasts nicely against the matte finish of the barrel.

The fitment of end cap of the ALUM is designed with rubber o-rings so it remains tight and secure when in place while remaining easy to remove with a simple twist and tug. The ALUM logo is laser etched onto the side and stamped onto the end of the cap.



 

Personalize your ALUM Case with our custom laser etching option. We looked at the lead times and logistics involved in etching individual ALUM Cases and found it to be a nice, workable option to be able to offer our supporters. Just select the “Laser Etching” option on the right and we’ll zap your name (or anything you want within 10 alphanumeric characters!) onto the end cap (it’ll be on the face opposite that of the ALUM logo). We’ll send out a survey to everyone who picked this option at the conclusion of the campaign to get individual details.

Q: Will the ALUM scratch the plastic surface of my Apple Pencil?

A: We’ll examine each piece and make sure that each ALUM Case is shipped free from imperfections that could damage your Apple Pencil.

The inner diameter of the ALUM is just 0.1 mm wider than the diameter of the Apple Pencil. Our prototypes show that this is the perfect size to ensure that the Apple Pencil fits easily into the ALUM Case without any play at the tip when you write and draw. However, we do recommend that you take care to insert your Apple Pencil into the ALUM at a straight angle.

Q: What are the dimensions of the ALUM? Will it be comfortable for writing and drawing?

A: The ALUM Case is 12 mm in diameter. You might compare it to the thickness of a high quality pen. In our opinion, the hexagonal sides and the increased diameter of the ALUM make holding and using the Apple Pencil more enjoyable. We find that the flat bevels reduce fatigue when writing and drawing by giving more support to our hands than the rounded barrel of the Apple Pencil.

Q: Does the ALUM team have any plans to develop other accessories for Apple products?

A: Yes! Our small team of designers, engineers and artists are all passionate about designing and developing beautiful and functional objects that make our lives (and yours) more productive. We hope that this project will be the first of many and we hope to have other high quality accessories for you in the future, and we’d love your support. You can follow us on (website/instagram/facebook) and keep up to date on whatever we’re currently working on.

- For Press Release & High Resolutions Photos: HERE

- Contact us for Press/Distribution at : info@alum.works

story:
Hey, my name is Lars. That's me in the video showing how easy it is to make a pipe from an apple. Roughly 2 years ago I invented the apple pipe tool, not because I'm obsessed with smoking from apples, but because I like coming up with simple solutions.

Sketch of the first  design

I am asking you to help me come up with a solution to raise $8420 to produce the first batch of apple pipe tools, bumper stickers, and locally made wood retail displays. In fact, each of these items will be produced in Portland, OR (not in China)

Let's talk about perks. You can donate any amount you like and I will be forever grateful. You can also promote the project through any and all social media that you use. Social Pipes currently exists on Instagram. Wouldn't it be awesome to be part of launching a business that seeks to create solutions.

Well, if that's not enough, for a $16 donation you get 1 of the first 1000 apple pipe tools. Each one will come with a numbered card in the order donations are made. For the first 10 donors, I will include a signed, 5" X 15", limited edition fine art print of either "American Apple Pipes" or "Psychedelic Apple Pipes". For those of you with some friends who like to smoke, I am offering 3 tools for a $39 donation.

Everyone who donates, will receive a Social Pipes logo bumper sticker. Even a $1 donation will get you a bumper sticker if you post a link to the campaign on your own social media page and contact me with a link or screenshot.

If you are a retailer or micro-entrepreneur, larger quantities are available. In addition to the product, retailers will receive a link on socialpipes.org for at least one year.


What would it look like if we took this balanced approach? Through social media platforms and peer to peer networks, our society is experimenting and learning the benefits of this type of system.

The Oregon Intrastate Offering Exemption recently went into affect in January of 2015. This exception allows Oregon residents to invest small amounts in business, capped at $2,500 per individual. This legislation makes it easier for small businesses to raise capital, in addition to giving individuals the opportunity to own a portion of the businesses they support.

The first major goal of Social Pipes will be to sell 50% of it's ownership to small business owners and individuals in the state of Oregon, starting in late 2017.

At this time we are only offering the perks listed, in exchange for support of the campaign.

Thank you in advance for your support!


The Apple Pipe Tool is intended to make a pipe out of an apple, specifically for smoking federally legal herbs and tobacco. By supporting the campaign, you acknowledge that you are at least 18 years old.

story:
Campaign at a glance.

What is ‘safe love’?

A mobile App that helps you know beforehand if your sex partner is HIV infected.

How to use this App?

Download the app.

Enter your personal details.

If you are HIV positive, update ‘Safe love’ status as positive.

How can I update the status to HIV ‘negative’?

A user cannot do that by himself/herself. There are laboratories associated with ‘safe love’ authorized to do it. Only these labs can update the status to negative.

How can I locate a Lab associated with ‘safe love’?

A user can locate the nearest Lab with just one click. There are laboratories associated with ‘safe love’ all over the world.

How can I update my ‘safe love’ status through these labs?

Submit your ‘safe love’ ID to the Lab.

Give the Lab permission to update your status.

Complete a one minute photo verification.

Give blood sample for testing.

Lab will update the user’s status based on the test result.

How can a user know the ‘safe love’ status of another user?

You can make a request via messaging apps or ‘safe love’ app.

If that person gives permission, ‘safe love’ status of that person can be viewed.

Does this app provide the status of other sexual diseases which are likely to transmit from a sex partner?

Not at present. But this feature will be added soon.

What is the advantage of this application?

The habit of using this App before entering into relationships that may lead to sexual activity will help you avoid HIV infection.

You can find outa person’s HIV infection status in a respectable and reliable way without hurting the feelings of the other person.

Who is behind this application?

Four friends from India.

At what stage is ‘safe love’ app now?

Developed and ready for use with 3 operating systems.

Why are we now coming to you?

The App requires the most efficient and safe hosting. Physical verification of thousands of Labs associated with ‘safe love’ is also very important. We are here toraise fundsto meet these requirements.

How much do we need?

$86,400
**************************************************


Let love be transparent.


Have you ever contemplated a situation where you develop a relationship that leads to sex with another person and unfortunately the other person happens to be AIDS infected? What if we make love with that person unaware of his /her infection only to find out later that we too have fallen victim to that horrible curse? This danger lay hidden in any sexual contact, not just marital relations or love affairs.

In most cases a person gets infected with AIDS due to not being aware that the partner is infected. Most people won’t ask this question to a person they are likely to have sex with: ‘Are you HIV positive?’  The question may be raised in a joking style, but nobody takes it seriously. We do not ask because we fear that he/she may take it as an insult.

If we set this fear aside and dare to ask, the answer most likely will be ‘No. I am not HIV infected’. It does not mean they are infected or not, but rather they are not aware of it. Probably they never had to take a test for HIV before.

It is shocking to learn that some HIV infected persons, even though a very small percentage, purposely try to spread this virus to as many people as they can.  Just 3 weeks back, such an incident was reported in India. A 33 year old man passed on AIDS to about 300 people, including many house wives. It is really very cruel and sadistic.

Ask the vital question: “How to prevent AIDS?” and the answer you get from the society around you will be: “Safe sex”. The one and only way any one can suggest to ensure safe sex is to use a condom. Oral or similar deviations of sex are not totally safe either. There also the chances of getting infected are high. Therefore the use of condom alone cannot safeguard you from the possibility of HIV infection.

What is the sure solution then?

Never engage in sexual contact with HIV infected persons. In other words, before going in for sexual activity, convince yourself, using a respectable and reliable method, that your partner is not HIV infected.

We thought  and discussed the possibilities of developing such a system. And from these dreams, the concept of ’Safelove’ application was born.

How does this application work?

Download and install this App and enter the basic information required. You will then be taken to the home page. The image of home page is given below.

Main features in the homepage - User uploaded photo, users’ personal information and ’Safe love’ ID, HIV infection status indicator.

If the indicator shows ‘not updated’ it means the user, or any of the other devices in this App, have not added information about HIV positive or negative status.


For the user to update his status as positive:

This application has an option to mark, while entering  basic information, if the user is HIV positive. This changes the indicator status to positive.

What if the user wishes to change the status to HIV negative?

In the ‘safe love’ App, no user can change his own status to negative.

There are several highly efficient, responsible and recognized hospitals and laboratories associated with ‘Safe love’. Only these institutions can conduct an Elisa test on a user and update his/her status as positive or negative.

 We requested many Laboratories in cities of America and Canada to participate in this movement to prevent AIDS by conducting Elisa tests on ‘Safe love’ users and updating their status. The response received really was surprising.  Every lab we approached happily consented to participate and many of them offered to conduct the Elisa tests for ‘safe love’ users at much discounted rates.

Now, let’s see how a user can get his status updated by a laboratory.

 ‘Safe love’ application has the facility that allows the user to search and find approved laboratories around his place. 

Using this facility user can easily search for the nearest Lab. The search result will be displayed like this:

Once he/she reaches the selected lab, he/she has to submit a request for the Elisa test and give his/her ‘safe love’ ID. He/she will receive the following notification on their ‘Safe love’ App.

“X laboratory situated at X requests consent to update your ‘Safe love’ status”.

He/she can issue or deny them permission. The notification provides an option to do that. The lab cannot update the status without your consent. They cannot even view your profile.

If he/she gives consent to update the status, the next step is to take a blood test. 

A photo verification is required before taking the blood sample for testing. This is to assure that photo given in the profile is of the same person. Once the verification is done, then on the user cannot delete the photo from his/her profile.  

After that an accurate blood test will be conducted and depending on the result, positive or negative, the status will be updated by the laboratory authority.

100% accurate and reliable HIV status of the user will be displayed in the homepage.

Next,  how a user can view the ‘Safe love’ status of another user.

If I wish to view the profile of another user and check his HIV status, I have to forward a request to that person, through instant messaging apps like ‘WhatsApp’ or social media sites like ‘Facebook’ or by e-mail, using the feature provided in ‘safe love’ App. Alternately, If I can get the safe love ID from that person, I can directly obtain his ‘safe love’ status from my ‘safe love’ application.

When a person  submit a request for another person’s status, that person receives a notification in his/her safe love app. 

That notification contains options for him to accept or reject my request. If he chooses to reject, the person will not be able to view his status or profile. If  request is accepted, person will get access to his profile and can check his safe love status. he/she can find out when his status was last updated. If I find the update very old, I can request for a fresh update.

‘Safe love’ will reveal the status of a user to another user taking extreme precautions to maintain total security and the privacy of the user.

The habit of exchanging the ‘Safe love’ status before any sexual relation will help considerably reduce the spreading of HIV infection. Insisting on ‘Safe love’ status in sexual relations will protect you from deadly HIV infection.

We present this application mainly for two types of people.

One for those people who believe that a few minutes pleasure should not cause destruction of our lives due to HIV infection.

For those who believe that one should not become the cause of AIDS infection to a person who trustfully gives love and pleasure.

We strongly believe that these two categories of people will take this App to their heart and use it to safe guard their own life and the life of others.

About us:

We are four friends with a common desire to do something different and valuable to the society.

Dr.Sindhu E.R

Post Doctoral fellow at Baylor College of Medicine, Houston - US. and senior lecturer at Royal Dental college.

A life dedicated to Cancer research, medical science, and teaching.

Her thoughts and actions are based on spirituality and she accomplishes every job entrusted on her with total devotion.

Verification of the laboratories associating with ‘safe love’. And monitoring their follow up operation is executed under the efficient leadership of Dr.Sindhu.

Biju George 

A freelance web developer.

Loves to discover new possibilities from drawbacks and convert those possibilities into reality.

The  concept of ‘safe love’ is a brain child of Biju George.

He provides the inspiration and motivation as the leader of project ‘safe love’.

Renjith Radhakrishnan

Graduate in Economics.

An expert in coordinating any type projects maintaining financial integrity and discipline. Ranjith takes care of the financial aspects of ‘safe love’.

Ameen.A.J.

UI/UX Designer at edureka. And chief Consultant at Eons Live

A web designer with wonderful creative skills.

Ameen, well versed in creating simply beautiful designs is also an expert in marketing of any type of products.

Designing and marketing wing of ‘safe love’ is led by Ameen.

Why do we  approach you?

Safe love’ app for all Operating Systems are already developed. Several people selected for testing this app are now using it.  But before we present this application to users worldwide, we have to take care of some very important factors.

Privacy and security are the two main factors. No one would like reveal to the public their personal information and the details of their illness. Therefore we intend to encrypt all data, including the Names and personal information and maintain highest level of privacy.

Another important factor is security. To assure total security and excellence in performance levels of the application, we are hosting this app in the best available cloud sever. All the security devices available today are incorporated in ‘Safe love’.

A very important part of security measures is the physical verification of the recognition certificates and performance of laboratories willing to be associated with ‘Safe love’. We know that the purpose of this App will not be fulfilled if we tie up with only a few labs in some areas only. Our idea is to have an associate lab in every place where ‘Safe love’ app is used. We do not give approval to every lab that submits request. We strive to identify the best in quality and performance among these labs and give approval only to the labs that meet our quality criteria. Much human effort is to be employed in order to facilitate this.

Naturally, all this will cost a lot of money. We have only limited resources and the huge sum of money that this project demands is beyond our capacity. If all of you come up with generous support, we can present before the world this very useful Application in a matter of few days. We request all kind hearted people to extend support.

How much funds are we expecting to raise?

86400 USD.  Working capital for one year.We assure that, within this one year, we can build yie up relations with laboratories in important towns all over the world and develop excellent level of performance.

How will we utilize your money?

Application development is complete and ready. Next step is ‘hosting’. $ 1500 for that.

Another critically important thing to do is to physically verify he registration certificates of associating Labs and to verify by video call that the labs applying for association are really functional and the facilities they claim to have are really available. Three of us are working on this project now and it is estimated that about 20 persons are needed to work full time.  Calculating @ $300 per month per person, we will have to keep a reserve of $86400 for 30 people for 12 months.

High speed internet is essential - $ 3000 for one year 

In what other ways can you support this venture?

Kindly light up our paths. Share your valuable ideas and suggestions. Guide us.

Please write about this campaign and promote us in your Blog, print media or Social media.

To show your support and to receive up to date information, please like our Facebook page.

Thank you for spending your time to read this slightly elongated explanation. For us, this show of interest from kind hearted people like you is the first and most valuable gesture of support.

Let love be transparent.
