story:
Kongo is intelligently designed, so your calls are crystal clear.

Take Kongo jogging. Relax, it won't fall off.

Kongo is a tireless work horse...... even while you work out.


PICK  A  PERK.

ENJOY  MUSIC.

SAVE  LIVES.

The Kongo Team has decided to donate  25% of our profits from this Indiegogo campaign to The Water Project, a Non-Profit group that provides safe drinking water to millions of people.

Every time you put on your Kongo headphones and tune out with your favorite band, you can do so knowing that you made a difference in someone's life. That's a Win-Win situation!

Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo Supporters, for help raising $37,000. This amount will cover the cost of manufacturing, marketing and distributing the Kongo headset. The Donation to The Water Project will come from our profits.

Your contribution will give the world two precious gifts: this cutting-edge headset and clean life-saving water to those who need it most.




Could you tell me more about the Saving Lives part of your Kongo campaign?

Sure. It's actually very straightforward, albeit unfortunate. There are communities all over the world with no access to clean drinking water. When they drink dirty or contaminated water, some of them get sick. According to U.N monitoring, hundreds of thousands of children, women and men die each year as a direct result of this.

The Water Project, a Non-Profit organization, provides wells in such communities, thereby saving the lives of those that would have died had they continued drinking dirty water. They have clean water not just for a day but for decades to come.

When you partner with us by purchasing your very own Kongo headset, a substantial part of our profits will go The Water Project. You are therefore helping to save lives.

Can I really get all those Perks for Free?

Most definitely. The more you share your link with friends, the more Perks we will gladly send you as our Thank You for supporting our campaign.

How does your referral program work?

We would like to reward you for referring friends and family to support Kongo launch. Please see our chart above for the rewards you can claim when your friends support us.

Also, please see this Post on Indiegogo about Referral contests.

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest

Where can I find my unique referral code?

You will need to log into your Indiegogo account.  You will see your name on the upper right corner of the page). Then use one of the buttons that appear to the left of the video. Look for a code at the end of the link (which is different for everyone), and that's your unique code!

Will I be able to check how many people I've referred?

Yes, first sign in on Indiegogo, and click on your name above the search box at the top right of the page. Click "My Profile" from the drop-down menu, then click on the “Referrals” tab to see totals of your referrals and contributions that resulted from your sharing!

How soon will I get my referral rewards?

We will do a tally of your referrals at the end of the campaign, and anyone who has successfully referred others to support us will be contacted via email to confirm total earned as well as your shipping address.

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?

Actually, yes. We have made Kongo to be really affordable. So, we would appreciate if you could help us with the cost of shipping it to you.  Costs are included as line items within associated perks.

Shipping costs will be automatically calculated once you select a reward.

Depending on the number of headsets you select  and where you live on the planet, the shipping cost will vary.

Will I be able to change my address for shipping?

Making changes to your order is done through your Indiegogo account. If you have any difficulty changing the address, please contact Indiegogo for support. After the campaign, you will also receive a survey from our fulfillment partners and you can confirm your shipping address.

When do I choose the colors of my Perks?

Just before shipping your Kongo, we will send you an email and will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to pick your colors  and confirm your shipping address.

What if I forgot to include shipping in my original order, how will you fix that?

We will just ask you to please send additional shipping fees via PayPal.

How will I know when you are about to ship my Kongo?

We will send you an email with a tracking number as soon as we ship your Kongo.

How is shipping processed?

We will be shipping via the USPS First Class. International shipments will be sent via USPS International First Class.

How long will shipping take?

In the U.S. and Canada. once a shipping confirmation is sent, you should receive your package within 5 business days. International backers can expect to receive packages a little later depending on the region.

What about shipping to a P.O  Box address?

Yes, we ship to post office addresses too.

Does Kongo come with a Warranty?

Absolutely! Every Kongo headset will come with a six months Manufacturer’s Warranty.

What happens if I change my mind  and would like a refund?

 In practice, the Indiegogo Support team takes care of all refund requests. You can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign ends, for immediate processing of all refund requests.

If it happens that our campaign has already entered InDemand, the Indiegogo Support team can still process refund requests if made within 10 days of the contribution.

What types of mobile devices will Kongo work with?

Kongo is equipped with Bluetooth® v4.0 and is compatible with all iOS and Android Bluetooth-ready devices, such as smartphones, tablets, Mac and PC computers and laptops.

What if I have small  ears, is Kongo Headset a good fit?

Yes, Kongo has been designed to fit all ears comfortably and won't fall off.

How can I order kongo?

 Right now, the only way to get Kongo wireless earphones is through this Indiegogo page. Contributors on Indiegogo will be the first to own Kongo. Just click the "Pick This Perk" button  to make your contribution and get Kongo sent out to you 2 months after the campaign ends.

Can I order more than one?

Yes, you can. We encourage you to. Think of the lives you will be saving and all the hundreds of people you will be providing clean drinking water with your contribution. Pre-order as many Kongo units as you’d like – the more the better.

Will I be able to change my Perk?

Yes. Indiegogo makes it easy to upgrade your perks. Please check this link for more information on how to do this here:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.

Can I use two phones with Kongo at the same time?

Yes. You can connect your Kongo to two different phones simultaneously.

Is Kongo waterproof?

No. We do not recommend that you take Kongo into the shower or for swimming. But we have designed it to be dust, sweat, and water resistant to handle the wear of everyday use of heavy workouts and rainy weather.

And you can also use Kongo during your post-workout activities, such as saunas and steam rooms. Don't forget to wipe off any excess moisture before you store Kongo.

How long does the battery last?

Kongo comes with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery that delivers five (5) hours of a continuous phone conversation or 4 hours of music.

You can do a complete recharge in under 2 hours.

Each Kongo is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. All you need to do is plug your headphones into a USB port in your computer or wall via the micro-USB charging cable.

What is Kongo's wireless range?

Your Kongo offers reliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft which is roughly 10 meters.

In which colors does Kongo come in?

Kongo comes in 5 colors.....Black, White, Pink, Blue, and Green

How can I reach out to your team directly?

We love connecting with our customers, so if you'd like to reach someone on our team directly, please drop us a note at kongo@kongoheadset.com


What's Next?

We want to share Kongo with you as quickly as possible so that we can in partnership, start providing clean drinking water to people that need it most. Here is our timetable.

June.......... Indiegogo promotion starts.
July...........Indiegogo promotion ends.
Backers survey sent for color selection etc
August...........Procurement of parts and components needed.
Manufacturing begins.
October........By the end of October, shipping of your Kongo Headsets begin. 


Thank you for backing our campaign.
story_txt:
Kongo is intelligently designed, so your calls are crystal clear.


Take Kongo jogging. Relax, it won't fall off.

Kongo is a tireless work horse...... even while you work out.






PICK  A  PERK.
ENJOY  MUSIC.
SAVE  LIVES.

The Kongo Team has decided to donate  25% of our profits from this Indiegogo campaign to The Water Project, a Non-Profit group that provides safe drinking water to millions of people.






Every time you put on your Kongo headphones and tune out with your favorite band, you can do so knowing that you made a difference in someone's life. That's a Win-Win situation!


Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo Supporters, for help raising $37,000. This amount will cover the cost of manufacturing, marketing and distributing the Kongo headset. The Donation to The Water Project will come from our profits.Your contribution will give the world two precious gifts: this cutting-edge headset and clean life-saving water to those who need it most.



 





 


 
 

 




Could you tell me more about the Saving Lives part of your Kongo campaign?
Sure. It's actually very straightforward, albeit unfortunate. There are communities all over the world with no access to clean drinking water. When they drink dirty or contaminated water, some of them get sick. According to U.N monitoring, hundreds of thousands of children, women and men die each year as a direct result of this.
The Water Project, a Non-Profit organization, provides wells in such communities, thereby saving the lives of those that would have died had they continued drinking dirty water. They have clean water not just for a day but for decades to come.
When you partner with us by purchasing your very own Kongo headset, a substantial part of our profits will go The Water Project. You are therefore helping to save lives.
Can I really get all those Perks for Free?
Most definitely. The more you share your link with friends, the more Perks we will gladly send you as our Thank You for supporting our campaign.
How does your referral program work?
We would like to reward you for referring friends and family to support Kongo launch. Please see our chart above for the rewards you can claim when your friends support us.
Also, please see this Post on Indiegogo about Referral contests.
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest
Where can I find my unique referral code?
You will need to log into your Indiegogo account.  You will see your name on the upper right corner of the page). Then use one of the buttons that appear to the left of the video. Look for a code at the end of the link (which is different for everyone), and that's your unique code!
Will I be able to check how many people I've referred?
Yes, first sign in on Indiegogo, and click on your name above the search box at the top right of the page. Click "My Profile" from the drop-down menu, then click on the “Referrals” tab to see totals of your referrals and contributions that resulted from your sharing!
How soon will I get my referral rewards?
We will do a tally of your referrals at the end of the campaign, and anyone who has successfully referred others to support us will be contacted via email to confirm total earned as well as your shipping address.
Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?
Actually, yes. We have made Kongo to be really affordable. So, we would appreciate if you could help us with the cost of shipping it to you.  Costs are included as line items within associated perks.
Shipping costs will be automatically calculated once you select a reward.
Depending on the number of headsets you select  and where you live on the planet, the shipping cost will vary.
Will I be able to change my address for shipping?
Making changes to your order is done through your Indiegogo account. If you have any difficulty changing the address, please contact Indiegogo for support. After the campaign, you will also receive a survey from our fulfillment partners and you can confirm your shipping address.
When do I choose the colors of my Perks?
Just before shipping your Kongo, we will send you an email and will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to pick your colors  and confirm your shipping address.
What if I forgot to include shipping in my original order, how will you fix that?
We will just ask you to please send additional shipping fees via PayPal.
How will I know when you are about to ship my Kongo?
We will send you an email with a tracking number as soon as we ship your Kongo.
How is shipping processed?
We will be shipping via the USPS First Class. International shipments will be sent via USPS International First Class.
How long will shipping take?
In the U.S. and Canada. once a shipping confirmation is sent, you should receive your package within 5 business days. International backers can expect to receive packages a little later depending on the region.
What about shipping to a P.O  Box address?
Yes, we ship to post office addresses too.
Does Kongo come with a Warranty?
Absolutely! Every Kongo headset will come with a six months Manufacturer’s Warranty.
What happens if I change my mind  and would like a refund?
 In practice, the Indiegogo Support team takes care of all refund requests. You can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign ends, for immediate processing of all refund requests.
If it happens that our campaign has already entered InDemand, the Indiegogo Support team can still process refund requests if made within 10 days of the contribution.
What types of mobile devices will Kongo work with?
Kongo is equipped with Bluetooth® v4.0 and is compatible with all iOS and Android Bluetooth-ready devices, such as smartphones, tablets, Mac and PC computers and laptops.
What if I have small  ears, is Kongo Headset a good fit?
Yes, Kongo has been designed to fit all ears comfortably and won't fall off.
How can I order kongo?
 Right now, the only way to get Kongo wireless earphones is through this Indiegogo page. Contributors on Indiegogo will be the first to own Kongo. Just click the "Pick This Perk" button  to make your contribution and get Kongo sent out to you 2 months after the campaign ends.
Can I order more than one?
Yes, you can. We encourage you to. Think of the lives you will be saving and all the hundreds of people you will be providing clean drinking water with your contribution. Pre-order as many Kongo units as you’d like – the more the better.
Will I be able to change my Perk?
Yes. Indiegogo makes it easy to upgrade your perks. Please check this link for more information on how to do this here:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.
Can I use two phones with Kongo at the same time?
Yes. You can connect your Kongo to two different phones simultaneously.
Is Kongo waterproof?
No. We do not recommend that you take Kongo into the shower or for swimming. But we have designed it to be dust, sweat, and water resistant to handle the wear of everyday use of heavy workouts and rainy weather.
And you can also use Kongo during your post-workout activities, such as saunas and steam rooms. Don't forget to wipe off any excess moisture before you store Kongo.
How long does the battery last?
Kongo comes with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery that delivers five (5) hours of a continuous phone conversation or 4 hours of music.
You can do a complete recharge in under 2 hours.
Each Kongo is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. All you need to do is plug your headphones into a USB port in your computer or wall via the micro-USB charging cable.
What is Kongo's wireless range?
Your Kongo offers reliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft which is roughly 10 meters.
In which colors does Kongo come in?
Kongo comes in 5 colors.....Black, White, Pink, Blue, and Green
How can I reach out to your team directly?
We love connecting with our customers, so if you'd like to reach someone on our team directly, please drop us a note at kongo@kongoheadset.com

What's Next?
We want to share Kongo with you as quickly as possible so that we can in partnership, start providing clean drinking water to people that need it most. Here is our timetable.June.......... Indiegogo promotion starts.July...........Indiegogo promotion ends.
Backers survey sent for color selection etcAugust...........Procurement of parts and components needed.Manufacturing begins.October........By the end of October, shipping of your Kongo Headsets begin. 

Thank you for backing our campaign.

story:
Hello, INDIEGOGO! My name is Marat and today I’d like to present you my new project called ANYROOM charger.

ANYROOM charger is a portable multi-charger docking station able to charge two devices simultaneously, no matter where it is placed. 


Everyone has electronic devices that need to be charged from time to time. The idea of AR charger is unbelievably simple: you don’t have to use dozens of wires and docks at home anymore – you can choose one AR charger responsible for charging all necessary devices. Moreover, it’s totally portable and versatile. 


With AR charger it doesn’t matter where you are. You simply enjoy your daily routine while your favorite gadget is autonomously charged by AR charger – and that gives you an opportunity to have your device with you whenever you need it. You don’t have to waste money on expensive wires for charging various gadgets. AR charger will definitely take care of that for you.

You can be in a hall reading e-mails, go to the kitchen and look for recipes online, move to the bathroom and listen to relaxing tunes, work at the desk and answer work e-mails, stay in the children’s room to watch cartoons or enjoy a new book in a chaise longue by the swimming pool. The best thing is that now you’ve got a chance to do all of the above while your devices are being charged. 


On this great day I’d like to ask for your help in supporting further development of this project.


Why are there two Indiegogo campaigns?

It’s rather simple. At this moment, it’s impossible to ascertain the full price of the complete AR charger, that’s why I can only make assumptions. The full price of the charger will be known as soon as I create the final prototype (case + electronic filling). And I still need investment for developing the final prototype. The first campaign will help raise funds for creating the final prototype and define the total price of the model. The second campaign is needed for investment into mass production of the charger. Moreover, the rewards from the first campaign will be taken into consideration during the second campaign, which means that investors will get all promised discounts and bonuses. Make a deposit now and you’ll get AR charger for a unique price.

Why does it take so long to release AR charger (est. August 2017)?

I prefer to play it safe to make sure I maintain the trust of my backers by providing a more realistic release deadline. I could have set an earlier date with the minimal buffer for potential development issues, but would rather stick to a more viable date.

Where will the money from the first campaign go?

58% - development of logo and brand, as well as further work on design and structure of AR charger. 

32% - development of electronic constituents of AR charger.

5% - creating the final prototype (case + electronic filling).

10% - Indiegogo fee.

AR charger allows you to use Apple Lightning to USB cable and Apple USB Power Adapter, which protects your device from problems occurring due to incompatibility or device safety settings. Apple Lightning to USB Cable is provided with significant protection from wear and physical damage by being put into the case of AR charger.

Devices are charged thanks to a docking station with an embedded battery.


The docking station with an embedded battery gets energy from a charging platform connected to the electrical network.


Don’t waste your money on dozens of wires. One AR charger is enough for charging various devices you have in different rooms. What’s more, it uses less space and reduces clutter.

Charging two devices simultaneously. Extra USB port for charging an extra third gadget.


Maximum compatibility. AR charger is compatible with most cases.

Easy access to device while charging. AR charger holds the device upright for you to be able to dial video calls, send text and e-mail, check notifications, etc.



[Here are the details on the developed prototype; note: the final version will have different dimensions and an enhanced battery capacity]

Dimensions: 

92.00mm x 87.00mm x 43.6mm 

(with charge spot 92.00mm x 96.00mm x 47.0mm)

Colors: 

PERFECT WHITE

Materials: 

Glossy ABS plastic

Tips: 

USB1 for original Apple Lightning to USB Cable (1 m)

USB2 for any to USB cable.

Electronic Specs:

2400 mAh battery

Output: 5 V DC (USB1: 1 A / USB2: 2 A)

Short circuit, over current, over charge, over discharge and over temperature protection

Compatibility: 

Any Apple devices with Lightning connector

Any devices connected via USB

•Apple USB Power Adapter not included

•Apple Lightning to USB Cable (1 m) not included




The project you are presented right now is not a complete device, it’s only an idea. The idea I hope to make real using your support. I have never dealt with production before. That’s why I found specialists – those good at industrial design, production, logistics and developing electronic constituents - in order to finish the project in time and to show the best possible quality of the final product. This will guarantee perfect timing for both production and shipping the ready goods. 

However, certain unexpected problems may occur during production. In this case, the specialists’ experience and professional skills will help us cope with the inconveniences and provide you with the best results in time.

If we face any unforeseen situations, you’ll be the first to know about it and about our efforts in solving the issues. Being our investor, you will be provided with inside information on the details of AR charger production.

If you like my idea, please contribute to the development of the project called ANYROOM charger! I will be very grateful for any assistance (investment, like, repost). Now you are part of this wonderful project as well! 

You can send your questions to my facebook profile or via e-mail.

https://www.instagram.com/anyroom_charger/
https://www.facebook.com/anyroomcharger/
You can also download the press kit.

story:
BangleCharger is the first iPhone USB charger you can carry at your wrist!

BangleCharger is a lightning cable you can use as a stylish bracelet and always have with you.


Do you often travel around and find yourself lacking battery juice for your iPhone?
BangleCharger is made just for you.

  • Carry your cable always with you, as a nice bracelet
  • High charge capacity, as fast as the official Apple cable
  • High quality elastomer and nickel free plate
  • Charge and sync functions


Design

BangleCharger is designed to be handy and useful, while keeping its nature as a fashion element.

It's not just a techie product or a cable you wrap around your wrist, it's an elegant piece of design you can wear anywhere and anytime, without worrying about it.

BangleCharger is available in two colors: deep black and snow white.


Specifications

However, BangleCharger is not a common bracelet.

When your iPhone needs some charge, just unwrap your BangleCharger and plug it into your phone and on a power outlet - a battery bank, or a wall plug.

BangleCharger features a lightning connector on one side and a classic USB plug on the other side. That makes it a fully featured USB cable.

The USB plug is golden plated to guarantee a fast charge and file transfer up to 480Mbps

The Lightning plug is just like the official Apple plug. It offers full iPhone, iPad and iPod compatibility and supports fast charge - if the power source can handle that!

Manufacturing

We found materials, pieces, manufacturer and logistic companies to help us in this adventure. BangleCharger is going to enter the manufacturing state in the last week of February. That's why we're here on Indiegogo: we'd like to get our first pre-orders and some money to purchase our further goals - that's the reason we chose the Fixed Funding campaign. Stretch goals will be available later this month.

The Team

The BangleCharger team is made of three people, two engineers and an industrial designers.

We are Michele, Mariarita and Luca, the inventors of BangleCharger. We designed it to be handy and nice, and to offer high technology specifications.

story:
Let's make UrbanMama for Android!

Raising children in cities and visiting other cities is rewarding for many reasons. However, finding fun things to do with children - or finding a place to change a diaper in the city - can be difficult and time-consuming.

Having raised young kids in both Europe and the U.S., we thought there must be a better way to find this information whenever and wherever it’s needed. So in 2015 we launched the UrbanMama iOS (iPhone) app in Amsterdam. UrbanMama provides curated information about kid-friendly places & current events. There’s so much to discover! With UrbanMama, you can view it all on a map and filter the results to find what fits your needs. (We have curated entries on 300+ places and a continually-updated listing of events in Amsterdam!)


We feel that this project is a worthy cause. Parenting isn’t easy. And days with young children can sometimes seem so, so long. But as we watch our kids grow up so quickly, we realize that family time is precious. We strongly believe in the value of families getting out and doing things together. As a wise person once said, nobody remembers their best day watching TV (or playing computer games). Let's simplify things for parents so that families can get out and maximize the joy of family time.

UrbanMama has an increasing community of engaged users in Amsterdam and we have received really positive and encouraging feedback. We have also had many requests for an Android version. That is why we are reaching out to you now. We invested our own resources to develop the iOS app. We need your help to make an Android app (for the other major type of smartphones) & open up UrbanMama to a much wider community of parents. 

Once we do that, we can start building out other cities to increase UrbanMama's usefulness to both locals and tourists. 

What we need, what you'll get & your impact

We need 10,000 euro to build a solid Android app.

We know how to do it. We created the iOS app from scratch and have working relationships with good designers and developers. Plus, we’ve already built (and maintain) the database with hundreds of curated entries that will support both apps.

What can we offer you in return for your support? Truth is, we’re not producing trendy new tech toys to give you in return. And we don’t believe in burdening our planet with cute little promo gifts. 

First, you’ll feel good that you supported a worthy cause. You’ll have the appreciation of a lot of busy parents!

Contributors at & above the 20 EUR level get the Android app for free.

Contributors at & above the 50 EUR level get a variety of special thank-yous and other recognition opportunities.

Why contribute if you don’t live in Amsterdam? For the feel-good reason described above! Or, come visit Amsterdam and use UrbanMama as a discovery tool with your family. And some day, we may expand UrbanMama to your city. PLUS, anybody can add content to UrbanMama, which means that a parents' community anywhere can crowd-source content for their city to share with each other!

Why isn’t the UrbanMama app free? UrbanMama is more than “just” an app. UrbanMama is a service that delivers regularly-updated, curated content…which doesn’t "grow on trees." Plus, there are additional costs like maintaining the server and making ongoing improvements to the apps. UrbanMama isn’t free because we want to keep it ad-free. We think ads are a nuisance for busy parents, so we need other income to cover these expenses. 

Can you trust us to get the job done?

Yes! As parents, we think we understand the problem well. We believe this is something worthwhile to tackle. We think that family time is precious and we should work to make the most of it – because they're not young forever. This is what UrbanMama is about.

Getting here hasn’t been easy. On the contrary. We worked through many hurdles in the last two years, bringing UrbanMama from just an idea to an iOS app. We learned at every step of the way. We had to find a designer, developers, build a website, ask for help from friends (and people we’d never met before), learn to be patient and deal with disappointments and set-backs. Some of us had to step out of comfort zones big time and we invested a significant amount of our own money. But we got it done! 

If you provide your support, we can create a great UrbanMama experience for Android.

Let's get this done! Please share the campaign!

Whether or not you can contribute, we REALLY need your help to spread the word, and fast! This is an ALL-OR-NOTHING campaign, which means we have a LIMITED TIME to raise funds. If we can’t get to the target funding level (10K), you’ll get back your contribution.

If you like the idea of UrbanMama, PLEASE SHARE THE CAMPAIGN on Facebook and in your other social circles.

Thank you so much for your support!

seize the day | save the day | survive the day

will support both apps.
What can we offer you in
return for your support? Truth is, we’re not producing trendy new tech toys to
give you in return. And we don’t believe in burdening our planet with cute
little promo gifts. 
First, you’ll feel good that you supported a worthy cause. You’ll have
the appreciation of a lot of busy parents!
Contributors at & above the 20 EUR level get the Android app for free.
Contributors at & above the 50 EUR level get a variety of special thank-yous and other recognition opportunities.
Why
contribute if you don’t live in Amsterdam? For
the feel-good reason described above! Or, come visit Amsterdam and use UrbanMama as a discovery tool with your family. And some day, we may expand UrbanMama to your
city. PLUS, anybody can add content to UrbanMama, which means that a parents' community anywhere can crowd-source content for their city to share with each other!
Why
isn’t the UrbanMama app free? UrbanMama
is more than “just” an app. UrbanMama is a service that delivers regularly-updated,
curated content…which doesn’t "grow on trees." Plus, there are additional costs
like maintaining the server and making ongoing improvements to the apps. UrbanMama
isn’t free because we want to keep it ad-free. We think ads are a nuisance for
busy parents, so we need other income to cover these expenses. 
Can you trust us to get the job done?
Yes! As parents, we think we understand the problem well. We believe this is something worthwhile to tackle. We think that family time is
precious and we should work to make the most of it – because they're not young forever. This
is what UrbanMama is about.

Getting here hasn’t been easy. On the contrary. We
worked through many hurdles in the last two years, bringing UrbanMama from just
an idea to an iOS app. We learned at every step of the way. We had to find a
designer, developers, build a website, ask for help from friends (and people we’d
never met before), learn to be patient and deal with disappointments and set-backs.
Some of us had to step out of comfort zones big time and we invested a significant
amount of our own money. But we got it done! 
If you provide your support, we can
create a great UrbanMama experience for Android.
Let's get this done! Please share the campaign!
 
Whether or not you can contribute, we REALLY need your help to spread the word, and fast! This is an
ALL-OR-NOTHING campaign, which means we have a LIMITED TIME to raise funds. If we can’t
get to the target funding level (10K), you’ll get back your contribution.
If you like the idea of UrbanMama, PLEASE SHARE THE CAMPAIGN on Facebook
and in your other social circles.
Thank you so much for your support!seize the day | save the day | survive the day

story:
Update


The maker community has felt that we require some changes in our current prototype before HackPOD becomes a full-fledged product. We acknowledge the mistakes on our part and appreciate all the support that the community has provided us.

We are making a new prototype satisfying the needs and recommendations of the community. So we have refunded all our backers who backed the current version of HackPOD.

As part of Team HackPOD, we express our deepest gratitude to all the contributors of our campaign. By now, all your refunds have been probably completed. Do reach out to us if you face any problems with your refund.

HackPOD will launch again, stronger and faster than before. Keep following our blog for all updates.

Avikalpa and Sayan

August 2, 2016.


What is HackPOD?


HackPOD is a powerful microcontroller development platform based on 32 bit ARM Cortex-M4, programmable  in Arduino and C.

HackPOD also includes an integrated touchscreen, a memory card slot, an in-built protoboard and SMT space and a rechargeable battery, all within a portable smartphone form factor.

HackPOD caters to the needs of hobbyists, students and engineers by presenting them with much more power and ease.
MUST READ : 

Disclaimer: The above images are just HackPOD's current prototype. There will be minor changes  in the consumer version (like solder mask colour, smoother PCB edges etc.). It will be more aesthetic and robust at final. We will keep you updated.

Special Features



Touchscreen LCD: HackPOD features an integrated 3.2 inch touchscreen display of resolution 240 X 320. The screen is of the optimum size for portable projects like wearable gadgets.  


Portable Smartphone Form Factor: The complete HackPOD device consisting of the microcontroller logic board, touchscreen and battery is shaped like a smartphone to make your projects compact, sleek and portable. 


Memory Card Slot: The HackPOD board has a memory card slot which supports SD, SDHC and SDIO cards. Your code will never run out of storage space again!!
 
Rechargeable Battery: Have you always envisioned completely wireless projects running without any external power source? We have included a 1800 mAh 3.7V Li-Po battery just for that.
Arduino compatible:  HackPOD is fully compatible with the Arduino IDE. All your existing Arduino codes will work on HackPOD. You can also program in C language.


HackPOD API: Based on Henning Karlsen's open source UTFT library, the HackPOD API is designed to make controlling the touchscreen and memory card completely hassle-free.




In-built Breadboard: Say goodbye to messy wiring. Build your prototypes and connect breakout modules and Arduino shields on the HackPOD breadboard itself. The clean circuits will make debugging projects a walk in the park.


Integrated SMT space: We have included an SMT space on HackPOD for pro hackers who want to solder their breakouts, . Ours is the only microcontroller platform with plug and play support for SMT breakout modules such as RFM22B/23B.


On-board Digital-to-Analog Converter pin: HackPOD provides an  on-board DAC pin. Use it for a signal generator, an oscilloscope or in any other way you envisage.


On-board uFL antenna connector: Need greater communication range for your projects? Just hop an antenna on our on-board uFL mount.




Why use HackPOD?



Most Economical LCD Touchscreen Integration: Integrating an LCD touchscreen with available microcontroller boards in the market is expensive and limits all connecting pins, thereby making DIY projects involving LCDs very difficult. HackPOD brings you LCD touchscreen integration at a very reasonable price.


Portability: HackPOD is the only development platform with a smartphone form factor, so that any your projects completed with HackPOD will look more aesthetic and compact than those on other platforms. The device can also be hacked to make wearable products like smartwatches, virtual reality headsets and fitness trackers. The only limit is your imagination!!!




Fast and Efficient: The "brain" of HackPOD is a 32 bit ARM Cortex-M4 chip, rendering it much more powerful than traditional microcontroller development platforms. Running at a regular clock speed of 72 MHz, it can be safely overclocked to 96 MHz.


Plug and Play: HackPOD's unique design allows seamless connectivity with nearly all breakout boards and Arduino shields available in the market. You can build custom circuits on the integrated protoboard itself.


Battery Power: HackPOD makes it possible for your projects to work without any external power connection. A single charge of the rechargeable battery can last for several days.


Memory: HackPOD's expandable memory provides plenty of extra storage space for your code.


SDIO Card Support: HackPOD's memory card slot supports SDIO 1.0 cards. Add extra functionality to your projects using GPS, Wi-Fi, Ethernet or Camera SDIO cards. HackPOD also supports Electric Imp out of the box.


Technical Specifications

Schematic Diagram



Download the schematic here.


User Guides


We are currently preparing an ebook 'Getting Started with HackPOD' and a series of tutorials to get new users acquainted with HackPOD. These will be made available for download from our website in due time.


What We Need and What You Get


We have initially been prototyping via small batches of boards. HackPOD's current prototype has been assembled and meticulously tested and we are confident with our design. Costs of development have been paid for, and the funding required is for manufacturing and shipping the first few batches of HackPOD.

Beyond the immediate goal of this campaign, the HackPOD project is about providing an advanced electronics development platform in the hands of the maker community. After shipping our Indiegogo perks, we plan to move the product into retail. HackPOD will have more production runs, and will be available post this campaign.


Risks and Challenges


Quality is our first Priority: We are committed to deliver you a great product. We will be working very closely with our manufacturers and run rigorous tests on our products before shipping to ensure that only the best reaches your hands. This may result in a delay in the release schedule, but there will be no compromise in quality.


Then comes affordability: We also aim to provide HackPOD at the most affordable price possible while maintaining the best quality.


Project History


HackPOD is the result of over 2 years of accumulated hard work. Read the complete story behind HackPOD here.


Release Schedule


The first batch of HackPOD will be manufactured and assembled by September 2016. After the testing phase, all units are scheduled to be shipped by November 2016.

As mentioned before, HackPOD will be available for purchase post this campaign. We will keep you updated regarding the same.


Meet the Team


Avikalpa Kundu, the brain: An Electronics Engineering undergrad, and active member of the maker community, Avikalpa has been the most instrumental behind the development of HackPOD. Always passionate about hacking electronic gadgets, the idea for HackPOD cropped up in his head while working on a project requiring integration of an LCD with an Arduino Mega while simultaneously making it portable. Working tirelessly towards this project for over two years, he added many cool features and much more functionality to the platform.

Sayan Bhattacharyya, the brawn: Another Electronics Engineering undergrad, specifically interested in Artificial  Intelligence Technologies. Also loves EDM music!! Passionate about startups, Sayan had always dreamed of founding his own. He joined the project to make HackPOD available to everyone.


Spread the Word


We need your support to make our campaign succeed. Donations are not the only way in which you can help us.Apart from financial contributions, following are some ways in which you can lend us a helping hand.

Word of Mouth: Know people who may be interested in our project? Tell them about HackPOD.

Social Media: Like our page and share our campaign on Facebook.  Visit our website and blog.

story:
Short Summary

iLuvFood Restaurant Manager is a free APP to manage your restaurant, pizzeria, pub, etc. using only tablets, smartphones and a wifi network.

All features are integrated in only a single APP that permit to manage:

  • Cash/POS system
  • Room orders
  • Cuisine orders and prepearations
  • Overall situation of restaurant
  • Follow orders using QR codes
  • Delivery to clients home (coming soon)
  • Providers management (coming soon)
  • Statistics (coming soon)
  • Menu (coming soon)
  • Online services (coming soon)

Actually, iLuvFood is already downloadable in Google play for android users located in Italy and in all spanish language countries at link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.iluv.iluvfood

What We Need

The campaign main goal is to arrive to sufficient amount of money to:

  • Start with our internationalization program (costs for translations and marketing).
  • Produce a video
  • Finish to develop these features:
  1. Food delivery and transportation module;
  2. Providers management module;
  3. Statistics module;
  4. A second app usable by clients for menu, find restaurants and make order and prenotations in one click;
  5. Online services.

WIN A TRAVEL IN NAPLES (ITALY)

From all contributors to this campaign will be extracted by lot a contributor that will win a trip  in Naples (Italy), one of the most beautiful cities in the world.

Naples is one of the better places in the world where you can:

  • See fantastic landscapes. Situated in middle of a gulf with a fantastic view of Vesuvius, this city offer spectacular views.
  • Eat something special. Naples is city where pizza was born! A place with a great variety of dishes that you can eat with recipes that are thousand years old, but also a fantastic modern cuisine.
  • Visit artistic and historical places. The historic centre of Naples has earned the UNESCO World Heritage Site denomination. And also, Naples is an art city full of churches to see, artworks, museums, historical buildings, etc.
  • Live the authentic Italian life, full of joy and happiness. That way of live that make Neapolitan people as a unique people.

...and more and more.

Travel package will contain:

  • Flights to Naples (or some other type of transport, depending from location where you start).
  • 6 nights for two people at Royal Continental Hotel, a fantastic Hotel in front of sea.
  • Transport from Airport to Hotel and vice versa.
  • A personal assistant, a Neapolitan citizen, that will help you to live city in better way and give you solution for any kind of need you have in time that you will stay in Naples. You can be sure that will be 7 days of fun...

THE EXTRACTION OF WINNER WILL BE DONE ONLY IF THIS CAMPAIGN WILL BE ACCOMPLISHED.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign as IndieGoGo logged in user, in that way, as a referrer you will receive same number of tickets procured by your sharing!!!

You can also help us downloading iLuvFood from Google play (if you can and if you need).

Thank you!

story:
Charging an iPhone X with the Turtle Powerpack power bank and Turtle iPhone X Case. No more wires. No more tangle.

Turtle Powerpack power bank wirelessly charging Samsung smartphone.

Wirelessly charging a Motorola smart watch with the Turtle Powerpack power bank.

Charging Turtle Powerpack power bank on a Samsung wireless charging pad.

Becomes one with your phone. Snap and go. No bulk. No fuss.

Small enough to fit in a keychain purse.

Each Powerpack comes with a Metal backing that you can stick to your phone or favorite case to allow for the Powerpack power bank to magnetically attach.

Product Description:

Never need a wire to charge your phone again! Our unique magnetic system is designed to keep your phone connected to the Turtle Powerpack power bank for wireless charging on the go. Not only can you charge your phone while on the go with Turtle Powerpack, you can charge your friends’ phones using the same Turtle Powerpack powerbank. Doesn’t matter if they have an iPhone or not. As long as they have wireless charging capabilities with their phone, they can charge up using the Turtle Powerpack power bank. We will ship the product in 45 days after the campaign ends.

We wanted to come up with a minimal & functional design that any user would love. First, we had to get our concepts on paper. 

Beginning Sketches

We then started to create our first 3D renderings. Going through the first iterations of our 3D models and finding design flaws along the way, that led us to improve and come to our finalized design. 

Original Concept

After creating the 3D model, we realized we wanted to do something a little different then what is already out there. The iPhone 3GS was a big influence in how we wanted to keep the design simple and clean. 

iPhone 3GS as an influence on new concept design for portable Powerpack power bank.

We had two main design ideas for how the power bank should look and feel in the palm of your hand. 

 The final two designs for the case and power bank fit together.  

 We eventually chose to go with this design as our final design.  

Through many iterations, we came up with a sleek & slim design that was also comfortable in the hand and pocket. 

What we have today, is the perfect balance between design and performance.

One of our first 3D printed prototypes.

 

Our first working prototype.

 

Working on figuring out the heat dissipation.

 

Risks and challenges

Our team has many years of experience in product design, development and manufacturing. Due to our years of experience and professionalism, we have done our best to predict any potential issues with developing our product and delivering it to our backers and supporters.

During our product development phase, we have rigorously tested our prototypes and they have been working perfectly. We resolved several critical issues such as heat dissipation, magnetic interference, and usability issues. We walked away feeling very good about the products.

However, we still have our challenges ahead. They include monitoring the quality from the manufacturer and utilizing the funds efficiently. We plan to spend most of our time focusing on ensuring manufacturing and expenses on the project are going as planned and without any issues.

The iPhone 3GS was a big influence in how we wanted to keep the design simple and clean. iPhone 3GS as an influence on new concept design for portable Powerpack power bank.We had two main design ideas for how the power bank should look and feel in the palm of your hand.  The final two designs for the case and power bank fit together.   We eventually chose to go with this design as our final design.  Through many iterations, we came up with a sleek & slim design that was also comfortable in the hand and pocket. What we have today, is the perfect balance between design and performance.One of our first 3D printed prototypes. Our first working prototype. Working on figuring out the heat dissipation. Risks and challengesOur team has many years of experience in product design, development and manufacturing. Due to our years of experience and professionalism, we have done our best to predict any potential issues with developing our product and delivering it to our backers and supporters.During our product development phase, we have rigorously tested our prototypes and they have been working perfectly. We resolved several critical issues such as heat dissipation, magnetic interference, and usability issues. We walked away feeling very good about the products.However, we still have our challenges ahead. They include monitoring the quality from the manufacturer and utilizing the funds efficiently. We plan to spend most of our time focusing on ensuring manufacturing and expenses on the project are going as planned and without any issues.

story:
https://adriancconstruction.com

Short Summary 

  • AdrianCConstruction.com Is a mobile staff partnering and social media platform that eliminates the need of a temp agency by using gps map concept to connect construction sites to temp laborers nearby, who are available to work immediately.  

    Recruiting and staffing helpers are at times a slow and expensive process for companies and contractors. The construction sector employs approximately 1.6 million temp laborers annually. Through AdrianCConstruction mobile app, companies and contractors are given instant and direct access to helpers with no middle man needed. 

    Labor Share provides workers of all trades the option to register a (Want to Work) profile. Laborers receive mobile notifications when temp jobs of their specified trades are available in their area or location. A map displays a workers general location or proximity according to their registered zip code.  A map displays a construction sites general location or proximity according to it's zip code.

    - Labor Share: Screen has a map view in the application where users will have 2 options to select from: Want to Hire or Want to Work. 

    Want to Hire. A map view opens and it displays the location of the company or contractor and receive a list of workers in the area according to their trade. Companies and contractors can click and view the profile of helpers and view their trade skills and availability along with their contact details.

    Companies add their company details along with the details of what type of work they are offering and require from the helper. Helpers can view these details before joining the company.

    Want to Work. Helpers are asked to submit a resume, and certifications of their skills and trade, availability (time and date), location and contact details as part of their Want to Work profile. Helpers and companies can have peer to peer communications through direct messaging or our social media platforms.                                                                                            Freelance.  Is a function that allows a worker to register as a freelancer if they are travelers and prefer to work and travel.

MOVING FORWARD

Since we launched our live prototype website in August 2020, users have created real profiles and posts on our social media platform regularly while our community continues to grow. To transition our prototype into a live mobile app and create a digital home for construction workers, companies and contractors, we need your help. Funds raised from this campaign will be allocated to the development of our mobile app and it's unique functions. Developments will need to include app screens, functionalities, tools and digital map technologies.

This app will create a great community of resources in the construction sector as workers and companies develop relationships together while interacting with posts, comments, likes, follows, photos, videos, chats, groups and more.

 

SUPPORTERS 

-Thanks for accepting me into the community. I look forward to making builder/contractor connections in the Southwest Florida market. I'm also looking to connect with other real estate professionals to share referrals both ways. I specialize in marketing residential real estate homes for sale. I work with several builders directly as well as homeowners. - Chris Richard

-Hey Folks,
 I was trying to reach out. Lets Connect.
Thanks & Regards. - Aj

-We believe in you Adrian. This is why I'm here. Push forward brother,
I enjoy watching your projects in the field. -Scottie James 

-I love this new platform. It has so much potential.- Valarie Moe

-I'm Supporting  AdrianCConstruction
He’s for the community & the people in it!!!
Keep pushing bro - Charles Price

 

OUR DEDICATION TO YOU

Thank you in advance to all of our supporters for believing in this product. We are fully dedicated with the highest level of determination to bring the construction industry on grid. We are fully committed to each and every one of our supporters and will ensure the delivery of all earned rewards. Thank you all for your patience as we work diligently to see this great project through.

 

MEET THE CREW

Adrian (Founder, CEO) - Hoisting Engineer/Site Supervisor. Adrian is all about construction and building and has led the successful completion of multiple Commercial and Residential projects. Adrian is completely driven to bring the construction and building industries on grid and up to speed with the latest mobile technology. Adrian is committed to building a digital mobile community for construction workers and companies.

Malanne (CMO) - With a Masters in social work, Malanne is an outstanding communicator, critical thinker and exceptional strategist. She does a great job ensuring that our product is exposed to multiple platforms and eyes. She believes that this product will open a new market in assisting workers with getting jobs and better wages. 

Steve (CFO) -Steve knows first hand, the importance of mobile labor hiring as he is an ex Taxi Cab owner for more than twenty years. During his tenure as a very successful business owner, he has developed expertise in finance. Steve manages finances like no other and has a stellar track record. 

Keith (CBA) - As a master carpenter, Keith himself has been hired through a temp workers process and has first hand experience. Joining our team as a Chief Business Analyst was right up Keith's alley. Keith is a wizard at analyzing the business and providing the most necessary analytics in the construction and hiring sector. He has data crunching abilities that are unmatched.

story:
The project is only 15 days!
How many watts is your battery output?

[POWER TANK] is the latest high-powered mobile battery that can charge laptops and smartphones at a maximum power of 100W. Please experience high-speed charging that is different from conventional quick charging!  As the name “Plain Edition”, the design is very simple black. We believe that simplicity is the best design. By making the design plain, I was able to stick to the performance as a gadget. Also, by cutting costs significantly, you can get the latest mobile battery with 100W output for less than 100USD in this project only! (SUPER EARLY BIRD)

We recommend the "POWER TANK" to those who fall into these categories!



[Output and input] Portable batteries are a familiar item for many people now. The most important point when choosing a mobile battery is the output. This is because the device that can be charged depends on the output. Is your battery labeled 5V/1A or 5V/2A?  In this case, the output is 5W to 10W, and only small devices such as smartphones can be charged. "POWER TANK" has a USB type C (POWER DELIVERY) charging port with a maximum output of 100W. "POWER TANK"can charge up to a 15-inch MacBook Pro. There is also 2 USB ports that can be charged at quick! “POWER TANK” USB-C port can also be input. Because it is a maximum of 100W input, the charging time of the "POWER TANK" main unit is fast and there is no stress.

[Charging to iPhone] For example, if you use the “POWER TANK” original USC-C to Lightning cable to charge iPhoneX, It can charge up tp more than 80% in about 30-40 minutes. If it's a  5V/1A battery, it takes about 3 hours. In various everyday situations, there are times when the battery should not run out. “POWER TANK”, which can charge various devices at quick, will be a must-have item for everyone!


[Charging to MacBook Pro] For example, if you use the “POWER TANK” original USC-C to USB-C cable to charge 15-inch MacBook Pro, it can be charged to over 80% in about 1 and a half hours. In the image above you can see 100W power supply. Charging of MacBookPro 15 inch is specified up to 87 W, so when charging using "POWER TANK" with 100 W output, charging from a household outlet using a genuine Apple adapter It will be the same performance! The ability to charge a laptop at the same speed as a household outlet is a great attraction anywhere in the world.

[All Charging ports can be used simultaneously] All charging ports of “POWER TANK” can be used simultaneously. Charge your various devices and gadgets at the same time!


[Cables] It doesn't make sense to have a high-powered battery unless you have a cable that supports it. It is also true that many people do not know this unexpectedly. In almost cases, cables are sold separately. But "POWER TANK" includes a USB-C/USB-C cable for 100W and a USB-C/Lightning cable for 18W output! Especially for Apple users, it will be attractive. Of course, the two genuine cables included are data transfer compatible cables, so they can be used for various purposes such as connecting to an external hard disk, not only for charging, but also for synchronization and backup of iPhone and laptop.


[Capacity] We surveyed friends and family, but many people have batteries around 10,000mAh. When choosing a battery, another important thing is capacity. "POWER TANK" has a capacity of 20,000mAh. Simply charge iPhoneX 5-6 times. In addition, various devices can be charged.

[Available on board] And of course, you can bring it on board. You can bring “POWER TANK” anywhere in the world. It can also be used on board.


[Simple and Cool plain design] We believe that “simple is the greatest design”. As the name "POWER TANK -Plain Edition-", the design is plain black. This has dramatically improved cost performance.

[Overwhelming cost performance] Currently, 100W output batteries of other companies released by overseas manufacturers are circulating at a price of around $150, cables for high output are also sold separately It is around $20 dollars per one. "POWER TANK" is a battery with a maximum of 100W input/output and a capacity of 20,000mAh, plus two high-power compatible genuine cables, and you can get it less than $100 only on INDIEGOGO! (For Super Early Bird: limited quantity)

[Smart size in your pocket] The development team of “POWER TANK” has succeeded in making it as thin and small as possible. Its compactness in the pocket is one of its attractions.


[Pass-through function] A pass-through function that can charge the device while charging the "POWER TANK" body is also standard. 


[Indicator] You can check the battery level easy and quickly.


[International safety standards] Of course, safety devices that meet international safety standards are also provided.

[Testing Video]

story:
Vigs App - Safer Together - Justice for ALL!

Vigs is unique as it is the first attempt to use the power of the social media like never before with the main purpose to keep us all safe and connected with our loved ones.

With the ongoing movement for Justice for All (e.g. Black Lives Matter), we believe Vigs can play an essential role as a dedicated platform where people can inform others by uploading what is happening around them.

The original idea of Vigs was borne, after the terror attacks around the globe. We thought, that there has to be a way to fight cruelty in this world, so we decided to create Vigs, where people who are trapped in dangerous situations, could easily seek help by contacting their friends and family.  Later, the idea evolved into a social media platform with various functions, to help people stay safe and connected with their loved ones, as well as to report what is happening around them for all to see .

In our effort to contribute to the well being of humanity, we believe we can tailor some of our functions in support of Justice for All. By  uploading a post, a single user can notify nearby users of an event, who can in turn start recording what is happening.

How Vigs Works!

The principle is very simple. By uploading posts of events you see happening around you, you are contributing massive information to others in real-time. Vigs, rounds up all the information shared by users of the community and sends out notifications of the events and their corresponding locations.

 

Activities Planned with Funds Raised:

If we raise enough funds we plan to: expand our team to increase our efficiency; make Vigs better and more user-friendly,  add more functionalities to Vigs and much more. We also have a vision to develop extra safety gadgets connected to Vigs to further enhance your safety.

 

What you get for supporting our campaign

Select Your Perks

 

Other ways you can help: Share with friends

From now until the end of our campaign, you can refer your friends to get additional benefits for free! How it works!

3 simple rules:

  1. Copy your unique sharing referral link​​​​​​​​.
  2. Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join us by backing our campaign on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone backs one of our campaign perks through your link. 
  3. Depending on the number of referred backers tracked through Indiegogo, you’ll receive FREE referral prizes!

 

What you get in return:

For every five successfully referrals, you will get access to an Ads-free version of Vigs.

 

Who can Share and How?

  • Who: To participate in sharing, you must be a backer on Indiegogo. As a backer, your unique Indiegogo ID and referral URL grants you access in participating.
  • How: Log in to Indiegogo --> visit our campaign page on Indiegogo --> on the right of the main video you will find the share tools for Indiegogo, shown below --> SHARE!!.

 

4 simple steps to tack your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page and select the "My Profile" option.
  3. To see the latest number of funders and your total referred contribution amount click on the tab that says "Referrals".
  4. Your will get your reward this campaign, based on the total successful referrals.

 

Compatible with iOS and Android

 

About Us

Vigs App is our first product which was borne from the search of a smarter way in solving the growing security crisis. Billions of people  already use smart phones, then the idea came: why not build an App which uses the social media to solve this growing menace?  Hence the solution of an open social media platform dedicated to safety and other crimes was borne. Vigs App!.

Who we are
J&A Bureau is a start-up with a strong focus on using Technology for the well being of People and Planet.
Our mission
Our mission is to contribute to the development of a sustainable world for the present as well as future generations
Our core value
In order to support our mission, we aim at  building sustainable products for People and Planet

 

Credits!

Many thanks to the extraordinary members of the Vigs App team, who have been putting in long hours to get this project ready!

To our readers and backers, we love you. Thank you!
