story:
How aging boomers unexpectedly impact employers and their employees as care needs increase. This national economic crisis is created by aging boomers as their family members try to remain employed and provide care. The Care Companion App accesses resources for those caring and working individuals to reduce the time, money and frustration involved in finding suitable solutions.

About 30% of American employees are juggling a job and family caregiving responsibilities, but their employers do almost nothing to support them.

Although it may seem like a money-saving plan, ultimately this costs the company money. Work-life balance is one thing. Employee-caregiver balance takes it to a whole new level. They are always feeling like they don’t give enough to their aging parent, and pulling up short at work, too.

Opportunities for promotions, extra projects, and new assignments on the job are just a no-go. They know they have to get across town to the pharmacy before it closes to get mom’s new prescription. And the doctor’s appointments, scheduling nightmares, calls to Medicare just suck your soul right out of you!

It causes so much stress that employee-caregivers:

  • Take part-time jobs with fewer hours
  • Use their vacation time and their own sick days
  • Take leaves of absence
  • Ultimately leave the workforce earlier than they would otherwise

More than 10,000 Baby Boomers have their 65th birthday every day in America. Most Baby Boomers prefer to stay in their own homes as long as possible as they age. But quite frankly, that means they depend on family members. They rely on family members who are already employed, have children and their own households to manage. These volunteer caregivers are stretched thin and burned out.

Let’s face it, family members losing their independence due to aging or illness do not have the ability to do what we call Activities of Daily Living like:

  • Cooking
  • Chores
  • Transportation
  • Legal and Financial management
  • And many, many more!

Family caregivers, who have their own jobs and other responsibilities, end up taking these on. So, families juggle the responsibilities themselves and try not to complain. All in the name of love.

Usually, families try to manage to care for their loved ones alone. They spend hours, sometimes when they should be at work, coordinating care for aging family members. In the beginning, the average 20 or more hours weekly.  As age and care needs increase caregiving evolves into a full-time job. And this care cycle is, on average, 5 ½ years long.

The constant struggle to juggle full-time work, caregiving, and other obligations are physically and mentally exhausting. It is not unusual for these employed caregivers to end up in the hospital themselves.

The government is not funding any social services for caregiving problems. Employee-caregivers are torn between their most productive employee selves and being loyal to their aging family members. They have to choose one between their career and family, that's why they used to quit from a job early and take retirement.

The Harvard Business School report explains that the employee turnover, hiring costs, and loss of institutional knowledge cost companies millions of dollars. An AARP study reports that American businesses lose over $33.5 billion, just in productivity. Losses are estimated at $6,000 PER EMPLOYEE (not just employee-caregivers) for each and every organization in the US. 

Employee-caregiving is not new, but with over 3.5 million Baby Boomers turning 65 every year, this is a crisis for American business. Soon, the majority of the workforce will be burdened with family care responsibilities while they hold a job. Estimates suggest that over 70% of Americans will be responsible for the care of an aging relative at some point. 
American businesses lose money every day as the workforce dwindles. And taking care of employee-caregivers in organizations is what will make the difference. When the time comes, almost every American will have some responsibility for aging parents. By taking action now, employers can maintain a reliable workforce.

CareWise™ Companion is a simple, inexpensive, paired Smartphone App that anyone with a smartphone or computer can use. It is usually purchased by the employer and made available as an employee benefit, but individual caregivers are also able to purchase the app for their individual family’s use.

We have spent the last eight years defining the extent of the Employee-Caregiver issues in the American workforce. Along with Harvard and the AARP, CareWise ™ recognizes the vital nature of this crisis.

So, we have the framework for a solution.

CareWise™ Companion – Internet Caring App for Smartphones

  • We understand the functionality Employee-Caregivers require to be both better employees and better caregivers.
  • We also understand how employers want to support the caregivers on their staff so they can reduce turnover and attrition rates.

The next step is to build the model App and test the CareWise™ Companion Top Solutions.

                                 

Information, organizational tools, multimedia, workspace, care management, Family Care Activities of Daily Living (ADLs), smart home connections, entertainment, safety, med management, and social program benefits. This simple, inexpensive Smartphone and browser App is now being presold to employers for their caregiving staff and to individual caregivers their family’s use.

The CareWise™ Companion App supports greater productivity, communications, relationships, and resource waste reduction for corporations. Implementation of the app helps attract and retain valuable employees, grow the business, support employee and team capabilities and engagement.

The CareWise™ Companion App provides employee-caregivers quality (remote) caring options, medical provider communications and even… online appointments… resource management, job and income protection, career growth opportunities, saved time, and greater family collaboration.

For Employers and Employees, The Employers Pre-purchase of the CareWise™ Companion App as part of a CareWise™ Strategy Solution offers a volume discount. Easy to offer employee benefit – Simple, cost-effective and high quality. Keeps employees and teams happy.

At  CareWise™ our reason for being is to support employees and employers to be successful in a care-intensive society. As the big institutions grapple with national policy, we will advocate for our niche millions of employers and employee-caregivers who need alternatives to the current financial, job, health and relationship burdens.

If a company loses $6,000. per employee per year due to caregiving wastes, what is a reasonable investment into supporting employment in an Aging Society?

Please contribute today and get your 6 -month CareWise™ Solutions package and the CareWise™ Companion App. Consider a CareWise™ gift to family and friends who could use a work, life and care boost from your support. If you are an employer, this is an opportunity to launch 2020 with a strong commitment to your employees’ needs.

It seems that we have a win-win in our hands.

             

 

      

 

 

Everything for Employee-Caregivers. This complete package specifically includes everything for managing family, employer, and potential resources from beginning to end.

The employee-caregiver platinum package includes everything necessary for employee-caregivers. This package specifically includes everything for managing family, employer, and potential resources from beginning to end.

  • Assess current and future caregiving needs
  • Family member communication for unity in understanding caregiving needs
  • Care plan development and implementation
  • Communication with Healthcare professionals
  • Communication with Employer to access company policies, insurance, and resources
  • Innovation for remote and technological solutions for caregivers, employers and medical professionals
  • Stress reduction, physical and mental health support for employee-caregivers
  • Government and non-profit resources
  • Additional services available to provide employee-caregiver support

This package is ideal for employee-caregivers who are new, or newly overwhelmed. Care needs change over time. This complete package provides access to all CareWise™ information for caregivers.

 

Everything necessary for employers coping with the caregiving crisis in their organization. Tools for managing policies, corporate culture, change, and employee benefits. It also includes everything for the Employee-Caregiver. The most complete CareWise ™ solution.

 

The employer solution platinum package includes everything necessary for employers coping with the caregiving crisis in their organization. This package specifically includes everything for managing policies, corporate culture, change, and employee benefits.

  • Assess current and future employee-caregiver needs
  • Executive and management communication for unity in understanding the caregiving crisis, costs, and urgency
  • CareWise™ plan development and implementation strategies
  • Development of company policies, insurance, and resources to reduce costs and better support employee-caregivers
  • Innovation for remote and technological solutions
  • Employee retention strategies
  • Government and non-profit resources
  • Additional services available to provide employee-caregiver support
  • Extensive employee-caregiver resources to cope with dual employment

This package is ideal for employers that understand the need to step up during the caregiving crisis. They may already see the money wasted in their organization or may assume their company is like most others in the US.  This complete package provides access to all CareWise™ tools, information, and courses for employers and Employee-Caregiver.

“As the owner of LifeWorkx, Inc., Jeannette addresses the often-hidden impacts - on employment, lifestyle and well-being-of Employee-Caregivers and Caregivers generally who are often stretched to the breaking point meeting their dual responsibilities."

Jeannette is also passionate about shaping national caregiving strategy as well as its local implementation.

Through LifeWorkx she focuses on bringing together the corporate challenges of a shrinking labor market and its linkages to the impacts on increasing numbers of employees with caregiving responsibilities.

She was educated at Quinnipiac, Harvard, and Instead International Universities, and has held many executive positions with a global tech company which sharpened her skills in corporate and national policy development and implementation.

As a mother of two daughters with special needs, she has personally experienced some of the employment, financial and other impacts of juggling her multiple responsibilities. Jeannette understands the personal effects of mixing employment with caregiving responsibilities. Her Employee-Caregiving overload led to her walking out the door and never returning to her influential corporate position. This may help explain why the LifeWorkx focus is on supporting employers and Employee-Caregivers find employment solutions that make this an option of last resort for Employee-Caregivers.

These experiences drive her passion for change at the intersection of best-practice employment initiatives in businesses large and small - and in merging these with solutions for Employee-Caregivers who are looking for workable answers to their challenges.

Jeannette is driving LifeWorkx in new directions to identify and apply realistic solutions for business and employees. This next stage of the LifeWorkx journey is implementing engaging resources, programs and processes that work to break the outdated caregiver ideologies and move caregiving from the realm of healthcare and government organizations into the mainstream of corporate and individual change and transition.                                               

LifeWorkx has convened a global team bringing innovative solutions in a new marketplace- a work-life and caring ecosystem. CareWise™ Solutions for employers and employee-caregivers is our specialty.

We are operating in a global, digital workspace with a just in time work ethic.  In our business, we write about the extent to which the nature of working and living is changing. We are excited about being a model of productivity -- always improving information sharing and project management technology applications.  Sometimes digital working is easy, some days the glitches slow us down, but we enjoy this ever-changing digital world.

Most members of our team bring personal experience in the dual role of being a caregiver and earning a living.  That definitely increases our sensitivity and makes our words much more than just talk. We know that you need solutions!

We hope that our customers share in our enthusiasm and will advocate for making a difference in the way we all live, work and care…  we call it Employment in an Aging Society.

Lifeworkx is a small startup business committed to diversity, inclusion, and equity. While we are a modest team of freelancers who are virtual and representing 6 countries from the United States, South America, Central Asia, and the Pacific Rim, we care about our shared values they make us a successful team.

We respect and value diverse life experiences and heritages and ensure that all voices are valued and heard. We make sure that cross-cultural beliefs are respected in language and actions. We listen to everyone who joins our community and try to accommodate all suggestions.

The LifeWorkx operating policy is to demonstrate our values in the way we work and in all of our daily business relationships. This commitment is demonstrated in very practical ways such as representing a diversity of gender, race, ethnicity, national origin, age, sexual orientation or identity, education or disability in all of our products and services such as coursework and on materials on our website. We represent our values in our media publications and conversations.

As we grow, we believe that our core commitments to diversity, inclusion, and equity will inspire customer loyalty to us and motivate other small businesses to do the same. It is my job to lead with respect and tolerance, we can and will do more.

Finally, I expect all contributors to LifeWorkx products and services whether freelancing, supplier or on my payroll (hopefully soon) to demonstrate the highest allegiance to these beliefs.
story_txt:
How aging boomers unexpectedly impact employers and their employees as care needs increase. This national economic crisis is created by aging boomers as their family members try to remain employed and provide care. The Care Companion App accesses resources for those caring and working individuals to reduce the time, money and frustration involved in finding suitable solutions.
 
About 30% of American employees are juggling a job and family caregiving responsibilities, but their employers do almost nothing to support them.Although it may seem like a money-saving plan, ultimately this costs the company money. Work-life balance is one thing. Employee-caregiver balance takes it to a whole new level. They are always feeling like they don’t give enough to their aging parent, and pulling up short at work, too.Opportunities for promotions, extra projects, and new assignments on the job are just a no-go. They know they have to get across town to the pharmacy before it closes to get mom’s new prescription. And the doctor’s appointments, scheduling nightmares, calls to Medicare just suck your soul right out of you!It causes so much stress that employee-caregivers: 
Take part-time jobs with fewer hours
Use their vacation time and their own sick days
Take leaves of absence
Ultimately leave the workforce earlier than they would otherwise
More than 10,000 Baby Boomers have their 65th birthday every day in America. Most Baby Boomers prefer to stay in their own homes as long as possible as they age. But quite frankly, that means they depend on family members. They rely on family members who are already employed, have children and their own households to manage. These volunteer caregivers are stretched thin and burned out.Let’s face it, family members losing their independence due to aging or illness do not have the ability to do what we call Activities of Daily Living like:
Cooking
Chores
Transportation
Legal and Financial management
And many, many more!
Family caregivers, who have their own jobs and other responsibilities, end up taking these on. So, families juggle the responsibilities themselves and try not to complain. All in the name of love. Usually, families try to manage to care for their loved ones alone. They spend hours, sometimes when they should be at work, coordinating care for aging family members. In the beginning, the average 20 or more hours weekly.  As age and care needs increase caregiving evolves into a full-time job. And this care cycle is, on average, 5 ½ years long.The constant struggle to juggle full-time work, caregiving, and other obligations are physically and mentally exhausting. It is not unusual for these employed caregivers to end up in the hospital themselves. The government is not funding any social services for caregiving problems. Employee-caregivers are torn between their most productive employee selves and being loyal to their aging family members. They have to choose one between their career and family, that's why they used to quit from a job early and take retirement.The Harvard Business School report explains that the employee turnover, hiring costs, and loss of institutional knowledge cost companies millions of dollars. An AARP study reports that American businesses lose over $33.5 billion, just in productivity. Losses are estimated at $6,000 PER EMPLOYEE (not just employee-caregivers) for each and every organization in the US. Employee-caregiving is not new, but with over 3.5 million Baby Boomers turning 65 every year, this is a crisis for American business. And taking care of employee-caregivers in organizations is what will make the difference. When the time comes, almost every American will have some responsibility for aging parents. By taking action now, employers can maintain a reliable workforce.

story:
What do you need immediate/Urgent Professional Security Services for today?

                                                12 hour pool party in Denver?

                                               3 hour corporate event in the Poconos?

                                                       8 hour fashion show in New York City?

                                                       7 days unarmed site/ premises security in San Jose?

                                                       All day boat party at Lake Lanier, Atlanta?

                                                       Fire watch for construction site in Brooklyn?

                                                       Armed bodyguard services to a red carpet event in Las Vegas?

                                                       secured VIP transportation for senior executives in Ohio?

                                                       Long term security services contract in Michigan?

          Private Investigators for insurance fraud, child support, infidelity/honey trapping?   

  

Whatever your security needs are, the instant security app will connect you directly to the right security professionals and private investigators nearby, whenever needed

 

Instant Security is an on-demand security technology Platform powered by LEAD Security Group Inc. that provides a marketplace where persons who seek the need for immediate physical security services (“Clients”) can be matched with a nearby verified, certified and licensed security partner (Security Professionals) within their local areas through our instant security app. Simply put, the instant security app is designed and developed to be the "Uber of Security".

 

The Instant Security app provides 2 (two) sections; one for physical security on demand clients and the other for verified, certified and licensed security professionals.

“Clients” are  defined as individuals, groups, businesses, organizations and any who need immediate physical security services for any purpose.

“Security Professionals” are  defined as verified, certified, licensed armed and unarmed security guards, fire guards, security patrols, site/premises security, executive security, bodyguards, security chaperons and private investigators within and around the clients designated area.

The instant security app is not just about business, but about how much lives and assets will be saved and protected through the unique opportunity and convenience the app provides, and most importantly the economic benefits to security professionals looking for part time security jobs at their free time or when available without commitment to a weekly full time/part time schedule, as well as satisfied clients whose security needs will be met regardless of how short or long they need the security service for.

People/Clients needs security and protective services for many reasons, and we want to be able to provide them that peace of mind at the touch of a button.

 

 

How will the $50,000 budget be utilized?

 72% ($36,000) will be invested in the overall instant security app both in android and IOS with back end office operations development

 20% ($10,000) will go into our current patent filing application process with related attorney fees. This patent is of strategic importance, signifying we have a proven winning idea and we are ready to protect it.

Advertising/marketing will take 8% ($4,000) of the budget. This fund will invest heavily on social media platforms and tech magazines with instant security campaigns for both clients and security professionals. 

Perks are the best way to support our campaign as we seek your financial support. So kindly feel free to choose from any of the perks attached to this campaign, donate or provide us your feedback and recommendations if any.

Also please kindly feel free to promote and get the word out to your networks, friends, families and potential contributors/supporters and users of the instant security app. Remember to use Indiegogo share tools in promoting the instant security app. 

We are excitedly looking forward to working with you in bringing and launching the "Uber of Security" to the United States business market by April-May 2020 and further as we move into global markets by the end of the year 2021.

                                                     Thank you for reviewing our campaign

story:
The Next Generation of On-The-Go Charge!

We all love our smartphones: we message, we read, we share! We connect to the world through our smartphones. But when the battery is running low, how do we stay connected?

We have developed YOOLOX 10k and 16k - a brand-new power bank to keep you connected.

 

Highlights:

Why YOOLOX?

We have come up with a product that makes your life easier. We have developed an easy-to-use power bank that does not require any cable or connectors if your smartphone supports wireless charging.

Does my smartphone support wireless charging? Check out our list below:

The YOOLOX 10k can fully charge your iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 up to 3 times. Need more energy? The YOOLOX 16k has almost double the capacity and re-charges your iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 up to 5 times.

 

The suction pads

We have developed our exclusive suction pads to make sure that your smartphone does not disconnect while charging, even when carried in your bag or backpack.

 

 Multiple connections and charge-through

YOOLOX power banks are powerful enough to charge 3 devices at the same time. For example you can charge your iPhone X wirelessly, your iPad via USB cable and your Samsung Galaxy S9 via USB C port.

Our power banks can also be used as a charging station as you can charge your device and the power bank simultaneously.

The YOOLOX Team

We have known each other for over 9 years and have worked together for a big corporation.Pascal then pursued a career in consulting while David gained extensive experience in a small company for electrical appliances. We would meet again in Hong-Kong in 2017 when we were both on a business trip. When we met, both of our smartphones were running low on battery. That was the moment we decided it was time to develop a power bank using state-of-the-art technology. After extensive market research we decided to found YOOLOX. Our name YOOLOX was born in the magic of the moment over a cold beverage when we were talking about charging possibilities for smartphones.

Today YOOLOX is a start-up company based in Munich, Germany. Our mission is to develop charging products for your mobile device. We are supported by technical engineers, product development partners and manufacturers. We want to give you the best and most convenient solution to keep you connected on your mobile device.

Refunds and Returns
story_txt:
Shipping Now! US Shipment in 2-5 Business Days.
30 Days Money Back Guarantee. 1 Year Warranty.


 The Next Generation of On-The-Go Charge!We all love our smartphones: we message, we read, we share! We connect to the world through our smartphones. But when the battery is running low, how do we stay connected?We have developed YOOLOX 10k and 16k - a brand-new power bank to keep you connected. Highlights:




 

YOOLOX 10k and 16k Technical Specs Why YOOLOX?We have come up with a product that makes your life easier. We have developed an easy-to-use power bank that does not require any cable or connectors if your smartphone supports wireless charging.Does my smartphone support wireless charging? Check out our list below: 
Re-charge your iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 up to 3 xThe YOOLOX 10k can fully charge your iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 up to 3 times. Need more energy? The YOOLOX 16k has almost double the capacity and re-charges your iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9 up to 5 times.  
Charging cycles with YOOLOXThe suction pads
 
Our exclusively developed suction pads keep your phone in the right positionWe have developed our exclusive suction pads to make sure that your smartphone does not disconnect while charging, even when carried in your bag or backpack.  Multiple connections and charge-through

You can charge up to 3 devices at the same timeYOOLOX power banks are powerful enough to charge 3 devices at the same time. For example you can charge your iPhone X wirelessly, your iPad via USB cable and your Samsung Galaxy S9 via USB C port.Our power banks can also be used as a charging station as you can charge your device and the power bank simultaneously.The YOOLOX Team
Pascal and David are the co-founders of YOOLOXWe have known each other for over 9 years and have worked together for a big corporation.Pascal then pursued a career in consulting while David gained extensive experience in a small company for electrical appliances. We would meet again in Hong-Kong in 2017 when we were both on a business trip. When we met, both of our smartphones were running low on battery. That was the moment we decided it was time to develop a power bank using state-of-the-art technology. After extensive market research we decided to found YOOLOX. Our name YOOLOX was born in the magic of the moment over a cold beverage when we were talking about charging possibilities for smartphones.Today YOOLOX is a start-up company based in Munich, Germany. Our mission is to develop charging products for your mobile device. We are supported by technical engineers, product development partners and manufacturers. We want to give you the best and most convenient solution to keep you connected on your mobile device.Refunds and ReturnsOur refund policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can’t offer you a refund. To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase. For returns that are not affiliated with warranty cases we will require you to ship the unit back.

story:
"AntiBac is a simple, gender specific sterilizer that combines with your existing charging cable to sterilize your smartphone."


A cell phone has 18x more bacteria than a public restroom - FOX News
Have you ever used a paper towel to open a public bathroom door or used your foot to flush the toilet? Of course, because those things are loaded with germs. 



SOURCE : MASHABLE

Conventional devices used to sterilize your smartphone utilize a short UV-A wavelength of 280nm. The advantages of using this wavelength is quick sterilization, but exposure to the human body can be harmful, which is why these sterilizers usually encase your device entirely prior to sterilizing.

Because of this, this wavelength is strictly regulated and photo-biological (light wavelength) certification must be received through an accredited agency to verify the devices stability. Strict regulations require vigorous testing for certification and these products should be used with caution.

AntiBac uses a longer infrared wavelength that is above the harmful UV range. AntiBac is certified IEC62471 and is the world's first sterilizer/charger that is harmless to the human body.


Existing sterilizers out there are cradles that encase your entire phone, which prevent use while sterilizing. The light that emits from these devices can be harmful to your eyes or skin. Also, phone sizes differ, and these case type sterilizers cannot accommodate for all devices.


AntiBac can be used for any model, at any time, whether the phone is in use or not. It's certified to be harmless to the human body and will continue to sterilize your device even when in use.


It's become an age where smartphones are needed everywhere, including your workplace. Companies are unable to progress or develop with the use of smartphones and the first thing people grab in the morning or put down right before sleeping is their smartphone. It's the closest thing to you and stays next to you at all times.

Many people have heard that their smartphones may contain more germs than a toilet, but not do realize how serious the effects may be.

If an article in the newspaper or a broadcast on the TV reports on it, there may be a brief thought of concern in passing, and then back to using your smartphone. But the problem is more serious than imagined. It was reported some time ago that around 90 people died from the flu in Hong Kong and dozens died from a deadly bacteria in the United States. It was reported that the smartphones ability to spread infectious bacteria and diseases contributed to this.

Most healthy adults can withstand coming in contact with bacteria or germs and do so on a regular basis daily. But there are always young children, adults with weak immune systems, and the elderly that was must think about as well. Especially with the increase in smart phone use by children and the elderly, this is ever increasing concern.

Because of this, many companies have come to realize the risk of germ spreading from smartphone use and have produced different versions of smartphone sterilizers. However, these devices are bulky and inconvenient to carry around. As well as emitting harmful rays inside their casing. We have the advantages of being smaller, extremely portable, and giving you the ability to safely charge and use your device simultaneously because our sterilizing rays are harmless to the human body. 


"Bread Culture Test"


AntiBac can be used at any time to sterilize the surface of your portable products.


Our vigorous testing has proved that AntiBac is safe and effective for sterilizing your devices and we have received official recognition from our government's Testing and Research Institute




Do the sterilizers only come in black for Android and white for iPhone?
No, we didn't want to include too many images in our campaign. Both devices (charger and stand) come in either black or white and we will collect this information after campaign completion.

How long does it take to sterilize my phone?
It takes about 3 hours to fully sterilize your device. Plenty of time for when charging your device at night or in the office.

Is AntiBac truly safe for human exposure?
Yes, as you can see in our certifications above, our products have been tested and approved by our government for being completely safe and harmless for human exposure. Length of exposure is also not an issue and is 100% safe for any living beings (humans, animals, etc.)

Is it compatible with all charging cables?
Yes, AntiBac is 100% compatible with all micro-USB and lightning charging cables.

Does AntiBac come with a warranty?
Yes, we will provide up to 1 year warranty on our devices. Simply send us a message and we will proceed from there. 


With any new project, there will always be risks when developing a new product. If we succeed with our funding, manufacturing AntiBac in bulk may come with time and/or production challenges, but we are doing our best to find the right manufacturer so we can ensure proper delivery to our backers.

story:
Meet our newest family member! 

Following the successfully launched FlashQ wireless flash trigger in 2014. We’re going to take it to the next level, a complete wireless flash unit, called FlashQ System. We hereby introduce our first flash project, FlashQ Q20.

We were inspired by a variety of classic flashes and extracted those essential elements that are desired by the photographers. Combined with the 90° adjustable tilting flash head, built-in gel holder, LED video/modeling light, and engineered with our wireless technology for off-camera flash control, Q20 will give you the most convenient experience in a flash unit. Furthermore we crafted it to be a beautiful piece with compact size, makes it a must-have accessory for every Prosumer or Compact System Cameras.

As Featured On

Off-camera Flash Any Time

Our first idea was something similar to the renowned Metz SCA System; flash main body can be detached from the hot shoe adapter. So, we made FlashQ transmitter function like an adapter! Q20 is just like a typical external flash while being plugged on FlashQ transmitter, and it goes into wireless mode while being detached from the transmitter. There will be more creative possibilities in shooting when off-camera flash gives easy and total control in lighting.

Remote Control Flash Power Ratio

FlashQ transmitter can adjust the flash power ratio on Q20 main body, also wirelessly. A Single-click of the Power button makes one step increment, while a Double-click makes one step decrement. This feature is already coded in every shipped FlashQ transmitter.

Manual Flash Power Control

Q20 puts control back into the photographer, as it allows you set the flash output at each stop from 1/128 (minimum output) to 1/1 (maximum output). 7 steps of flash power ratios can be adjusted by two buttons.

Tiltable Flash Head

For ease of setup bouncing light effects, Q20 flash head can tilt up to 90°, with click-stops at 0°, 45°, 60°, 75°, 90°.

Built-in Color Gel / Filter Holder

Q20 flash head has a built-in gel holder for more versatile shooting options. It facilitates quick installation and removal of colored gels, so you change the light color at any time you want. 

LED Video / Modeling Light

LED lighting plays an emerging role in digital photography for close-ups, modeling light or filming. Q20 features an LED light suited for these tasks with 7 output levels, makes it perfect for still or video shootings.

Rectangular Shaped, Able to Stand

Q20 has a rectangular outline with flat sides, which makes it easy to stand or position itself in any orientation. It is especially useful in setting up off-camera lighting.

With Tripod Mount

Furthermore, a built-in female 1/4” receptacle is included, which allows it to be attached on a tripod.

Camera Support

FlashQ transmitter can work on most cameras with standard ISO hot shoe mount. It supports remote triggering flashes at sync speeds up to 1/250 sec*. The trigger signal is barely on the central contact of standard ISO hot shoe. No TTL information is transmitted by FlashQ. This makes FlashQ compatible with most cameras.

Multiple Flashes Support

Q20 equips with the same FlashQ radio, which features Automatic Clear Channel Selection and Simple Pair-up. 

FlashQ System can support up to 8 flashes (Q20 main bodies) simultaneously, provided that those flashes had been paired up with the FlashQ transmitter. This gives the scalability of multiple wireless flashes and makes your photography more creative. 

Q20 Technical Specifications

  • Guide Number 20 (at ISO 100)
  • Focal length coverage: 32mm (on 35mm format)
  • No TTL, up to 1/250 sync speed*
  • Manual flash power ratio control (7 steps adjustable, 1/128 to 1/1)
  • LED video light (7 steps adjustable, Max. 60 lux output at 1m)
  • 2.4GHz low-power digital radio (FlashQ receiver) inside Q20 main body
  • 10 meters wireless operating range
  • Tilt-capable flash head, up to 90° and with click-stops at 0°, 45°, 60°, 75°, 90°
  • Other functions: S1 / S2 optical slave, modeling light (LED)
  • Two AA-size alkaline / Ni-MH batteries power source
  • Recycling time (1/1 full power output) : 7 sec. by fresh alkaline batteries /
    6 sec. by Ni-MH batteries
  • Number of flashes : 100 - 2000 flashes by fresh alkaline batteries
  • LED lighting time: approx. 3 hours (at full power LED output and by Ni-MH batteries)
  • Flash color temperature : 5600K±200K (same as daylight)
  • LED color temperature : 5500K±300K
  • Dedicated socket for FlashQ transmitter attachment
  • Dimensions : 59(W) x 92(H) x 29(D) mm (with FlashQ transmitter attached)
  • Weight : 115g (without battery)
* On compatible cameras and flashes

Nomenclature


FlashQ Wireless Flash Trigger

This is our first crowdfunded campaign in 2014. It shares the same transmitter with Q20 flash. So FlashQ system supports remote triggering both Q20 flash and third-party flashes.

(Buy Now)

Risks and challenges

We are really excited about launching this full featured, handy flash. The full-functional prototype demonstration ensures a wonderful experience for our backers. We have finished most of the engineering work, design validation and preparation for mold tooling with our manufacturing partners.

Lighting performance is the most important aspect of a flash. We’ve lined up a well qualified optics manufacturer for the Fresnel lens design and tooling. We assure that Q20 shall have the optimum lighting quality.

We learned a lot through the journey of our previous project, and proved that our team is able to let our first idea evolve to the final product. We've further strengthened our supply chain this year, and we are confident to deliver on rewards. However, there are factors out of our expectation, so, while we may not be able to promise 100% accuracy on delivery date, we promise complete transparency. We are committed to keep our backers posted.

Media kit is here.

So FlashQ system supports remote triggering both Q20 flash and third-party flashes.(Buy Now)Risks and challengesWe are really excited about launching this full featured, handy flash. The full-functional prototype demonstration ensures a wonderful experience for our backers. We have finished most of the engineering work, design validation and preparation for mold tooling with our manufacturing partners.Lighting performance is the most important aspect of a flash. We’ve lined up a well qualified optics manufacturer for the Fresnel lens design and tooling. We assure that Q20 shall have the optimum lighting quality.We learned a lot through the journey of our previous project, and proved that our team is able to let our first idea evolve to the final product. We've further strengthened our supply chain this year, and we are confident to deliver on rewards. We are committed to keep our backers posted.Media kit is here.

story:
The issue

All of us like using our phones. And none of us like when it runs out of juice...
As we use smartphones nowdays with more apps and games on them their battery gets weaker and weaker.

No more Nokia mobiles that we had to charge once a week.
An average user needs to charge their phone at least once a day.

How can you extend your battery life?

  • Prevent apps from running in the background.
  • Use Data Connection or Wi-Fi only when it's necessary.
  • Charge your phone properly


How to save battery on Android devices: How to Save Battery Power on an Android


Prevent apps from running in the background


There are a lot of Apps on the Market - now Play Store - that can help you prevent other apps from running in the background and drain the juice from your phone.
E.g.: Battery Doctor (Battery Saver), DU Battery Saver&Phone Charger

Use Data Connection or Wi-Fi only when it's necessary


Take care of your phone. Turn off Wi-fi or Data Connection when you don't need it.
Also there are apps that help you save battery by turning off Wi-fi or Data Connection when you've forgotten that.
E.g.: WiFi/Data Auto Off, Data Switch Save Battery Easy

Charge your phone properly


Here we come in! :)

According to a research, charging your phone might be the most important way to keep your battery life longer.

Most of us - probably 90% - charge our phones night while we sleep.
This is as bad for the battery as draining it to 0%.
While the phone is on charger, it keeps the battery level on 100%. If the phone goes down to 99.9%, it will be charged again to 100%... several times during the night. This is like stretching your muscles continously... Not healthy...

Not to mention the heat generated by being on charger for such a long time.

Theoretically the best for a Lithium-Ion battery would be to be charged to around 25% and disconnect the charger at 95% or 99% at the most. This would keep the battery healthy for much longer than it is now.

Indiegogo's just had a campaign for the same issue called UsBidi- The World's Most Intelligent Charger Ever!
We do admire the guys for their idea, but we have a different solution for the same problem.

While UsBidi uses a not so simple USB cable for charging your phones with similar
features like CellGuard, CellGuard is better.

  • While with UsBidi you need a different cable for each type of connector (micro USB, Apple's Lightning) with CellGuard you have a universal connector, and you can use your factory made charger designed for your phone Using your own charger helps to extend battery life
  • Fast Charge (2C, 3C, etc) causes undue stress on your battery


CellGuard communicates with your phone and charges it as it really needs.
In addition to the presets, you can set your own rules how to charge your phone.

  • You can set it to turn off charging at 95% to give your batteries extra lifetime
  • You can set when to start charging, so you can keep the phone/tablet on the charger for an infinite period. (Great for tablets used as fixed displays)

Simple Guidelines on Chargers

  • Use the correct charger for the intended battery chemistry. Most chargers only serve one chemistry.
  • Charging is recommended  at a moderate rate. Ultra-fast charging causes undue stress even if the battery can take it.
  • Do not apply fast and fast charge when the battery is cold or hot. Charge batteries at moderate temperatures.
  • Do not apply fast and ultra-fast charge to aged and low-performing batteries. Very few chargers are able to assess the condition of a battery and govern the fast-charge accordingly.
  • Observe battery temperature when using a low-cost charger. Remove battery when warm.

Source: BatteryUniversity.org

What We Need & What You Get

We have our working prototype. (via Bluetooth)

But we need money to make it available for mass production and to produce it for consumer market.

Perk0: Huge thanks for making our vision history. 1$
Perk1: Super Early Bird CellGuard smart outlet. 19$ (39$ expected retail price)
Perk2: Early Bird CellGuard smart outlet. 24$ (39$ expected retail price)
Perk3: CellGuard smart outlet. 29$ (39$ expected retail price)
Perk4: CellGuard smart outlet. 35$ + CellGuard T-Shirt.
Perk5: CellGuard retailer package 240$ (10 x CellGuard smart outlet)

The Impact

Using CellGuard will change our life:

  • With extending your battery life, you'll spare money you would spend on new batteries
  • Using less batteries, you will reduce your ecological footprint
  • Using CellGuard your charger will not consume energy while it's plugged but not used.


Risks & Challenges

Currently we are working with a Bluetooth prototype, but we see reason for moving to Wi-Fi solution.
We use Arduino for prototyping so it's not really user friendly...
The outlet is right now too big for consumer usage, we need to find the correct PCB, and Chips to make it smaller. We aim at the size of a travel adapter as you can see it on the 3D model.

We truly believe that these are problems we can easily deal with.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Spread the word. :)

    If you like our idea, share it via social media, like Facebook, Twitter, etc. using hashtag #cellguard

    You can do it directly, using Indiegogo's sharing buttons on the left side.

    Thanks for all of You.

(via Bluetooth)But we need money to make it available for mass production and to produce it for consumer market.Perk0: Huge thanks for making our vision history. 1$Perk1: Super Early Bird CellGuard smart outlet. 19$ (39$ expected retail price)Perk2: Early Bird CellGuard smart outlet. 24$ (39$ expected retail price)Perk3: CellGuard smart outlet. 29$ (39$ expected retail price)Perk4: CellGuard smart outlet. 35$ + CellGuard T-Shirt.Perk5: CellGuard retailer package 240$ (10 x CellGuard smart outlet)

The Impact Using CellGuard will change our life:  With extending your battery life, you'll spare money you would spend on new batteries
 Using less batteries, you will reduce your ecological footprint
 Using CellGuard your charger will not consume energy while it's plugged but not used.

   Risks & Challenges  Currently we are working with a Bluetooth prototype, but we see reason for moving to Wi-Fi solution.We use Arduino for prototyping so it's not really user friendly...The outlet is right now too big for consumer usage, we need to find the correct PCB, and Chips to make it smaller. We aim at the size of a travel adapter as you can see it on the 3D model. 
We truly believe that these are problems we can easily deal with.
    Other Ways You Can Help Spread the word. :)
If you like our idea, share it via social media, like Facebook, Twitter, etc. using hashtag #cellguardYou can do it directly, using Indiegogo's sharing buttons on the left side.Thanks for all of You.

story:
Who we are and why we want to do this

There are smart TVs and plenty of set top boxes on the market.  We see a gap. 

Smart TVs and set top boxes generally provide a closed ecosystem where you have apps and specific content streams.  Some may provide the option to surf Google and access the web broadly however the functionality is limited and is usually via an old school TV remote.

What WaveTV is:

  • Powerful computer built for surfing the web, business, web-gaming or absolutely anything only for your TV
  • Streamlined carbon fiber box with the full spectrum of connectivity inputs
  • Open source app for smart phones and tablets for controlling input
  • Portable

The solution is an affordable powerful computer for your smart or dumb TV that uses your existing devices like iPhone or iPad as the keyboard, mouse or anything you want to program up yourself to meet your unique requirements.

We are based in Brisbane Australia with our usual day jobs as a leading digital marketing agency.  We of course have computers everywhere however we don't want to keep hooking up the laptop to the TV just to get the 60" experience with gaming or whipping up a PowerPoint.  Id rather not throw my computer screen to the TV via a number of different solutions.  We don't want a closed gaming experience via one of the well known gaming consoles.  We want it OPEN and anything!  We want to sit down, grab the iPhone and start surfing the web for anything or launching into a web game on the TV.

The specs at a high level:
  • Windows desktop
  • 4GB RAM
  • 1TB hard drive 5,400 rpm
  • Nvidia GeForce GTX 860M graphics card
  • 2.9-GHz dual-core Intel Core i3-4130T
  • WiFi
  • Bluetooth
  • Multiple usb slots, HDMI and optical audio out connections

Jump on the couch, grab your smart phone or tablet, open the Wave app to access standard keyboard and mouse configuration and surf the web, play games or jump on Windows and play with the Microsoft Office suite of products; anything you want.

An open community for those that want to program in different keyboard mouse configurations for gaming or anything else and share these innovations with other WaveTV users.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking at raising an initial $50,000 to:

  • Convert the prototype into the first batch of manufactured units
  • Complete the website and app
  • Launch the market ready product
  • Assemble the after market support unit

The perks on the side are designed to be simple.

  1. A nominal amount to signify your support for bring this product to market. 
  2. An amount to secure your WaveTV unit. 
  3. The signature series for those who want their own customized unit
  4. Partner package to own the country distribution channel

The signature series has us here excited.  As you get when you purchase an AMG Benz or Bentley the engine has a silver plaque with the signature of the single engineer who hand made your engine.  The Wave Signature series is your customized unit with a silver plaque with your name a signature - pretty special!

The partner distribution channel is designed to share the opportunity across multiple countries with those in that country who understand the best way to get WaveTV to our customers.

In the event we don't fully fund the campaign, providing we get close we should still be able to deliver on the goal.  If we don't come close then we won't be bringing the product to market and all those that contributed will have funds returned.

Given these are your funds, we take a maximum transparency approach.  You will see what we do with every dollar, where it goes and whats left, along with the progress of bringing this product to market.

The Impact

We see a demographic that:
  • Wants an open experience that is the bridge between a computer for business and play
  • Folks that have been connecting laptops to their TVs or using devices to throw their PCs to their TVs and find the Jerry-rigged  experience messy and painful
  • People who may have a set top box or smart TV on a closed ecosystem looking to get more out of their big screens
  • Those that only have dumb TVs and want the open experience of being able to do anything
  • Internet gamers that dont have to hack complimentary devices to control games how they want rather they can program up their custom interfaces and use superior devices in their smart phones and tablets

Risks & Challenges

We are mashing up existing products here, not creating brand new untried tech.  We have quality conventional manufacturing processes therefore we don't foresee any significant risks or challenges.  By securing adequate funding we can establish the right type of after market support and warranties to ensure sustained success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign far and wide, we will be forever grateful!

story:
Introduction

Dev OS is not only innovative operating system, but also a pretty promising start-up. Unfortunately, the creators of the project do not have enough funds for its development. We can only help you - people who are interested in the development of technology. We are donating even small amounts to help the development of technology, particularly mobile.

What We Need & What You Get

The required amount of 22.000$ will go to:

  • Paying programmers
  • Rent small office
  • Additional research
  • Advertising
  • Lease of production equipment

We hope that the funds will be collected and we can make something amazing!

For donations, even minor, you'll be rewarded with access to early testing of the operating system, and people who have paid significant amounts expect big gifts!

 

If the target fundraising is reached by 1/3, we will send the money to the Children's home No. 3 for orphans in Minsk. If the target fundraising is reached at 2/3, we will begin to work on the Dev OS, but without adequate funding the project will be delayed for a long time. If the goal is to raise funds will be fully achieved, we will immediately start developing a Dev OS!

In case of failure of the project, the remaining money will also go to Children's home No. 3 for orphans.

The Impact

Our project is unique in its kind, there are plenty of similar projects. But our project stands out among the rest that he offers you something different, what you've all been waiting for.

Dev OS will give you full freedom in the settings area of the device, but not at the expense of convenience and ease of use! However, you will be provided with a truly impressive set of software and modifications of the system that will allow you to use the device as you see fit. For example, as a multimedia entertainment device, or even as a full-fledged tool for development!

Our project needs people look at the statistics which we collected the last few months:

All these issues say that our operating system to the right people. As ordinary people, and developers.

Our goals:

  • To give the operating system to those in dire need. For example, developers and people with disabilities.
  • To narrow the circle of persons who have never installed third-party firmware.
  • To give common users simple and convenient operating system with all the benefits of Android.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have no funds that you could to help us, no problem. You can also tell about our project to your friends, colleagues, relatives. Any your help will be very important for us!

If you are a developer and want to participate in creating the Dev OS, write on our Facebook. If you just want to share their ideas, too, please contact us by Facebook!

Our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/devos.net/

 

Thank you for taking the time to our project!

story:
ORDER NOW AND HAVE IT FOR CHRISTMAS

 

 Discuss in FB: http://bit.ly/2ah58cW


Maximum housing capabilities:

  • 1 ATX motherboard
  • 3 X 12" graphics card
  • 1 X 12" power supply
  • 2 X 3.5"HDD + 1 X 2.5" SSD

Tidy Work Space

Overall size: 

290 X 330 X 160 mm OR 11.5"X13"X6.3" (width X height X thickness), subject to small change.

If we don’t reach our entire goal, we are going to have a delay of 2 months in our production, but we ensure that you get the product as expected and described.

The Ulfberht In Action, This is how the bubble pump works.

What We Changed

Integrated cooling will allow the PC to be sleek, small and light.  

As the liquid reaches 40 degrees Celsius, It evaporates and circulates by itself without any pump 

Fans are friends of dust, so without fan means dustless, and dustless means maintenance-less

Manufacturing In: msmmgroup.com

 

Installation And First Look Of The Ulfberht.

The existing water cooling expertise for its installation. The minimum equipment in the Ulfberht allows it to be installed by normal computer resellers.

Clarification Of Our Claims

How does a 50$ PC case can save 100$ electricity while increasing the PCs performance to 150% of the factory setting?

       Comparison chart between each existing PC cooling in the market

Market available options

Equipment used

Advantage

Disadvantage

Price

Fan + air cooling

Case, power supply, air cooler

Home & office owners, cheap

Big, low performance

30$+50$

Water cooling

Case, power supply, pump, reservoir, heat sink, radiator, and fan

Overclock-able

Expensive, big

140$

No fan PC

Case, power supply, heat sink

Silent

Expensive, No redundancy

500$ (useless)

Mac

All in one

Efficient, small, long lasting, beautiful

Not for gamers, expensive, starting budget

3000$ and above

Ulfberht

Case, cooling unit, (11w/) thermal paste

Silence, efficient, -able, maintenance free, smallest, large housing capability

No DVD support

50$

We have made videos to encourage people to be more careful when they are choosing a PC case. It is the most important aspect of a PC for having continuous optimum performance.

What happens if CPU stock heat sink used for 2 years without cleaning

Why Did We Make The Ulfberht?

  • The inventor of the Ulfberht PC case (Ghasem Zolfaghari) is a Mechatronic engineer in Malaysia. He has been a computer technician for 2 years and then a mechanical designer for another 2. In the PC technician life, the repetitive PC problems with reduced performance overtime strike him. So being miserable with same old problem and having no market alternative for it, made him to design it himself. Working in metal fabrication industries and doing complex Mechatronic designs made us realize simple designs last longer and they are more reliable. This basic principle combined with our hands on experience in repairing computers made us come out with this ground breaking design.  
  • PC cases are running almost always in our lives and they are closely related to our daily performance. There are more than 2 billion PC cases worldwide.

Tested in extreme test conditions

We have tested our old case design with a flame torch to simulate heavy load of the CPU and as the result shows we did not get temperatures more than 62 degrees Celsius with the pump running and without the pump running inside our case.

  • Maintenance free:

Just remind yourself how many times you have needed to clean your house WOT condenser versus how many times you have seen a CPU overload due to dust build up on the heat sink. We have been computer technicians and every time we heard about computer hanging, overloading or having loud fan noise, right away we knew the problem was accumulated dust on the heat sink. This would most probably resulted in drying out the thermal paste as well. But not in with Ulfberht, since it is and dustless.

  • Overall pricing:

Intel 5 Generation CPU as well as High end AMD processors does not come with stock cooler. It will cost of 30$ if you want to buy it separately and Normal CPU case will cost 30$. Therefore the minimum cost of any case and cooling is 60$ (for NOW). The innovations used in Ulfberht made it the cheapest in the world.

We can save up to 30 billion watt hours of electricity worldwide by using our design due to:

  • Elimination fans.
  • Elimination of the pump.
  • Less CPU electricity usage because it is cooler.
  • Less frequent PC changing required.
  • Less frequent CPU hanging.
  • No thermal throttling.
  • Reliable performance due to less dust builds up and maintenance less operation.

 

What We Need & What You Get​

  • Our suppliers are asking for a minimum of 5000 units of hydro formed CPU blocks.  If we get  1000 units pre-order, we will start the project anyways.
  • 100 units of 45$ perk is available for early bride and let us know if you want it for any humanitarian aid, our team will contact you for giving special offers to you.

The Impact

  • This project is open-source (the files will be uploaded when this campaign ends) because sustainable future relies on informed societies. We need to accelerate spread of information by refurbishing old PCs which we normally destroy after a  few years of use and give them to less fortunate people around the world. This humane act will empower people to get more information and skills which allow the society to be more productive and it repays back to the society that they belong in. We will start a project soon on that base which provide FREE Ulfberht case for humanitarian aims.
  • Please watch our YouTube channel to understand its working principles more in depth.

Risks & Challenges

  • Our lack of funding has forced us to lunch early with so many other improvement ideas in our hands. Our tested prototypes are reliable even without the new heat exchanger Hydroforming design. Because of the cost associated with molding, we are not able to manufacture it and therefore we do not have the final performance result. The current reveal enough performance for the white-box market, but you should wait for the surprise to see how well it performs.
  • As we get help from you, we can have the current product in the market. This will help us to innovate further for yet another generation of PCs. There are many untested ideas such as making the  CPU block with grooved copper pipe and experimenting with better heat dissipation radiator with finned tube, your help will let us continue our innovations.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this campaign as you can so hopefully we can give outdated PCs to needy hands and give them a way to contribute to society.
  • Let us know if you have any idea on how to develop it further.

story:
How does it work?

 

First, you need to decide what you are looking for.

  • If it is a company then you need to go to the list of companies and choose the one that suits you great: a big company or a small one, a tete-a-tete meeting or maybe you want to find your lovely girl. All companies in your town are on the first screen, and you can join any of them.
     
  • If it is a place, you will be able to find it on the map or in the lists of companies. You can also find all the bars, which are relevant today. For example, drinks are free in the bar which is three blocks from you. Intriguing, isn't it?
     
  • If you are looking for people nearby, right now, you only need to rotate your smartphone or connect to the VR and you will see all the people within 500 meters who use the application, also their profile, rating, and preferences that will help you in choosing.
     

 

Security

 

Users have a rating, and after each meeting the user can leave a good or bad feedback about it. Thus, uninteresting or dangerous people will be immediately visible to other people. 

Security of users will be guaranted by bars and only verified places will be included in Friday. 

All users data are confidential and their contact information such as phone number, social network page and e-mail is transmitted only after confirmation of the meeting if the user specified this information.

 

 

Business focus

 

Friday is an excellent platform for advertising places and events. They can be allocated on the map, searching or using the function "Offer of the day in your city". Thus, by opening the application, users will see your place one of the first.

  1. Advertising
    Friday is an excellent platform for advertising places and events. They can be allocated on the map, searching or using the function "Offer of the day in your city". Thus, by opening the application, users will see your place one of the first.
     
  2. Statistics and feedback
    We will provide full statistics of your establishment as well as collect feedbacks and proactive visitors. This is a great way to test innovations in the menu, check how often your cocktail "Daiquiri" is bought and if the visitors like your new guard.
     
  3. Additional reality and events
    Thanks to additional reality we will single out your institution among others. Also we will create for you a quest to find invitations to parties or coupons for cocktails or show the shortest way to your bar.
     


 

How the idea comes
 

"Once I met my friend to drink beer and talk. But something went wrong. I was sitting in my armchair and drinking beer glass by glass, I used to try to find interesting topics for conversation , hoping that everything will change. Suddenly I saw a company at the bar.

At that moment I felt a very big sadness, frustration and limitation of my actions because I was afraid to approach them. I felt wild animal fear. Later the idea to create a mobile application Friday appeared."
Dmitry Yaroshevich
 

We are absolutely sure that by creating a mobile application Friday, we will be able to change the world for the better. There will be far fewer lonely people in the world, people will start leaving the comfort zone and get to know each other, exchange experiences, ideas and smile. After all, what this world is, if we do not use the main gift that absolutely everyone has. 
This gift is communication.
Nikita Gavrilovich

 

Our team

Dmitry Yaroshevich, 25 years old, marketing, design, advertising.

Engaged in advertising for over 7 years, in promotion of projects, he has good experience in managing and developing large and small companies.

Nikita Gavrilovich, 22, iOS developer.

Developing a mobile applications for more than 3 years. He is a person who devotes his life to development and mobile applications.

 

Some information about out perks

 

Premium account

story_txt:
How does it work?
 
First, you need to decide what you are looking for.

If it is a company then you need to go to the list of companies and choose the one that suits you great: a big company or a small one, a tete-a-tete meeting or maybe you want to find your lovely girl. All companies in your town are on the first screen, and you can join any of them. 
If it is a place, you will be able to find it on the map or in the lists of companies. You can also find all the bars, which are relevant today. For example, drinks are free in the bar which is three blocks from you. Intriguing, isn't it? 
If you are looking for people nearby, right now, you only need to rotate your smartphone or connect to the VR and you will see all the people within 500 meters who use the application, also their profile, rating, and preferences that will help you in choosing. 


 
Security
 
Users have a rating, and after each meeting the user can leave a good or bad feedback about it. Thus, uninteresting or dangerous people will be immediately visible to other people. Security of users will be guaranted by bars and only verified places will be included in Friday. All users data are confidential and their contact information such as phone number, social network page and e-mail is transmitted only after confirmation of the meeting if the user specified this information.
 

 
Business focus
 
Friday is an excellent platform for advertising places and events. They can be allocated on the map, searching or using the function "Offer of the day in your city". Thus, by opening the application, users will see your place one of the first.


AdvertisingFriday is an excellent platform for advertising places and events. They can be allocated on the map, searching or using the function "Offer of the day in your city". Thus, by opening the application, users will see your place one of the first. 

Statistics and feedbackWe will provide full statistics of your establishment as well as collect feedbacks and proactive visitors. This is a great way to test innovations in the menu, check how often your cocktail "Daiquiri" is bought and if the visitors like your new guard. 

Additional reality and eventsThanks to additional reality we will single out your institution among others. Also we will create for you a quest to find invitations to parties or coupons for cocktails or show the shortest way to your bar. 


 
How the idea comes 
"Once I met my friend to drink beer and talk. But something went wrong. I was sitting in my armchair and drinking beer glass by glass, I used to try to find interesting topics for conversation , hoping that everything will change. Suddenly I saw a company at the bar.At that moment I felt a very big sadness, frustration and limitation of my actions because I was afraid to approach them. I felt wild animal fear. Later the idea to create a mobile application Friday appeared."Dmitry Yaroshevich 
We are absolutely sure that by creating a mobile application Friday, we will be able to change the world for the better. There will be far fewer lonely people in the world, people will start leaving the comfort zone and get to know each other, exchange experiences, ideas and smile. After all, what this world is, if we do not use the main gift that absolutely everyone has. This gift is communication.Nikita Gavrilovich
 
Our team
Dmitry Yaroshevich, 25 years old, marketing, design, advertising.
Engaged in advertising for over 7 years, in promotion of projects, he has good experience in managing and developing large and small companies.
Nikita Gavrilovich, 22, iOS developer.
Developing a mobile applications for more than 3 years. He is a person who devotes his life to development and mobile applications.

Premium account will accentuate you among other users in the application, will be raising your account much faster in the rating, will provide more opportunities for your account and help you become one of the best partyers in your city.

story:
Your all-in-one digital security companion

Secalot is a small USB dongle that carries four applications on board

It can help you in many ways:

 

Protect your emails.

Make your emails private and personal. Only once you connect your Secalot and enter a pin, would your emails become accessible.

Protect your files.

Want to keep a secret? Encrypt your files and only you would be able to access them by connecting a Secalot and entering a pin code.

Protect your bitcoins.

Secalot acts as a hardware bitcoin wallet. Your bitcoins are securely stored on the device and are always with you. You can access them everywhere.

Protect your web accounts.

Nobody except you would be able to login to your web accounts even if your password is compromised.

Protect your PC.

Securely login to your PC by connecting your Secalot and entering a pin code.

And much more.

 

Secalot is completely open source. Both software and hardware. Check us out on GitHub.

 

General features

Built upon open specifications and integrates with existing software.

Software and hardware are open source.

All applications work on Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, Linux.

No specialized drivers necessary.

Utilizes a secure microcontroller to perform cryptographic operations and store sensitive data.

High crypto performance. Dedicated secure cryptographic co-processor.

Secalot firmware is updatable. Allows us to release bug fixes and introduce new features.

 

Bitcoin wallet

Securely stores your wallet credentials on the device.

Integrates with the popular Electrum wallet.

PIN protected.

Confirm transaction with a button press on the device.

Your bitcoin keys do not leave the device after wallet creation.

Bip39 hierarchical deterministic wallet.

Wallet can be restored from a secret passphrase.

 

OpenPGP smart card

Securely stores your cryptographic keys without a possibility to retrieve them.

E-mail signing and encryption with GnuPG.

File encryption.

Secure OS logon.

Integrates with lots of applications with the help of the OpenSC PKCS#11 driver.

SSH authentication.

VPN access.

 

U2F authenticator

Helps to securely login to websites supporting the standard, like all Google services, GitHub and Dropbox, GitLab, Bitbucket and more.

You type your password, insert Secalot and press a button on the device.

Enables you to sing in to an unlimited number of services.

 

One time passwords

Secalot acts a USB keyboard, typing in your one time password upon a button press.

Securely login to a wide range of websites like Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, Wordpress.

Fully compatible with the Google authenticator app.

Works with secure password managers, like KeePass.

Supports time based and counter based one time passwords.

 

Touch buttons

Secalot features two touch buttons that allow you to confirm your actions in the bitcoin wallet, request a one time password and confirm user presence with the U2F authenticator.

 

Project timeline

 

 

Meet the team
